East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Ore wa Rufi! Kaizoku Ō ni naru Otoko da! (俺はルフィ！海賊王になる男だ！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: I'm Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the Pirate King!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: A band of pirates led by Alvida plundered a ship, only to find a barrel which contains a strange boy named Luffy. Luffy is on a quest to find the legendary treasure "One Piece" and he befriends the ship's cabin-boy, Koby, who actually wants to become a marine officer. Luffy defeats Alvida and the two journey on in search of crewmates.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Daikengō Arawaru! Kaizokugari Roronoa Zoro (大剣豪現る！海賊狩りロロノア・ゾロ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Great Swordsman Appears! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and Koby arrive at Shell Island, a Marine base. They meet the bounty hunter Roronoa Zoro, held under arrest by the infamous marine, Captain Morgan, and his son Helmeppo.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Mōgan tai Rufi! Nazo no Bishōjo wa Dare? (モーガンVSルフィ！謎の美少女は誰？)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Morgan vs. Luffy! Who's This Mysterious Beautiful Young Girl?
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy convinces Zoro to join his crew, but they must first defeat Captain Morgan. After freeing the island from Morgan's oppressive rule, Koby is accepted as a marine while the other two continue on their journey.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi no Kako! Akagami no Shankusu Tōjō (ルフィの過去！赤髪のシャンクス登場)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Past! The Red-Haired Shanks Appears!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Out on the sea, Luffy almost loses his hat and reflects on his past, and how a pirate named Shanks influenced him. Afterwards, Luffy meets Nami, and Buggy the Clown's men.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Kyōfu Nazo no Chikara! Kaizoku Dōke Bagī Senchō! (恐怖　謎の力！海賊道化バギー船長！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Fear, Mysterious Power! Pirate Clown Captain Buggy!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: In order to save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, Nami tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to Buggy.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Zettai Zetsumei! Mōjūtsukai Mōji VS Rufi! (絶体絶命！猛獣使いモージＶＳルフィ！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Mohji and Richie show up for revenge after Buggy's humiliating defeat in the previous episode, and Luffy meets a small dog guarding his master's store, even though he knows that he is long dead.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Sōzetsu Kettō! Kengō Zoro VS Kyokugei no Kabaji! (壮絶決闘！剣豪ゾロＶＳ曲芸のカバジ！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Grand Duel! Zoro the Swordsman vs. Cabaji the Acrobat!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Enraged by the actions of Buggy's crew, the city's mayor rushes to fight Buggy himself, but the Straw Hat Pirates come to his rescue. Zoro fights Cabaji, despite still being wounded from his previous encounter with Buggy, while Luffy faces the clown pirate himself and Nami searches for the map to the Grand Line.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Shōsha wa Docchi? Akuma no Mi no Nōryoku Taiketsu! (勝者はどっち？悪魔の実の能力対決！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Who Will Win? Showdown Between the True Powers of the Devil Fruit!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Buggy's link to Shanks is revealed, and when he rips the straw hat Shanks gave Luffy, his rage knows no bounds. Who will win in this clash between Devil Fruit users?

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Seigi no usotsuki? Kyaputen Usoppu (正義のうそつき?キャプテンウソップ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: With Nami forming an alliance with the crew as their navigator (though not as an actual member), the crew arrives at the Syrup Village in search of a proper ship, where they meet the town liar, Usopp, who too has ties to Shanks.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Shijō saikyō no henna yatsu! Saiminjutsushi Jango (史上最強の変な奴！催眠術師ジャンゴ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The World's Strongest Weirdo! Jango the Hypnotist!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: When trying to convince his rich friend, Kaya, to give the Straw Hats a ship, Usopp is told to stay away from her by her caretaker, Klahadore. However, when Usopp and Luffy later see him conversing with a strange man, they learn of a plot to kill Kaya.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Inbō o abake! Kaizoku shitsuji Kyaputen Kuro (陰謀を暴け！海賊執事キャプテンクロ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Revealing the Conspiracy! The Pirate Caretaker, Captain Kuro!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: After learning of Captain Kuro's evil plan, Usopp runs back to the village to warn Kaya, only to find that after all his years of lying no one believes him.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Gekitotsu! Kuroneko kaizoku-dan sakamichi no daikōbō! (激突！クロネコ海賊団坂道の大攻防！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Battle! The Black Cat Pirate Crew. Battle on the Slope!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp resolves to keep his story of pirates attacking the town a lie by making sure none reach it. Luffy, Zoro, Nami, and Usopp then try to keep the Black Cat Pirates at bay.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Kyōfu no futarigumi! Nyāban Burazāsu VS Zoro (恐怖の二人組！ニャーバン兄弟VSゾロ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Terrifying Duo! Nyaban Brothers vs. Zoro
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats manage to take out most of the opposing Black Cat Pirates, so Jango orders the Nyaban Brothers to attack. Meanwhile, after getting hypnotized by Jango, Luffy gets himself stuck under the collapsed mast of the Black Cat Pirates' ship.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi fukkatsu! Kaya ojō-sama no kesshi no teikō (ルフィ復活！カヤお嬢様の決死の抵抗)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Revival! Miss Kaya's Life and Death Confrontation
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Captain Kuro himself arrives at the scene, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy being incapacitated, and the other two being too weak to handle him, things seem hopeless. However, Kaya herself appears to bargain with Kuro.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Kuro o taose! Otoko Usoppu namida no ketsui! (クロを倒せ！男ウソップ涙の決意！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Defeat Kuro! Usopp's Tear-filled Determination!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro and Buchi (of the Nyaban Brothers) face off once again as Luffy and Kuro begin their fight. Usopp orders the Usopp Pirates to run away with Kaya, but Jango goes after them. A flashback reveals how Captain Kuro faked his death with Captain Morgan and how he became Kaya's butler.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaya o mamore! Usoppu kaizokudan dai katsuyaku! (カヤを守れ！ウソップ海賊団大活躍！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Protect Kaya! Usopp Pirate Gang Takes Action!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: As the fight between Luffy and Kuro is close to an end, the Usopp Pirates do their best to avoid Jango.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Ikari bakuhatsu! Kuro vs Rufi kecchaku no yukue! (怒り爆発！クロVSルフィ決着の行方！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Completely Infuriated! Kuro vs. Luffy, Final Battle!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Kuro's ultimate attack, "Shakushi", attacks everything in the area, whether friend or foe, and Luffy becomes enraged by his lack of regard for his crew. Will Luffy's determination overcome Kuro's sheer speed?

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Anta ga chinjū! Gaimon to kimyō na nakama (あんたが珍獣！ガイモンと奇妙な仲間)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: You Are a Special Animal! Gaimon and His Bizarre Friends
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: With Usopp now in the crew and a new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure, only to encounter a strange man stuck in a treasure box that has also been looking for this treasure.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Santōryū no kako! Zoro to Kuina no chikai! (三刀流の過去！ゾロとくいなの誓い！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Past of the Three Swords! The Promise Between Zoro and Kuina!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: While Usopp & Luffy fool around with the ship's cannon one day, Zoro dreams about his childhood and the promise he made to Kuina.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Meimono Kokku! Kaijō Resutoran no Sanji (名物コック！海上レストランのサンジ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Famous Cook! Sanji of the Floating Restaurant
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The crew meets Johnny and Yosaku, Zoro's former companions, and they set sail for the Baratie restaurant in search of a cook.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Manekarezaru kyaku! Sanji no meshi to Gin no on (招かれざる客！サンジの飯とギンの恩)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: An Unexpected Guest! Sanji's Food and Gin's Grace
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Sanji, a cook at the Baratie, helps a starving pirate named Gin. Luffy begins his job as a waiter to pay for the damage he did to the Baratie, and tries to convince Sanji to join his crew.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Saikyō no kaizoku kantai! Teitoku Don Kurīku (最強の海賊艦隊！提督ドン・クリーク)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Greatest Pirate Fleet: Captain Don Krieg
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Gin returns to the Baratie with his also-starving captain, Don Krieg, to whom Sanji once more gives food, but Don Krieg betrays the cook once he regains his energy.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Mamore Baratie! Dai kaizoku - Akaashi no Zefu (守れバラティエ！大海賊・赫足のゼフ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate: Zeff the Red Leg
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: It is revealed that Chef Zeff was a great pirate known as Red Leg Zeff. Gin explains the catastrophe the fleet met in Grand Line when they encountered Hawk-Eyes Mihawk, and Krieg attempts to take control of the Baratie.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Taka no me no Mihōku! Kengō Zoro umi ni chiru (鷹の目のミホーク！剣豪ゾロ海に散る)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Hawk Eyes Mihawk! Swordsman Zoro Falls into the Sea!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: As Nami steals the Going Merry, Mihawk has returned to finish the job, but Zoro challenges him to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Hissatsu ashiwaza sakuretsu! Sanji vs Teppeki no Pāru (必殺足技炸裂！サンジVS鉄壁のパール)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Emergence of the Superb Kicking Skill: Sanji vs. the Iron Wall Pearl
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Mihawk leaves after defeating Zoro, so Krieg continues his invasion and has Pearl, one of his stronger crewmates, attack, and Sanji reveals his fighting skills. Meanwhile Johnny and Yosaku leave with Usopp and the wounded Zoro to go after Nami.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Zefu to Sanji no yume Maboroshi no Ōruburū (ゼフとサンジの夢　幻のオールブルー)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Zeff and Sanji's Ambition: The Sea of Dreams - All Blue
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: With Zeff held captive by Gin, Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Reitetsu hijō no kijin kaizoku kantai sōchō Gin (冷徹非情の鬼人　海賊艦隊総隊長ギン)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Coldhearted Demon: Pirate Fleet Battle Commander Gin
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Gin finishes off Pearl, claiming that he wants to kill Sanji himself. Still wounded, Sanji faces Gin while Luffy attacks Don Krieg.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Shinanee yo! Gekitō Rufi vs Kurīku! (死なねェよ!激闘ルフィVSクリーク!)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: I Won't Die! Conclusion: Luffy vs. Krieg
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: When Gin refuses to kill Sanji, Krieg uses a poison gas on him. Luffy seems to have the advantage in the fight until Krieg pulls out his explosive Battle Spear.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Shitō no Kecchaku! Hara ni kukutta ippon no yari! (死闘の決着！腹にくくった１本の槍！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Outcome of a Deadly Battle! The Inner Spear!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Even after taking several hits from the Battle Spear, Luffy refuses to give up.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Tabidachi! Umi no Kokku wa Rufi to tomo ni (旅立ち！海のコックはルフィとともに)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Departure! Sea Chef and Luffy Travel Together!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: After the battle, Gin decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg despite still being poisoned, and Sanji makes the difficult decision on whether to stay or to go with Luffy just as Yosaku comes back with news that he knows where Nami is.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Higashi no umi saiaku no otoko! Gyojin kaizoku Āron! (東の海最悪の男！魚人海賊アーロン！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Most Wicked Man of East Blue, Fishman Pirate Arlong
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The crew chases after Nami, who stole their ship, and Yosaku takes time during the trip to explain about Arlong and his Fishmen to Luffy and Sanji. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro arrive at the island Nami docked at.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Kokoyashi mura no majo! Āron no jokanbu (ココヤシ村の魔女！アーロンの女幹部)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Witch of Cocoyashi Village, Arlong's Female Officer
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro is captured by the fishmen after Usopp and Johnny ditch him, and it's revealed that Nami was part of Arlong's crew the entire time. When a group of Fishmen attack Cocoyashi Village, Usopp comes to the rescue.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Usoppo shisu? Rufi jōriku wa mada? (ウソップ死す？！ルフィ上陸はまだ？)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Usopp's Death?! Luffy - Yet To Land?
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: After Zoro escapes with Nami's help, she tries to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates by appearing to kill Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finally arrives at the island.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Zen'in shūketsu! Usoppu ga kataru Nami no shinjitsu (全員集結！ウソップが語るナミの真実)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Reunited! Usopp Tells Nami's True Story
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Johnny tells the others about Nami killing Usopp, and Luffy does not believe them until Nami appears herself and confirms it. She tells them to stay out of her business and leave without her, but Luffy stubbornly decides to stay on the island. Usopp returns, revealing that Nami only pretended to kill him, and Nami's sister, Nojiko, starts to explain why Nami is acting the way she is.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Himerareta kako! Josenshi Berumēru! (秘められた過去！女戦士ベルメール！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Hidden Past! Female Fighter Bellemere!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Nojiko starts her story about Nami's childhood and their adopted mother, Bellemere. Despite being poor and none of them being related by blood, they had a happy life.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Ikinuke! Haha Berumēru to Nami no kizuna! (生き抜け！母ベルメールとナミの絆！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Survive! The Mother Bellemere and Nami's Family!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Nojiko continues her story, explaining how their life was ruined when the Arlong Pirates first took over the village.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi tatsu! Uragirareta yakusoku no ketsumatsu! (ルフィ立つ！裏切られた約束の結末！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy Stands Up! End of a Broken Promise!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: When a marine officer under Arlong's pay confiscates all the money Nami stole over the years, in order to one day buy the village from Arlong, the villagers decide that enough is enough and fight back, despite Nami's pleads that they do not and that they'd all be killed. Upon seeing Nami's sorrow, the Straw Hats head for Arlong Park.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Dai Pinchi! Gyojin vs Rufi kaizokudan (ルフィ大ピンチ！魚人VSルフィ海賊団)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy in Trouble! Fishmen vs. Luffy Pirates!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats face the Fishmen themselves as the villagers watch from the sidelines.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi suibotsu! Zoro vs tako no Hacchan (ルフィ水没！ゾロVSタコのはっちゃん)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy Drowning! Zoro vs. Octopus Hatchan!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Arlong has trapped Luffy in the ocean and Zoro faces the six-sword wielding octopus Hatchan.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Hokori takaki senshi! Gekitō Sanji to Usoppu (誇り高き戦士！激闘サンジとウソップ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Proud, Tall Warriors! Dramatic Battle of Sanji and Usopp!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: With Hatchan defeated, two of the fishmen battle Sanji and Usopp. Things look grim for Sanji as he attempts to face Kuroobi underwater, and Usopp gets the chance to prove that he too is a brave warrior.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Zenkai! Nami no ketsui to mugiwara bōshi (ルフィ全開！ナミの決意と麦わら帽子)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Best! Nami's Courage and the Straw Hat
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Arlong's officers have been defeated, but Sanji and Zoro prove to be no match for Arlong in their current state. However, with Luffy finally free, he just may be able to defeat the "most wicked man in the East Blue".  Meanwhile, Nami finally gathers the courage to face Arlong.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Sakuretsu! Gyojin Āron umi kara no mōkōgeki! (炸裂！魚人ア!）ロン海からの猛攻撃！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Bursting Out! Fishman Arlong, Fearsome Attack From The Sea!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy returns to the fight, and the battle with Arlong versus Luffy begins.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Gyojin teikoku no owari! Nami wa ore no nakama da! (魚人帝国の終わり！ナミは俺の仲間だ！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The End of the Fishman Empire! Nami is my Friend!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The battle spreads into Arlong Park itself and Arlong is no longer holding back.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Egao no tabidachi! Saraba furusato Kokoyashi mura (笑顔の旅立ち！さらば故郷ココヤシ村)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Setting off with a Smile! Farewell my Hometown, Cocoyashi Village!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Arlong's reign of terror is over, and no one has anything on their mind except to party. As the crew celebrates, Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Shōkinkubi! Mugiwara no Rufi yo ni shirewataru (賞金首！麦わらのルフィ世に知れ渡る)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes World Famous!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: As a result of defeating Buggy, Krieg and Arlong, Luffy now has the highest bounty in all of East Blue. News quickly spreads to Shanks, who celebrates Luffy's arrival into the world of pirates by partying with Mihawk, despite already being severely hungover.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Mugiwara o oe! Chīsana Bagī no dai bōken (麦わらを追え！小さなバギーの大冒険)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Following the Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: After his fight with Luffy, Buggy was sent flying to another island with several body parts missing. Thus, Buggy begins his journey to find his crew and his body parts, making some unlikely friends.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Omachi ka ne! Aa fukkatsu no Bagī Senchō (お待ちかね！あぁ復活のバギー船長！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: You've Been Waiting For It! The Return of Captain Buggy!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: With Buggy assumed to be dead, his crew fights over who will be the new captain, only to be captured by a tribe of cannibals.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Hajimari to owari no machi - Rōgutaun jōriku (始まりと終りの町・ローグタウン上陸)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Town of the Beginning and the End - Arrival at Loguetown
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The crew arrives at the last large town before the entrance to the Grand Line--Loguetown, the place where Gold Roger was both born and executed, where they stock up on supplies and sightsee. As Luffy heads for the execution platform where Roger was killed, old enemies are searching for him.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Sandai Kitetsu to Yubashiri! Zoro no Shintō to Onna Sōchō (三代鬼徹と雪走！ゾロの新刀と女曹長)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Sandai Kitetsu and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords, and the Female Sergeant Major
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: While searching for new swords to replace the ones shattered by Mihawk, Zoro meets a woman named Tashigi, who looks exactly like an older Kuina, who then helps him look for his new swords.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Usoppu vs kozure no Dadi mahiru no kettō (ウソップVS子連れのダディ真昼の決闘)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Usopp vs. Daddy The Father! Showdown at High Noon!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp manages to anger the daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father, and finds his own life at stake. When Daddy discovers that Usopp is the son of Yasopp, the only man to beat him, he challenges him to a duel.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Honō no Ryōri batoru? Sanji vs bijin shefu (炎の料理バトル?サンジVS美人シェフ)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: A Burning Culinary Battle? Sanji vs. The Gorgeous Chef
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: In order to win a rare fish, Sanji enters a cooking contest and faces a woman named Carmen.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Bagī no ribenji! Shokeidai de warau otoko! (バギーのリベンジ！処刑台で笑う男！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Buggy's Revenge! The Man who Smiles at the Execution Platform!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy arrives at the execution platform only to be caught in a trap by Buggy and Alvida.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Densetsu wa hajimatta! Mezase Gurando Rain (伝説は始まった！目指せ偉大なる航路)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Legend Has Begun! Head to the Grand Line
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Miraculously saved from death by an unnatural green gust and a lightning bolt to Buggy, the Straw Hats rush out of Loguetown, only for Zoro to be stopped by Tashigi and Luffy to be stopped by Captain Smoker.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Arata naru bōken no yokan! Nazo no shōjo Apisu (新たなる冒険の予感！謎の少女アピス)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Foreboding of a New Adventure! The Puzzling Girl, Apis
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: On a stormy night a girl called Apis escapes from the Marines and arrives at Straw hat's ship, but the girl upon knowing that they are pirates begins to hide some of the reasons which she is being wanted by the Marines. As the Straw Hats escape from the Marines, they get caught in the Calm Belt.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Kiseki no ikimono! Apisu no himitsu to densetsu no shima (奇跡の生物！アピスの秘密と伝説の島)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: The Holy Beast! Apis' Secret and the Legendary Island
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: The Calm Belt is revealed to have no winds or currents as well as being the home of many giant sea kings. Apis forms a plan with Luffy's help and escapes the sea kings by riding with one's sneeze. Later, the crew reaches Warship Island, where they listen to the soporific story of the island's creation. After following Apis into a cave where a dragon is hidden, Luffy and Nami find the reason why Apis is being chased.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Erikku shutsugeki! Gunkanjima kara no dai dasshutsu! (エリック出撃！軍艦島からの大脱出！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Eric's Raid! Great Escape from Gunkan Island!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Now that the crew is informed about the reasons for which Apis was followed, they hurry to escape the island so Ryuuji could be saved, but they meet with a foe that wants Ryuuji to himself. Zoro and Usopp bring the ship to a thin rock at the side while Nami and Apis get Ryuuji onto a cart. Luffy and Sanji fight the Marines to buy time for all preparations. In the end, the ship pulls the cart away on the search for Lost Island.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Zekkai no kojima! Densetsu no rosuto airando (絶海の孤島！伝説のロストアイランド)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Lone Island in a Distant Sea! The Legendary Lost Island
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: After arriving to what might seemed as the Lost Island the Straw hats where looking for, they find an old Temple with paintings that might indicate where the Lost Island really is, and also Eric who has been following them throughout the sea.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Haikyō no kettō! Kinpaku no Zoro tai Erikku! (廃墟の決闘！緊迫のゾロ対エリック！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Duel in the Ruins! Strained Zoro vs. Eric
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro is left fighting with Eric while Luffy and the gang run to the ship in order to get to Lost Island, but only find more problems.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Kanzen Hōi! Teitoku Neruson no Hissaku (ルフィ完全包囲！提督ネルソンの秘策)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy, Completely Surrounded! Admiral Nelson's Secret Plan
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: At last Admiral Nelson has seen through the ambitions of Eric, but takes it a little too personally and now the mystical dragon's life is in danger.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Ōsora o mau mono! Yomigaeru sennen no densetsu! (大空を舞うもの！蘇る千年の伝説！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Those Who Soar in the Open Skies! Revival of the 1000 Year Legend
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: With his last breath, Ryuuji calls all his fellow dragons, and the Lost Island re-surfaced. Meanwhile Luffy takes out Admiral Nelson and his gang.

East Blue Saga.episode_name_jp: Ikari no Ketchaku! Akai tairiku o norikoero! (怒りの決着！赤い大陸を乗り越えろ！)
East Blue Saga.episode_name_en: Angry Finale! Cross the Red Line!
East Blue Saga.episode_sumary: After leaving Warship Island the Going Merry is now towards the Grand Line, and the crew now returns to the Great Adventure.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Maruko! Shirohige no Katami no Shugosha (マルコ! 白ひげの形見の守護者)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Nekomamushi arrived somewhere in the New World to meet Marco. Nekomamushi's comrades saw an abandoned village and waited for Nekomamushi near their ship. Marco helps the people at the hidden village and reminisces the times that he spent with Whitebeard. After that, Marco was shocked to hear that the Straw Hats are starting a war with Kaido and tells Nekomamushi to give a message for Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Takinobori! Wano Kuni no Kaiiki Dai-kōkai! (滝登り！ワノ国の海域大航海！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through Wano Country's Sea Zone!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After reading about the Levely in the newspaper, Luffy's group finds themselves in the perilous sea surrounding Wano Country, which leads to the bottom of a waterfall. Luffy uses the giant carp swimming around them to pull the crew and ship up the waterfall, but they end up sailing into a whirlpool at the top, causing Luffy to be submerged.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Wano Kuni! Sakuramau Samurai no Kuni e (ワノ国! 桜舞うサムライの国へ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Wano Country! To the Land of Dancing Sakura and Samurai
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro, Usopp, Franky, and Robin are incognito inside Wano Country. Zoro poses as a ronin, Usopp works as a merchant, Franky works as a carpenter, and Robin trains as a geisha. One night, Zoro is arrested for street murders. On the next day, he is sentenced to commit seppuku. Deducing that the magistrate is the culprit, Zoro attacks him and his men. Elsewhere, Luffy and the Thousand Sunny washed up on a beach.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Otama tōjō - Rufi tai Kaidō-gun! (お玉登場 ルフィ対カイドウ軍！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: While fighting the magistrate's men, Zoro retrieves his swords and demolishes the magistrate's home. Afterwards, Zoro becomes a wanted man. Back at Kuri Beach, Komachiyo and Hihimaru are fighting near the Thousand Sunny. Two Beasts Pirates arrive with a captive girl and try to capture Luffy. He easily defeats them and frees the girl, who introduces herself as Tama. After Tama tames Hihimaru, Luffy gets acquainted with her.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kanarazu kuru - Wano Kuni no Ēsu densetsu! (必ず来る ワノ国のエース伝説！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: He’ll Come! The Legend of Ace in Wano Country!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Otama uses every ingredient on-hand to create a feast for Luffy but has trouble with bad water; a friend tells Otama about the mysterious Ace.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tokubetsu-hen! Saikyō no shōkin kari shīdoru (特別編！ 最強の賞金狩りシードル)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Special Edition! - The Strongest Bounty Hunter Cider
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hat Pirates are ambushed by a group of bounty hunters led by Cidre out at sea. After escaping the attack, the Straw Hats go to an island with carbonated water. Luffy separates from his crew to explore the island. The bounty hunters attack him once again but Luffy also meets Boa Hancock again. They later go to the Cidre Guild's stronghold and encounter Cidre.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tokubetsu-hen! Rufi vs tansan-ō (特別編！ ルフィvs炭酸王)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Special Editon! - Luffy Vs Cidre Guild
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy battles Cidre, who equips his most powerful carbonated rig. Hancock defeats both Ginger and Guarana and turns them to stone. Cidre unleashes powerful attacks, but is unable to hurt Luffy, who defeats him. Afterwards, Luffy acquires an invitation to the Pirates Expo, and the former members of the Cidre Guild give the Straw Hats many barrels of cola for free. The Straw Hats sail to Delta Island for the Pirates Expo, and find out that it will have a race for Gol D. Roger's treasure.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: O-Tama Sukue - Mugiwara Kōya o Kakeru! (お玉救え 麦わら荒野を駆ける！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Save O-Tama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy reveals to O-Tama that Ace has died, causing her to pass out. Her master Tenguyama Hitetsu reveals that Tama grew close to Ace after he arrived at Wano Country and saved their home, Amigasa Village, from a famine. However, Amigasa Village was destroyed by X Drake during the Beasts Pirates' takeover. Luffy decides to take Tama to a doctor at the nearest town, and borrows Hitetsu's cursed Meito Nidai Kitetsu without Hitetsu's permission. Luffy and Tama arrive at a massive polluted wasteland when they run into Zoro saving a woman from attackers. Basil Hawkins then comes to confront Luffy and Zoro as they reunite, and the two of them prepare to fight.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shin'uchi！ Majutsu-shi Hōkinsu Tōjō (真打ち！　魔術師ホーキンス登場)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Headliner! The Magician Basil Hawkins Enters the Scene!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After a brief conversation, Luffy and Zoro battle against Hawkins and his men with Hawkins displaying the power of his Wara Wara no Mi, which enables him to redirect any damage done to him to one of his men. Komachiyo drags the two Straw Hats away from the battle

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Haiboku Kakutei - Sutorō Man no Mōkō! (敗北確定　ストローマンの猛攻！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Confirmed Defeat! The Assault of the Strawman!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The woman that Zoro saved earlier introduces herself as Tsuru. Upon seeing Tama in critical condition, Tsuru asked the two Straw Hats to bring Tama to her tea shop so she can help her. They later arrive at Okobore Town and on top of a mountain, Bepo, Shachi, and Penguin spotted Luffy and Zoro.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Saikō no Hi - O-Tama Hajimete no O-shiruko (最高の日　お玉初めてのおしるこ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Greatest Day! O-Tama’s First Oshiruko!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy, Tsuru, and Kiku prepare the medicine for Tama. Kiku also helps to bandage up Zoro after he sustained injuries during the battle with Hawkins. After Tama recovered, Tsuru gives her sweet red bean soup, which Tama declares to be the best birthday ever. Luffy and Zoro learn from Tsuru how Kaido and Orochi pollute the environment and turn Wano into a wasteland and the people are starving. Batman attacked Tsuru, but is saved by Zoro, while Tama was abducted by Gazelleman in the confusion.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tekijin Sennyū - Yakunin wa Bikoru Bakura-chō! (敵陣潜入　役人はびこる博羅町！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Entering Enemy Territory! The Protagonists Spread into the Town of Bakura!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy, Zoro, and Kiku chased after Gazelleman, riding on Komachiyo but they failed to catch up as he was too fast for them. He arrived in Holdem's residence in Bakura Town, the town where Orochi's officials and men of Kaido lives. He hands Tama over to Holdem, one of three headliners ruling over Bakura Town. Luffy's group arrived at the entrance of the town but were stop by the guards. Bepo, Sachi and Penguin saw them using a binocular from a nearby hilltop, and they ran to find Law, who was chilling in an abandoned building, and informed him that Luffy had appeared at the entrance of Bakura Town.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yokozuna Tōjō - O-Kiku Nerau Muteki no Urashima! (横綱登場 お菊狙う無敵の浦島!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Yokozuna Appears - The Invincible Urashima Goes After O-Kiku!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy, Zoro, Kiku, and Komachiyo enter Bakura Town to rescue Tama. They later come across Urashima participating in sumo matches. After Urashima's men grab Kiku and bring her to the ring, Kiku rejects Urashima by cutting off his topknot. Enraged, Urashima attacks Kiku, but Luffy steps in and clashes with him.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sumō Kessen - Mugiwara tai Saikyō no Yokozuna! (相撲決戦 麦わらVS最強の横綱！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Climactic Sumo Battle - Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy faces against Urashima in a sumo match. Holdem tries to pull off Tama's cheek until Luffy sends Urashima crashing into Holdem's residence.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi Gekido - Pinchi no Otama o Sukue! (ルフィ激怒　ピンチのお玉を救え！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy's Intense Anger! Save O-Tama from the Crisis!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy, Zoro, and Kiku fight back against the attacking Beasts Pirates and their samurai allies. Luffy calls out to Holdem, who approaches Luffy's group while holding Tama hostage.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Otama Dakkan Gekitō! Hōmudemu-sen! (お玉奪還　激闘！ホームデム戦！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Fighting for Otama! Fight against Holdem!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Holdem continues to taunt Luffy's group while holding Tama hostage, threatening to chew her up with Kamijiro. Kiku warns Luffy against attacking Holdem as Kuri is ruled by Jack, and he will destroy Bakura Town if they fight back. Speed arrived with the Treasure ship of food from Paradise Farm. Luffy ordered Zoro to steal the food cart, which he did with Kiku's help. Luffy proceed to punch Kamijiro and rescue Tama. When he saw the injuries on Tama's cheek from being pulled by Holdem with a pincer, he flew into a rage and punched Holdem with Red Hawk, where Tama see Ace in Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ikkiuchi - Majutsushi to Shi no Gekai! (一騎打ち 魔術師と死の外科医!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Strike - The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After defeating Holdem, Luffy grabs Tama and flees the scene. During the escape, they encounter Speed and Tama tames her. They then catch up to Zoro, Kiku, and Komachiyo as the latter three were fleeing with the stolen food cart. Meanwhile, Law fights Hawkins but their battle is interrupted when the food cart passes by them. After jumping on the food cart, Law reprimands Zoro for his group's actions.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nijusshūnen! - Tokubetsu-hen Romansu Dōn (２０周年！ 特別編ロマンスドーン)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: 20th Anniversary! - Special Romance Dawn
Wano Country.episode_sumary: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. The bird turns out to be the girl's lifelong companion that is being hunted for its magical blood.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Takarabune Tōrai - Rufitarō no Ongaeshi! (宝船到来 ルフィ太郎の恩返し！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Arrival of the Treasure Ship - Luffy-tarou Returns the Favor!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy's group delivers the stolen food cart to Okobore Town and Luffy also gives the residents clean water. After Luffy parted ways with Tama and Speed, Law takes the group to the ruins of Oden Castle.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nazo no Bohyō - Oden Jōseki de no Saikai! (謎の墓標 おでん城跡での再会！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Mysterious Gravestone - Reunion at the Oden Castle Ruins!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: While traveling to Oden Castle, Komachiyo, Law, Luffy, Zoro, and Kiku encounter a ferocious tiger. Zoro separates from the group to fight the tiger. The rest of the group later arrive at the ruins of Oden Castle. After seeing the graves of the Kouzuki Family, Luffy reunites with Kin'emon, Momonosuke, Sanji, Nami, Brook, Chopper, and Carrot. Once they are inside Oden Castle, Kin'emon reveals that he, Momonosuke, Kiku, Raizo, and Kanjuro came from the past.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Densetsu no Samurai - Rojā ga Horeta Otoko! (伝説の侍 ロジャーが惚れた男！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Legendary Samurai - A Man that Roger Favoured!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kin'emon explains to Luffy's group about the past such as Kouzuki Oden bringing order to Kuri, the day of his demise, and Toki sending Kin'emons group and Momonosuke to the future.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Datō Yonkō - Gokuhi Uchiiri Sakusen Hatsudō (打倒四皇 極秘討ち入り作戦発動)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Defeat the Emperor - The Secret Raid Plan Starts
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kin'emon explained to Luffy's group, who just arrived, the preparation they have done till now and assigned new tasks to them. He laid out the plan of how they are going to defeat Kaido, but there are still lots of work to do such as recruiting more allies and gathering more information on the enemy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Saikyō no Otoko - Tōzoku-dan Tōryō: Shutenmaru! (最強の男 盗賊団棟梁・酒天丸！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Strongest Man - Pillar of the Bandits, Shutenmaru!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: While Usopp is looking for allies in Wano Country, Shutenmaru and the Mt. Atama Thieves plunder Okobore Town. Jack suddenly arrives at Okobore Town and confronts Shutenmaru. Shutenmaru and Jack quickly get into a fight, but are interrupted when Kaido flies in his dragon form.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Zen'in Shōmetsu - Kaidō Ikari no Boro Buresu! (全員消滅 カイドウ怒りのボロブレス！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Everyone's Annihilated - Kaido's Bolo Breath of Rage!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Kiku start running towards the town to rescue them. However, Kaido heads towards the ruins of Oden Castle and destroys it with a single attack.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tsuini Gekitotsu - Mōkō Rufi tai Kaidō (遂に激突 猛攻ルフィVSカイドウ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Finally Clashing - The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Right after the destruction of Oden Castle, Luffy enters a furious battle with Kaido.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hakai-teki! Ichigeki Hissatsu no Raimei Hakke! (破壊的! 一撃必殺の雷鳴八卦!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill - Thunder Bagua!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy continues his furious battle with Kaido. Despite his best efforts, the battle ends in Luffy's defeat from just one blow.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Iki-jigoku! Rufi Kutsujoku no Dai Tankutsu-jō (生き地獄！ルフィ屈辱の大探掘場)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Life in Hell! Luffy's Place of Humiliation
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kaido dispatches Luffy, who ends up laboring in a mine and finding a familiar face; Okiku heads to Oden Castle to check on the Straw Hats.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Seichi Gekidō - Futeki ni Warau Yonkō Kurohige (聖地激動 不敵に笑う四皇黒ひげ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Holy Land in Tumult - The Emperor Blackbeard Laughts Boldly
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Perona learns from a newspaper that Gecko Moria is alive and prepares to leave Kuraigana Island to search for him. Moria and his zombie army attack Hachinosu to find Absalom only to learn that he had been killed.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ugokidasu - Datō Kaidō Daikeikaku! (動き出す 打倒カイドウ大計画！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Start of the Action - The Great Plan to Overthrow Kaido
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Dogstorm struggles to convince Shutenmaru to aid the operation; Sanji and others seek out recruits.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Dai Abare！ Shūjin Rufi to Kiddo！ (大暴れ！ 囚人ルフィとキッド！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Great Riot! Prisoner Luffy and Kid!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy and Kid's hard work in the labor camp nets them a lot of food but also causes warden Dobon to call for their execution.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Dai Hyōban! Sanji no Ohako Soba！ (大評判！ サンジの十八番そば！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Great Reputation! Sanji's Specialty Soba!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sanji tangles with some gang members who disrupt his soba business and learns that one of his customers has friends in high places.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Gōka Kenran - Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo: Komurasaki (豪華絢爛 ワノ国一の美女・小紫)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Magnificent - The Most Beautiful Woman of Wano, Komurasaki
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Wano's most popular courtesan heads to the palace, but a revenge plot threatens the proceedings.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ninkyō Den! Zoro to Tonoyasu Futaritabi! (任侠伝！ゾロとトの康二人旅！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro goes to a gambling house with Tonoyasu. After a brawl, they go to Ebisu Town. Meanwhile, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance works to steal weapons and food. Franky learns that Minatomo no longer has the blueprints of Kaido's mansion. He goes all over the Flower Capital searching for them but hits a dead end. At the shogun's castle, CP-0 attempts to negotiate with Orochi.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kinkyū Jitai - Biggu Mamu Dai-Sekkin! (緊急事態 ビッグ・マム大接近!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A State of Emergency - Big Mom Closes in!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The banquet at Orochi's palace begins and Robin begins her mission. Shinobu, Nami, and Brook sneak into the palace as well. Meanwhile, in Udon prison, Kid explains to Luffy and Caribou about how he lost his arm. Back at the Flower Capital, two of the Flying Six, Page One and X Drake arrive to hunt down Sanji. In the seas surrounding Wano Country, the Big Mom Pirates draw closer.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Miyako Sōzen! Sanji Nerau Arata na Shikaku (都騒然！サンジ狙う新たな刺客)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the Big Mom Pirates approach Wano Country, Kaido's subordinates try to get rid of them. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, another member of the Beasts Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in the city in search for Sanji.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Dai Katsuyaku! Seigi no O-Soba Masuku! (大活躍！正義のおそばマスク！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Great Success - Justice of O-Soba Mask!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As he confronts Page One, Sanji puts on his Raid Suit and displays its capabilities. Back in the shogun's castle, Robin sneaked around in an attempt to gather information but was soon confronted by the Orochi Oniwabanshu.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Zettai Zetsumei - Kyōi no Orochi Oniwabanshū (絶体絶命　脅威のオロチお庭番衆)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Desperate Situation - The Threatful Orochi Oniwabanshu
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Robin gets caught by the Orochi Oniwabanshu in Orochi's castle. The ninjas attack Robin in order to find the truth of her intentions but with the help of her Devil Fruit, she is able to get away from them. Meanwhile, Chopper, Kiku, Tama, and Momonosuke find Big Mom who gets drifted to the shore after the encounter with King. Chopper and the others then discover that Big Mom lost her memories.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shura-jō！ Ikareru Daija Shōgun Orochi (修羅場！ 怒れる大蛇将軍オロチ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A State of Chaos - Fearsome Snake Shogun Orochi
Wano Country.episode_sumary: At Kuri Beach, Chopper gives the amnesiac Big Mom a fake name. Back inside the shogun's castle, Orochi warns his guests about the return of the Nine Red Scabbards. Toko laughs out loud, enraging Orochi. As Orochi lashes out at Toko, Komurasaki steps in and slaps him. Komurasaki refuses to apologize for her transgression and Orochi transforms in a fit of rage and goes on a rampage. Robin tries to flee with Toko but she is found by the Orochi Oniwabanshu.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hana Chiru! Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo no Saigo (花散る! ワノ国一の美女の最期)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Flower Falls! The Final Moments of the Most Beautiful Woman in Wano Country
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Orochi takes his rage out on Komurasaki as Robin protects Toko. Brook, Nami, and Shinobu arrive at the banquet hall to aid Robin. Right after Orochi releases his grip on Komurasaki during the commotion, Kyoshiro faces the oiran and seemingly cuts her down. Orochi then pursues Robin and Toko, intending to kill the little girl. Nami manages to stop Orochi with Zeus' help. Afterwards, the group at the castle escapes with Shinobu. At Okobore Town, Chopper's group convinces Big Mom to travel with them to Udon.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shūjin no Kizuna - Rufi to Hyōjii! (囚人の絆 ルフィとヒョウじい!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Conciliation of Prisoners - Luffy and Grandpa Hyo!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: In the Ringo region, Kanjuro meets up with Shinobu's group at the Northern Cemetery. In Ebisu Town, Law's group learns from a newspaper that a funeral for Komurasaki will be held and that Kid escaped from Udon prison, the place where Chopper's group and Big Mom are currently traveling to. In Udon prison, Hyougoro tries to make good use of the meal tickets that Luffy generously gave to him, but Daifugo approaches and torments the elderly man.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ōkanban! Ekisai no Kuīn Arawaru! (大看板! 疫災のクイーン現る!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: All-Star! Queen the Plague Appears!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy kicks Daifugo to defend Hyougoro and then fights the guards until Babanuki fires a cannonball at him. Raizo manages to steal some keys from the Prisoner Mines executive tower. As Queen arrives at the Prisoner Mines, Luffy attempts to escape with Hyougoro.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yojinobore - Rufi Kesshi no Tōsōgeki! (よじ登れ ルフィ決死の逃走劇！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Climb - Luffy's Fleeing Play!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy hangs Hyougoro on his neck and starts scaling the cliffside. The Queen orders her goons to deal with them. Babanuki, with an elephant cannon in his chest, blasts them off the wall. Luffy gets surrounded by goons and with nowhere to go. Back in Ebisu, everyone is getting nice and comfortable. Sanji has disappeared and Zoro is all MIA again. Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are at the bathhouse chatting and gossiping while the octopus washes their back. Back at the labour camp, Queen decides what to do with Luffy and Hyougoro. Raizo gets caught when we watching from above, but suddenly a poof, and he’s gone. The goons tie deadly collars around Luffy and Hyougoro’s necks. It will chop their heads off if they fall outside the ring of combat! They will now have to face the prison guard in combat. Luffy is fully prepared for the battle!

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sei ka Shi ka - Kuīn no Ōzumō Inferuno (生か死かクイーンの大相撲地獄 (インフェルノ))
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Life or Death - Queen's Sumo Inferno
Wano Country.episode_sumary: At the Prisoner Mines, the Sumo Inferno begins, but Luffy easily defeated his opponents. Meanwhile at the Flower Capital bathhouse, Drake and Hawkins arrive to search for those associated with the Kouzuki Family. As Shinobu, Robin, and Nami are accosted by Hawkins, Sanji is revealed to be at the bathhouse as well. After a scuffle with Drake and Hawkins, Sanji escapes with Shinobu, Robin, and Nami. In the Ringo region, Zoro confronts the person who took Shusui.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Gyūkimaru! Zoro Oihagi-bashi no Kettō (牛鬼丸！ゾロおいはぎ橋の決闘)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Gyukimaru - Duel on Oihagi Bridge
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Sumo Inferno continues and Queen sends in the Gifters after Luffy defeats the Pleasures. At the Oihagi Bridge, Zoro clashes with Gyukimaru to get Shusui back. Their fight is interrupted when a woman and Toko arrive seeking help as they were chased by an assassin known as Kamazo. Zoro then decides to fight the assassin to protect the woman and the girl.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Dai-gyakuten! Shisen o koeta Santōryū (大逆転！ 死線を越えた三刀流！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Great Reversal - Santoryu Beyond the Deadline!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Due to a leak, those allied with the Kouzuki Family are getting arrested in the Flower Capital. During an argument with Shinobu, Law plans to rescue his crew. Meanwhile at Oihagi Bridge, Zoro continues his clash with Kamazo. Because of Gyukimaru's interference, Kamazo lands a hit on Zoro. However, Zoro manages to turn the battle around and defeats Kamazo.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Zoro Kyōgaku - Shōgeki! Nazo no Bijo no Shōtai (ゾロ驚愕 衝撃！謎の美女の正体)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Amazement of Zoro - True Identity of the Mysterious Beauty
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy continues trying to use an advanced Busoshoku Haki technique as he and Hyougoro are confronted by Alpacaman and Madilloman. After the battle with Kamazo, Zoro's wound is treated by the woman he saved. During their conversation, the woman revealed herself to be Momonosuke's sister, Hiyori.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Etoku Seyo - Wano Kuni no Haki, Ryūō! (会得せよ ワノ国の覇気・流桜)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Approach - Ryuo, the Haki of Wano Country
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After Hiyori revealed her identity to Zoro, she explains some aspects of her past, such as how Kawamatsu watched over her after her parents' death. Back in the Sumo Inferno, Hyougoro defeats Alpacaman, displaying his knowledge and skills with advanced Busoshoku Haki, and offers to teach Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tonoyasu! Ebisu-chō ichi no Ninkimono! (トの康！えびす町一の人気者！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Tonoyasu - The Star of Ebisu Town
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy tries to learn Ryuo through fighting in the Sumo Inferno. It continues until the night and will resume the next day. Luffy and Hyougoro meet Caribou and Raizo and talks about the rebellion. Tonoyasu speaks to and addresses Kanjuro and Shinobu casually, but they do not remember him. Meanwhile, Big Mom approaches Udon with Kiku, Chopper, Momonosuke, and Tama.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shōgeki Hashiru - Gizoku Ushimitsu Kozō no Shōtai (衝撃走る 義賊丑三つ小僧の正体)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Meet Easily - Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After his capture, Tonoyasu is sentenced to execution. Meanwhile, Holdem and his men battle the Mt. Atama Thieves. While clashing with Ashura Doji, Holdem sets the mountain on fire. In Ringo, Brook finds Zoro, Hiyori, and Toko and informs them of the impending execution in the Flower Capital.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ichimi Hashiru! Sukue Toware no Tonoyasu (一味疾る!救え囚われのトの康)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Malediction - Departure in Song of Tonoyasu
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Toko and Zoro's group make their way to the Flower Capital. As Shimotsuki Yasuie is placed on a wooden pole and is being broadcasted throughout Wano, his old acquaintances recognize him. The citizens of Ebisu Town and some of the Straw Hats rush to the execution. As Orochi heads to the execution site, Yasuie reveals that he lied about being Ushimitsu Kozo and plans to say a few things before meeting his demise.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Zoro no Ikari - Sumairu no Shinjitsu! (ゾロの怒り SMILEの真実)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Cruelty - The Reality of SMILE Devil Fruit!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After claiming responsibility for Kin'emon's secret message, saying it was a prank, and casting doubt in the Rasetsu prison guards, Yasuie meets a brutal end as Orochi and his men shoot him to death. As the Ebisu Town citizens "laugh" over Yasuie's death, Hiyori reveals to Zoro that they were affected by the fruits known as SMILE.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Toko no Namida! Orochi Hijō no Jūdan! (トコの涙！オロチ非情の銃弾！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Toko's Tears - Orochi's Painful Bullets!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the citizens of Ebisu Town grieve over Yasuie's death, Shinobu reveals more information about the SMILE fruits. Toko enters the execution site, hoping to revive her father. Seeing Toko, Orochi attempts to kill her as well, but Zoro and Sanji step in and save her.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ichimi Ran'nyū! Sōzen! Shokei-jō no Gekitō (一味乱入！騒然！ 処刑場の激闘)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Straw Hats Intrudes! Uproar! A Fierce Battle at the Execution Room
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi's clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, a new criminal, Hitokiri Kamazo, has arrived. And someone else who is brought to the site reveals the shocking truth about Kamazo.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi no Ketsui - Yabure Ōzumō Inferuno! (ルフィの決意 破れ大相撲!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy's Determination - Win Through the Sumo Inferno!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro keeps fighting Kyoshiro, but Orochi's Oniwabanshu comes to back Kyoshiro up. Meanwhile at the Excavation Labor Camp, Queen announces the restart of the Sumo Inferno with a new cruel rule which is painful not only to Luffy, but also to Kid and Killer.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Arashi Tōrai! Ō-abare Biggu Mamu! (嵐到来！ 大暴れビッグ・マム！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Coming of the Storm! Big Mom's Great Rampage!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kin'emon apologizes Ashura Doji AKA Shutenmaru for goading Holdem to attack Atamayama where Ashura's hideout was located, and asks him to join the fight against Kaido. Meanwhile, Chopper and his group finally arrived at the Excavation Labor Camp and Big Mom forces her way in to find her favorite soup!

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Oshiruko no Urami - Rufi Zettai Zetsumei (おしるこの恨み ルフィ絶体絶命)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Grudge Over Oshiruko - Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Craving read-bean soup, Big Mom attacks Queen, the Animal Kingdom Pirates' Lead Performer who reigns over Udon. However, when she finds out that the pot is empty, she turns her wrath against the one who ate it all: Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yonkō o Tomero! Kuīn no Hisaku (四皇を止めろ！クイーンの秘策)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot of the red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goes after him.  Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stop the rampaging Big Mom.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Saikyō Heiki! Rufi o Nerau Ekisaito Dan (最凶兵器！ルフィを狙う疫災弾)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Brutal Ammunition!  The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki.  Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten the inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hangeki Kaishi! Rufi to Akazaya no Samurai! (反撃開始! ルフィと赤鞘の侍!)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Red Scabbard Samurai!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Raizo retrieves the keys to Kawamatsu's cell as well as his sword. The ninja later gives them to him, and Kawamatsu frees himself. After Raizo, Kawamatsu, and Kikunojo reunite, they joined up with Luffy and Hyougoro in fighting the Beasts Pirates. However, the Beasts Pirates continue infecting prisoners with Excite Bullets.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kachi ni Kita! Rufi Kesshi no Sakebi (勝ちに来た！ルフィ決死の叫び)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: We're Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tsuwamono-domo ga Yume! Rufi Udon Seiatsu! (兵どもが夢！ルフィ兎丼制圧！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Warriors' Dreams - Takeover of Udon
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After Udon is conquered, Chopper tends to Luffy and works to develop a cure for his condition. Luffy asks Kid to join the fight against Kaido, but Kid rejects his offer and leaves Udon with Killer. After finding out that Luffy is a pirate, the prisoners distrust him, but Momonosuke speaks to them and convinces them to join the cause to liberate Wano Country. Elsewhere, Ashura Doji reveals to Kin'emon and Inuarashi that he had comrades who were too impatient to wait for the Kouzuki Family to return and died when they tried to fight Kaido. Afterwards, Ashura comes around and decides to rejoin Kin'emon.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Orochi no Otte! Ninja Gundan tai Zoro (オロチの追手！忍者軍団VSゾロ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Orochi's Pursuers! Ninja Army Corps vs. Zoro
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi’s ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Onigashima Kinpaku! Sōgū!? Futari no Yonkō (鬼ヶ島緊迫！遭遇！？二人の四皇)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Tensions on Onigashima! Encounter?! The Two Emperors
Wano Country.episode_sumary: In Ebisu Town, Kanjuro takes Yasuie's body to give it a memorial service in Kuri, and he, Nami, and Franky ride off. Meanwhile, Usopp, Robin, and Brook are riding a boat to Kuri when they are stopped at a wharf for inspection. Usopp and Robin avoid recognition by distorting their faces, and the guards desire to let them through quickly due to fearing Brook's presence. As they sail on, Robin takes the sleeping Toko from Brook to give her warmth. Meanwhile, Ashura Doji takes Kin'emon's group to Kuri's abandoned southwestern port, where he shows them several boats that Kaido damaged during the first attack on Onigashima. On Onigashima, the Beasts Pirates race to make sweets for Big Mom, and frantically rush back and forth as she eats them at a fast rate. King, Queen, and Jack watch her during this, and Queen expresses his anger at King for his lack of thoroughness in attacking the Big Mom Pirates outside Wano.  Big Mom then tells King that she will forgive him for attacking her if he joins her crew, as there are three races currently missing from Totto Land's population and he is a member of one of them. King refuses, and Big Mom asks for her chains to be removed, which Queen angrily rejects. However, Kaido then arrives and orders for Big Mom to be released as he faces his former crewmate for the first time in many years. Kaido's subordinates try to find a way out of his command, but he affirms what he said and they remove Big Mom's chains. Big Mom then activates Napoleon's sword form as Napoleon refamiliarizes itself with her, and she and Kaido engage in a clash so powerful it splits the heavens above the island. Meanwhile, Zoro and Hiyori return to Oihagi Bridge. Zoro fights Gyukimaru again until Kawamatsu interrupts them. Hiyori then reunites with Kawamatsu, but some Beasts Pirates arrive and attack the group.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hiyori no Kokuhaku! Oihagi-bashi no Saikai (日和の告白！おいはぎ橋の再会)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Hiyori's Confession! Reunion on Oihagi Bridge
Wano Country.episode_sumary: At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom continue fighting unabated, having been doing so all night. Kaido's subordinates get more and more afraid about the condition of the island, and wonder if they should flee. Queen berates them for their cowardice, but then asks if there have been any reports from Udon. Upon hearing that there is still no Tanishi signal, he decides to go and check on it, prompting questions from his subordinates about his hypocrisy. Suddenly, Queen receives a call on his Tanishi from Babanuki, who says that communications have been restored. Queen asks if he needs backup, and Babanuki says that there is no need, as Luffy, Kid, and all the prisoners have been put back in their cells. This disappoints Queen, as he wanted a reason to leave Onigashima. Back in the Prisoner Mines, Babanuki hangs up and is praised by Tama, who has tamed him with her power. Caribou looks forward to surprising the Beasts Pirates during the final battle. The freed prisoners thank Chopper for curing them of the Mummy virus and promise to repay him with their lives if necessary, although Chopper downplays his accomplishment and points them to the rejuvenated Luffy. Back on Oihagi Bridge, Hiyori tearfully embraces Kawamatsu, being overjoyed to get the chance to see him again. She confesses that she ran away from him 13 years ago because he always gave the food to her, and she had hoped this would help him survive.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sono Na wa Enma! Oden no Meitō! (その名は閻魔！おでんの名刀！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Meito!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kawamatsu reveals that after Hiyori left him, he went to Ringo, where he encountered Onimaru, a komagitsune who was the companion of Ringo's late daimyo Shimotsuki Ushimaru. Until Kawamatsu was caught and arrested, he had worked with Onimaru to collect the weapons left on the graves in the cemetery in order to use them in the final battle against Kaido. In the present, Gyukimaru leads Zoro, Kawamatsu, and Hiyori to an underground chamber where all these weapons have been stored, and Kawamatsu contacts Kin'emon to reveal that they can easily arm their allies come the final battle. Outside, Gyukimaru transforms into Onimaru. Hiyori then tells Zoro to return Shusui, and in exchange she will give him the Meito Enma, a blade wielded by her father that was able to wound Kaido.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Arata na Dōmei!? Kaidō-gun Dai Shūketsu (新たな同盟！？カイドウ軍大集結)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A New Alliance?! Kaido's Army Great Assemble
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro accepts Hiyori's offer to give him Enma in place of Shusui, despite Kawamatsu's reservations. Law is freed from his imprisonment by a mysterious figure, and he cuts up Hawkins, who reveals that his alliance with Kid and Apoo was blown up due to Apoo secretly working for Kaido from the start. Two days later, several of the Straw Hats and Kouzuki Family retainers meet up to discuss the strategy for the final battle, and Kin'emon reveals that Yasuie changed their secret message to have their allies meet at Port Tokage in Udon. Meanwhile, Apoo and the Numbers have arrived at Wano for the Fire Festival, and on Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom reveal to King and Queen that they have formed an alliance to take over the world.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Semaru Kessen! Mugiwara Ichimi Sentō Taisei (迫る決戦！麦わら一味戦闘態勢)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Decisive Battle Draws Near! The Straw Hat Crew Ready for Battle
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Hitetsu gives Enma to Zoro, and Zoro takes control of it after preventing it from draining his Haki. Hitetsu reveals that Wado Ichimonji was made by the same swordsmith who made Enma: Shimotsuki Kouzaburou, who had illegally left Wano many decades ago. Three days pass, and by the day before the raid, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance has added hundreds of new allies, though they are still vastly outnumbered by Kaido and Orochi's forces and were unable to free the prisoners in Rasetsu Town. Luffy continues to train and successfully strengthens his Haki. However, Orochi is aware of the alliance's new meeting spot after deciphering Yasuie's alteration to the secret message, and he also knows where Hiyori is.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Biggu Nyūsu! Shichibukai o Osou Jiken (大ニュース！七武海を襲う事件)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Big News! The Warlords Attack Incident
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After the Levely concluded, big news concerning Sabo spread throughout the world. Those who knew Sabo become distressed after reading the news about him. Koby and X Drake have a private conversation via transponder snail, and Drake informs Koby about the newly formed alliance between Kaido and Big Mom and the recent presence of CP-0 in Wano Country. Thanks to the efforts of Nefertari Cobra and Riku Doldo III, the Seven Warlords of the Sea have been abolished. Now that the Warlords are no longer affiliated with the World Government, the Marines pursue the former members.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Densetsu no Tatakai! Gāpu to Rojā (伝説の戦い！ガープとロジャー)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sakazuki and Fujitora talk about the fate of the recently-ousted Seven Warlords of the Sea while the other Marines discuss the recently-formed alliance between Kaido and Big Mom, with some worrying that Rocks has returned. Afterwards, they discuss Rocks and his crew, the Rocks Pirates, in which three of the Four Emperors have been members as well as a team-up between Garp and Roger to defeat them. Afterwards, Roger's and all the Emperors's bounties have been revealed.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yakusoku no Minato! Wano Kuni-hen Daisanmaku Kaimaku (約束の港！ワノ国編第三幕開幕)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Promised Port! Wano Country Arc Act 3 Opening
Wano Country.episode_sumary: 25 years ago, Kouzuki Oden parted ways with the Roger Pirates after their voyage to Laugh Tale, seeking to open Wano Country's borders. In the present, Orochi heads to Onigashima from Port Habu to partake in the Fire Festival, and as twilight draws near, the Nine Red Scabbards reach Port Tokage. However, none of their allies are there, and they cannot get in contact with anyone, including the Straw Hats.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Wano Kuni Ichi no Samurai! Kōzuki Oden Tōjō (ワノ国一の侍！光月おでん登場)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Best Samurai in Wano Country! Kouzuki Oden Appears
Wano Country.episode_sumary: It is revealed that Orochi had the Beasts Pirates bombed the Thousand Sunny and destroyed some bridges to cut off routes to Tokage Port. At the port, the Nine Red Scabbards prepare to continue with the raid on their own. A flashback to many years ago begins. Back then, Oden was a well-known troublemaker. A younger Kin'emon takes a baby white boar from some thugs and brings it to the Flower Capital to gain money. However, the boar's parent, the Mountain God, arrives at the capital and wreaks havoc.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Namida no Deshiiri - Oden to Kin'emon (涙の弟子入り おでんと錦えもん)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Tearful Apprentice - Oden and Kin'emon
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Mountain God continues its rampage in the Flower Capital until Oden confronts and defeats it. After this incident, Oden was expelled from the capital. Due to their admiration for Oden, Kin'emon and Denjiro decide to follow him. After staying with Shimotsuki Yasuie for a time, Oden decides to travel to Kuri. Along the way, Oden is also joined by Izou, Kikunojo, Kanjuro, and Raizo. Oden eventually arrives at Kuri and prepares to fight the bandits there.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ugoku Unmei Hyōchaku! Shirohige Kaizokudan! (動く運命漂着！白ひげ海賊団！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Moving Fate Drift Ashore! Whitebeard Pirates!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Oden defeats Ashura Doji and earns the title of the Daimyo of Kuri. He then spends years rebuilding the lawless land and eventually rescues and nurtures Nekomamushi, Inuarashi, and Kawamatsu. Yasuie then gives gold to Oden's retainers to let them train and become worthy samurai. Oden and his retainers become distinguished legends in Wano, and Kouzuki Sukiyaki is proud of Oden's accomplishments. Meanwhile, the Whitebeard Pirates cast ashore the beaches of Wano.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Oden no Ketsui! Shirohige no Shiren! (おでんの決意！白ひげの試練！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Oden's Determination! Whitebeard's Trials!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kouzuki Oden's dreams to leave Wano lead him directly to Whitebeard after he learns of the pirate's arrival. After a brief battle, Oden begs Whitebeard to let him join his crew. Whitebeard denies his request due to concerns about Oden's character. Once their ship is repaired, the Whitebeard Pirates leave at night to avoid Oden's advances but he catches up anyway, attaching a chain to the ship and riding with Izou through the ocean. Marco saves Izou and brings him onto the Moby Dick where he is tied up. Whitebeard tells Oden that if he holds on for three days, he can join the crew. Three days have passed and Oden only has an hour left before he can join the crew. However, after hearing the screams of Amatsuki Toki, Oden lets go of the chain to save her life.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shirohige no Otōto! Oden no Dai Bōken! (白ひげの弟！おでんの大冒険！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Toki tends to Oden after he rescued her from the kidnappers. On the next day, they are confronted by the kidnappers and their leader, Karma. Whitebeard intervenes and knocks out Karma. Whitebeard accepts Oden into his crew because of his selflessness. Toki, Izou, and the stowaways Inuarashi and Nekomamushi become part of Whitebeard's crew as well. Oden travels to various places and has many eventful experiences. Oden and Toki also has a son together and the infant is given the name Kouzuki Momonosuke.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Majieru Yaiba! Rojā to Shirohige! (交える刃！ロジャーと白ひげ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Blades Crossed! Roger and Whitebeard!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Orochi plots to take the shogunate with Higurashi's assistance. As Oden continues his journey with the Whitebeard Pirates, he finally encounters the Roger Pirates. A clash between Whitebeard and Gol D. Roger ensues.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rojā no Negai! Aratana Tabidachi (ロジャーの願い！新たな旅立ち)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Roger's Wish! A New Adventure Begins!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After a battle between the Whitebeard Pirates and Roger Pirates, Oden agrees to accompany Roger on his final voyage to the last island due to his ability to read the Poneglyphs. He is joined by his family as well as stowaways Nekomamushi and Inuarashi.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shōgai o Kakete! Rojā no Bōken (生涯をかけて！ロジャーの冒険)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Bet of a Lifetime! Roger's Adventure
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Roger Pirates travel the Grand Line as they visit Skypiea, Water 7, Tequila Wolf, Sabaody Archipelago, and Fishman Island. At Fishman Island, the Roger Pirates are able to take a copy of a Road Poneglyph while a young Madam Shyarly predicts that the Ancient Weapon Poseidon will be born in 10 years.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kaizoku Ō Tanjō - Tōtatsu! "Saigo no Shima" (海賊王誕生 到達! "最後の島")
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Pirate King is Born - Arriving at the Last Island!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Toki becomes ill, and Oden is forced to drop off his family with Nekomamushi and Inuarashi at Wano Country while quickly taking a copy of the Road Poneglyph. The Roger Pirates travel to Zou to get a copy of the final Road Poneglyph needed in order to arrive at the final island. Before departing, Buggy becomes extremely ill and stays behind with Shanks taking care of him. When faced with the treasure on the last island, the Roger Pirates simply laugh while Roger expresses interest in the humorous tale of Joy Boy. Roger then becomes the King of the Pirates as he dubs the final island "Laugh Tale".

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Wano Kuni e! Rojā Kaizokudan Kaisan (ワノ国へ！ロジャー海賊団解散)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Roger returns from Laugh Tale as "King of the Pirates", making the Navy and other pirates become more aggressive towards the Roger Pirates. After picking up Shanks and Buggy, Roger decides to disband his pirate crew and leaves the ship. Oden returns to Kuri and discovers that Kurozumi Orochi is ruling over Wano Country as Shogun with the help of Kaidou and his Beast Pirates.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kanashiki Shirase - Dai Kaizoku Jidai Makuake (悲しき知らせ 大海賊時代幕開け)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Sad News - The Opening of the Great Pirate Era
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After learning how much pain Orochi has caused Wano Country, an enraged Oden attempts to kill the Shogun, but is foiled by Higurashi and Semimaru. After his failed attack, Oden visited the castle steps weekly to dance like a fool for coin. As a result, the people of Wano lost respect and grew angry at Kouzuki Oden. A year later, Oden receives news of Gol D. Roger's execution.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Uchiiri! Oden to Akazaya Kunin Otoko (討ち入り！おでんと赤鞘九人男)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Raid! Oden and the Nine Red Scabbards
Wano Country.episode_sumary: For five years, Oden brought shame to his family name on a promise from Orochi, though Orochi betrays Oden and commands him to build weapon factories all throughout Kuri. Oden travels with his Nine Red Scabbards to raid Orochi's Castle, but Kaidou and his army lie in wait and a battle ensues.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ketchaku no Toki! Oden tai Kaidō! (決着の時！おでんVSカイドウ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Moment of Conclusion! Oden vs. Kaido!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: King and Queen battle the Scabbards as Oden and Kaidou fight. Oden gets distracted by Higurashi disguised as Momonosuke, and Kaidou defeats Oden. Oden and the Scabbards are captured and sentenced to public execution.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kamayude no Kei - Oden Kesshi no Ichijikan (釜茹での刑 おでん決死の一時間)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Sentenced to Boil - Oden's Deadly Hour
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Oden and the Scabbards are sentenced to death by being boiled alive. During the public execution, Kaidou challenges Oden that if he and the Scabbards can survive the boiling pot for one hour, they can be freed. Oden jumps in the pot and carries the Scabbards on a plank so that they are technically "in the pot", thus saving their lives. Shinobu reveals to the spectators that Oden had been protecting the people of Wano for five years on the promise that Orochi would not kidnap them if Oden danced like a fool weekly.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: “Niete nanbo no Oden ni sōrō” (“煮えてなんぼのおでんに候“)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: I'm Oden, and I Was Born to Boil
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Oden survives being boiled alive for an hour in order to save the Scabbards. His dying wish is for Wano Country to be open to the world again. Orochi decides to shoot Oden and the Scabbards, but Oden throws the Scabbards for them to escape. Oden mocks Orochi and Kaidou shoots him dead.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Moeru Shiro! Kōzuki no Ichizoku no Unmei! (燃える城！光月の一族の運命！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Burning Castle! The Fate of the Kouzuki Clan!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Nine Red Scabbards return to Kuri to protect Toki, Momonosuke, and Hiyori. On the way to Kuri Castle, Dogstorm, Cat Viper, Ashura Doji, and Denjiro get left behind. The rest of the Scabbards reach the burning castle and apologize to Toki for Oden's death. Toki then sends Kin'emon, Kanjuro, Raizo, Kikunojo, and Momonosuke 20 years to the future. She leaves Hiyori in the care of Kawamatsu, and decides to stay behind in the burning castle as they escape.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Futatabi Genzai! Nijū-nen no Toki o Koete (再び現在！二十年の時をこえて)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Back to the Present! Beyond 20 Years
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Denjiro infiltrates Orochi's court under the name Kyoshiro. Hiyori escapes Kawamatsu's care and is found by Denjiro. He tells her to keep her true identity a secret and live in the capital as the oiran Komurasaki. In the present, word reaches Orochi of the Scabbards' arrival from the past. Orochi reveals to Kaidou that he has a spy within the Nine Red Scabbards willing to die for him.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Umi wa Kaizoku! Uchiiri! Iza Onigashima (海は海賊！討入り！いざ鬼ヶ島)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Pirates at Sea! Raid! Onward to Onigashima
Wano Country.episode_sumary: On the night of the raid, the Scabbards discover the ships at the port have been destroyed and the troops that were summoned did not show up. Kin'emon decides to continue the raid and board a small rowboat with the Scabbards. Kanjuro reveals himself as the spy who leaked information to Orochi, foiling the raid on Onigashima. Beast pirate ships attack the Scabbards' boat, but the Scabbards are saved by the pirate ships of Luffy, Law, and Kid.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Saiaku no Sedai Shingeki! Arashi no Umi no Tatakai (最悪の世代進撃！嵐の海の戦い)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Worst Generation Captains Luffy, Law, and Kid counter-attack against the Beast Pirate ships. Kyoshiro's ship comes and the Straw Hats prepare to battle him, but he sinks the enemy Beast Pirate ship instead.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kyōun!? Rīdā Kin'emon no Ikkei (強運！？リーダー錦えもんの一計)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Strong Luck!? Leader Kin'emon's Plan
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kyoshiro reveals himself to be Denjiro, and offers the aid of 1,200 troops to Kin'emon. The original 4,200 troops were able to meet at Habo Port Wharf safely due to Kin'emon's blunder; He mistakenly thought the meeting place was Tokage Port instead, misleading Kanjuro accidently. Kawamatsu battles with Kanjuro, but Kanjuro is able to kidnap and flee with Momonosuke.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Namida no Yakusoku! Sarawareta Momonosuke (涙の約束！さらわれたモモの助)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Promise of Tears! The Kidnapped Momonosuke
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kanjuro makes off with Momonosuke, though Momonosuke rallies the troops to attack Onigashima without him. A ship fires long ranged cannons and sink some of the samurai ships. Jinbe appears and destroys the ship and announces to all that he's joining the Straw Hat Pirates.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Arata na Nakama! Kaikyō no Jinbē! (新たな仲間！海侠のジンべエ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A New Companion! Knight of the Sea Jinbe!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats welcome Jinbe aboard the Thousand Sunny while the Scabbards discuss their plan of attack with Law, Denjiro, and Hyougoro. The Straw Hats attack the front gate of Onigashima.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kaidō no Kirifuda - Tobi Roppō Tōjō (カイドウの切り札 飛び六胞登場)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Kaido's Trump Card - Introducing the Tobi Roppo
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Queen performs during Orochi's banquet as the Tobi Roppo - Kaidou's Six Headliners below King, Queen, and Jack - are introduced. Kaidou inquires about his son's activities. As the Straw Hats toast Jinbe's induction to their crew, Kin'emon's forces start the raid on Onigashima. An eager Luffy postpones their toast in order to join the main attack.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Samurai-tachi no Honki! Ichimi Onigashima Jōriku (侍たちの本気！一味鬼ヶ島上陸)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Seriousness of the Samurai! The Crew Lands on Onigashima
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats reach the port of Onigashima and dispatch the guards stationed there. The samurai prepare for their surprise attack on the unalerted island. Their ships are too many in number for the port, so the determined samurai sink their ships so the troops can land ashore. Kin'emon uses his Garb-Garb ability to disguise the samurai, Kid Pirates, and Straw Hats as Beast Pirates.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi Bōsō!? Sen'nyū Kaidō no Utage (ルフィ暴走！？潜入カイドウの宴)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido's Banquet
