Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Kid Pirates go on ahead with their own agenda. Luffy pursues Kid and Zoro follows, but they get lost within the banquet. Luffy and Zoro get angered by the Beast Pirates lack of empathy for the poor citizens of Wano.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: O-Tama e no Omoi - Rufi Ikari no Ichigeki (お玉への思い ルフィ怒りの一撃)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Feelings Toward O-tama - Luffy's Furious Blow
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Tobi Roppo are summoned by Kaidou. He informs them of the alliance with Big Mom and orders them to find and bring him his son, Yamato, who is unaccounted for. The Kid Pirates get closer to reaching Kaidou. Luffy and Zoro pick a fight with the Beast Pirates for intentionally wasting red bean soup.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tatakau Myūjikku! Rufi o Osou Nōryoku! (戦う音楽！ルフィを襲う能力！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Fighting Music! The Ability to Attack Luffy!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the Kid Pirates head towards Kaidou, Luffy and Zoro are attacked by Scratchmen Apoo with his Tone-Tone abilities. Kid gets blinded by revenge and attacks Apoo for betraying him.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yume Yabureru!? Sanji o Izanau Wana! (夢やぶれる！？サンジを誘う罠！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Failing Dream? The Plot to Lure Sanji!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Kid Pirates abandon their mission to join the fight against Apoo and the Beast Pirates to allow Luffy, Zoro, Kid, and Killer continue searching for Kaidou. Due to the commotion of the fight, the compound is emptying out, allowing Kin'emon's forces to pass undetected.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Engun Tōchaku! Shirohige Kaizokudan Taichō! (援軍到着！白ひげ海賊団隊長！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Arrival of Reinforcements! Captain of the Whitebeard Pirates!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Marco, Izou and Nekomamushi arrive and Marco knocks the Big Mom Pirates back down the waterfall. Meanwhile, Kanjuro brings Momonosuke to Kaidou.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Otoko no Chikai! Gekitō Burakio Tanku (漢の誓い！激闘ブラキオタンク)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Oath of Man! Fierce Battle of the Brachio Tank
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Big Mom battles with Chopper's tank. Denjiro's southern forces advance, restraining Sasaki before splitting up. Meanwhile, Ulti encounters Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Raimei Hakke! Tōjō Kaidō no Musuko (雷鳴八卦！登場カイドウの息子)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Thunder Bagua! The Appearance of Kaido's Son
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Ulti battles with Luffy and gets the upper hand. However, Kaidou's son Yamato appears and strikes her down.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Teki ka? Mikata ka? Rufi to Yamato (敵か？味方か？ルフィとヤマト)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Enemy or Friend? Luffy and Yamato!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Perospero approaches Onigashima on his own. Big Mom leaves Chopper to look for Zeus. Luffy is hostile to Yamato for being Kaidou's son.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Oden ni Naritai - Yamato no Omoi (おでんになりたい ヤマトの思い)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: I Want to Become Oden - Yamato's Desire
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kaidou announces a certain New Onigashima Project. Yamato removes his mask and is revealed to be a woman.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Bakuhatsu!? Yamato no Jiyū o Shibaru Jō! (爆発！？ヤマトの自由を縛る錠！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato's Freedom!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The samurai battle against Kanjuro's forces atop the mountain. Meanwhile, Kaidou announces the Beasts Pirates' new alliance to the crowd, and Big Mom enters the party.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Akazaya Ikkiuchi - Kikunojō tai Kanjūrō (赤鞘一騎打ち 菊之丞VSカン十郎)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Scabbards One-On-One - Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kaidou turns on Orochi and decapitates him. At the back of the castle, Kikunojo defeats Kanjuro in battle.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Uchiiri! Uketsugu Oden no Ishi (討入り！受け継ぐおでんの意思)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Raid! Inheriting the Will of Oden
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke bravely declares himself as the future shogun in front of Kaidou. Meanwhile, the Nine Red Scabbards invade the castle and slice Kaidou's body.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Onigashima Gekidō - Rufi Zenmen Sensō Kaishi (鬼ヶ島激動 ルフィ全面戦争開始)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Onigashima in Tumult- Luffy's All-Out War Begins
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Due to Ryuo, the Scabbards' weapons pierce Kaidou in several places, and he falls off the stage. The allies samurai reveal their disguise. Ulti confronts Yamato, and Yamato makes official her departure from the Beasts Pirates, saying she doesn't care if Kaidou dies. Big Mom finds Luffy and says she will kill him. Trafalgar Law follows through Kaidou's castle, and Who's-Who stops chasing Yamato to resolve other business. Shinobu tries to approach Momonosuke without being noticed. Nami and Carrot escape from the Homies with a combined electric attack, and Nami retrieves Zeus. Luffy says he didn't come just to defeat Kaidou, but to finish him, Big Mom, and Orochi and his subordinates.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Gekka no Tatakai - Kyōsenshi "Sūron" (月下の戦い 狂戦士””)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Moonlight Battle - Berserker "Sulong
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Onigashima enters an all-out war, and allied troops enter from several angles, including Marco and Perospero, who have teamed up. Outside, the Minks transform into their Sulong form to face off against Kaidou and Jack.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Zeusu no Hangyaku!? Nami Zettai Zetsumei! (ゼウスの反逆！？ナミ絶体絶命！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Rebellion of Zeus?! Nami's Desperate Situation!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Shinobu rescues Momonosuke while Sanji battles unsuccessfully against King. Meanwhile, Big Mom tries to take Zeus back, but Franky and Brook appear and run over her face.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kimi o Mamoru - Kaikō Yamato to Momonosuke (君を守る 邂逅ヤマトとモモの助)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: I'll Protect You - Chance Encounter Yamato and Momonosuke
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The banquet is terrorized by three of the Numbers, who attack the Brachio Tank. However, they are defeated by Franky. Meanwhile, Yamato attempts to meet with his alleged son, Momonosuke, but he is too suspicious of Yamato to trust him.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Attōteki Senryoku! Mugiwara no Ichimi Shūketsu (圧倒的戦力！麦わらの一味集結)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hat Pirates Gather
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats reflect on their past adventures. They gather at the live floor, prepared to battle the All-Stars and the Tobiroppo.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kiken na Sasoi! Kuīn Massatsu Keikaku (危険な誘い！クイーン抹殺計画)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Dangerous Invitation! Plan to Eradicate Queen
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats battle the Number Goki. Drake is caught as a traitor by Queen and Who's-Who and he defects to Luffy's side.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Arata na Innen! Nami to Uruti! (新たな因縁！ナミとうるティ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats reluctantly accept Drake into the alliance. Usopp and Nami are faced against Page One and Ulti, Franky distracts Hatcha and Zoro and Drake battle against Apoo. Suddenly, Queen fires Excite Bullets into the crowd.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hisō no Yaiba! Akazaya tai Kaidō Futatabi (悲壮の刃！赤鞘VSカイドウ再び)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Tragic Sword! The Red Scabbards vs. Kaido Again
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Queen's new virus devastates the samurai, triggering a transformation. Inuarashi and Nekomamushi defeat Jack and the allies are now faced against Kaidou himself.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Uketsugishi Waza - Sakuretsu Oden no Hiken (受け継ぎし技 炸裂おでんの秘剣)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Inherited Technique - The Explosive Secret Sword of Oden
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Bao Huang spies on Yamato. Meanwhile, the Nine Red Scabbards inherit Oden's Two Sword Style, and slash Kaidou in his honor.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kōri Oni no Iryoku! Arata na Ekisaito Dan (「氷鬼」の威力！新たな弾)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Excite Bullets
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Queen names his masterpiece virus the Ice Oni. Kaidou collapses from the Nine Red Scabbards' attack, but gets up quickly, unleashing an attack that severs Kiku's arm.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yurusa nē! Choppā no Ketsui! (許さねェ！チョッパーの決意！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: I Won't Forgive You! Chopper's Determination!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: King sends his forces to the right brain tower to kill Momonosuke. Shinobu and Momonosuke are faced against the armoured division, but Yamato rushes to their aid. On the rooftop, Kiku's injuries are treated before she reenters the battle.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Zoro no Tsuigeki! Kōri Oni in Onigokko (ゾロの追撃！氷鬼in鬼ゴッコ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Zoro's Pursuit! Ice Oni Tag
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Beasts Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nami Kōfuku!? Uruti no Mō-zutsuki (ナミ降伏！？うるティの猛頭突き)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Nami's Surrender?! Ulti's Wild Headbutt
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Ulti and Page One corner Nami and Usopp, and Ulti forces Nami to declare that Luffy will never become the Pirate King. However, they are rescued by Tama.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sasaki no Mōkō - Sōkō Butai tai Yamato (ササキの猛攻 装甲部隊VSヤマト)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Sasaki's Onslaught - Armored Division vs. Yamato
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Beasts Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Koori Oni wo Yabure - Choppā no Hisaku! (氷鬼を破れ チョッパーの火策！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Defeat the Ice Oni - Chopper's Fire Plan!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Chopper finds that heat can be used to slow the Ice Oni virus' spread. Zoro defeats Apoo and acquires the antibody sample. However, Kaidou defeats the Nine Red Scabbards on the rooftop.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yokanē yo!! Sanji o Sasou Kumo (よかねエよ！！サンジを誘う蜘蛛)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: It's Not Okay!! The Spider That Lures Sanji
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sanji separates from Luffy and falls into Black Maria's trap. Meanwhile, Kaido lifts up the entire island of Onigashima, preparing to move it.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Gyakuten no Itte! Fushichō Maruko no Honō (逆転の一手！不死鳥マルコの炎)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Comeback Move! Marco The Phoenix's Flame
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Marco arrives on the battlefield and temporarily stops everyone from turning into Ice Oni. Chopper starts creating antibodies to the plague. Luffy and Jinbe are running through the 3rd floor to reach the roof. Franky gets in a fight with the Armored Division. Ulti and Page One follow Nami while cursing her.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yamato no Kako - Yonkō no Kubi o Nerau Otoko (ヤマトの過去 四皇の首を狙う男)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Yamato's Past – The Man Aiming for an Emperor's Head
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about his relationship with Ace. Ace initially invaded Onigashima to take down Kaidou but would befriend Yamato.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Maruko no Namida! Shirohige Kaizokudan no Kizuna (マルコの涙！白ひげ海賊団の絆)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Marco's Tears! The Whitebeard Pirates' Bonds
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro reminds Marco of his late comrade, Ace. He takes Zoro to the rooftop, but Big Mom also joins Kaidou there.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Mugiwara no Rufi - Kaizoku Ō ni Naru Otoko (麦わらのルフィ 海賊王になる男)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Straw Hat Luffy - The Man Who Will Become the Pirate King
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaidou and Big Mom.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kaibutsu Kessen! Iji Hariau San Senchō (怪物決戦！意地張りあう三船長)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kaidou gets up, but Luffy, Law and Kid begin to quarrel amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls “heaven.”

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ōwaza Renpatsu! Saiaku no Sedai no Mōkō! (大技連発！最悪の世代の猛攻！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro and Killer continue their fight against Kaidou and Big Mom. Although the other allies are struck by Zeus, Luffy is unaffected and uses Gomu Gomu no Kong Gatling to pummel Kaidou.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Warau Kaidō! Yonkō tai Shin Sedai! (笑うカイドウ！四皇VS新世代！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Kaido Laughs! Four Emperors vs. New Generation!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy pummels Kaidou and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way while Kid and Killer try to finish Kaidou off. Meanwhile, CP0 observes the battle in hiding.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Otama no Hisaku! Kibi Dango Dai Sakusen (お玉の秘策！きびだんご大作戦)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Otama's Secret Plan! Great Operation Kibi Dango
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Nami, Usopp and Tama's servants feed many gifters Tama's Dango Dumplings to aid them in the battle. One of the soldiers protecting Chopper turned into an Ice Oni and attacks Hyougoro. Tama alongside her new servants, Nami and Usopp save Franky from being impaled by Sasaki in his dinosaur form

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sanji Zekkyō! Shimajū ni Hibiku Esu Ō Esu (サンジ絶叫！島中に響くSOS)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Sanji Screams! SOS Echoing Throughout the Island
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sanji is captured by Black Maria. Perospero fights against Carrot and Wanda. The location of the Scabbards is found. The battle in Skull Dome continues as Chopper tries to create an antidote for the Ice Onis. Sanji screams for Robin to come save him.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Supanku Sakutersu! Sanji no Jonan! (スパンク炸裂！サンジの女難！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Spank Strike! Sanji's Suffering with the Woman!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sanji is freed from Black Maria's webs by Brook and Robin and went to help the Scabbards. Yamato, Shinobu, and Momonosuke are spotted by a mary in the storehouse and escape after battling many of Kaidou's officers. Carrot continues her battle against Perospero. Luffy, Kid, Law, Killer, and Zoro continue their fight against Kaidou and Big Mom on the Skull Dome's roof.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kui Nashi - Rufi to Oyabun Shitei no Kizuna (悔いなし ルフィと親分師弟の絆)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: No Regrets - The Student and Teacher Bond Between Luffy and the Boss
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The battle at the live floor of Skull Dome continues as Chopper creates and tries the antidote he created. Hyougoro before completely transforming into an Ice Oni asks Yatappe to kill him. Law, Kid, Zoro and Killer continue their battle against Big Mom and Kaidou on the roof of Skull Dome, Luffy finishes regenerating his haki and wakes up to help them.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Junbi Ōkē! Chopafāji Neburaizā (準備OK！チョパファージ霧砲)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Preparations OK! Chopperphage Nebulizer
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After experimenting Chopperphage on himself, Chopper is ready to cure all of the Samurais participated in the war who is infected by Ice Oni virus. Meanwhile, Queen is very mad due to the subordinates' disobeying behavior, which driven by his actions, causing some of his subordinates dissatisfied. Chopper uses the Chopperphage to cure Hyougoro first, then all of the affected Samurais using the "Chopperphage Nebulizer". This provoked Queen, and he was helped by all of the dissatisfied subordinates and allies, who called him "raccoon dog". With Queen called him "raccoon dog" as a last straw, Chopper is driven into anger and used Monster Point to slap Queen, causing people who called him "raccoon dog" before to feel remorse to Chopper. In the Onigashima, Luffy, Law and Kid are still fighting against Kaidou. Meanwhile, the Scabbards after rest from the injuries are facing Oden to their surprise.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Oden Arawaru! Yureru Akazaya no Kokoro! (おでん現る！揺れる赤鞘の心！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Red Scabbards!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke's Devil Fruit is revealed to Yamato and a CP0 agent reveals how it was made. Meanwhile, the samurai welcome Oden, but find it is an impostor created by Kanjuro.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Saiaku no Sedai Zenmetsu!? Yonkō no Ōwaza! (最悪の世代全滅！？四皇の大技！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Annihilation of the Worst Generation!? The Powerful Techniques of the Four Emperors!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Red Scabbards members fight off the fake Oden, with Ashura Doji dying in the process. Inuarashi stays behind to fight Jack while the rest of them begin searching for Momonosuke. The Worst Generation members on the rooftop fight Kaidou and Big Mom, coming to the conclusion that they need to separate them. The Emperors launch a joint attack, nearly taking out all 5 combatants, but Roronoa Zoro is barely able to block the attack, allowing Monkey D. Luffy to fire back and note that Kaidou has resorted to dodging attacks

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Chōshinsei Hangeki! Yonkō Bunkai Sakusen (超新星反撃！四皇分解作戦)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Supernovas Counterattack! The Four Emperors's Disassembly Operation
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the Nine Red Scabbards defeat Orochi, the Worst Generation members continue battling the Emperors, successfully throwing Big Mom off the roof.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi o Mamore! Zoro to Rō no Kengi (ルフィを守れ！ゾロとローの剣技)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Protect Luffy! Zoro and Law's Sword Technique
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Big Mom recovers from her fall, re-approaching Onigashima, while Kaidou and the Worst Generation members continue to fight. Zoro manages to scar Kaidou, but both him and Law are defeated, and Luffy resolves to defeat the Emperor.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yonkō o Koero - Rufi Hangeki no Tekken (四皇を超えろ ルフィ反撃の鉄拳)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Beyond the Four Emperors - Luffy's Iron Fist Counterattack
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Worst Generation and Emperors scatter across Onigashima, preparing for new fights. Kid prepares to battle Big Mom, Killer fights Hawkins, and Luffy fights Kaidou. Meanwhile, Nami, Tama, and Usopp return to the Live Floor, chased by Page One.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Awai Kioku - Rufi to Akagami no Musume Uta (淡い記憶 ルフィと赤髪の娘ウタ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Faint Memory - Luffy and Red-Haired's Daughter Uta
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy meets Shanks and Uta for the first time, and the two children begin developing their friendship.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shin Jidai no Chikai! Rufi to Uta (新時代の誓い！ルフィとウタ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Oath of the New Era! Luffy and Uta
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After Shanks leaves on a trip, Uta doesn't return, much to Luffy's shock. At the same time, Elegia is mysteriously destroyed, seemingly due to Shanks.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nami Zekkyō - Zettai Zetsumei Desu Rēsu! (ナミ絶叫 絶体絶命デスレース！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Nami's Screams - The Desperate Death Race!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy and Kaidou resume their fight. Momonosuke, Shinobu, and Yamato wait for Kin'emon's help. Page One chases down Nami, Usopp, and Tama, but is defeated by an enraged Big Mom as retaliation for Okobore Town's destruction.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Wano Kuni no Yoake - Zenmen Taiketsu Gekika! (ワノ国の夜明け 全面対決激化！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Dawn of the Land of Wano - The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Nine Red Scabbards split up to help across Onigashima, with Nekomamushi heading to Perospero. Yamato begins heading to the rooftop. Chopper continues fighting Queen, and Nami begins to fight Ulti.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ketchaku! Rufi Kasoku Suru Haō no Ken (決着！ルフィ加速する覇王の拳)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Settled! Luffy's Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sanji and Zoro head to the Live Floor, while Nami faces off against Ulti. Big Mom defeats the Tobiroppo member, allowing Nami and Usopp to escape. Luffy and Kaidou continue their fight, and Luffy falls off Onigashima, unconscious.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi Haiboku! Mugiwara no Ichimi Kyūchi!? (ルフィ敗北！麦わらの一味窮地!?)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy Defeated! The Straw Hats in Jeopardy?!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Luffy falls into the sea, various fights progress over Onigashima. Zeus is eaten by Hera, and Chopper continues to stall Queen. Momonosuke reads Oden's logbook, but is found by a Mary. Kid finally finds Big Mom, preparing to fight.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hyakujū Jūrin! Kōzuki-ke no Shūen! (百獣蹂躙！光月家の終焉！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Beasts Trampled! The End of the Kouzuki Family!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Chopper continues to battle Queen while Bao Huang declares Luffy's loss. Kanjuro defeats Kikunojo before being beaten himself by Kin'emon. Kaidou arrives in front of Momonosuke, crushing Kin'emon.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yamiyo ni Aragae - Wano Kuni Sōdaishō Hoeru (闇夜に抗え ワノ国総大将吠える)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Fight Against the Dark Night - The Commander-in-Chief of Wano Country Sounds Off
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Like all the other samurai, Chopper is discouraged by the news of Luffy's loss and Queen doesn’t miss the chance to finish him off! Meanwhile, Kin'emon fights for his life to save Momonosuke and that motivates Momonosuke to rise up!

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi o Shinjiro! Dōmei Hangeki Kaishi! (ルフィを信じろ！同盟反撃開始！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance's Counterattack Begins!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke and Shinobu face Kaidou while Kid and Law challenge Big Mom. Meanwhile, Nami, heading towards the stage on the Live Floor along with Usopp and Tama, hears a strange voice.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nami Hissatsu! Otama Kesshi no Ōichiban! (ナミ必殺！お玉決死の大一番！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Nami's Lethal Attack! O-Tama's Desperate Challenge!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Nami strikes a thunder blast to clear the way to the stage on the Live Floor. However, the elite corps of the Gifters shows up to crush their inferior opponents. Upset but unbroken, Tama stands up to give a command!

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Mikata Gekizō! Mugiwara no Ichimi Gyakushū! (味方激増！麦わらの一味逆襲！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Dramatic Increase of Allies! Straw Hats Fight Back!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Hearing Tama's command, the Gifters side with the samurai and upset the Tobiroppo and others! Chopper starts to take care of Zoro while suffering from the side effect of the enhanced Rumble Ball. Meanwhile, Jinbe gets stunned by Who's-Who's story.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sōdashu no Hokori - Ikari no Jinbē! (操舵手の誇り 怒りのジンベエ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Pride of a Helmsman - The Enraged Jinbe!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Who's-Who expresses fierce resentment toward Luffy and Jinbe fights back out of his loyalty to Luffy. As Who's-Who asks Jinbe a question, he tramples on the dignity of the Fish-Men and that sparks Jinbe's outrage.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kaijū Dai Kessen! Yamato to Furankī (怪獣大決戦！ヤマトとフランキー)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Great Battle of Monsters! Yamato and Franky
Wano Country.episode_sumary: To cut ties with Kaidou, Yamato unleashes his true power. Meanwhile, Queen repeatedly attacks Sanji with his power as a cyborg, and Sasaki in his Human-Beast Form launches tricky attacks on Franky and drives him into a corner.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Hoshokusha no Wana - Burakku Maria no Yūwaku (捕食者の罠 ブラックマリアの誘惑)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Predator's Trap - Black Maria's Seduction
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kaidou tries to convince Yamato to become the Shogun of the Wano Country and rule the country with the special power he obtained by accident. Meanwhile, Saul, Professor Clover, and Robin's mother Olvia suddenly appear in front of her.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Akumu o Kiru - Burukku no Kōri no Battō! (悪夢を斬る ブルックの氷の抜刀！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Slash the Nightmare - Brook's Sword of Ice!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates. Robin and Black Maria begin fighting in earnest, and Luffy asks Momonosuke to bring him back to Onigashima.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kuratchi! Akuma no Keshin Robin! (クラッチ！悪魔の化身ロビン！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Clutch! A Demon Incarnate, Robin!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The battle between Black Maria and Robin rages on, with Robin unveiling new techniques and achieving victory. On the Wano mainland, Luffy continues to gain energy, and Momonosuke asks Shinobu to turn him into an adult.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Jubaku! Semaru Kyōi - Kiddo to Zoro! (呪縛！迫る脅威 キッドとゾロ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Raizo battles Fukurokuju, Killer battles Hawkins, Sanji battles both King and Queen and Nekomamushi enters battle with Perospero. After Sanji is defeated, King pursues Zoro while he is still incapacitated.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ichikabachika no Ōshōbu! Ryōyoku Shutsujin! (一か八かの大勝負！両翼出陣！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Taking a Chance! Both Wings Go into Battle!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Zoro gets back on his feet and along with Sanji, confronts King and Queen, the All-Stars of the Beasts Pirates. Watching Zoro fight, Hyougoro and Kawamatsu remember someone from way back.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yoake e to Nobore! Momoiro no Ryū Takeru (夜明けへと昇れ！桃色の龍猛る)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Inuarashi confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Nekomamushi faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro’s death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Mirai e! Yamato to Dai Kengō no Chikai (未来へ！ヤマトと大剣豪の誓い)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen's Pledge
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The battle between Kaidou and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen who he met when he was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi Hishō! Hyakujū e no Ribenji (ルフィ飛翔！百獣へのリベンジ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the King of the Beasts
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaidou, vows to survive until Luffy returns.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sōryū Aiutsu! Momonosuke no Kakugo! (双龍相搏つ！モモの助の覚悟！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Twin Dragons Collide! Momonosuke's Resolve!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke faces Kaidou once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy’s encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaidou.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Densetsu no Sairai! Ten ni Todoroku Rufi no Kobushi (伝説の再来！天に轟くルフィの拳)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy's Fist Roars in the Sky!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Yamato helps Momonosuke conquer his fear of flying and the two take on the most important task of saving Onigashima. Meanwhile, Luffy and Kaidou clash which parts the heavens. The clear skies help Inuarashi and Nekomamushi finally defeat their foes.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Fūun Kyū o Tsugeru! Onigashima no Matsuro! (風雲急を告げる！鬼ヶ島の末路)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Situation has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke, with his newfound courage, and Yamato are on a mission to save Onigashima from crashing into the Flower Capital. On the Live Floor, Zoro and Sanji are engaged in battles of their own against Beasts Pirates’ All-Stars, King and Queen.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sanji no Ihen - Ryōyoku Kiiro Shingō! (サンジの異変 両翼黄色信号！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Sanji's Mutation ? The Two Arms in Crisis!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke attempts and struggles to move Onigashima. The members of CP0 send troops to Wano Country. Inside, Sanji realizes he, like his siblings, may have genetic advancements that allow him to heal instantaneously.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Aibō ni Shi o! Kirā Kesshi no Ōbakuchi (相棒に死を！キラー決死の大博打)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Death to Your Partner! Killer's Deadly Gamble!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Killer and Hawkins continue their battle. Killer finds away to damage Hawkins despite his Devil Fruit powers, and emerges victorious in battle.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Yami no mono no an'yaku! Onigashima enjō (闇の者の暗躍！鬼ケ島炎上)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kin'emon survives his defeat in battle, having been cut into two pieces. Meanwhile, Kanjuro gives his "final performance," creating a flame monster and setting the castle on fire.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Gyakushū! Rō to Kiddo no Hangeki Dōmei (逆襲！ローとキッドの反撃同盟)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Countercharge! Law and Kid's Return-Attack Combination
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Law and Kid awaken their powers and carry out their first successful attack against Big Mom. However, Big Mom consumes a year of her life to strengthen herself in retaliation.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi no Tame ni - Sanji to Zoro no Chikai (ルフィの為に サンジとゾロの誓い)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro's Oath
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the situation around Onigashima escalates, fearing his awakening enhancements, as Sanji makes his decision, he contacts Zoro and requests for the latter to kill him if he loses control.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kazenbō Shūrai - Semaru Orochi no Ma no Te (火前坊襲来 迫るオロチの魔の手)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Onslaught of Kazenbo - Orochi's Evil Clutches Close in
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The chaos within the floating island of Onigashima rages on to seemingly no end. Kazenbo, Kajuro's creation, is wreaking havoc all throughout the Skull Dome in the name of vengeance for the Kurozami. The rampage causes panic among Beasts Pirates and samurai, alike. As Orochi watches on, he hears a sound that reminds him of his past love.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Gyakkyō no Zoro - Kaibutsu! Kasai no Kingu (逆境のゾロ 怪物！火災のキング)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Zoro Faces Adversity - A Monster! King the Wildfire
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Queen reveals to Sanji King's secret, elsewhere as he is struggling against King, Zoro realizes an important fact from his past.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Enma no Himitsu! Zoro ni Takusareshi Yōtō (閻魔の秘密！ゾロに託されし妖刀)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Secret of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Zoro recalls his past involving an old man he once knew, the clues from his memory help him realize the secret necessary to truly master Enma.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Majin no Ichigeki! Sanji tai Kuīn (魔神の一撃！サンジVSクイーン)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Attack of the Devil! Sanji VS Queen
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Queen overwhelms Sanji with the Raid Suit abilities he duplicated, a new factor enters the fray, and the truth of an earlier incident may give Sanji the motivation to accept his new abilities and create a way to take down Queen once and for all.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: En'ō Santōryū - Zoro tai Kingu (閻王三刀流 ゾロVSキング)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: King of Hell Three Sword Style - Zoro vs. King
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the battle between Zoro and King reaches its climax, Zoro figures out the secret of King's abilities and uses his newfound power to create the King of Hell Three Sword Style. As King remembers his past, the two fight it out, Zoro ultimately emerging victorious.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi Yakudō! Shin Jidai no Bunkiten! (ルフィ躍動！新時代の分岐点！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy Accelerates! The Turning Point of a New Era!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Usopp locates Kin'emon and Kiku while Izou holds off the Beasts Pirates for them to escape, and the battle between Raizo and Fukurokuju reaches its climax. Meanwhile, CP0 makes a report about the current situation on Onigashima after having defeated Drake.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shuron Hakke! Rufi ni Semaru Muhō no Ryū (酒龍八卦！ルフィに迫る無法の龍)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Shuron Hakke! A Lawless Dragon Approaches Luffy!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Luffy continues to fight Kaidou, Kaidou uses a form of drunk fighting known as Shuron Hakke. At Mary Geoise, the Five Elders review the situation, discussing a Devil Fruit that had not awakened for centuries.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Dōmei Kaimetsu!? Moero Shin Sedai no Ishi! (同盟壊滅！？燃えろ新世代の意志！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Destruction of the Alliance?! Fire up, the Will of the New Generation!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the battles inside Onigashima continue, Chopper returns to normal, Franky searches for Zoro, Izou encounters CP0, and Yamato reaches the Armory. Meanwhile, Law and Kid struggle against Big Mom, and when she prepares to leave to assist Kaidou, the two launch a powerful counterattack, badly injuring her.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ōtori Kitaru! Hadō to Jiki no Ōwaza (大トリ来る！波動と磁気の大技)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Here Comes Main Act! Powerful Techniques of Shockwave and Magnetism
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Momonosuke continues to pull Onigashima away from the Flower Capital he hears Zunesha's voice. Meanwhile Big Mom recovers from Kid's last attack she launches a powerful counter attack that puts both him and Law in danger. Despite taking heavy damage and at their limit, the two rivals begin their own last ditch effort plan to remove Big Mom from Onigashima.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shin Jidai e! Ketchaku! Gaki-domo no Kakugo (新時代へ！決着！ガキ共の覚悟)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Towards A New Era! Conclusion! The Brats' Resolution
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Law and Kid emerge victorious against Big Mom, causing her to fall into the exposed magma chamber below. Meanwhile, Fukurokuju begins to lose his composure as a result of being set alight, and Zunesha starts to communicate with Kouzuki Momonosuke.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tsukihime ga Hibiku! Wano Kuni Saishū Kyokumen! (月姫が響く！ワノ国最終局面！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Moon Princess Echoes! The Final Phase of Wano Country!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Izou sacrifices himself to defeat the CP0 agents, successfully taking down Maha with him. Meanwhile, Hiyori as Komurasaki inserts a Seastone nail into Orochi's body to neutralize his powers.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shōsha wa Hitori - Rufi tai Kaidō (勝者はひとり ルフィVSカイドウ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: There is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaidou
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Raizo outlasts Fukurokuju in the burning hallway, causing the latter to collapse from his injuries. Meanwhile, Guernica follows his order, taking down Drake before interrupting the battle on the Skull Dome.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi Haiboku!? Nokosareta Mono no Kakugo (ルフィ敗北！？残された者の覚悟)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy is Defeated?! The Determination of Those Left Behind
Wano Country.episode_sumary: After defeating Luffy on the Skull Dome, Kaidou viciously beats Guernica before returning to the Skull Dome to battle the remaining allied forces on the Live Floor. Meanwhile, on the Skull Dome, Luffy undergoes a sudden transformation, which Zunesha declares to be the return of Joy Boy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi no Saikō Chiten Tōtatsu! "Gia Fifusu" (ルフィの最高地点  到達! "ギア5")
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Luffy’s Peak - Attained! Gear 5
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Finishing his transformation, Luffy, in his Gear Fifth form, drags Kaidou back to the rooftop to continue their battle. Meanwhile, a dying Kazenbo sets a trapped Orochi on fire.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Fuzaketa Nōryoku! Yakudō Suru Gia Fifusu (ふざけた能力! 躍動するギア５)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Ridiculous Power! Gear 5 in Full Play
Wano Country.episode_sumary: With his newfound power, Luffy is able to overwhelm Kaidou to the point where he greatly enjoys the battle, shocking Kaidou and his allies alike with his immense power.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nigeba Nashi! Jigoku Ezu no Onigashima (逃げ場なし！地獄絵図の鬼ヶ島)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Luffy and Kaidou continue their battle, Raizo and Jinbe utilize their plan to put out the fire that has spread throughout Onigashima. Meanwhile, Yamato warns Momonosuke of the danger Onigashima will face if he does not act soon to create new flame clouds to keep it from crashing into the Flower Capital.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Momo o Shinjiru - Rufi Saigo no Ōwaza! (モモを信じる ルフィ最後の大技！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Believe in Momo - Luffy's Final Big Move
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Momonosuke struggles to create his own flame clouds, Luffy continues to fight Kaidou. As the Samurai realize what would happen to Onigashima if Luffy won, Orochi is freed from the Seastone Nail and attempts to murder Hiyori. After hearing the voices of the people, Luffy prepares his final attack.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Nijū-nen no Inori! Wano Kuni o Torimodose (二十年の祈り！ワノ国を取り戻せ)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Twenty Years of Prayer! Reclaim Wano Country
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Luffy and Kaidou prepare their final attack, Momonosuke is tasked with moving Onigashima out of the way of Luffy's attack. Meanwhile, Denjiro saves Hiyori by beheading Orochi one final time.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Rufi no Mezasu Sekai! (ルフィの目指す世界！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The World That Luffy Wants!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Kaidou's past is revealed; he was a former Rocks Pirate who later built his own crew which sought out to create war. In the present day, Momonosuke moves Onigashima away just as Luffy defeats Kaidou, sending him falling into the ground.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Makuhiki! Shōsha - Mugiwara no Rufi! (幕引き！勝者 麦わらのルフィ！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Kaidou's unconscious body falls into a magma chamber and triggers a volcanic eruption, Onigashima lands safely near the Flower Capital. Momonosuke announces their victory to the townspeople.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Kikan! Wano Kuni Shōgun - Kōzuki Momonosuke (帰還！ワノ国将軍 光月モモの助)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: He Returns! The Shogun of Wano Country, Kouzuki Momonosuke
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Momonosuke announces to the citizens his victory and the return of the Kouzuki Family. Tama remembers her childhood, and Yamato asks to join Luffy's crew.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Asa ga kuru! Rufi-tachi kyūsoku! (朝が来る!ルフィ達休息！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As the Five Elders learn of Wano Country's status, a festival is held to celebrate the alliance's victory. Meanwhile, Admiral Ryokugyu heads to Wano.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Omatsuri no utage! Aratana umi no kōtei-tachi (お祭りの宴！新たな海の皇帝たち)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: A Celebration Banquet! The New Emperors of the Sea
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Tenguyama reveals his true identity as Sukiyaki to Robin and confirms Wano's secret. The new Emperors of the Sea are declared, as Ryokugyu heads after Luffy.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Sekai ga moeru! Kaigun taishō no kōgeki! (世界が燃える！海軍大将の攻撃！)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Marine Admiral!
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Red Hair Pirates, now at Wano, decide on going after the One Piece. The Red Scabbards attempt to stop Ryokugyu from pursuing Luffy. Sakazuki, Borsalino, and Tensei discuss the events at the Levely regarding the Revolutionary Army's interference and Sabo's alleged assassination of Nefertari Cobra.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shin Jidai Tōrai! Akagami no Kōtei no Ikari (新しい時代が到来！ 「四皇」赤髪の怒り)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired's Imperial Rage
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Sukiyaki shows Robin and Law the Road Poneglyph and tells them more about Wano Country's history, including the ancient civilization and the location of Pluton. Meanwhile, the Nine Red Scabbards and Momonosuke battle against Ryokugyu. Momonosuke successfully uses a fire-breathing attack against Ryokugyu for the first time and, with the help of Shanks, forces the admiral to retreat.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Ugoku Sekai! Shin Soshiki Kurosu Girudo (動く世界！新組織クロスギルド)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The World That Moves On! A New Organization, Cross Guild
Wano Country.episode_sumary: As Sukiyaki reveals himself to the Nine Red Scabbards, Inuarashi and Nekomamushi announce their decision to remain in Wano Country and give leadership of the Mokomo Dukedom to Carrot. Meanwhile, as allied pirate crews prepare to depart the country, Kid reveals that Buggy has formed the Cross Guild, a new criminal organization with Mihawk and Crocodile.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Tabidachi no Toki - Wano Kuni to Mugiwara no Ichimi (旅立ちの時　ワノ国と麦わらの一味)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: Time to Depart - Wano Country and the Straw Hats
Wano Country.episode_sumary: Before their departure from Wano Country, the Straw Hat Pirates say their goodbyes to their comrades. Luffy visits the ruins of Kuri Castle, where he parts with the Nine Red Scabbards and the Mink Tribe, and Tsurujo's shop, where he leaves Tama. Meanwhile, Zoro visits Yasuie and Pedro's graves, and Sanji sells the last of his soba in the Flower Capital.

Wano Country.episode_name_jp: Shūmaku! Rufi to Momonosuke no Chikai (終幕！ルフィとモモの助の誓い)
Wano Country.episode_name_en: The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke's Vow
Wano Country.episode_sumary: The Straw Hat Pirates say their final goodbyes to Momonosuke, Kin'emon, and Yamato, formally declaring Wano Country as one of their territories. With their business concluded, they finally depart from the island, at the same time as the Heart and Kid Pirates. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, the story of the return of the Kouzuki Family is recounted as a performance.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: Shin Kōtei! Senryō Dōke no Bagī! (新皇帝！千両道化のバギー！)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A New Emperor! Buggy the Star Clown!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the Straw Hats leave Wano, they find out their new bounties. Meanwhile, Mihawk and Crocodile confront Buggy for being portrayed as the clown's subordinates. However, they relent after realizing they can use him to bear the brunt of the Marines' attention. Thus, the Cross Guild is established with Buggy as the figurehead, and Mihawk and Crocodile as its Chief Officers.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 女ヶ島の乱！英雄コビーの一件 (Nyōgashima no Ran! Eiyū Kobī no Ikken)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
Final Saga.episode_sumary: The Marines invade Amazon Lily to arrest Boa Hancock with the aid of their new Seraphim Pacifista. However, the Blackbeard Pirates also invade the island, and Blackbeard captures Hancock, with the intention of stealing her Devil Fruit power.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 〝ルフィの夢〟 (Rufi no Yume)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Dream
Final Saga.episode_sumary: With the help of Rayleigh, Hancock and the Kuja Pirates successfully defend Amazon Lily. Meanwhile, news of Cobra's assassination and Vivi's kidnapping spread to the Straw Hat Pirates, while Luffy reveals the end of his dream.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 新章突入！ルフィとサボの針路！ (Shinshō Totsunyū! Rufi to Sabo no Shinro!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: The World Government destroys the Lulusia Kingdom before Sabo could divulge information about Imu over the Den Den Mushi. Several days later, the Straw Hat Pirates come across a young girl trapped in a Warm Eddy.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 新しい島！未来島エッグヘッド (Atarashii Shima! Mirai-jima Egguheddo)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A New Island! Future Island Egghead
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Jinbe jumps into the sea to save Luffy, Chopper and the young girl, while a mysterious giant robot and its pilot rescue the others on the Thousand Sunny. Meanwhile, Helmeppo and Hibari request Prince Grus for help in rescuing Koby from Hachinosu.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 未来満載！ 科学の国の冒険！ (Mirai Mansai! Kagaku no Kuni no Bōken!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After the stranger identifies herself as Dr. Vegapunk, she is tasked by another individual to bring the crew aboard the Thousand Sunny to the lab. Meanwhile, Luffy's group explores around Egghead and meets another individual who identifies herself as Dr. Vegapunk.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ボニーの慟哭！未来島に潜む闇 (Bonī no Dōkoku! Mirai-jima ni Hisomu Yami)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Bonney's Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
Final Saga.episode_sumary: A CP0 unit is sent to Egghead to eliminate Vegapunk. Meanwhile, when Luffy's group is under attack by a Pacifista, Bonney stops Luffy's attack on it due to its resemblance to Kuma, revealing that Kuma is her father. Elsewhere, the Heart Pirates are attacked by the Blackbeard Pirates.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 勝者総取り！ローVS黒ひげ！ (Shōsha Sōdori! Rō tai Kurohige!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Winner Takes All! Law vs. Blackbeard!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Blackbeard challenges Law to a battle, with possession of the Road Poneglyph copies as the prize. As a result, both the Heart Pirates and Blackbeard Pirates engage in a full-scale battle.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 深まる謎！エッグヘッド研究層 (Fukamaru Nazo! Egguheddo Rabofēzu)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Mystery Deepens! Egghead Labophase
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After escaping from the Pacifista, Bonney tells Luffy's group more about Kuma. Meanwhile, Lilith takes the other Straw Hat Pirates to Labophase. While Zoro and Brook remain behind to guard the Thousand Sunny, Sanji's group encounters a Jinbe look-a-like.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 天才の頭脳 6人のベガパンク！ (Tensai no Zunō - Rokunin no Begapanku!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Brain of a Genius - Six Vegapunks!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Sanji's group fights against S-Shark, until the fight is ended when Shaka intervenes. Meanwhile, Luffy's group encounters a mysterious giant robot in the scrapyard.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 禁じられた歴史！ある王国の仮説 (Kinjirareta Rekishi! Aru Ōkoku no Kasetsu)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Shaka reveals the existence of an ancient kingdom, whose existence has been erased from history by the World Government, and that the books from Ohara's library survived the island's destruction. Meanwhile in the scrapyard, as they are checking out the giant robot, Luffy's group meets Dr. Vegapunk.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: オハラの意志！受け継がれる研究 (Ohara no Ishi! Uketsugareru Kenkyū)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Will of Ohara! The Inherited Research
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Shaka tells Sanji's group about how the giants saved Ohara's books 22 years ago when Dr. Vegapunk met up with Dragon. He also confirms to Robin the identity of their leader. At the scrapyard, Bonney attempts to kill Vegapunk. Meanwhile, Lucci's group has arrived at Egghead's coast.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 奇想天外！天才が想い描く夢！ (Kisō Tengai! Tensai ga Omoiegaku Yume!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As Dr. Vegapunk reveals more about the ancient robot to Luffy's group, he explains how it relates to why he wants them to take him away from Egghead. The CP0 unit arrives at Egghead and after being refused entry, they prepare to invade. Meanwhile, Kuma escapes from the Revolutionary Army.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 迎撃準備！ロブ・ルッチ襲来！ (Geigeki Junbi! Robu Rutchi Shūrai!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Preparations for Interception! Rob Lucci Strikes!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As Lucci's group launches their invasion of Egghead, Shaka begins the preparations to deal with it. However, Atlas ignores orders and is damaged when attempting to fight Lucci. Upon arriving at that location, an angry Luffy prepares to engage Lucci in battle.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 異次元の力！ルフィVSルッチ！ (Ijigen no Chikara! Rufi tai Rutchi!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Unprecedented Power! Luffy vs Lucci!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: At Marine Headquarters, Sakazuki learns of the situation on Egghead and orders Lucci not to face Luffy until Kizaru arrives with back-up, but he is ignored and they attack each other using their new Awakened states. As Dr. Vegapunk explains to Sanji's group about Devil Fruits, he convinces Sentomaru to join their side. This forces Lucci to knock out Sentomaru to regain control of the Seraphim.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 最強の人類！セラフィムの能力！ (Saikyō no Jinrui! Serafimu no Nōryoku!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Strongest Form of Humanity! The Seraphim's Abilities!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the battle continues in the Fabiriophase with Sentomaru barely conscious, Dr. Vegapunk explains the Seraphim and their abiities to Sanji's group. Once Jinbe and Chopper get to the Vacuum Rocket, they and Luffy escape to the Labophase as the lockdown is completed and Sentomaru passes out.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 蠢く陰謀！エッグヘッド脱出作戦 (Ugomeku Inbō! Egguheddo Dasshutsu Sakusen)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Sinister Schemes! The Operation to Escape Egghead
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As plans are made for Dr. Vegapunk to escape Egghead on the Thousand Sunny, Lucci has his forces cut off all means of escape. However, the Labophase's defense system suddenly goes down, allowing CP0 to progress forward towards the Thousand Sunny. Elsewhere, at the Red Line, Kuma crashes into the Red Port.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 父を戻せ！儚きボニーの願い！ (Chichi o Modose! Hakanaki Bonī no Negai!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Kaku attempts to destroy the Thousand Sunny, but is stopped by Zoro. Bonney chases Dr. Vegapunk, demanding to know the truth about her father before finding one of Kuma's paw-shaped repulsions. Meanwhile, the Marines engage Kuma at Red Port, the Kid Pirates arrive at Elbaph, and Garp arrives at G-14, intent on leading a mission to rescue Koby.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 絶体絶命！セラフィム総攻撃！ (Zettai Zetsumei! Serafimu Sō Kōgeki!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Desperate Situation! The Seraphim's All-out Attack!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro battles Kaku, prompting him to use his awakened abilities. Sanji, Franky, Lilith and Edison head out to regain control of the Seraphim as Lucci orders them to destroy the lab. However, Stussy betrays CP0, and knocks out Lucci and Kaku.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 麗しき反逆！内通者ステューシー (Uruwashiki Hangyaku! Naitsū-sha Sutyūshī)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Beautiful Act of Treason! The Spy, Stussy
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Stussy is revealed to be Dr. Vegapunk's spy, as Sanji's group successfully stops the Seraphim. Meanwhile, on Sphinx, Marco learns that Weevil protected the residents while he was away, and Miss Buckin reveals that Weevil was captured and asks Marco to help her rescue him. Elsewhere, while on their way to Egghead, Kizaru and Saturn talk about Dr. Vegapunk.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 異常発生！探せ！ベガパンク (Ijō Hassei! Sagase! Dokutā Begapanku)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Trouble Occurs! Seek Dr. Vegapunk!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: A recovered Sentomaru dispatches the Pacifista MK-III to deal with the World Government agents. Bonney begins exploring her father's memories. Shaka reveals the situation, including that Dr. Vegapunk is missing. While Luffy and Zoro remain behind to guard Lucci and Kaku, the others head out to look for Dr. Vegapunk.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 戦慄！研究所へ忍び寄る魔の手 (Senritsu! Kenkyūjo e Shinobiyoru Ma no Te)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Shudder! The Evil Hand Creeping Up on the Laboratory
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After experiencing one of her father's memories, Bonney decides to continue to learn the truth. Meanwhile, as Kuma is climbing the Red Line to Mary Geoise, the search for Dr. Vegapunk is complicated by the communications and surveillance going down, causing Shaka to suspect an intruder. While searching, York is suddenly turned to stone by S-Snake.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 理解不能！セラフィムの反逆 (Rikai Funō! Serafimu no Hangyaku!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Incomprehensible! The Seraphim's Rebellion!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the Seraphim begin their attack, Shaka suspects one of the other satellites has ordered them to kill them all. Realizing they too are in danger, Lucci and Kaku attempt to convince a reluctant Luffy and Zoro into freeing them so they can assist in repelling the Seraphim's attack. In the Fabiriophase, Sentomaru tries to convince the researchers to evacuate.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 苦渋の決断！異色の共闘戦線！ (Kujū no Ketsudan! Ishoku no Kyōtō Sensen!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Tough Decision! An Unusual United Front!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the Straw Hat Pirates struggle against the Seraphim, Luffy reluctantly decides to release Lucci and Kaku, allowing them to join the fight. Meanwhile, on Elbaph, Shanks learns of Kid's presence and accepts his challenge with the Road Poneglyph copies as the prize, with the Giant Warrior Pirates accompanying him.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 生き残れ！最強の人類との死闘 (Ikinokore! Saikyō no Jinrui to no Shitō)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Survive! Deadly Combat with the Strongest Form of Humanity!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro realizes that the Seraphim have King's Lunarian abilities. Sanji arrives to help Nami and Brook against S-Shark, and S-Snake partially turns Franky to stone while completely petrifying Usopp and Lilith. Meanwhile, Shaka tracks down Dr. Vegapunk while following a lead, only to be killed by a mysterious assassin.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: オハラの再来！黒幕の野望！ (Ohara no Sairai! Kuromaku no Yabō!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Second Ohara! The Mastermind's Ambition!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the battles progress, Sentomaru warns the researchers that this incident will be bigger than the Ohara Incident and urges them to flee while S-Snake finishes off Pythagoras. It is revealed that the Egghead Incident began three months ago when York leaked Dr. Vegapunk's research to the Five Elders, intent on becoming both a World Noble and the only Vegapunk.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 激突！シャンクスVSユースタス・キッド (Gekitotsu! Shankusu tai Yūsutasu Kiddo)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Clash! Shanks vs. Eustass Kid!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Shanks heads out to face Kid, but when he sees a vision of Kid's attack destroying a number of his allies' ships, he launches a major attack which takes down Kid and Killer in a single strike. Dorry and Brogy, in retaliation for Kid's reckless attack threatening Elbaph, sink the Victoria Punk, annihilating the Kid Pirates in the process.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 走れコビー！決死の脱出作戦！ (Hashire Kobī! Kesshi no Dasshutsu Sakusen!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Run, Koby! A Desperate Escape Strategy
Final Saga.episode_sumary: With Perona's help, Koby is able to escape. After freeing the Blackbeard Pirates' slaves, he attempts to act as a decoy to help them escape, but is spotted and soon cornered. Just as he is about to be killed, the island is attacked by the Marine unit led by Garp.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 愛弟子のため ガープ中将の拳骨！ (Manadeshi no Tame - Gāpu-chūjō no Genkotsu!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: For the Beloved Pupil - The Fist of Vice Admiral Garp!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Garp launches a major attack on Hachinosu that devastates the island. Just as Koby reaches the Marines' ship, they are attacked by their former comrade Kuzan, now one of the Blackbeard Pirates' Ten Titanic Captains. A flashback occurs to when Kuzan met Blackbeard after he had left the Marines.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 海軍驚愕！元海軍本部大将クザン (Kaigun Kyōgaku! Moto Kaigun Honbu Taishō Kuzan)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Marines Surprised! Marine Headquarters' Former Admiral, Kuzan
Final Saga.episode_sumary: In the past, after having some drinks with the Blackbeard Pirates, Kuzan is convinced by Blackbeard to join them. In the present, Kuzan faces his former mentor Garp in battle. Meanwhile, at Winner Island, Blackbeard has defeated Law. This forces Bepo to use a special drug to briefly enter Sulong form to save his captain, then escape with Law to the sea.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 取りに行こうぜ！バギーの大宣言 (Tori ni Ikō ze! Bagī no Dai Sengen)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Let's Go Get It! Buggy's Big Declaration
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the Marines deal with the issues the Cross Guild is causing them while Buggy declares that they should go after the One Piece, irritating Mihawk and Crocodile. Meanwhile, Sabo returns to Momoiro Island with refugees from Lulusia Kingdom. He calls a private meeting with Dragon and Ivankov to tell them what really happened at the Levely.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: サボの帰還 語られる衝撃の真実！ (Sabo no Kikan - Katarareru Shōgeki no Shinjitsu!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Sabo Returns - The Shocking Truth to Be Told!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo reports on his mission to Mary Geoise, telling Dragon and Ivankov what happened. The flashback begins, and the Revolutionary Army begin their attack, freeing the slaves and fighting the Government forces. Meanwhile, Charlos plans a second attempt to capture Princess Shirahoshi, and King Cobra prepares for his meeting with the Five Elders.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 聖地騒然！サイとレオ渾身の一撃！ (Seichi Sōzen! Sai to Reo Konshin no Ichigeki!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Holy Land in Tumult! Sai and Leo's Full-Power Blow!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo gets the keys to the slaves' collars and meets Bonney before heading to find the Lost Chamber. Meanwhile, Cobra asks the Five Elders about the fate of his ancestor Lili. Outside, Charlos uses Kuma to capture Shirahoshi, but is interrupted both by Mjosgard and the Revolutionary Army, losing Kuma in the process. As Cobra asks his second question, regarding the mystery of the Will of D., Imu appears.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 託された！コブラ王の覚悟 (Takusareta Messēji! Kobura-Ō no Kakugo)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Entrusted Message! King Cobra's Resolve
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Imu and Cobra discuss the truth about the Will of D., the Poneglyphs, and Nefertari D. Lili's name. Sabo tries to escape with Cobra, but Cobra sacrifices himself to allow him to flee, giving a final message for Luffy and Vivi. Wapol witnesses Cobra's death and escapes in a panic, which Vivi uses to escape CP0.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 揺らぐ世界！支配者の審判と五老星の始動！ (Yuragu Sekai! Shihaisha no Shinpan to Gorōsei no Shidō!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The World is Shaken! The Ruler's Judgement and the Five Elder's Actions!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo, Vivi, Wapol, and Bonney escape Mary Geoise by stowing on various ships. Imu decides to test the Mother Flame on Lulusia. Back on Momoiro, Sabo finishes his story with the destruction of Lulusia, and Ivankov speculates on Imu's identity. In Mary Geoise, Mjosgard is executed by Garling.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ガープとクザン 衝突する師弟の正義 (Gāpu to Kuzan - Shōtotsu Suru Shitei no Seigi)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Garp and Kuzan - A Clash of Justice Between Master and Apprentice
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the battle at Hachinosu continues, just as the Marines' ship is prepared for departure, a mistake that Koby makes results in Garp getting injured by Shiryu. As Garp faces off against his former pupil Kuzan, flashbacks are seen of their training together. Meanwhile, Pizarro prepares to destroy the Marine ship.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 最後の教え！受け継がれた拳 (Saigo no Oshie! Uketsugareta Inpakuto)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Last Lesson! Impact Inherited
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As Pizarro prepares his attack on the Marine ship, Garp motivates his men to fight back, and Koby unleashes a powerful Armament Haki attack on the giant stone to destroy it. Garp then orders them to leave him behind, reminding them of what is important. Meanwhile, a Marine Fleet approaches Egghead.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 世界震撼！麦わらの一味立てこもり事件 (Sekai Shinkan! Mugiwara no Ichimi Tatekomori Jiken)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The World Shakes! The Straw Hats' Hostage Situation
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the news spreads throughout the world of Garp's disappearance and the hostage situation regarding Dr. Vegapunk, the repercussions of Lulusia Kingdom's destruction affects the entire world. As Admiral Kizaru's forces surround Egghead, York contacts them to reveal she had been caught by the Straw Hat Pirates.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 全面包囲！エッグヘッド脱出作戦 (Zenmen Hōi! Egguheddo Dasshutsu Sakusen)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Completely Surrounded! The Operation to Escape Egghead
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After Luffy attempts to force a deal for the Marines to allow the Straw Hat Pirates to leave Egghead, both groups plan their next move. However, when Lucci secretly leaks information on Egghead's current status, it allows the Marines to begin their attack, with Kizaru heading in and targeting Sentomaru first.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ぶつかる男の覚悟！黄猿と戦桃丸 (Butsukaru Otoko no Kakugo! Kizaru to Sentōmaru)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Clash of Two Men's Determination! Kizaru and Sentomaru
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Kizaru defeats Sentomaru, allowing him to gain control of the Pacifista Mark IIIs to deal with the Sea Beast Weapons. As the Vegapunks continue to try to crack York's password, Lucci tries to kill Dr. Vegapunk, but Stussy takes the hit, and Zoro engages him in battle. Just as Kizaru reaches the Frontier Dome, he spots Luffy's group, and Luffy engages him in battle.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 迫る絶望！大将黄猿の憂鬱な任務 (Semaru Zetsubō! Taishō Kizaru no Yūutsu na Ninmu)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Looming Despair! Admiral Kizaru's Depressing Mission
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Kuma's attack on Mary Geoise the previous day is revealed to have been thwarted by Fleet Admiral Sakazuki. Meanwhile, Kizaru knocks away Luffy, which also destroys the Vegaforce-01. Before Kizaru can kill Vegapunk, Luffy returns in his Gear 5 form, which causes the nearby Iron Giant to awaken.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ルフィ黄猿！変幻自在の大激戦 (Rufi Bāsasu Kizaru! Hengen Jizai no Dai Gekisen)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy vs. Kizaru! A Fierce Kaleidoscopic Battle
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After Luffy draws away Kizaru, it allows a group to be formed to both rescue Bonney and regain control of the Mark III Pacifista. As Luffy and Zoro continue their individual battles, the Vegatank-08 reaches its destination, and Atlas succeeds in regaining control of the Pacifista and turning them against the Marines.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 悪夢襲来 科学防衛武神サターン聖 (Akumu Shūrai - Kagaku Bōei Bushin Satān-sei)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Nightmare Strikes - Warrior God of Science and Defense, Saint Saturn
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After Sanji rescues Bonney, the Vegatank-08's retreat is cut off when Saint Saturn shows up to fight. Luffy manages to take Kizaru down as he reaches his limit with Gear 5. An angry Bonney then attacks Saturn, in retaliation for his role in taking away Kuma's free will.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: くまの過去 死んだ方がいい世界 (Kuma no Kako - Shinda Hō ga Ii Sekai)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Kuma's Past - Better Off Dead in This World
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Saturn easily heals from Bonney's attack, capturing her and overwhelming the rest of the group. The story of Kuma's past then begins with his birth 47 years ago, before his family's capture a few years later. After his parents are murdered, a competition is held at God Valley by the World Nobles, where Kuma meets and befriends fellow slaves Ivankov and Ginny.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 消された歴史！絶望のゴッドバレー (Kesareta Rekishi! Zetsubō no Goddo Barē)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A History Erased! God Valley of Despair
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After Ginny leaks information about the competition, the Roger Pirates and Rocks Pirates invade God Valley. Kuma's group plan to steal the Devil Fruit prizes to escape, and though Linlin interrupted them, Kuma succeeds in eating one, allowing his group and 500 other slaves to escape. After parting ways with Ivankov, Kuma and Ginny begin their new life of freedom together.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ひとときの幸せ くまちーとジニー (Hitotoki no Shiawase Kumachī to Jinī)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Fleeting Moment of Happiness - Kumachi and Ginny
Final Saga.episode_sumary: 30 years before the present, Kuma and Ginny are living in a church in Sorbet Kingdom. Eight years later, King Bekori decides to enslave the poor elderly townsfolk, prompting Kuma and the Freedom Fighters to take action and leading to the creation of the Revolutionary Army. Years later, 14 years before the present, Ginny is reported to have been kidnapped by an unknown assailant during a revolutionary operation.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ジニーへの誓い 父となったくま (Jinī e no Chikai - Chichi to Natta Kuma)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: A Pledge to Ginny - Kuma Becomes a Father
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Two years after Ginny was kidnapped by a World Noble, she returns to the Sorbet Kingdom, contacting the Revolutionary Army for her final words before succumbing to disease. Kuma begins raising her daughter Bonney, but years later, Bonney contracts the same symptoms. In an attempt to find a cure to this incurable disease, Kuma leaves the Revolutionary Army. A year later, the former King Bekori launches an act of vengeance against the Sorbet Kingdom.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: を救え 気弱な〝〟くま (Bonī o Sukue Kiyowana "Pashifisuta" Kuma)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: To Save His Daughter - Kuma the Timid Pacifist
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After thwarting Bekori's attempts to regain power, Kuma is officially branded a criminal. Traveling the world to seek a cure for Bonney's illness, he reunites with Dragon, who tells about Dr. Vegapunk. He and Bonney then meet with Vegapunk, who offers a cure for Bonney's disease in exchange for Kuma becoming the model for a cyborg project.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 非情なる運命 父くまの決断 (Hijō-naru Unmei - Chichi Kuma no Ketsudan)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Cruel Fate - Kuma's Decision as a Father
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Due to eavesdropping on their previous conversation, upon Borsalino's arrival, Saint Saturn forces some additional conditions on Kuma, including becoming a Warlord of the Sea and a Cyborg stripped of all memories. Six months later, Bonney is allowed to return to Sorbet Kingdom for her remaining treatment while under surveillance. As Kuma begins his duties as a Warlord, he writes to Bonney while approaching Foosha Village in the East Blue.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 父のいる海へ！ボニーが選ぶ未来 (Chichi no Iru Umi e! Bonī ga Erabu Mirai)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: To the Sea Where My Father is! The Future Bonney Chooses
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After witnessing Luffy train and remembering a conversation he had with Dragon, Kuma finishes his business in the East Blue, unaware the letters he sends to Bonney are being intercepted and destroyed by Alpha. Even after Bonney is cured, Alpha refuses to let her leave. However, with the help of Conney and some townspeople, Bonney escapes Alpha and departs out to sea.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: “くまの人生” (Kuma no Jinsei)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Kuma's Life
Final Saga.episode_sumary: During the last few days of his free will, Kuma witnesses the progress of the Straw Hat and Bonney Pirates throughout Paradise, including separating the Straw Hats so they could train and one day save the world. As the procedure starts, Kuma thinks back on his life.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ごめんね、お父さん ボニーの涙とくまの拳 (Gomen ne, Otōsan - Bonī no Namida to Kuma no Koboshi)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: I'm Sorry, Dad - Bonney's Tears and Kuma's Fist
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After Bonney comes out of the memory bubble, Vegapunk gives her the gift Kuma had for her tenth birthday. In the present, as Luffy consumes food to regain his strength, Bonney finds her ageing power does not work against Saturn, who reveals he was responsible for Ginny contracting Sapphire Scales and for Bonney having Devil Fruit powers. Before Bonney can be killed, Kuma arrives and punches Saturn.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ありがとう、お父さん ボニーとくまの熱き抱擁 (Arigatō, Otō-san - Bonī to Kuma no Atsuki Hōyō)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Thank You, Dad - Bonney and Kuma's Warm Embrace
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Saturn is knocked away from Kuma and Bonney's embrace. After Saturn recovers, Sanji and Franky protect the immobile Kuma, while Atlas gets him out of the area. Saturn then decides to invoke the Buster Call to eliminate Kuma, Bonney, Vegapunk, and the Straw Hat Pirates for good.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: を破壊せよ バスターコール発動 (Egguheddo o Hakai Seyo - Basutā Kōru Hatsudō)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Destroy Egghead - The Buster Call is Invoked
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As the Marines prepare for the Buster Call, Dr. Vegapunk fails to convince St. Saturn to call it off. The bombardment begins, and Kizaru prevents Franky's group from escaping while the Pacifistas are ordered to kill them. Elsewhere at sea, a downed Marine unit plans to warn Kizaru that a new force is approaching Egghead.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 憧れのヒーロー ボニーを救う解放の戦士 (Akogare no Hīrō - Bonī o Sukuu Kaihō no Senshi)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: An Admired Hero - The Warrior of Liberation Who Saves Bonney
Final Saga.episode_sumary: As Luffy reenters Gear 5, Atlas reveals to Bonney the secret of the Pacifistas, allowing her to gain control of them. As an angry Saturn stabs Vegapunk, Luffy arrives and engages Kizaru, and Vegapunk reveals to Bonney that Luffy is Nika. Elsewhere, the Iron Giant activates, while the Giant Warrior Pirates arrive to assist the Straw Hat Pirates.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 頼もしき援軍！ドリーとブロギー到着！ (Tanomoshiki Engun! Dorī to Burogī Tōchaku!)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Reliable Reinforcements! Dorry and Brogy Arrive!
Final Saga.episode_sumary: The Giant Warrior Pirates begin their attack as Dorry and Brogy move on ahead. As the other members of the Straw Hat Pirates continue their plan to escape Egghead, Luffy fights Saturn and Sanji fights Kizaru. However, Devon and Augur of the Blackbeard Pirates arrive for a mission, and while leaving, Caribou asks to go with them.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 応答せよ、世界 ベガパンクのメッセージ (Ōtō Seyo, Sekai - Begapanku no Messēji)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Come In, World - Vegapunk's Message
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Augur and Devon reluctantly agree to take Caribou with them when he promises useful information. The Vice Admirals target Bonney, but are interrupted by Dorry and Brogy, as Kizaru's attack kills Vegapunk. His death prompts a worldwide broadcast he recorded to begin.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: ベガパンクの秘策 緊迫の全世界配信 (Begapanku no Hisaku - Kinpaku no Zen Sekai Haishin)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Vegapunk's Secret Plan - A Tense Worldwide Broadcast
Final Saga.episode_sumary: Vegapunk gives the world ten minutes to prepare before he makes his announcement. Luffy's attack is able to take out Kizaru, as the Giant Warrior Pirates advance. Realizing they have to stop Vegapunk's broadcast, St. Saturn begins to summon the other Elders to Egghead.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: 最凶の悪夢 「五老星」集結 (Saikyō no Akumu - Gorōsei Shūketsu)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: The Worst Nightmare - The Five Elders Come Together
Final Saga.episode_sumary: After the other Elders arrive at Egghead in their transformed states, they separate to deal with the opposition. As Sanji contacts Nami to warn her of the situation, Usopp helps the Thousand Sunny safely stop. Elsewhere, Zoro launches a powerful blow against Lucci, and Dorry and Brogy arrive to assist Luffy.

Final Saga.episode_name_jp: との共闘！ルフィとエルバフの戦士 (Dachi to no Kyōtō! Rufi to Erubafu no Senshi)
Final Saga.episode_name_en: Fighting Together with Friends! Luffy and the Warriors of Elbaph

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Saisho no toride? Kyodai kujira Rabūn arawareru (最初の砦?巨大クジラ・ラブーン現る)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The First Obstacle? Giant Whale Laboon Appears
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Upon entering the Grand Line, the ship is swallowed by a giant whale, inside of which they discover a strange place. In addition, they are not the only ones there.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Otoko no yakusoku! Rufi to kujira saikai no chikai (男の約束！ルフィとクジラ再会の誓い)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: A Man's Promise! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After hearing the story of Laboon the whale, Luffy comes up with a clever solution to his problems. From Laboon's caretaker, Crocus, the crew learns more about the Grand Line and how to navigate through it, since compasses are useless there.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kaizoku kangei no machi? Uisukīpīku jōriku (海賊歓迎の町?ウイスキーピーク上陸)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: A Pirate-Loving Town? Arrival at Whisky Peak
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy and friends arrive at Whisky Peak, a town of pirate-lovers who hold them a feast.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Sakuretsu santōryū! Zoro vs Barokku Wākusu (炸裂三刀流！ゾロVSバロックワークス)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Exploding Santoryu! Zoro vs. Baroque Works!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Zoro battles a hundred members of Baroque Works, and discovers there is more to them than meets the eye.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Shinken shōbu! Rufi vs Zoro Nazo no dai kettō (真剣勝負！ルフィVSゾロ謎の大決闘！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: A Serious Fight! Luffy vs. Zoro: the Baffling Duel!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy, who does not realize the town is full of bounty hunters, engages in a battle with Zoro after he discovers that Zoro attacked the townsfolk, while Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine head for Princess Vivi.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Ōjo Bibi o todokero! Rufi kaizokudan shukkō (王女ビビを届けろ！ルフィ海賊団出航)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Deliver Princess Vivi! Luffy Pirates Depart
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy's crew manages to become targets of Crocodile, one of the Shichibukai, and decide to help Princess Vivi. They also meet Miss All-Sunday, the second strongest member of Baroque Works and partner of Crocodile.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Ganbare Kobī! Kobimeppo kaigun funtōki (頑張れコビー！コビメッポ海軍奮闘記)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Try Hard, Koby! Diary of Koby-Meppo's Marine Struggles
Arabasta.episode_sumary: As Luffy and his crew are sailing in the Grand Line, Koby and Helmeppo are stuck doing odd-jobs for the marines back in East Blue, and encounter Vice-Admiral Garp.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kobimeppo no ketsui! Gāpu Chūjō no oyagokoro (コビメッポの決意！ガープ中将の親心)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Koby-Meppo's Determination! Vice Admiral Garp's Fatherly Pride
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Vice Admiral Garp mentors Koby and Helmeppo to become marines.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Taiko no shima! Ritoru Gāden ni hisomu kage! (太古の島！リトルガーデンに潜む影！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Prehistoric Island! The Shadow Lurking in Little Garden!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy and friends land on Little Garden, a prehistoric island inhabited by dinosaurs and giants.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Dekkai kettō! Kyojin Dorī to Burogī (でっかい決闘！巨人ドリーとブロギー)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Humongous Battle! The Giants Dorry and Brogy!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Nami and Usopp meet a giant named Brogy, while Luffy and Vivi encounter Brogy's rival, Dorry. The Straw Hats little suspect that Officer Agents of Baroque Works are on their tail.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Rufi okoru! Seinaru kettō ni hiretsu na wana (ルフィ怒る！聖なる決闘に卑劣な罠)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Luffy's Anger! A Dirty Trick in a Sacred Battle
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Dorry, critically injured by exploding ale, blames the Straw Hats. Luffy is enraged that someone would pull such a cowardly trick to sabotage the giants' honorable duel.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Burogī shōri no gōkyū! Erubafu no kecchaku! (ブロギー勝利の号泣！エルバフの決着)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Brogy Wails in Victory! Elbaph's Judgement
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy tries in vain to convince the injured Dorry not to fight Brogy. The Officer Agents who sabotaged Dorry's ale further tamper with the giants' duel.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Ma no kyandoru! Munen no namida to ikari no namida (魔のキャンドル！無念の涙と怒りの涙)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Devil's Candle! Tears of Regret and Tears of Anger
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Having subdued the giants, Baroque Works makes their move. Mr. 3 introduces Zoro, Nami, Vivi, and Brogy to the slow torture of becoming living statues of wax.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Rufi o osou maryoku! Karāzutorappu! (ルフィを襲う魔力！カラーズトラップ)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Luffy Attacked by Magic! Colors Trap
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy attempts to rescue his friends but only accelerates the deadly waxing process. To make matters worse, Miss Goldenweek interferes and reveals her own terrifying ability.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Iza hangeki! Usoppu no kiten to kaenboshi! (いざ反撃！ウソップの機転と火炎星！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Critical Counterattack! Usopp's Quick Wit and Kaenboshi!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Usopp frees Luffy from Miss Goldenweek's control. With Karoo's help, Usopp and Luffy rescue the others, who take on Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine. Luffy and Karoo pursue Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek into the forest.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Saraba kyojin no shima! Arabasuta o mezase! (さらば巨人の島！アラバスタを目指せ)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Farewell to the Giants' Island! On to Arabasta
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After having a pleasant chat with Mr. 0 and encountering the "Unluckies", Sanji retrieves an Eternal Pose for Arabasta. The crew leaves Little Garden and sets sail for Arabasta.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Nami ga byōki? Umi ni furu yuki no mukō ni! (ナミが病気?海に降る雪の向こうに！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Nami is Sick? Beyond the Snow that Falls on the Ocean!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Nami is sick, but the crew does not have a doctor to help her.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kishū! Burikingu gō to Buriki no Waporu (奇襲！ブリキング号とブリキのワポル)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Ambush! The Bliking and Wapol the Blik
Arabasta.episode_sumary: While looking for a doctor, the crew meets the pirate Wapol, who attacks them, but only makes Luffy send him flying.  Meanwhile Smoker manages to intercept the conversation between Mr. 0 and Sanji and plans to go to Arabasta.  Back with the crew they arrive at last to an island only to find out they are not welcome.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Isha no inai shima? Na mo naki kuni no bōken (医者のいない島?名も無き国の冒険！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: A Doctorless Island? Adventure in the Country Without a Name!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The Straw Hat crew manages to gain the trust of the people that attacked them, and are taken to the village, except for Zoro and Karoo, who guard the ship.
