Luffy and Sanji must take Nami to the island's sole doctor who lives on a mountain-top. Vivi and Usopp discover the past of the island, and about the pirate Wapol from Dalton.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Happī kai? Majo to yobareta isha! (ハッピーかい?魔女と呼ばれた医者！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Ya Happy? The Doctor Who is Called a Witch!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness, the islander's worst nightmare turns true, as Wapol returns to the island. The doctor is discovered to be on the other side of the island, and Usopp, Vivi and Dalton rush to find her. Dalton however returns as he hears of Wapol's return.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Doruton no kakugo! Waporu gundan shima ni jōriku (ドルトンの覚悟！ワポル軍団島に上陸)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Dalton's Resolve! Wapol's Forces Land
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Dalton faces Wapol, but only gets himself hit by arrows thrown by his former comrade Chess. An avalanche stops the battle, but injures Sanji. Luffy must carry both Nami and Sanji to the doctor, and begins his ascent.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Yuki no sumu shima! Doramu Rokkī o nobore! (雪の住む島！ドラムロッキーを登れ！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Island that Lives in Snow! Ascend The Drum Rockies!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The Lapahn help Luffy escape from Wapol, giving him enough time to climb to the castle where doctor Kureha lives. Vivi, Usopp and Zoro deal with the king's army in order to save Dalton. The recovering Nami meets a strange creature.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Tonakai wa aoppana! Choppā no himitsu! (トナカイは青っ鼻！チョッパーの秘密)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Blue-Nosed Reindeer! Chopper's Secret
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Nami asks Chopper to join the crew, but he is not interested. Kureha tells Nami some of what was Chopper's background. After realizing the abilities that Chopper has, Luffy is eager to make him join the crew.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hamidashimono no yume! Yabu isha Hiruruku! (はみだし者の夢！やぶ医者ヒルルク！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Dream of the Outcasts! The Quack Doctor Hiriluk!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Doctorine continues to tell how Chopper lived his life and how the quack doctor Hiriluk took care of him.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hiruruku no sakura to uketsugare yuku ishi! (ヒルルクの桜と受け継がれゆく意志！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and Inherited Will!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: More of Chopper's past is revealed, including the fate of doctor Hiriluk and Wapol's cruelties as the king. Meanwhile, Wapol reaches the castle where the crew is residing.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: VS Waporu gundan! Bakubaku no mi no nōryoku! (VSワポル軍団！バクバクの実の能力！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Against Wapol's Army Corps! The Abilities of the Baku Baku no Mi!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Wapol is determined to bring down Hiriluk's flag, and to do that, he engages Sanji, Luffy and Chopper in a fight.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Zōn kei akuma no mi! Choppā Nanadan Henkei (動物系悪魔の実！チョッパー七段変形)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Zoan Type Devil's Fruit! Chopper's Seven-Level Transformation
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Chopper demonstrates the abilities of Rumble Balls when fighting Chessmarimo. Dalton is uncovered from the avalanche.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Ōkoku no shihai owaru toki! Shinnen no hata wa eien ni (王国の支配終る時！信念の旗は永遠に)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: When the Kingdom's Rule is Over! The Flag of Conviction Lasts Forever
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After trying every trick in the castle, Wapol is finally hunted down by Luffy. The villagers along with Zoro, Vivi and Usopp start their ascent to the castle through a ropeway.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hiruruku no sakura! Doramu Rokkī no kiseki (ヒルルクの桜！ドラムロッキーの奇跡)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle of the Drum Rockies
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After finally been convinced to join the team, Chopper announces his intentions to Dr. Kureha, who does not take it too well; but after escaping from the castle, she has decided to give the whole Straw Hat crew a farewell gift.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Sayōnara Doramujima! Boku wa umi e deru! (さようならドラム島！僕は海へ出る！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Farewell, Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Chopper joins the Straw Hat crew as they continue their journey to Vivi's homeland.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Arabasuta no eiyū to senjō no barerīna (アラバスタの英雄と船上のバレリーナ)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Hero of Arabasta and the Ballerina on Deck
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Crocodile appears to stop rampaging pirates. Luffy and his crew meet Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, who shows off his Devil Fruit power; Vivi sees a shocking sight.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Iza sabaku no kuni e! Ame o yobu kona to hanrangun (いざ砂漠の国へ！雨を呼ぶ粉と反乱軍)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Coming to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Calling Powder and the Rebel Army
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy separates from the rest of the crew, right after arriving at Arabasta's port city of Nanohana. The crew dons disguises while Luffy learns of Dance Powder.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Gōketsutachi no saikai! Yatsu no na wa hiken no Ēsu (豪傑達の再会！奴の名は火拳のエース)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Reunion of the Powerful! His Name is Fire Fist Ace
Arabasta.episode_sumary: While in Nanohana, the Straw Hats encounter Smoker and Tashigi. A powerful pirate named  appears, and is revealed to be Luffy's older brother.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Ēsu to Rufi! Atsuki omoi to kyōdai no kizuna (エースとルフィ！熱き想いと兄弟の絆)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Ace and Luffy! Warm Memories and Brotherly Bonds
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Ace fights Smoker while the Straw Hats run for their ship. Luffy reunites with his brother, and together take down agents of Baroque Works.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Midori no machi Erumaru to Kunfū Jugon! (緑の町エルマルとクンフージュゴン！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Green City, Erumalu and the Kung Fu Dugongs!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Ace decides to travel with the Straw Hats, as he is hunting for a man known as Blackbeard. The group arrives first at the 'Green City' of Erumalu only to find it abandoned to the desert. Vivi and Nami explain what Dance Powder is and what it has done to Arabasta.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Suna no kuni no bōken! Ennetsu no daichi ni sugomu mamono (砂の国の冒険！炎熱の大地に棲む魔物)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Demons that Live in the Scorching Earth
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After leaving Erumalu, the Straw Hats plus Vivi & Ace continue through the desert, facing the many dangers of it.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Sabaku no kaizokudan tōjō! Jiyū ni ikiru otokotachi (砂漠の海賊団登場！自由に生きる男達)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Here Come the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Free
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Nami and Vivi found themselves an easier way to travel in the desert and leave all men behind. While trying to catch up with them, Ace gets lost. Luffy and the rest of the gang find the Desert Pirates, and Vivi meets a figure from her past.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Nisemono no iji! Kokoro no hanrangun Kamyu! (ニセモノの意地！心の反乱軍カミュ!)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Spirit of the Fakes! Heart of the Rebel Army, Kamyu!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After hearing that a small village has fake Rebel Army bodyguards that have been keeping peace, Vivi asks the men of the crew to test if they are worthy of staying.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hanrangun senshi Kōza! Bibi ni chikatta yume! (反乱軍戦士コーザ！ビビに誓った夢！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Rebel Warrior Koza! The Dream Sworn to Vivi!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Still trekking through the Arabasta desert, the crew beats up a giant desert scorpion for lunch, while Vivi tells Nami about her past and her friendship with Koza.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Yōen no kettō! Ēsu vs otoko sukōpion (陽炎の決闘！エースVS男スコーピオン)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Heat Haze Duel! Ace vs. Scorpion Man
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Ace finds out that Blackbeard is not in Arabasta after all, and leaves the group to continue looking for him. He leaves Luffy a mysterious piece of paper, explaining that it 'will let them meet again.'

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kiseki to maigo! Bibi to nakama to kuni no katachi (遺跡と迷子！ビビと仲間と国のかたち)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Ruins and Lost Ways! Vivi, Her Friends, and the Country's Form
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Zoro, Chopper and Luffy manage to get themselves lost and stumble across some huge underground ruins.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Supaidāzu Kafe ni hachiji teki kanbu shūgō (スパイダーズカフェに8時敵幹部集合)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: At Spiders Cafe - The Enemy Ringleaders Meet at 8 o'clock
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Baroque Works plan starts to take effect, and for that, the Number Agents gather to meet Mr. 0. Meanwhile, crew finds out that the Rebel Army has moved out of Yuba and headed to Katorea, and the rebel leader Koza is determined to attack.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Rufi vs Bibi! Nakama ni kakeru namida no chikai (ルフィVSビビ!仲間に賭ける涙の誓い)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Luffy vs. Vivi! A Tearful Vow for Comrades
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Vivi and Luffy disagree in how to stop the rebel army and Baroque Works, leading to a fight.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Arabasuta sensen! Yume no machi Reinbēsu! (アラバスタ戦線！夢の町レインベース)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Arabasta War Front! City of Dreams, Rainbase
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The crew travels to the city of Rainbase to take down Crocodile and Baroque Works, but run afoul of Smoker and Tashigi.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Zettai zetsumei no wana! Rein dināzu totsunyū (絶体絶命の罠!レインディナーズ突入)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Trap in a Desperate Situation! Breaking Into Rain Dinners
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Most of the Straw Hats, along with Smoker, are trapped by Crocodile. Vivi reunites with the royal guardian Pell, but is captured by Miss All-Sunday. Crocodile reveals his invincible Devil Fruit power.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Yūtopia sakusen hatsudō! ugokidashita hanran (ユートピア作戦発動!動き出した反乱)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Operation Utopia Commences! The Wave of Rebellion Begins to Move
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Baroque Works' plan to take over Arabasta is set in motion. The king is kidnapped and framed for a crime, and the rebel army begins to move.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kyōfu no Bananawani to Mistā Purinsu (恐怖のバナナワニとミスタープリンス)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Fearsome Bananawani and Mr. Prince
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Most of the Straw Hats are helplessly trapped, but Crocodile is contacted by "Mr. Prince".

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Gyakuden dai dasshutsu e no kagi! Dorudoru Bōru! (逆転大脱出への鍵！ドルドルボール！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Key to Turning the Tide and a Great Escape! Doru Doru Ball!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Chopper distracts Crocodile while Sanji frees the rest of the crew, but find themselves trapped yet again. Smoker's view on Luffy changes a little.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Jōmuyō no shitō! Rufi vs Kurokodairu! (情無用の死闘！ルフィVSクロコダイル)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Merciless Fight to the Death! Luffy vs. Crocodile
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After escaping from Rain Dinners, the Straw Hats and Vivi cross the desert to Alubarne, where the final battle will take place. Crocodile, however, manages to catch Luffy, beginning the first round of their battle.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kiseki e no Shissō! Arabasuta Dōbutsu Rando (奇跡への疾走！アラバスタ動物ランド)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Miracle Sprint! Arabasta the Animal Land
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy is left for dead by Crocodile, but is helped by the mysteríous Miss All-Sunday. Meanwhile, the rest of the Straw Hats reach Alubarna  after encountering the Spot-Billed Duck Squad and dangers of Arabasta's main river.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hanrangun vs kokuōgun! Kessen wa Arabāna! (反乱軍VS国王軍！決戦はアルバーナ！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! The Battle will be in Alubarna!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The revolution is on the verge of starting and the crew comes out with a plan that could stop it.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Nageki no Arubāna! Gekitō Karū taichō (嘆きのアルバーナ!激闘カルー隊長!)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Alubarna is Crying! Fierce Fight of Captain Karoo!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Vivi's attempts to stop the rebel army go to waste, and she is attacked by Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, but manages to escape. Meanwhile, the battle of Usopp and Chopper vs. the Mr. 4 team begins.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Nakama no yumi ni chikau! Kettō Mogura tsuka 4 banchō (仲間の夢に誓う！決闘モグラ塚4番街)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Swear on Your Crewmate's Dream! Battle at Molehill 4th Avenue
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Things look hopeless for Usopp & Chopper as they continue to suffer from every attack that the Mr.4 team makes. However, the tides may be beginning to turn as Usopp learns what it truly means to be a man.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Honjitsu dai kōkai! Manemane Montāju! (本日大公開！マネマネモンタージュ！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Today's Grand Performance! Mane Mane Montage!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Albeit severely beaten and bruised, Usopp and Chopper have finally defeated the Mr.4 team. However, Mr. 2 has figured out Sanji's weakness.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Nami ni henshin! Bonkurē renpatsu baree Kenpō (ナミに変身！ボンクレ－連発バレエ拳法)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Transforming Into Nami! Bon Kurei's Hard-Hitting Ballet Kenpo
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Though Mr. 2 discovers Sanji's weakness, Sanji still defeats his opponent after an evenly-matched fight. Meanwhile, before Vivi could give the word to blow up the palace, Crocodile appears.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Nami no senpū chūihō! Kurimatakuto sakuretsu (ナミの旋風注意報！クリマタクト炸裂)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Nami's Whirlwind Warning! Clima-Tact Explosion
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Nami faces off against Miss Doublefinger and tries to figure out her new weapon that Usopp made, the Clima-Tact.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Ōke ni tsuwaru himitsu! Kodai heiki Buruton (王家に伝わる秘密！古代兵器プルトン)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Secret of the Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon, Pluton
Arabasta.episode_sumary: While Crocodile reveals to Vivi about the ancient weapon Pluton, Nami attempts to defeat Miss Doublefinger with her most powerful attack: The Tornado Tempo.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Gōken no kyokui! Hagane o kiru chikara to mono no kokyū (豪剣の極意！鋼鉄を斬る力と物の呼吸)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Essence of a Mighty Sword! The Power to Cut Steel and the Breath of All Things
Arabasta.episode_sumary: While Miss. Doublefinger's fight with Nami was challenging, Zoro is having an even more difficult time fighting Mr.1: A man who can change his entire body into steel - something that Zoro cannot cut. As Zoro nears death, he must discover the secret to "the breath of all things".

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Tatakai wa owatta! Kōza ga ageta shiroi hata (戦いは終わった！コーザが掲げた白い旗)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Battle is Over! Koza Flies the White Flag
Arabasta.episode_sumary: When Vivi reveals Crocodile's plan to Koza, he attempts to stop the fighting, but is shot. Crocodile reveals that he has set up a massive bomb in the city.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Bibi no koe no yuke! Eiyū wa maiorita! (ビビの声の行方！英雄は舞い降りた！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Vivi's Voice Goes Unheard! A Hero Descends!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: As Koza tries to stop the Rebel Army, both sides are once more fighting due to the intervention of Baroque Works. Vivi is thrown to her certain death when Luffy saves her and challenges Crocodile to a second round.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Suna wani to mizu Rufi! Ketō dai ni raundo (砂ワニと水ルフィ！決闘第2ラウンド)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Sand Crocodile and Water Luffy! Death Match: Round 2
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy fights Crocodile with more success this time by using water, but still loses this round. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats hurry to locate the bomb before it goes off. Nico Robin forces the king to take her to the tomb where the Pluton Poneglyph is hidden.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Wanippoi! Ōke no haka e hashire Rufi! (ワニっぽい！王家の墓へ走れルフィ！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Smells Like Croc! Run to the Tomb of the Royal Family, Luffy!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Crocodile joins Robin in the tomb, and orders her to translate the Poneglyph. Robin tells him that Pluton was not mentioned and that it was only about history, but Crocodile figures out that she was lying and stabs her in response. When Luffy recovers from the last round of fighting, he chases after Crocodile into the tomb.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Akumu no toki hakaru! Koko wa Sunasunadan himitsu kichi (悪夢の時迫る！ここは砂砂団秘密基地)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Nightmare Draws Near! Secret Base of the Suna Suna Clan
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy fights with Crocodile by using blood on his fists. Meanwhile Vivi finds the bomb, and calls the Straw Hats together.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Idai naru tsubame! Wa ga na wa kuno no shigoshin Peru (偉大なる翼！我が名は国の守護神ペル)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Spirit of the Kingdom
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Vivi finds the bomb inside of the clock tower, but the Mr. 7 pair of Baroque Works are there to protect it. Vivi defeats them, but she realizes the bomb cannot be stopped so easily. It has a timer,  and right before it blows up, Pell shows up and takes it into the atmosphere, where he sacrifices himself to save Arabasta.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Koete iku! Arabasuta ni ame ga furu! (越えていく！アラバスタに雨が降る！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls on Arabasta!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy defeats Crocodile by punching him through solid bedrock. When Crocodile falls, the rain-drops calm the soldiers.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Buki yo saraba! Kaizoku to ikutsu ka no seigi (武器よさらば！海賊といくつかの正義)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and a Little Justice
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Now that the battle has ended, the outcome is tallied. Igaram appears with proof of Cobra's innocence, as well as Koza telling everything. Tashigi and Smoker both are rewarded for taking on Crocodile, but neither one of them believes that is right, considering the Straw Hat pirates did all the work.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kaizokutachi no utage to Arabasuta dasshutsu sakusen! (海賊たちの宴とアラバスタ脱出作戦!)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Pirates' Banquet and Operation Escape Arabasta!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Luffy is rescued from the collapsed tomb where he fought Crocodile and brought into Cobra's palace to rest. When he awakens, a magnificent banquet is thrown for the pirates, then, the Straw Hats are invited to enjoy the hot spring steam room inside the palace.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hajimaru wa ano hi! Bibi ga kataru bōkendan (始まりはあの日!ビビが語る冒険譚)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Everything Began That Day! Vivi Tells of Her Adventures!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: It's the day for Vivi's speech and her decision whether or not to continue to be with the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Bon Kurei and his crew attempt to protect the Straw Hats from Hina.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kiken na kaori! Shichininme wa Niko Robin! (危険な香り！七人目はニコ・ロビン！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Beware Her Scent! The Seventh One is Nico Robin!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The Marines fail again to catch the Straw Hats. After escaping from Marines, Nico Robin (Ms. All Sunday) appears from inside of Straw Hats ship. She manages to persuade the crew to let her join. Pell is seen at the end standing over his own grave.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Hajimete no kanja! Ranburu bōru hiwa (はじめての患者！ランブルボール秘話)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The First Patient! Anecdote of the Rumble Ball
Arabasta.episode_sumary: After their adventures in Arabasta, the crew come upon another deserted island and split up tasks amongst themselves. Chopper is left in charge of guarding the ship, and he reminisces about the day he first made the rumble ball and his first patient, Dr. Kureha, while spending some time with the newest crewmember: Nico Robin.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Kōkaishi no hanran! Yuzurenai yume no tame ni! (航海士の反乱！ゆずれない夢の為に！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: The Navigator's Mutiny! For an Unwavering Dream!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: A weird salesman is fished out of the water and onto the Going Merry, and Nami buys a ton of "1000 year paper" from him to draw her sea maps. However, that's not going to be easy with the rest of the crew goofing off as usual.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Uketsugareru yume! Karē no tetsujin Sanji (受け継がれる夢！カレーの鉄人サンジ)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Inherited Recipe! Sanji the Curry Iron Chef
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The Going Merry runs into several Marine ships in some fog, and the Straw Hats meet a trainee Marine chef named Tajiyo. Sanji helps him out of a bit of cooking trouble.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Sakasete misemasu! Otoko Usoppu yasaka tama (咲かせてみせます！男ウソップ八尺玉)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: I'll Make it Bloom! Manly Usopp's Eight-Shaku Ball
Arabasta.episode_sumary: The crew stops on an island that's having its annual fireworks festival; Usopp meets a young fireworks-maker named Kodama and helps her achieve her dream.

Arabasta.episode_name_jp: Uwasa no kaizoku gari! Sasurai no kenshi Zoro! (噂の海賊狩り！さすらいの剣士ゾロ！)
Arabasta.episode_name_en: Infamous Pirate Hunter! The Wandering Swordsman, Zoro!
Arabasta.episode_sumary: Zoro has a flashback about the time when he first met Johnny and Yosaku, and faced off against Bandits and, Dick.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Yagi no shima no Zenii to yama no naka no kaizokusen (ヤギの島のゼニィと山の中の海賊船)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Zenny of Goat Island and the Pirate Ship in the Mountains!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: After escaping from several Marine ships, the Straw Hats land on an uncharted island and meet an old man named Zenny. Chopper finds out that, because of his bad heart, Zenny probably only has three days to live.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Mōkarimakka? Kanekashi Zenii no yabō (儲かりまっか？金貸しゼニィの野望)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: How's That for Profit? Money Lender Zenny's Ambition!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats help Zenny out, hoping to make his last days good ones; they learn about Zenny's past as a money lender, and his dream of becoming a pirate. But Zoro realizes that Zenny has outlived Chopper's predictions and so the straw hats decide that, after helping him finish his pirate ship, they will leave the island.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Shima no otakara no yukue! Zenii Kaizokudan shutsugeki! (島のお宝の行方！ゼニィ海賊団出撃！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Where the Island's Treasure Lies! Zenny Pirates Full Charge!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Zenny decides to follow his dream and become a pirate, despite his age. He helps the Straw Hats out of trouble with the Marines, and then they part ways.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Nijiiro no kiri densetsu! Ruruka-tō no rōjin Henzo (虹色の霧伝説！ルルカ島の老人ヘンゾ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Ruluka Island and the Old Man Henzo
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: On Ruluka Island, some of the Straw Hats make enemies of the Mayor and his men, who have placed high taxes on everything. Robin, Usopp, and Luffy meet Professor Henzo, who's doing research on the island's rainbow mist. When some of the mist shows up, Henzo borrows the Going Merry to go explore it.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Eien no kuni no jūnin! Panpukin kaizokudan! (永遠の国の住人！パンプキン海賊団！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Inhabitants of Neverland! The Pumpkin Pirates!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The inside of the Rainbow Mist full of wrecked ships and treasure, and is guarded by five kids. The kids are actually friends of Henzo's that got lost in the mist over 50 years ago.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kokyū e no omoi! Dasshutsu funō no kaizoku hakaba! (故郷への想い！脱出不能の海賊墓場！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: A Longing for Home! The Inescapable Pirate Graveyard!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Henzo, his friends, and the others try to find a way out of the ship graveyard. Meanwhile, the Mayor and his men let the information about the Rainbow Mist slip to the remaining Straw Hats still on Ruluka.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ransen hissu! Uetton no yabō to niji no tō (乱戦必至！ウエットンの野望と虹の塔)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Frantic Struggle! Wetton's Plans and the Rainbow Tower!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy accidentally propels himself and Rapanui to the end of the mist. Nami appears in the ship graveyard with a rowboat full of treasure and a string connected to the real world, which are both stolen by Wetton's subordinate. The Mayor uses the Rainbow Tower to make a bridge to the Rainbow Mist.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Soshite densetsu ga hajimaru! Iza niji no kanata e (そして伝説が始まる！いざ虹の彼方へ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: And Then the Legend Begins! To the End of the Rainbow!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Going Merry escapes from the Rainbow Mist, getting badly damaged on the way. The Mayor gets arrested by a bunch of powerful marines that turn out to be older versions of Henzo's friends, who were thrown 50 years into the past by the Rainbow Mist's collapse.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ubawareta kiroku! Sarubēji ō Mashira! (奪われた記録！サルベージ王マシラ！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Log is Taken! Salvage King, Masira!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Nami's log pose begins to point to the sky, and the crew finds a map of an island named 'Skypiea' on a 200-year-old ship. They compete with the monkey-like Masira's salvage crew while they search for more clues on how to get there.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaibutsu tōjō! Shirohige Ichimi ni wa te o dasu na (怪物登場！白ひげ一味には手を出すな)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Monsters Appear! Don't Touch the Whitebeard Pirates
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats decide to go to Jaya island to look for information on Skypiea. Meanwhile, Ace suddenly shows up on Buggy's ship; Buggy does not let any of his men attack Ace, fearing Whitebeard's retribution.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Yume o miru na! Azakeri no machi Mokku Taun! (夢を見るな！嘲りの街モックタウン！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Stop Dreaming! The City of Ridicule, Mock Town!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Jaya's main town is full of famous pirates that are constantly brawling with each other. Luffy and Zoro have a run-in with a pirate known as '  the Hyena,' who ridicules their dreams and beats them up.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaizoku no takami! Yume o kataru otoko to kaitei shinsaku ō (海賊の高み！夢を語る男と海底探索王)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Pirate's Summit! The Man Who Talks of Dreams and the King of Underwater Exploration
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Zoro and Nami meet the man who is later revealed to be Blackbeard. They leave Mock Town, and get into a fight with Masira's brother Shoujou, another salvage monkey.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Densetsu no ichizoku! Usotsuki Nōrando (伝説の一族！うそつきノーランド)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Legendary Family! 'Liar Noland'
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats meet with Mont Blanc Cricket on another part of Jaya; Cricket is a descendant of Montblanc Noland, an infamous "liar" who told of a gold city on Jaya, and Cricket was outcast for looking for artifacts of the gold city. He may be the only person who knows how to get to Skypiea.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kumo kaji ippai! Sausubādo o oe! (雲舵いっぱい！サウスバードを追え！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Hard Turn to the Clouds! Find the Southbird!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Cricket explains how the Straw Hats can ride a dangerous vertical current called the Knock-Up Stream to get to Skypiea. However, they first have to catch a southbird to point them toward the point where the stream will erupt from the ocean.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Gensō wa kanawanai!? Beramī tai saruyama rengō (幻想は叶わない!?ベラミーVS猿山連合)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Dreams Don't Come True!? Bellamy vs. The Saruyama Alliance
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: While the Straw Hats are looking for a Southbird, Bellamy and his crew attack Cricket's house, and steal the gold artifacts he'd collected over the years from his salvage work. When the Straw Hats return and see what happened, Luffy decides to take a side trip back to Mock Town.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ichioku no otoko! Sekai saikō kenryoku to kaizoku kurohige (一億の男！世界最高権力と海賊黒ひげ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The 100,000,000 Man! The World's Highest Authority and the Pirate Blackbeard
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy takes out Bellamy with a single punch. Meanwhile, the world government heads are concerned over Whitebeard, Shanks, and Luffy. The marines try to decide who will replace Crocodile as a Shichibukai - one of Blackbeard's crew shows up uninvited and nominates his captain.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Fune wa sora o yuku! Nokku Appu Sutorīmu ni nore (船は空をゆく！に乗れ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Sail into the Sky! Ride the Knock-Up Stream
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Going Merry is refitted by Masira and Shoujou to be more flight capable, and the Straw Hats catch a ride on the Knock-Up Stream for Skypiea.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Koko wa sora no umi! Sora no kishi to tengoku no mon (ここは空の海！空の騎士と天国の門)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: This is the Sea of the Sky! The Knight of the Sky and Heaven's Gate
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats arrive in an ocean above the clouds. Usopp almost falls out of the Going Merry but is saved at the last minute. The crew is also attacked by a mysterious looking warrior, but is saved by the Knight of the Sky. Finally, they arrive at the border which transports them to the upper realm, Skypiea.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kami no kuni Sukaipia! Kumo no nagisa no tenshitachi (神の国スカイピア！雲の渚の天使たち)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Godland Skypiea! The Angels of the Cloud Beach
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: As the crew arrives in Skypiea, they are greeted by Conis and her pet Su. Both she and her father start explaining how the life in Skypiea is and how the different Dials work.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kindan no seichi! Kami no sumu shima to ten no sabaki! (禁断の聖地！神の住む島と天の裁き！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Sacred Ground! The Island Where God Resides and Heaven's Judgement!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Nami finds out what should happen to anyone who enters the forest. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang are waiting for the wind to change but are rudely assaulted by Skypiea's police who are going to carry out Heaven's Judgement.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Hayaku mo hanzaisha!? Sukaipia no hō no banjin (早くも犯罪者！？スカイピアの法の番人)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Criminals Already!? Skypiea's Upholders of the Law
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats have some problems with the local justice enforcer force called "The White Berets.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Dasshutsu naru ka!? Ugokihajimeta kami no shiren! (脱出なるか！？動きはじめた神の試練！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Can we Escape!? God's Ordeals are Set in Motion!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: While trying to escape from Sky Island, Robin, Chopper, Nami and Zoro are held hostages by God Enel.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Raburī dōri no wana! Zennō naru kami Eneru (ラブリー通りの罠！全能なる神エネル)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Trap on Lovely Street! Almighty God Enel
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Conis leads Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji to a boat to get to Upper Yard, but she tells them it is a trap and almost gets hit by "Heaven's Judgment".

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Susume Karasumaru! Ikenie no saidan o mezase (すすめカラス丸！生贄の祭壇を目指せ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Go Forth, Little Crow! To the Sacrificial Altar
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Usopp and Sanji finally enter Upper Yard, only to find out that the whole road is trapped heavily, but at last they arrive at the Ordeal Gates.  Meanwhile Robin, Zoro, and Nami go out to explore Upper Yard while Chopper stays behind to guard the ship.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Seizonritsu 10%! Mantora tsukai no Shinkan Satori (生存率10%！心綱使いの神官サトリ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Survival Rate: 10%! Priest Satori with the Power of Mantra!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp enter the Ordeal of Balls gate and encounter the Priest Satori.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Tama no shiren no kyōi! Mayoi no mori no shitō (「玉の試練」の脅威！迷いの森の死闘)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Peril of the Ordeal of Balls! Fight to the Death in the Lost Forest
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp, Sanji and Luffy fight Satori, but the power of Mantra seems to be too strong.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Choppā abunau shi! Moto kami VS Shinkan Shura (チョッパー危うし！元神VS神官シュラ)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Chopper's in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper, threatened by priest Shura, blows the whistle for Gan Fall to come, but before he can arrive, Priest Shura assaults Chopper and begins destroying the Going Merry.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Makafushigi! Himo no shiren to koi no shiren!? (摩訶不思議！紐の試練と恋の試練！？)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Ever Mysterious! Ordeal of String and Ordeal of Love!?
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Gan Fall cannot handle Shura and lost the battle. Meanwhile, Satori is finally defeated by Luffy and Sanji.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Shandora no tō o nobose! Senshi Waipā (シャンドラの灯を燈せ！戦士ワイパー)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Light the Fire of Shandia! Wyper the Warrior
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper is saved by a bunch of giant Southbirds, who tell him that Gan Fall was actually God. Nami, Zoro and Robin discover the reason why Upper Yard is a soil island: It was once part of Jaya, and this is the part that Liar Noland saw. Meanwhile the Shandia attack Upper Yard.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Tenkū no ōgonkyō Jaya! Mezase kami no yashiro (天空の黄金郷ジャヤ！目指せ神の社)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Floating Land of Gold, Jaya! To God's Shrine!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Shandia attack on Upper Yard has started. The crew is finally reunited, and everyone speaks up about what has happened. Chopper takes care of Gan Fall, and the pirates plan to steal the gold on the island.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: ōgon zenya matsuri! Vāsu e no omoi! (黄金前夜祭!「ヴァース」への想い!)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Eve of Gold Festival! Feelings Toward 'Vearth'!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: After befriending a wolf pack, Gan Fall tells the crew a little more about the history of Upper Yard.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kami Eneru tōjō!! Ikinokori e no ōbado (神・エネル登場!! 生き残りへの夜明曲)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: God Enel Appears!! Aubade to the Survivors
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Enel takes away the limitations of the priests. Also, Usopp witnesses a mysterious person fixing the ship; the next day Merry is found to be back to her original form. After getting her off the altar, the pirates plan out their course of action.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kiba muku uwabami! Tsui ni hajimaru sabaibaru gēmu (牙むく大蛇!遂に始まる)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Python Strikes! The Survival Game Begins
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: A giant python makes Luffy, Robin, Chopper and Zoro split while going to the ruins at the south.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Sutemi no haigeki! Senki Waipā no kakugō (捨て身の排撃!『戦鬼』ワイパーの覚悟)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Life-Threatening Reject! War Demon Wyper's Resolve
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Wyper takes out Shura and tells his goal to the Shandia, and Enel speaks up about how many people will be alive by the end of his plan.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kūchū no gekisen! Kaizoku Zoro VS Senshi Burahamu (空中の激戦!海賊ゾロVS戦士ブラハム)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Fierce Sky Battle! Pirate Zoro vs. Fighter Braham
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro fights the Shandia warrior Braham, and defeats him with Ittoryu (one sword style) 36 Pound Cannon technique.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Unaru Bān Bazuka!! Rufi vs Senki Waipā (唸る燃焼砲!! ルフィVS戦鬼ワイパー)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Howling Burn Bazooka!! Luffy vs. War Demon Wyper
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy fights Wyper, but after some time, he falls into some underground ruins. Meanwhile, Enel appears on the Going Merry and after telling that his true goal was the City of Gold, he takes out both Usopp and Sanji; then he vanishes and leaves Satori's brothers: Hotori and Kotori to avenge him.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Numa no shiren! Choppā VS Shinkan Gedatsu!! (沼の試練! チョッパーVS神官ゲダツ!!)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Ordeal of Swamp! Chopper vs. Priest Gedatsu!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper is attacked by Gedatsu, who turns out to be a complete moron, and eventually defeats him, sending him plummeting to the Blue Sea. Conis and Pagaya help Aisa, and head to Upper Yard.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Muteki no nōryoku! Akasareru Eneru no shōtai (無敵の能力！明かされるエネルの正体)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Invincible Ability! Enel's True Nature Revealed
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Enel defeats several members of the Shandia Tribe. Meanwhile, Gan Fall and Nami start and finish their fight with Kotori and Hotori. Hotori is defeated by Nami while Kotori is defeated by Gan Fall.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Maboroshi no miyako! Yūdai naru Shandora no iseki!! (幻の都！雄大なるシャンドラの遺跡！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Vanished City! The Magnificent Ruins of Shandora!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: While Robin is looking at some ruins she found, Yama, The Chief Enforcer, attacks her. Yama is easily defeated by Robin. Later, she discovers the legendary city, Shandora.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Seizonritsu 0%!! Choppā VS Shinkan Ōmu (生存率0%！！チョッパーVS神官オーム)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Chance of Survival: 0%!! Chopper vs. Priest Ohm
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Priest Ohm appears and starts fighting everyone.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Giant Jack" o nobore!! Jōsō iseki no shitō ("巨大豆蔓”を登れ！！上層遺跡の死闘)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Climb Giant Jack!! Showdown in the Upper Ruins
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: At the Upper Ruins, the fight between Ohm, Zoro, Gan Fall and Wyper begins. When Nami appears, she is swallowed by the giant python, along with Gan Fall and Aisa.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Tetsu no shiren no shinkocchō! Shiroibara Desumacchi!! (鉄の試練の真骨頂！白荊デスマッチ！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Ultimate Test of the Ordeal of Iron! The White-Barbed Death Match!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Ohm makes matters worse, creating a barbed wire cage around the area. Raki is knocked out by Enel, and Nami, Aisa, and Gan Fall find out why the python was rampaging so much.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Hotobashiru Zangeki! Zoro VS Shinkan Ōmu!! (ほとばしる斬撃！ゾロVS神官オーム！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Gushing Blade Attack! Zoro vs. Priest Ohm!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro finally defeats Priest Ohm with his 108 Pound Cannon technique. Meanwhile Pagaya and Conis hear the terrible truth about the goal of Enel: to eradicate every person in the sky.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kuzure yuku jōsō iseki! Fināre e no kuintetto!! (崩れゆく上層遺跡！終曲への五重奏！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Upper Ruins Crumble! The Quintet Finale!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Enel appears only to reduce the group as close to his prediction as he can.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kodai iseki no taiketsu! Goddo Eneru no mokuteki!! (古代遺跡の対決！神・エネルの目的！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Battle in the Ancient Ruins! God Enel's Desire!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Enel counterattacks Gan Fall and lands a finishing hit. He then knocks out Robin as she tries to manipulate him. Zoro impresses Enel with his power but is easily beaten, while trying to make him pay for what he did to Robin; but it takes Wyper with a secret weapon to take Enel down.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Fearī Vāsu e no yabō hakobune Makushimu!! (限りない大地への野望方舟マクシム！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Ambitions of Fairy Vearth - The Ark, Maxim!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Enel defeats Zoro and Wyper. Upon seeing this, Nami follows him to a cave where his ark, Maxim, is. Luffy finally gets out of the snake, along with Aisa, only to find out the outcome of the fight against Enel. When Aisa tells him that she knows where he is, he asks her to take him there.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Tsui ni gekitotsu! Kaizoku Rufi VS Goddo Eneru!! (遂に激突！海賊ルフィVS神・エネル！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Finally Clashing! Pirate Luffy vs. God Enel!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and Enel start fighting. Conis tells the dangers of staying in Sky Island to the other Skypieans.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Makushimu ujō! Ugokihajimeta Desupia!! (マクシム浮上！動き始めたデスピア！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Maxim Rises! The Start of Deathpiea!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The fight between Enel and Luffy continues with Enel starting a machine that would bring the death of Skypiea: Deathpiea.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi rakuka! Kami no sabaki to Nami no nozomi!! (ルフィ落下！神の裁きとナミの望み！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Fall! God's Judgement and Nami's Desire!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy falls from the ark. Nami starts fighting Enel while Sanji and Usopp try to rescue her.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Mesameta futari! Moeru koi no kyūshutsu zensen!! (目覚めた二人！燃える恋の救出前線！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Two People Awaken! A Rescue in Front of Burning Love!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp and Sanji split up to rescue Nami, but the first one to get on deck is Usopp.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Zetsubō e no Kapuritchio hakari kuru sorajima no shōmetsu!! (絶望への狂想曲迫り来る空島の消滅！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Capriccio to Destruction! The Impending Doom of Sky Island!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Enel's thunderclouds are coming down to Sky Island while the evacuation is half complete.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kane no oto no michibiki! Daisenshi to shinkenka no monogataru (鐘の音の導き！大戦士と探検家の物語)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Guidance from the Sound of a Bell! The Great Warrior and Tales of an Explorer
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The history of Noland and Kalgara is told, as a flashback from Wyper.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Jubaku kara no kaihō! Daisenshi ga nagashita namida!! (呪縛からの解放！大戦士が流した涙！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Released from Disgrace! The Tears of the Great Warrior!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Noland and Kalgara are enjoying themselves, as well as the villagers and Noland's crew, but that changes one day, as the villagers start hating their new friends.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Eien no shinyū! Daikaigen ni hibiku chikai no kane!! (永遠の親友！大海原に響く誓いの鐘！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Eternal Friendship! The Bell of Oath Echoes Throughout the Giant Ocean!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The cause of the hatred is discovered and explained. Meanwhile, Kalgara vows to meet Noland again.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Enjerushima shōmetsu! Raigō kōrin no kyōfu!! (エンジェル島消滅！雷迎降臨の恐怖！！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Destruction of Angel Island! Terror of the Descending Raigo!!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Angel Island is destroyed by Enel's attacks. Luffy decides to go and ring the golden bell before Enel takes it away.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Giant Jack o taose! Dasshutsu e no saigō no nozomi (巨大豆蔓を倒せ！脱出への最後の望み)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Chop Down Giant Jack! The Last Hope of Escaping
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Nami finds out a way to get to Enel, by cutting down Giant Jack. Wyper finds out from Robin that Noland has a descendant that is searching for the Gold City, and that's the reason why Luffy wants to ring the Golden Bell.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kami no kuni no kiseki! Tenshi ni todoita Love Song (神の国の奇跡！天使に届いた島の歌声)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Miracle in God's Country! A Love Song Heard by Angels
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy defeats Enel, ringing the Golden Bell in the process.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Tatakai no shūen! Tōku hibiku hokori takaki Fantasia (戦いの終焉！遠く響く誇り高き幻想曲)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The War Draws to a Close! Ringing Far and Wide, the Proud Fantasia
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The 400 year war on Sky Island comes to an end. Montblanc Cricket and the Masira Brothers hear the Golden Bell ringing and realize that the Gold City was always in the sky. Enel, who was thrown to the Blue Sea heads out to the Fairy Vearth (the Moon). The Sky People (both Skypieans and Shandia) celebrate the end of the war with a great bonfire.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ware koko ni itaru! Poneglyph ga tsumugu mono (我ここに至る！歴史の本文が紡ぐもの)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: I Have Come Here! The Weaving of the Poneglyphs
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Robin deciphers the poneglyphs on the Golden Bell and realizes how to find the Rio Poneglyph. She also discovers that the poneglyphs on the Bell were written by Gol D. Roger, who could understand poneglyphs, who had discovered the Rio Poneglyph, and had once visited Skypiea. Soon afterwards, the Straw Hats steal a bunch of gold from the Giant Anaconda's belly and they begin to leave Skypiea.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Iza seikai e!! Omoi ga shibarinasu saishū gakushō (いざ青海へ！！想いが織りなす最終楽章)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Now Heading Towards the Blue Sea!! Memories of an Interwoven Finale
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Golden Bell rings as the Straw Hats are going down to the sea, meaning that they are welcome and are deeply thankful for what they did.  When the ship finally rests on the sea, problems appear, as the ship has landed in a Marine base.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Hijō Jitai hatsumei! Akumei takaki kaizokusen sennyū (非常事態発令！悪名高き海賊船潜入！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Emergency Official Announcement! Notorious Pirate Ship Infiltration!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Marines are convinced the Going Merry is a ghost ship after it crashes inside their fortress from above. The crew members are scattered around the premises.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ryōrinin Sanji! Kaigun Shokudō de Shinka hakki! (料理人サンジ！海軍食堂で真価発揮！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Sanji the Cook! Showing His Real Worth at the Marine Dining-room!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: In disguise, Sanji shows the Marine chefs the proper way to prepare a meal.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Towareta Zoro to Choppā Kinkyū Shittō (囚われたゾロとチョッパー緊急執刀！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Zoro's Imprisonment and Chopper's Emergency Operation!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro is taken prisoner as Chopper and Nami assist a nervous doctor in treating injured Marines.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Semaru kaigun no sōsamō! Towareta futarime! (迫る海軍の捜査網！囚われた二人目！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Search of the Approaching Marines! The Second Person Who Was Captured!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Robin and Usopp both disguise themselves as the same visiting inspector, and Usopp is thrown in the brig with Zoro. Luffy and Sanji are discovered by Jonathan after a slight mishap.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kesshi no Rufi to Sanji! Kūshutsu daisakusen! (決死のルフィとサンジ！救出大作戦！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy and Sanji's Desperate Decision! Large Rescue Maneuvers!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The real Inspector is thrown in the brig with Zoro and Usopp, while Sanji and Luffy race to rescue the two while avoiding detection.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Netsuketsu tokubetsu butai sansen! Burijji Kōbōsen! (熱血特別部隊参戦！ブリッジ攻防戦！)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Hot Blood Special Unit Participation! Bridge Offensive and Defensive Battle!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Sanji and Luffy, after freeing Usopp and Zoro, try to escape Navarone. As the  Burning Soul combat unit is deployed, Dr. Kobato leads Nami and Chopper to the docks.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Hōimō Toppa! Dakkan Gōingu Merī gō (包囲網突破！奪還ゴーイングメリー号)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Breaking Through the Siege! The Going Merry is Recovered
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The crew meets at the docks and are surrounded by Marines. Using Nami as their fake hostage, they trick the Marines into letting them back on the Going Merry.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Kieta kaizokusen! Yōsai kōbō Dai ni Raundo (消えた海賊船！要塞攻防第2ラウンド)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Missing Pirate Ship! 2nd Round Assault on the Fortress
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The crew disguises the Going Merry as a Marine ship so they can get their treasure back. With the gold, they decide they’ll hire a shipwright.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ōgon Dakkan sakusen to Ueibā Kaishū Sakusen! (黄金奪還作戦とウエイバー回収作戦!)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: The Gold Recovery Plan and the Waver Recovery Plan!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp splits up the crew into two teams: the gold retrieval team and the waver retrieval team. Inspector Shepherd decides to catch Luffy on his own.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Ichimōdajin keikaku! Jonasan jishin no hisaku! (一網打尽計画！ジョナサン自信の秘策)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: Catch Them All in One Net! Jonathan's Secret Scheme!
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin continue to search for their treasure. Luffy leads Nami to the captain’s quarters where they retrieve their gold.

Sky Island Saga.episode_name_jp: Saraba kaigun yōsai! Dasshutsu e no saigō no kōbō (さらば海軍要塞！脱出への最後の攻防)
Sky Island Saga.episode_name_en: So Long, Marine Base! The Final Battle for Freedom
Sky Island Saga.episode_sumary: The Going Merry is grounded during a period of low tide and Jonathan believes they’ve reached “checkmate”. They cleverly use the impact dial to boost the ship and the breath and flame dials to inflate the octopus balloon again so they can escape.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rongu Ringu Rongu Rando no Daibōken! (ロングリングロングランドの大冒険！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Big Adventure in Long Ring Long Land
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and company come across a mysterious pirate ship after trying to escape a giant wave. Soon, they arrive on an island inhabited by strange animals. Going Merry is captured by the Foxy Pirate crew.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Fokushī Kaizokudan to Dēbī Bakku! (フォクシー海賊団とデービーバック！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Foxy Pirate Crew and the Davy Back!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After Tonjit re-unites with his horse, they are soon attacked by Captain Foxy and his subordinates, who challenge Luffy in a Davy Back Fight, a contest of pirates where the stakes are members of the crew.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Dai ikkaisen! Gururi ishū Dōnatsu Rēsu (第一回戦！ぐるり一周ドーナツレース)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Round 1! One Lap of the Donut Race
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The first round of Davy Back Fight involves a race around the island with tiny boats. Zoro and Chopper's boat is eliminated.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gin Gitsune no Fokushī! Mōretsu bōgai kōsei! (銀ギツネのフォクシー！猛烈妨害攻勢)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Foxy the Silver Fox! A Violent Interference
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: With only Luffy, Nami, and Porche's boat remaining, it is an all out war to the goal, but after Foxy exposes his Devil Fruit powers, Porche wins and takes Tony Tony Chopper from Luffy. The second round prepares to start.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Dai ni kaisen! Buchikome Gurokkī Ringu! (第二回戦！ブチ込めグロッキーリング)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Round 2! Shoot into the Groggy Ring!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Without Chopper, Sanji and Zoro must face the Foxy Pirates in a ball game, but are hampered by their blatant cheating and the crooked referee.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Reddo Kādo renpatsu! Gurokkī Ringu (レッドカード連発！グロッキーリング)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Rapid-Fire Red Cards! Groggy Ring
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The bickering rivals Sanji and Zoro manage to overcome the opposing team by working together. Luffy chooses Tonjit's horse, Shelly over Chopper.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Daisan kaisen! Guruguru Rōrā Rēsu! (第三回戦！ぐるぐるローラーレース!)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Round 3! Round and Round Roller Race!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats face Foxy in a race around a giant ring on roller skates.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hakunetsu bakusō rēsu! Saishū raundo totsunyū (白熱爆走レース！最終ラウンド突入！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Burning Roller Race! Dash into the Final Round!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Thanks to some quick planning, the Straw Hats win the race.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Unaru netsukyū gōkyu! Kaizoku Dojjibōru! (うなる熱球剛球！ 海賊ドッジボール！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Screaming Speed Serve! Pirate Dodgeball!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: With Luffy's victory, he takes Chopper back, but foolishly accepts another challenge by Foxy.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Dangai no kessen! Daruma-san ga koronda! (断崖の決戦！だるまさんがころんだ！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Final Match on the Edge! Dharma has Fallen!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Foxy decides to take Robin from Luffy this time because of her Devil Fruit ability. The next match is a race to the top of the island.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kyaputen taiketsu! Saishūsen Konbatto! (キャプテン対決！最終戦コンバット！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Captain Confrontation! The Last Fight: Combat!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: With Chopper gone again from Luffy's crew, Luffy and Foxy face off in the final game: a battle of brawn aboard Foxy's ship.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Zenkai noronoro kōgeki Vs Fujimi no Rufi (全開ノロノロ攻撃VS不死身のルフィ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Full Power Noro Noro Beam vs. The Invulnerable Luffy
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy continues to battle Foxy with the odds not in his favor, and the fight continues inside Foxy's ship.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Sōzetsu nettō konbatto! Unmei no saishū ketchaku! (壮絶熱闘コンバット！運命の最終決着)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Heroic Fierce Combat! The Fateful Last Battle
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy manages to finally defeat Foxy by using his ability against him. After dismissing his new crewmembers, the Straw Hats leave in search for a shipwright.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Ushinatta? Ubawareta? Omae wa dare da? (失った?奪われた？おまえはだれだ？)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: You Lost Your Memory? It Was Taken? Who Are You?
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: A mysterious figure appears during the night and steals the memories of the crew. In the morning, Robin is the only one who remembers the Straw Hats adventures together. Her attempts to keep the crew together fail as Nami and Zoro go separate ways.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Fude o daita nazo no shōnen to Robin no suiri! (笛を抱いた謎の少年とロビンの推理！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Mysterious Boy With the Whistle and Robin's Guess!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin suggests that only those who were sleeping lost their memories. Luffy and the others then remember seeing the mysterious boy who played some kind of flute. Later that night, they discover the boy outside and Luffy tries to fight him. At the last second, he proclaims his memory has returned.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Iza kioku o Dakkan se to! Kaizokudan shima ni jōriku (いざ記憶を奪還せよ！海賊団島に上陸)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Get Back Your Memories! Landing on the Island!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: During the night, Usopp, Chopper, and Sanji question what brought them to the Going Merry. In the morning, Usopp builds them a raft and they sail to the island where they meet Nami again. Meanwhile, the boy sets his sights on Zoro.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kiba o muku Zoro! Tachihadakatta yajū (牙をむくゾロ！立ちはだかった野獣)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Zoro Sharpens His Fangs! A Fight With a Wild Beast!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: On their way to "The Palace of the Sea God" Robin's group meets an entranced Zoro. It looks like Zoro wants to fight so Luffy urges the others to keep going without him. They apprehend the kid but the whistle was what was really stealing their memories. Zoro returns, still entranced, but Luffy is nowhere to be seen.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Honsei o arawashita kioku dorobō no saigo no gyakushū (本性を現した記憶泥棒の最後の逆襲！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Memory Thief's Final Counterattack Shows His True Nature!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy returns and knocks some sense into Zoro. Cornered, the sea horse spreads illusions of the people in their memories to distract them. It steals their complete memories and claims that it has become a Sennenryu. Luffy defeats it and returns all the memories but the townspeople are convinced they are the memory stealers.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hokori takaki otoko! gin Gitsune no Fokushī (誇り高き男！銀ギツネのフォクシー)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Man of Pride! Foxy the Silver Fox
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy rescues Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche from a storm at sea. When they reunite with the Sexy Foxy ship, they find it captained by somebody new. Foxy accepts a Davy Back Fight in order to regain his ship and crew. Donning the afro once again, Luffy vows to defeat the captain.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Mottomo muteki ni chikai yatsu? To mottomo kiken na otoko! (最も無敵に近い奴？と最も危険な男！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Nigh Invincible Man? And a Very Dangerous Man!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Once Foxy wins back his crew, he captures the Straw Hats. Nami and Luffy fight Foxy and although he is defeated, his crew accepts him back. Later, they sail to an island where they meet someone Robin knows: a Marine named Aokiji.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaigun honbu taishō Aokiji! Saikō senryoku no kyōi (海軍本部大将青キジ！最高戦力の脅威)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Marine High Admiral Aokiji! The Threat of the Greatest Power
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The man they met, Marine High Admiral Aokiji, appears to be incredibly lazy. He first displays his Devil Fruit ability by freezing the sea so some deserted people can get off the island. Unfortunately, he is determined to catch Robin. Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro attack but they seem to be no match.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gomu to koori no ikkiuchi! Rufi VS Aokiji! (ゴムと氷の一騎打ち！ルフィVS青キジ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Rubber and Ice One-On-One Fight! Luffy vs. Aokiji!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin is frozen by Aokiji and Luffy tells the others to escape with her. In the Going Merry, Usopp and Chopper try to thaw her in the shower. Luffy gets defeated (frozen), but his life is spared as Aokiji believes he must repay the debt the marines incurred from Crocodile's defeat at Luffy's hands. With the crew defrosted, they continue sailing as usual. Zoro spots the giant frog they heard about and they chase it to an island with a lighthouse, but it appears they will sink before they get there.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shissō umi ressha to mizu no miyako Uōtā Seven (疾走海列車と水の都ウォーターセブン)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Running Sea Train! The City of Water, Water 7
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After the Going Merry narrowly escapes being hit by an "umi ressha"; a "sea train", the crew meets an old woman, Kokoro, and her granddaughter, Chimney. Kokoro gives Luffy a map to Water 7. Luffy, Nami, and Usopp buy boats driven by sea monsters called "yagara".

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Suijō toshi no bōken! Mezase kyodai sōsen kōjō (水上都市の冒険！目指せ巨大造船工場)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Adventure in the City of Water! Aim for the Giant Shipyard
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp get strange greetings from the residents and they get to experience the roller coaster-like channels of Water 7. Luffy's group finds out that some pirates had been beaten at the hands of some powerful craftsmen; the Galley La Company. Chopper loses Robin and some strange new people threaten Zoro back on the ship.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Furankī ikka to Aisubāgu-san (フランキー一家とアイスバーグさん)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Franky Family and Iceburg!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The people who attacked Zoro reveal themselves to be the feared "Franky Family", though they are no match for Zoro. Luffy's group has the gold exchanged for cash. After, they meet a man who resembles Usopp, Galley La's carpenter employment foreman, Kaku. Two of the suitcases of money are stolen by the Franky Family.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Garēra Kanpanī! Soukan ichiban Dokku (ガレーラカンパニー！壮観一番ドック)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Galley-La Company! The Magnificent Dock #1
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Paulie makes his debut when he retrieves Usopp's stolen money as he runs from debt collectors. Kalifa shows Luffy, Nami, and Usopp around Dock No.1 and tells them how Iceburg founded the Galley La Company. Kaku returns from the Going Merry and tells them that their keel is irreparably damaged.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaizoku yūkai jiken to shi o matsu dake no kaizokusen (海賊誘拐事件と死を待つだけの海賊船)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Pirate Kidnapping Incident and the Pirate Ship Waits for Death!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy refuses to believe that Galley La cannot repair the Going Merry. The two soon realize that not only is Usopp missing now, the two brief cases that were returned to them are empty! Nami decides to head to Franky House and finds Usopp on the way in a pitiful state. As she heads back to the ship for help, Usopp goes to the Franky House himself.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama kyūshutsu! Nagarikomi Furankī Hausu (仲間救出！殴りこみフランキーハウス)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Rescuing a Crewmate! The Raid on the Franky House
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Sanji, Zoro, and Chopper follow Usopp's bloody trail to the Franky House where they find him passed out in front. The four of them challenge the Franky Family only to find out that their real target, Franky himself, is gone and has taken the money with him.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gekka no dai kenka! Kanashimi ni hirugaeru kaizoku hata! (月下の大喧嘩！哀しみに翻る海賊旗！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Quarrel in the Moonlight! The Pirate Ship Trembles in Sadness
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Once they are back on the ship, Luffy has to finally tell Usopp that the Going Merry can no longer be repaired and that they have chosen to get a new ship without him. Usopp believes that Luffy has abandoned the dignity of their ship and says he is leaving the crew. That night, he challenges Luffy to a duel.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi VS Usoppu! Butsukaru otoko no iji (ルフィvsウソップ！ぶつかる男の意地)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy vs. Usopp! The Spirit of the Clashing Men
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp fights Luffy in order to decide who keeps the Going Merry; he fights harder than he has ever fought before. Luffy actually seems to pose no threat but all the while, he is remembering what great friends they used to be, sailing together on the same ship.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gekishin mizu no miyako! Newareta Aisubāgu (激震水の都！狙われたアイスバーグ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The City of Water is Shaking! Iceburg was Targeted!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats get themselves a hotel room. Nami finds the crew on the roof with urgent news; Iceburg has been shot. As the Galley La Company frantically search for answers, Nami and Luffy decide to check on his condition - only to be met by closed gates. Franky appears then to exact his revenge - with style.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gomugomu ningen VS Hi o fuku Cyborg (ゴムゴム人間VS火を吹く改造人間)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Rubberman vs. Fire-Breathing Cyborg
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: In the streets outside of the hospital, Luffy fights Franky. Inside, Iceburg recalls seeing Nico Robin and another tall man before he was shot. The Galley La company run outside and stop Franky and Luffy and tell them that they suspect the Straw Hat Pirates of the crime.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hannin wa mugiwara kaizokudan? Mizu no miyako no yōjinbo (犯人は麦わら海賊団？水の都の用心棒)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Criminals are the Straw Hat Pirates? The Bodyguards of Water 7
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Galley La Company continues to fight Luffy and Franky is enraged that they have stolen his opponent. An incredibly high tide called the "Aqua Laguna" is coming and Chopper and Sanji rush to warn Usopp. Luffy raises some chaos in order to meet with Iceburg and he demands to know what is happening. Iceburg says he wants to see Robin one more time.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Eien no wakare? Yami o hiku onna Niko Robin (永遠の別れ？闇を引く女ニコ・ロビン)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: An Eternal Farewell? Nico Robin, The Woman Who Bears Darkness
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: In a bar, Franky talks with Kokoro about her theory on who shot Iceburg. The rumors she speaks of seem to have some truth as we see Robin meeting with someone from an organization called CP9. While the crew hide from angry residents, Sanji and Chopper discover Robin and she tells them what they have feared: she is responsible and she wants to part ways.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Robin o tsukamaero! Mugiwara ichimi no ketsui (ロビンを捕まえろ！麦わら一味の決意)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Catch Robin! The Determination of the Straw Hat Pirates
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper reunites with the others without Sanji and they discuss what is happened. Luffy decides that in order to know the full truth, they must catch Robin. Usopp attempts to repair the ship enough to withstand the Aqua Laguna and the Straw Hats make their way to the Galley La Company.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Aizu wa hōgeki to tomo ni! Ugokidashita CP9 (合図は砲撃と共に！動き出したCP9)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Signal is the Explosion! CP9 Starts to Move
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats (still missing Sanji) rush to Galley La where Robin and CP9 begin a raid. In Iceburg's room, Robin and the mysterious man Iceburg saw before, tell him that they have purposely placed the blame on the pirates. Their true aim is the blueprints he would have passed down to Paulie. Luffy separates from his group.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kamen o totta CP9! Sono odoroki no sugao (仮面を取ったCP9！その驚きの素顔)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: CP9 Unmasked! Their Shocking True Faces
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin speaks with Iceburg inside his room still. Iceburg is the one with the blueprints to the ultimate weapon, Pluton. The true enemies are revealed to be Iceburg's own allies. Elsewhere, Luffy is tied up with Paulie after Paulie tells members of CP9 that his blueprints are fake.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hisometa kizuna! Aisubāgu to Furankī (秘めた絆！アイスバーグとフランキー)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Secret Bond! Franky and Iceburg
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Lucci tells Iceburg their hypothesis and has Kaku check his pulse to tell if the things he tells him are true. They suspect that Iceburg's friend from the past, Cutty Flam, is really Franky and has the real blueprints. The Straw Hat Pirates and Paulie break into the room where they find Iceburg and CP9.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaette koi Robin! CP9 to no taiketsu! (帰って来いロビン！CP9との対決！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Come Back, Robin! The Confrontation with CP9
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and the others request that Robin comes back to the crew. She refuses and tells them that she cannot accomplish her "wish" if she were to stay with them. Robin turns to leave and CP9 try to hold the pirates back. Robin successfully escapes and Lucci shows those remaining his "transformation".

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Mugiwara kaizokudan zenmetsu? Moderu hyō no kyōi (麦わら海賊団全滅？モデル豹の脅威！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Destruction of the Straw Hat Pirates? The Terror of the Model Leopard!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Lucci's transformation is a result of a Devil Fruit: a Zoan Type leopard. He quickly disposes of the crew and CP9 tie up Paulie and Iceburg, leaving them alone as the building slowly burns down around them. In Franky's underground hideout, Usopp tells him his story and Franky is finally touched. In return, Franky tells him a little about Tom's contributions to Water 7.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Fune kara mo aisareta otoko! Usoppu no namida! (船からも愛された男！ウソップの涙！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Man who is Loved by his Ship! Usopp's Tears!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp believes that the person who repaired the Going Merry in Skypiea was really the Going Merry itself. Franky says that the ship was inhabited by a spirit who enters ships who are dearly cared for. The spirit repaired their ship just enough for them to reach the next island. The doorbell rings from the sea side and CP9 enter.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Furankī no kako! Umi ressha ga hashitta hi (フランキーの過去！海列車が走った日)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Franky's Past! The Day the Sea Train Ran
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: CP9 discover Franky's hidden room and he fears they will trample his memories. A long flashback ensues, covering Franky's past in Tom's Workers and how he and Iceburg helped create the Sea Train.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Supandamu no inbō! Umi ressha ga ureta hi (スパンダムの陰謀！海列車が揺れた日)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Spandam's Conspiracy! The Day the Sea Train Shook
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: (Franky's flashback) Spandam, a CP5 representative, was determined to get Tom proven guilty in his trial so he could get the blueprints. As Franky walked into the town, people from the government began to attack with the battleships he had personally constructed. Tom and Iceburg run to their shipyard where they are attacked by two ships which also destroy the others. Iceburg tells Franky that he has to take responsibility or he will never forgive him.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Densetsu no otoko no saigo! Umi ressha ga naita hi (伝説の男の最期！海列車が泣いた日)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The End of the Legendary Man! The Day the Sea Train Cried
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: (Franky's flashback) Franky said that if a ship of his were to be used as a weapon, then it is no longer one of his ships. That enraged Tom and he punched Franky for the first time, telling him he had to take pride in the ships he created. He then told the judge that he would accept the punishment for both his previous crime and the recent attack. Franky tried to stop the train to Enies Lobby with his bare hands.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Uragiri no shinsō! Robin no kanashiki ketsui! (裏切りの真相！ロビンの哀しき決意！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Truth Behind the Betrayal! Robin's Sorrowful Decision!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper escapes the burning building with Paulie and Iceburg on his back and collapses outside. Iceburg makes it clear to Nami that Robin wanted to recover the blueprints and to do that, she wanted her companions to leave the island without her. Nami rushes to tell Chopper so they can go looking for the rest of the crew. Elsewhere, the foremen let go of the Going Merry so she would be destroyed at sea.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama o hikihanasu kiteki! Hashiridasu umi ressha (仲間を引き離す汽笛！走り出す海列車)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Steam Whistle Separates the Crew! The Sea Train Begins to Run
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Paulie helps clear the name of the Straw Hats but does not tell the mob everything he knows. He gets the mob to follow Chopper so they can search for the rest of the crew. Nami goes her own way so she can rush to the Sea Train. As Nami nears the station, Sanji, ahead of her, approaches the train.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Sanji tsotsunyū! arashi no naka no umi ressha batoru! (サンジ突入！嵐の中の海列車バトル！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Sanji Breaks In! The Sea Train Battle in the Storm!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Nami and the conductors are rescued by Paulie when the Aqua Laguna floods the main station. A man hands Nami a letter he found from Sanji. It informs her that Usopp, Franky, and he are on board the train that had just departed. On board, he storms the cars. High up in the city, Nami speaks with Kokoro and spots Luffy, stuck in between two buildings, in the back streets where the Aqua Laguna will hit first.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nami tamashii no sakebi! Mugiwara no Rufi fukukatsu! (ナミ魂の叫び！麦わらのルフィ復活！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Shout of Nami's Soul! The Return of the Straw Hat!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Nami finally reaches Luffy and tells him that he needs to hurry before Robin reaches Enies Lobby. Chopper finds Zoro and hands him the Sandai Kitetsu so he can escape the chimney. Luffy pushes apart the buildings he was stuck between and Paulie grabs them all so they can escape the Aqua Laguna's massive wave.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Mō hitotsu no umi ressha? Rokettoman shutsugeki (もう一つの海列車?ロケットマン出撃)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Another Sea Train! Rocket Man Sortie
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Sanji fights his way through another train car and finds Usopp and Franky. Seeing how determined Luffy is to save Robin, Kokoro and Iceburg lends the Straw Hat crew the use of another sea train, Rocket Man. The Franky Family shows up, pleading with Luffy to let them join them because they'll do anything for their leader.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama o sukue! Kobushi ni chikatta teki dōshi no kizuna! (仲間を救え！拳に誓った敵同士の絆！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Rescue our Friends! The Oath that Links the Enemies
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Rocket Man finally makes it out to sea. As the train connects with the tracks, Luffy has to rescue Chimney before she is thrown off by the wind. In the meantime, Iceburg has a flashback about when he finally met Franky again in Water 7. With Luffy and Chimney safe in the train, Paulie tells his fellow carpenters who the real culprits were. The Straw Hats, Franky Family, and Galley La Company form an alliance.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nami o sake! Rufi to Zoro no saikyō Combo (波を砕け！ルフィとゾロの最強合体技)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Smash the Wave! Luffy and Zoro, The Strongest Combo!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and Zoro perform a move that acts similar to a cannon and blasts a hole through the wall of the tidal wave ahead of them, opening up a channel for them to pass through. They miraculously pass through unscathed and the passengers rejoice. Sanji contacts the rest of the crew and fills them in on his current situation. Usopp separates from them but later, when Sanji and Franky are spotted, a man named Sogeking comes to their rescue.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nazo no otoko tōjō!? Sono na wa Sogekingu! (謎の男登場！？その名はそげキング)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: A Man of Mystery Appears!? His Name is Sogeking!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Sogeking makes his grand entrance. Franky and Sanji are not fooled by his costume but they try to humor him. They devise a plan first, then detach the last two cars and fight their way through the rest. Back in the Rocket Man, Luffy, Zoro, Nami, and Chopper get an outfit change; Nami shows off the weapon Usopp upgraded for her while he was still with them.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kokku taiketsu! Sanji VS Rāmen kenpō (コック対決！サンジVSラーメン拳法)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Cook Confrontation! Sanji vs. Ramen Kenpo
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Kalifa updates the CP9 on the situation with Franky, Sanji, and Usopp. Sanji tells Franky and Usopp to go on without him so he can fight Wanze and his "Ramen Kenpo". Franky begins to fight Nero, CP9's "Weasel", and Sogeking meets with Robin.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Yane no Ue no Kettō! Furankī VS Nero (屋根の上の決闘！フランキーVSネロ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Duel on the Roof! Franky vs. Nero!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Franky's fight with Nero continues. Nero discovers that Franky's weak spot is his back, so Franky lies down flat so he cannot get to it. Nero demands that he fight seriously, so Franky gets up to perform his "Centaur" form. Sogeking talks with Robin and tells her that the crew knows about her reasons for leaving. Those on the Rocket Man encounter the discarded cars and Zoro slices them so they can pass.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gekitotsu! Onigiri Zoro VS funegiri T Bōn (激突！鬼斬りゾロVS船斬りTボーン)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Crash! Demon-Cutting Zoro vs. Ship-Cutting T-Bone!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro clashes with "Ship Cutter" T-Bone. The fight is short and Zoro joins the crew again in the Rocket Man. On the Puffing Tom, Sanji beats Wanze beautiful, though Wanze thinks Sanji has ruined his face. Franky finally gains the upper hand against Nero and defeats him. After beating their respective opponents, Franky and Sanji stand to fight against the other CP9.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Robin sōdatsusen! Sogekingu no kisaku!! (ロビン争奪戦！そげキングの奇策！！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Robin Struggles! Sogeking's Clever Scheme!!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After hiding under Robin's cloak for a few episodes, Sogeking finally shows himself. They stumble into the room with the CP9 and meet with Sanji and Franky. Sogeking produces a smokescreen. The four head into another car, detach it, and escape. It is not long before Blueno pulls their car back, though. Franky knocks down the wall so they can escape but ends up on the enemy car. Blueno opens a door then back in the Straw Hat car.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shihō no shima! Eniesu Robī no zenbō (司法の島！エニエス・ロビーの全貌！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Judiciary Island! The Full Picture of Enies Lobby!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin willingly follows Blueno into his improvised door and Sogeking and Sanji are left alone. For a while, Blueno explains a little of Robin's past involving the Buster Call. Back at the Rocket Man, Yokuzuna the frog jumps onto the front of the train, knocking them from the rails. After Kokoro speaks with him, he joins the group. The CP9, Franky, and Robin finally reach Enies Lobby and disembark.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Jōriku sakusen shidō! Mugiwara ichimi totsunyū se yo! (上陸作戦始動！麦わら一味突入せよ！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Operation Disembarkation Commences! The Straw Hat Crew Rushes In!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and the others finally catch up to Sanji, Usopp, and the rest of the Franky Family as they near Enies Lobby. Paulie sits down with the group and talks about their plan. Luffy does not bother to follow the plan, and slingshots himself beyond the gates before the train stops.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi kaishingeki! Shihō no shimi de dai kessen!! (フィ快進撃！司法の島で大決戦！！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy Charges In! Great Decisive Battle on the Judiciary Island!!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Spandam is informed that an intruder has entered the area. Luffy confuses the Marines guarding the entrance gate by manipulating one of their own comrades to fight against them. The rest of Luffy's group come in after he already slingshot himself over the gates. Because they are not all quite as limber as Luffy, they have to band together to get inside. Giant Gate Keepers Kashii and Oimo come to fight the Franky Family.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kyojinzoku to no kōbō! Dai 2 no mon o akero! (巨人族との攻防！第2の門を開けろ！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Battle with the Giants! Open the Second Door!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: In a David and Goliath turn around, the Franky Family and Galley La bring down Kashii. Spandam receives an incomplete report about Luffy and believes that he is no longer a threat. The Cipher Pol 9 members meet with Spandam and it looks more like a comedy routine than a briefing.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Katsuro o ake! Sora o tobu rokettoman! (活路を開け！空を飛ぶロケットマン！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Means of Escaping is Opened! Fly through the Sky, Rocketman!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: While Robin and Franky are brought before Spandam, Luffy blasts his way through another wave of marines. In order to get past the gate, Zoro orders that they just keep going. Yokozuna the frog bends down the outside gates and they fly over the gate inside. Back on the ground, Paulie is stabbed by someone from "The Law's Watch Dogs", the Houbantai. The Rocket Man flies over the gate and the point of the train smashes into Oimo's back, knocking him out cold.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi ni oitsuke! Mugiwara ichimi sōryokusen (ルフィに追いつけ！麦わら一味総力戦)
