Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Catch Up with Luffy! The Straw Hat Pirates' All-Out War
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: As the title of the episode suggests, the Straw Hats enter an all-out war to catch up with Luffy, albeit a humorous one; Sanji and Zoro bicker over who is more dangerous, Nami injures her own comrades with her improved weapon, and Sogeking fails at being a decoy. The Houbantai show up to stop them and the foremen of Galley La stay behind to fight.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Uragirareta Robin! Sekai seifu no omowaku! (裏切られたロビン！世界政府の思惑！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Robin was Betrayed! The Expectations of the World Government!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin questions why Spandam was given rights to the Buster Call. The CP9 plan to kill the Straw Hats because they violated the original arrangement; that they entered Enies Lobby after leaving Water 7. Back in the fray, Franky's Giant Bulls talk with Chopper. He translates and they notice that Sogeking is not with them anymore. Elsewhere, Blueno appears before Luffy.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Robin o kaese! Rufi VS Burūno! (ロビンを返せ！ルフィVSブルーノ！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Give Robin Back! Luffy vs. Blueno!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: For a while, Sogeking talks with Oimo about how he and Kashii came to support the marines and hears a familiar story. The majority of the episode is a Little Garden flashback. Soddom the Giant Bull takes severe damage and urges those riding him to run before he collapses. Back at the fight between Blueno and Luffy, Luffy throws the first punch to initiate the battle.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Tachitomaru na! Hangeki no noroshi o agero! (立ち止まるな！反撃の狼煙を上げろ！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Don't Stop! Raise the Signal Fire of a Counterattack!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Kokoro contacts the Straw Hats by way of Nami's baby den den mushi. The Franky family decide to lower the inner bridge so the others can enter the courthouse first. After Gomorrah is blinded, Sogeking arrives with the giants as back up. Shortly after, Gomorrah tells those riding him to hold on, as he plans to take them to the courthouse. Inside, Spandam gives Kaku and Kalifa Devil Fruits.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi memae! Saibanshomae hiroba e shūketsu se yo (ルフィ目前！裁判所前広場へ集結せよ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy is in Sight! Gather at the Courthouse Plaza
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Although Gomorrah was blinded, he continues to rush ahead. Spandam receives word of their progress right as the Straw Hats reach the gate. Zoro slices right through it and while up top, Luffy activates "Gear Second".

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Subete wa nakama o mamoru tami ni! Gia 2 hatsudō (全ては仲間を守る為に！ギア2発動)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: All for the Sake of Protecting My Friends! Gear Second in Motion
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats enter and Yokozuna the frog and the Franky Family stay behind at the door to watch their backs. The three-headed judge attempts to stop them but the Franky Family holds him off. Elsewhere, Luffy's Gear Second is put into action, ultimately defeating Blueno without having to activate Gear Third.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kotaero Robin! Mugiwara ichimi no sakebi!! (答えろロビン！麦わら一味の叫び！！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Answer Us, Robin! The Outcries of the Straw Hat Crew!!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Franky helps Robin escape from their chains and they make it outside to see Luffy. Luffy wants to come over to rescue Robin but she tells him to stay, that she only wants to die. Below, as Yokozuna falls, the giants come to cover. All the Straw hats arrive on the roof, and ask Robin to return.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Robin no kako! Akuma to yobareta shōjo! (ロビンの過去！悪魔と呼ばれた少女！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Robin's Past! The Girl who was Called a Demon!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: 20 years ago, on the West Blue island of Ohara, Nico Robin becomes an archaeologist, but Professor Clover forbids her from researching the Void Century. She meets the giant Saul who has washed up on the beach. Meanwhile, Spandine is just off the coast of Ohara.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shukumei no hahamusume! Sono haha no na wa Orubia! (宿命の母娘！その母の名はオルビア！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Fated Parent and Child! The Mother's Name is Olvia!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin continues talking with Saul, and Saul is shocked to learn that Robin is Nico Olvia's daughter and that he is on Ohara. Olvia returns to Ohara to warn the other scholars that the World Government's forces are headed there. She decides not to reveal herself to Robin, not wanting her daughter to be branded a criminal because of her. CP9 arrives on the island, capturing Olvia and rounding up the scholars.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Ohara no higeki! Basutā Kōru no kyōfu (オハラの悲劇！バスターコールの恐怖)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Tragedy of Ohara! Fear of Buster Call!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Clover reveals that the Poneglyphs were most likely carved by an ancient country in order to prevent their enemy, the World Government, from completely erasing their history, but is shot by Spandine, who then activates the Golden Den Den Mushi. Robin recognizes Olvia as her mother, but Olvia denies it, causing Robin to admit that she is an archaeologist and can read the Poneglyphs. The Buster Call commences, and, after a tearful reunion with her daughter, Olvia entrusts Saul with Robin's care.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Ikitai to ie! Oretachi wa nakama da!! (生きたいと言え！オレたちは仲間だ！！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Say You Want to Live! We are Friends!!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin finishes her story and says that while she considers the Straw Hats her friends, she believes that one day, they will be no longer able to protect her from her pursuers, and betray her like the others did. After Spandam points out that taking in Robin means declaring war on the entire world, Luffy tells Sogeking to shoot the World Government flag. Sogeking uses his Sure-kill Firebird Star to burn up the flag, declaring war on the world for Robin's sake. Robin, moved by the depth of Luffy's action, cries out that she wants to live and return to the sea with Luffy, and Luffy and the others prepare to do battle with CP9 and save Robin.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Taki ni mukatte tobe! Rufi no omoi!! (滝に向かって飛べ！ルフィの想い！！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Jump Into the Falls! Luffy's Feelings!!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy's backstory. also plays.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Otoko no ikisama! Zoro no waza Usoppu no yume (男の生き様！ゾロの業・ウソップの夢)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: A Man's Way of Life! Zoro's Techniques, Usopp's Dream
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro and Usopp's backstories. also plays.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Namida ga tsumuida nakama no kizuna! Nami no sekai chizu (涙が紡いだ仲間の絆！ナミの世界地図)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Tears Which Weaved the Bond of Friendship! Nami's World Map
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Nami's backstory. also plays.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Wakare ga otoko o migaku! Sanji to Choppā (別れが男を磨く！サンジとチョッパー)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Separation Refines a Man! Sanji and Chopper
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The backstories to Sanji and Chopper. also plays.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Subete wa nakama no tami ni! Yami no naka no Robin! (全ては仲間の為に！闇の中のロビン！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: All for my Friends' Sake! The Darkness Within Robin!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The reasons for Nico Robin's recent actions, as well as a summary of her back story. also plays.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Sekkeizu wa watasanai! Furankī no ketsudan (設計図は渡さない！フランキーの決断)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Blueprints Aren't Passed! Franky's Decision
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After Robin decides she wants to live, the Straw Hats wait for the bridge so they can battle CP9. Franky reveals that the Pluton blueprints are with him and burns them in front of Spandam, saying that he is betting it all on the Straw hats. With unexpected help from Kokoro, Franky and the Straw Hats make a dramatic entrance into the Tower of Justice.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Itsutsu no kagi o ubae! Mugiwara ichimi tai CP9 (5つの鍵を奪え！麦わら一味対CP9)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Retrieve the 5 Keys! The Straw Hat Crew vs. CP9
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats and Franky made it to the Tower of Justice. However, Fukurou reveals that one of the CP9 members has the key to Robin's handcuffs, and will not say which, so the Straw Hats must fight every member to find the key. Meanwhile, Chimney follows Spandam and Lucci down a secret corridor.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Akuma no mi no chikara! Kaku to Jabura daihenshin (悪魔の実の力！カクとジャブラ大変身)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Power of the Devil Fruit! Kaku and Jabra Transform
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro begins his intense battle with Kaku, and Sogeking fails to retrieve the key from a sleeping Jabra. Kaku reveals his Devil Fruit power and causes the floor to collapse in the process. Meanwhile, Luffy searches high and low in the Tower of Justice, and attempts to cross the whirlpools to the Bridge of Hesitation.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shindemo keran! Sanji otoko no kishidō (死んでも蹴らん！サンジ男の騎士道！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Even if I Die, I Won't Kick you! Sanji's Manly Chivalry
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Nami barely escapes from Kumadori, stealing his key in the process. Kaku utilizes his new body to cut the Tower of Justice in half, and Sanji attempts to get the key from Kalifa.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Fukurō no gosan! Ore no kōra wa inochi no mizu (フクロウの誤算！俺のコーラは命の水)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Silent Owl's Miscalculation! My Cola is the Water of Life
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Nami becomes Kalifa's opponent, Kumadori is trapped in a fridge by Chopper, and Luffy demonstrates a new power, and becomes temporarily small. Meanwhile, Franky spars with Fukurou in an attempt to get to the kitchen to power up with Cola.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Zoro Shinwaza sakuretsu! Katana no na wa Sogekingu? (ゾロ新技炸裂！刀の名はそげキング?)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Zoro's New Technique Explodes! The Katana's Name is Sogeking?
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro has to fight with Sogeking in his right hand against Kaku and Jabra. Meanwhile, Franky gets cola and ends his battle with Fukurou.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Seigyo funō! Choppā kindan no ranburu! (制御不能！チョッパー禁断のランブル！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Uncontrollable! Chopper's Forbidden Rumble
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper's first Rumble ball wears off, his second fails, and he is forced to break a promise to Doctorine. Chopper uses his a third Rumble Ball in a row and transform into his most powerful and deadly form: Monster Point.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi oyabun futatabi! Yume ga aware ka tomikuji zōdō (ルフィ親分再び！夢か現か富くじ騒動)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Boss Luffy Returns! A Dream or Reality Lottery Trouble
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hat crew and Buggy's crew are in an , called Jipangu. Buggy tries to sell Rika as a slave to make up for Pandaman's debts, who Buggy thinks is Rika's father.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Oshiro de mochi maki dai rēsu! Akai hana no inbō (お城で餅まき大レース！赤い鼻の陰謀)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Great Mochimaki Race to the Castle! Conspiracy of the Red Nose
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Great Mochimaki Race, a festival about who can catch a Mochimaki with a great treasure inside, is running, but Buggy has a conspiracy for stealing the treasure before the festival starts.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Awatsukai Karifa! Nami ni hakaru sekken no wana (泡使いカリファ！ナミに迫る石鹸の罠)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Bubble User Kalifa! Nami Draws Near to the Soap's Trap
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: While Chopper in his Monster Point easily defeats Kumadori, Nami has trouble with her Devil Fruit opponent, Kalifa. Meanwhile, Luffy finally catches up with Spandam, Lucci and Robin.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hibikiwataru kyōhō! Hatsudō Basutā Kōru! (響き渡る凶報！発動バスターコール！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Resounding Bad News! The Buster Call is Invoked
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Spandam accidentally invokes the Buster Call on Enies Lobby with the Golden Den Den Mushi. He also accidentally informs everyone on the island of the coming destruction.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Gonin no Nami? Hangeki wa shinkirō to tomo ni! (五人のナミ？反撃は蜃気楼とともに！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: 5 Namis? Counterattack with the Mirage!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: As the battle between the Straw Hats and CP9 rages on, Nami seems to be at a disadvantage. However with the distraction from Chopper in monster point, Nami finds a weakness of Kalifa's ability: water. After returning herself to normal, she creates a mirage of 5 Namis.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Nami no ketsudan! Bōsō Choppā o ute! (ナミの決断！暴走チョッパーを撃て！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Nami's Determination! Shoot the Rampaging Chopper!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Nami ends her fight with Kalifa. Franky shoots Chopper down into the sea, while Zoro and Sogeking are set free.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Garibito Sanji tōjō? Usotsuki ōkami ni okuru banka (狩人サンジ登場?嘘つき狼に贈る挽歌)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Hunter Sanji Appears? Elegy to the Lying Wolf
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Sogeking gets beaten up by Jabra and is saved in the last second by Sanji.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shakunetsu no keri! Sanji ashiwaza no furukōsu (灼熱の蹴り！サンジ足技のフルコース)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Scorching Kick! Full Course of Sanji's Footwork
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Sanji seems to be at a disadvantage due to the active use of Tekkai Kenpo by Jabra, however he introduced a new technique "Diable Jambe", which finished off Jabra.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hakujin no mōgeki! Zoro tai Kaku kyōryoku sangeki taiketsu (白刃の猛襲！ゾロ対カク強力斬撃対決)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Drawn Sword's Fierce Attack! Zoro vs. Kaku Powerful Slash Showdown
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The battle between Zoro and Kaku rages on. Meanwhile Franky finally reaches Luffy.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kishin Zoro! Kihaku ga miseta Ashura no keshin (鬼神ゾロ！気迫が見せた阿修羅の化身)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Zoro the Fierce God! The Incarnation of Asura Revealed by His Soul
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro finally defeats Kaku with his new power, Asura, while Luffy activates Gear Second in his fight against Lucci, who in turn transforms into his half-leopard form.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Spandamu Kyōgo! Shihō no tō ni tatsu eiyū (スパンダム驚愕！司法の塔に立つ英雄)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Spandam's Shock! A Hero Stands on the Tower of Justice
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin finds out that Spandam is the son of Spandine, the man who invoked the buster call on Ohara. Sogeking stops Spandam with his Kabuto and saves Robin, while Franky releases her Seastone handcuffs. Now free to use her Devil Fruit powers again, Robin finally releases her anger on Spandam with her Seis Fleur Slap. However, the Buster Call on Enies Lobby has just begun.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Robin Kaihō! Rufi tai Rucchi chōjō kessen (ロビン解放！ルフィ対ルッチ頂上決戦)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Robin's Liberation! Luffy vs. Lucci: Peak of the Decisive Battle
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Robin and Franky take down some marines, while the fight between Luffy and Lucci continues, the Gear 2nd effect finishes.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hannin wa Rufi oyabun? Kieta oozakura o oe (犯人はルフィ親分？消えた大桜を追え)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Criminal is Boss Luffy? Chase the Vanished Great Sakura Tree
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Sakuras are blooming and a festival is to be celebrated the next day. But, Ninjin is sick and cannot go to the festival. That makes Chopper and Luffy feel really sad. The next day, the greatest sakura tree of the park disappears, and Usopp thinks it was Luffy.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Katenakya dare mo mamorenai! Gia 3 shidō (勝てなきゃ誰も守れない！ギア3始動)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: If I Can't Win, I Can't Protect Anyone! Gear Third Activates
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The battle between Lucci and Luffy rages on. As Luffy's anger grows, he activates a new strength: Gear Third.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Senritsu no kako! Yami no seigi to Robu Rucchi (戦慄の過去！闇の正義とロブ・ルッチ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Terrifying Past! Dark Justice and Rob Lucci
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After receiving the impact from Luffy's Gigant Pistol, Lucci barely manages to get up , thus continuing his fight with the Straw Hat captain. We also find out about the sadistic CP9 agent's past thanks to Vice-Admiral Doberman, of how Lucci became the enforcer of his "dark justice.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Maboroshi no ningyo awareru? Usure yuku ishiki no naka de (幻の人魚現る?薄れゆく意識のなかで)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: A Phantom Mermaid is Here? Within Fading Consciousness
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Kokoro is revealed to be a mermaid. Meanwhile, Franky pulls Robin to her senses as she struggles to forget the trauma of Ohara's Buster Call. The two giants break out with the Franky Family and Galley-La, only to be confronted by three Marine ships.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Hōka ni shizumu shima! Furankī munen no sakebi (砲火に沈む島！フランキー無念の叫び)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Island Sinking in Gunfire! Franky's Outcry of Regret
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hat crew minus Luffy make it safely to the ship. However, Luffy is still fighting Lucci in the first tower off the Bridge of Hesitation. Franky yells for Luffy to hurry up, as he and the rest of the crew hear that Oimo, Kashii, Galley-La and the Franky Family have been hit by the three Battleships. Luffy enters Gear Second for the second time during his fight with Lucci.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi o mate! Tamerai no hashi no shitō! (ルフィを待て！ためらいの橋の死闘！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Wait for Luffy! Fight to the Death on the Bridge of Hesitation!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The fight between Luffy and Lucci rages on, as the rest of the crew, minus Chopper, who cannot move at all, and Sanji, who went missing, face off against a massive army of Marines. Luffy seems to gain the upper hand in his fight, until Lucci hits him with his strongest attack, the Rokuougan.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Kobushi ni kometa omoi! Rufi konshin no gatoringu (拳に込めた想い！ルフィ渾身の銃乱打)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Feelings Put Into Fists! Luffy's Full-Power Gatling
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats continue their fight against the marines while Usopp reveals himself to Luffy and encourages him to stand once more. Zoro has his Yubashiri destroyed by Shuu. Lucci traps Luffy using his tail and does his strongest rokougan on Luffy. With Luffy's memories of why Robin left, he forces himself to stand. Luffy defeats Rob Lucci using his most powerful Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling, which breaks Lucci through the wall and astounds all the Marines as they find out what just happened.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Tomo, umi yori kuru! Mugiwara ichimi saikyō no kizuna (友、海より来る！麦わら一味最強の絆)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: A Friend Approaches from the Sea! The Straw Hat Crew's Strongest Bonds
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, after finally defeating Rob Lucci, is unable to move after his battle. The Franky Family, along with the Galley La Company, Yokozuna, and Oimo and Kashii are still alive after their Buster Call encounter. When all hope seems lost, the Straw Hats hear a familiar voice that tells them to jump into the sea; the Going Merry.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Zenin dai dasshutsu! Shōsha no michi wa kaizoku no tame ni (全員大脱出！勝者の道は海賊のために)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Everyone Escapes! The Path to Victory is for the Pirates
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: With the arrival of Going Merry, the Straw Hats make their great escape from Enies Lobby. Thanks to Sanji, and his clever strategy of closing the Gate of Justice, the Marines are unable to get a shot on Merry. The crew fights off the remaining cannon barrage, and finally give their thanks to Merry.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Arigatō Merī! Yuki ni kemuru wakare no umi (ありがとうメリー！雪に煙る別れの海)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Thank You Merry! The Sea of Separation in the Snow
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: As the crew make their way back to Water 7, they meet the Galley-La Company sailing out to greet them. The Going Merry cracks under its own weight, and the crew say their farewells as they give the ship a Viking funeral, finally putting it to rest.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Yaburareta Ansoku! Ai no Kobushi o Motsu Kaigun Chūjō (破られた安息！愛の拳を持つ海軍中将)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Disturbance of Peace! The Vice-Admiral with the Fist of Love
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Upon their return from Enies Lobby, the Straw Hats rest in Water 7, which is being repaired by Galley-La company's carpenters due to the damage left by the Aqua Laguna. Suddenly, they are attacked by Marine Headquarters Vice-Admiral Garp, whom Luffy calls "Grandpa.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Saikyō no Kakei? Akasareta Rufi no Chichi! (最強の家系？明かされたルフィの父！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Strongest Family Lineage? Luffy's Father Revealed!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Revelations continue as Garp sheds light on Luffy's early childhood, the whereabouts of Shanks, and the identity of Luffy's father, Monkey D. Dragon. Meanwhile, two young marines, under the Vice-Admiral's command, have a joyful reunion with members of the Straw Hats.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Sono Na wa Shin Sekai! Gurando Rain no Yukue (その名は新世界！偉大なる航路の行方)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Its Name is The New World! The Whereabouts of the Great Grand Line!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Koby explains to Luffy how he got his training and how he got on the Grand Line. We also find out about the New World from Koby and how the pirate who conquers it will become the Pirate King. Garp leaves the Straw Hats uncaptured. While everybody is busy celebrating their huge victory at Enies Lobby, Aokiji talks to Robin in secret.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shankusu Ugoku! Bōsōsuru Jidai e no Kusabi (シャンクス動く！暴走する時代への楔)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Shanks Moves! Ceremony to the Rampaging Age
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Shanks meets up with Whitebeard despite all the efforts made by the World Government to avoid it. His main reason for the meeting: a request to stop Ace from chasing after his under-crew mate Teach/Blackbeard. When Shanks's request is denied, the two clash, resulting in an enormous gash across the sky. Meanwhile in Water 7, the Franky Family is shocked to discover that they have been completely removed from the report on the events at Enies Lobby while the Galley-La Company helps Franky with building the Straw Hats' new ship.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Yagara o Sagasu Shōjo! Mizu no Miyako Daisōsasen! (ヤガラを探す少女！水の都大捜査線！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Girl Searching for the Yagara! Great Investigation in the Water Metropolis!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: While walking around Water 7, Luffy and Chopper meet a young girl named Abi, who is searching for her pet yagara that has been missing since the Aqua Laguna incident.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Haha wa Tsuyoshi! Zoro no Dotabata Kaji Tetsudai (母は強し！ゾロのドタバタ家事手伝い)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Mother is Strong! Zoro's Slapstick Housework Help
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After being denied from various Sword Shops to get Yubashiri repaired. Zoro is tricked into becoming the new "Big Brother" to the Family of Auntie. While Zoro is not busy doing house work and ducking from his fellow Straw Hats, he is defending the Family from a gang of Loan Sharks.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Sanji Shōgeki! Nazo no Jī-san to Hageuma Ryōri (サンジ衝撃!謎の爺さんと激ウマ料理)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Sanji Crashes! The Mysterious Old Man and Intense Cooking
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: While out shopping with Chimney, Sanji is persuaded by her to go to a good cook whom which she calls grandpa, the old man teaches Sanji the reason why his food tastes so good, salt which is produced by the Aqua Laguna.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Tsuini Zenin Shōkinkubi! Rokuoku Koe no Ichimi! (ついに全員賞金首！6億超えの一味！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Everyone's Finally Wanted! The Crew of Over Six Hundred Million!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: As Usopp plots to get back in the Straw Hats, Franky, Iceburg, and the Galley-La foremen are hard at work putting the finishing touches on the new ship. As the Straw Hats were told that the ship is finished, they were interrupted by the Franky Family, who revealed that they all have Bounties now, and plead with Luffy to take Franky along with them because Franky is also a wanted man.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Umi o Nozomu Hyakujū no Ō! Yume no Fune Dōdō Kansei! (海を臨む百獣の王!夢の船堂々完成!)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The King of Beasts that will Cross the Ocean! The Dream Ship's Magnificent Completion!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Soon after Sanji, Nami, and Chopper went about their new Bounties, the Straw Hat Pirates depart to see Iceburg and their new ship. Meanwhile, in an effort to draw him to joining the Crew, the Franky Family steal Franky's swim briefs, leading him to destroy half of Water 7 to get them back.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Saraba Itoshiki Kobun-tachi! Furankī Tatsu (さらば愛しき子分達!フランキー発つ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Goodbye my Lovable Followers! Franky Departs
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: After Franky refuses Luffy's offer to join the crew, Nico Robin "persuades" Franky to go. Iceburg reminds Franky that his dream will not be fulfilled unless he is on the ship to aid it till it reaches its goal. After many reflections of his past, Franky decides to join Luffy and gives a heartfelt goodbye to his comrades at Water 7. As he gets on board, Sanji and Zoro makes the announcement that Garp is on the island and he wants to arrest the crew.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Shukkō Mizu no Miyako! Otoko Usoppu Kettō no Kejime (出港水の都!男ウソップ決闘のケジメ)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Departure from the Water City! The Distinction of a Man, Usopp's Duel
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: As the Straw Hats set to depart from Water 7, Garp, who is under watch from Aokiji, attacks them by throwing cannonballs. Chopper senses that Usopp is on shore trying to get their attention. But due to a conversation about honor they had earlier with Zoro, they do not stop for him. Usopp realizes what he must do as he begs for Luffy's forgiveness and ultimately rejoins the Straw Hats.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Meguru Tehaisho! Kokyō wa Odoru Fune wa Susumu! (めぐる手配書！故郷は踊る船は進む！)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: Circling Bounties! The Hometowns Dance as the Ship Advances!
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: As the Straw Hats escape from Garp's attacks, Franky tells them about a name for their new ship. Taking Iceburg's advice, the crew decides on Thousand Sunny. Afterwards Garp intends to attack with a giant iron ball, but Franky reveals the Coup de Burst at the last moment and the crew flees from Garp. Meanwhile, the new bounties are known by most of the crew's hometowns, as well as Smoker and Tashigi, Alabasta and the revolutionary, Monkey D. Dragon.

Water 7 Saga.episode_name_jp: Saikyō no Nōryoku! Ēsu o Osou Kurohige no Yami (最凶の能力！エースを襲う黒ひげの闇)
Water 7 Saga.episode_name_en: The Most Evil Ability! Blackbeard's Darkness Attacks Ace
Water 7 Saga.episode_sumary: Three days before Luffy leaves Water 7, Ace finally catches up to Blackbeard on Banaro Island, but his attempt to fight him reveals Teach's darkest secret: the control of the Dark Dark Fruit (Yami Yami no Mi), the most powerful of Devil Fruits. As fire and dark gravity collide, the island is destroyed. The outcome is unknown, but Ace's hat is shown lying on the ground. It is said that the fight between them is the trigger for a great event yet to come.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Nazo no Kaizoku go-ikkō! Sanī-gō to Kikken na Wana (謎の海賊ご一行！サニー号と危険な罠)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Mysterious Party of Pirates! The Sunny and a Dangerous Trap
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After departing Water 7, the Straw Hats find a drifting ship with hungry and sick fishermen. All things seem great until the drifting fishermen have something else in mind and set a trap for the Straw Hats.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Sanī-gō Pinchi! Unare Chōsoku no Himitsu Meka (サニー号ピンチ！唸れ超速の秘密メカ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Sunny in a Pinch! Roar, Secret Superspeed Mecha
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats find themselves surrounded by a fleet of Marine ships, actually illusions. They escape using the Soldier Dock System, with the fishermen in tow. Chopper meanwhile is told by Jiro about their past of being the Phoenix Pirates under Puzzle. The Accino family meanwhile pledges to collect the Straw Hats' heads.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Shinsekai ni Shizumu Yume! Shitsui no Kaizoku Pazūru (新世界に沈む夢！失意の海賊パズール)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Dream Sinking in the New World! The Pirate of Despair, Puzzle
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Trapped by moving icebergs, the Straw Hats try to figure a way out avoiding numerous dangers as the assassins draw closer. The Phoenix Pirate, Puzzle, awakes after Chopper's treatment only to reveal some harsh realities on the awaiting crew. The Thousand Sunny is trapped by ice by three of the assassins. However it escapes using the Coup de Burst. Zoro, as usual, is lost after severing a blocking iceberg in half, and in an iceberg attack the rope attached to the Phoenix Pirate ship is severed leaving behind Luffy and Chopper. Their pirate flag is then stolen by a little girl's flying fish.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Osoi Kuru Shikaku-tachi! Hyōjō Dai Batoru Kaishi (襲い来る刺客たち！氷上大バトル開始)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Assassins Attack! The Great Battle Above the Ice Begins
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Using the Shark Submarine, Nami and Franky find out that penguins are moving the icebergs. Afterwards, they are attacked by Hockera. Usopp and Sanji are knocked off the Sunny by an iceberg, and encounter Salchow and Arbell. Luffy and Chopper, along with the rest of the Phoenix Pirates are attacked by Brindo, and Lil, the little girl, appears before Robin back on the Sunny. Finally, Zoro stumbles upon Lovely Land, the Accino Family's headquarters. The fight between the Accino Family and the Straw Hats begin.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Daikusen Mugiwara Ichimi! Hata ni Kakeru Kaizoku-damashī (大苦戦麦わら一味！旗にかける海賊魂)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Hard Fights of the Straw Hat Crew! The Pirate Soul Banking it All on the Flag!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The fights continue. Luffy, distracted due to the lost flag, has initial trouble with Brindo, but the Phoenix Pirates help capture him. Usopp has marginal success against Arbell, but is hampered by the angered Salchow. Franky, meanwhile, manages to beat Hockera at the cost of his remaining cola, but ends up iced up inside the sub along with Nami. Lil accepts Robin's request to be led to Lovely Land, where Zoro is aimlessly wandering inside it.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Atsu Kurushisa Zenkai! Semaru Futago no Jiryoku Pawā (暑苦しさ全開！迫る双子の磁力パワー)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Hot Full Throttle! The Twins' Magnetic Power Draws Near
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Due to more of Sanji's blundering, he and Usopp find themselves captured by Salchow and Arbell. Meanwhile, Campacino arrives at the Phoenix Pirates' ship to rescue his brother. Due to their 'brotherly love', the two are human magnets, and use their unique fighting style to separate Luffy from the others. Zoro, meanwhile, encounters the Don. After knocking back a few drinks together, the Straw Hats' jolly roger is delivered, and Zoro's 120 million bounty is quite a hard thing to pass up...

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Daikonran no Yakata! Ikaru Don to Toraware no Ichimi (大混乱の館！怒るドンと囚われの一味)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Great Chaos Mansion! The Angry Don and the Imprisoned Crew
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The Don reveals his Devil Fruit powers. Zoro is no match against his anger and ends up imprisoned inside an ice cavern along with the other captured Straw Hats. They manage to escape thanks to some indirect assistance from Robin, who is still with Lil. Luffy's fight with Brindo and Campacino ends in a draw when the two leave to calm down the Don. Puzzle finally overcomes his depression and resolves to follow Luffy, Chopper, and Jiro to Lovely Land to recover the pirate flags.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Fushichō Futatabi! Tomo ni Chikau Kaizokuki no Yume (不死鳥ふたたび！友に誓う海賊旗の夢)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Phoenix Returns! The Dream of the Pirate Flag Sworn to a Friend
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The formerly captured Straw Hats finally manage to get outside, no thanks to Zoro, where they once again encounter the Accinos. The rematches turn out to be in the Straw Hats' favor, as Hockera is taken down by Franky and Chopper, Arbell and Salchow by Nami and Sanji, and after a protracted battle, Luffy smashes Brindo right back into Lovely Land. Puzzle, showing newfound confidence, then confronts Campacino. But all the ruckus arouses the Don. Meanwhile, Robin is taken hostage by Lil to coerce her into promising to stay in Lovely Land.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Atsu Atsu Chōkessen! Rufi vs Shakunetsu no Don (アツアツ超決戦！ルフィvs灼熱のドン)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Super Final Atsu Atsu Battle! Luffy vs. the Scortching Don
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The Atsu Atsu no Mi gives the Don all sorts of powers, from throwing blasts of heat, heating his skin to extreme temperatures, to even being able to fly by blowing steam out his nose. How can Luffy win when he can barely even hit his enemy? Meanwhile, Puzzle defeats Campacino, the rest of the Straw Hats search for their flag, and Robin and Lil reconcile with one another. Outside, the fight really heats up when Luffy activates Gear Second, but the Don is not going to fall so easily.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Shinsekai de Matsu! Isamashiki Kaizoku to no Wakare (新世界で待つ！勇ましき海賊との別れ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Courageous Pirates
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After a grueling struggle, Luffy finally defeats the Don. With a little help from Lil, the two stolen flags are finally recovered, and the crew manages to get it back on the ship before Luffy returns. The defeated Accinos sail away with the Don in tow and finally have a belated birthday celebration, while Arbell makes up with her sister. The Phoenix Pirates go to battle with Campacino and the remaining grunts, Puzzle promising to meet the Straw Hats again in the New World.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Shutsudō Choppāman! Mamore Nagisa no Terebi Kyoku (出動チョッパーマン！守れ渚のＴＶ局)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Chopper Man Departs! Protect the TV Station by the Shore
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper Man and Namifia are low on money! Dr. Usodabada constructs a plan to bring down Chopper Man while collecting fame for himself and a new crew to replace his nonhelpful duo - Sanjilops and Zorogilla. His plan - to take over the TV Station and televise his demands. Not that anyone really cares except Chopper Man, who only wants to join for the rare Air Force C-Max Collectors item. After a wrestling match between the two, and even a mecha battle, the evil Doctor is defeated, and Chopper Man reaches celebrity status!

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Ma no Umi Totsunyū! Kiri ni Ukabu Nazo no Gaikotsu (魔の海突入！霧に浮かぶ謎のガイコツ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Venture Into the Devil's Sea! The Mysterious Skeleton Floating Through the Fog
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: In search of food, the Straw Hats attempt octopus hunting before discovering a barrel in the middle of the ocean.  After opening the barrel, Thousand Sunny gets thrown into the foggy Florian Triangle where it encounters a ruined ship and a skeleton man named Brook, whom Luffy immediately asks to join the crew.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Hito ni Aeta Yorokobi! Gaikotsu Shinshi no Shōtai (人に逢えた喜び！ ガイコツ紳士の正体)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Delight of Having Met People! The Gentleman Skeleton's True Colors
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Onboard the Thousand Sunny, Brook tells his story of being a musician before being killed. However, his spirit was able to reanimate his skeleton due to the power of the Yomi Yomi no Mi. He also tells of having his shadow stolen, and thus cannot be out in open sunlight. A ghost suddenly appears in the galley, and the Straw Hats find out that they have been targeted by the ghost isle Thriller Bark, which has found them.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Kai Genshō Zokuzoku! Surirābāku Jōriku (怪現象ぞくぞく！ スリラーバーク上陸)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: One Phenomenon After Another! Disembarking at Thriller Bark
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Brook bids farewell to the Straw Hats and leaps overboard, revealing that he can dash across the ocean's surface. Nami, Usopp, and Chopper sail out to explore the island using the Mini-Merry II, and encounter a cerberus. Back on the ship, the remaining crew members are harassed by an invisible creature. After fleeing the cerberus, Nami, Usopp, and Chopper encounter Hildon, a vampiric creature who offers to take them to the mansion of Doctor Hogback.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Tensai to Yobareta Otoko! Hogubakku Arawaru! (天才と呼ばれた男！ ホグバック現る！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Man Called a Genius! Hogback Appears!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp, Nami and Chopper traverse through the forest of Thriller Bark, where they are attacked by a platoon of zombies before finally reaching the mansion of the bizarre surgeon Doctor Hogback and his female assistant Cindry.  While immediately hospitable, the doctor starts acting strange after it is mentioned that Brook has arrived on the island. The Thousand Sunny, meanwhile, gets caught in a giant spiderweb.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Nami Dai Pinchi! Zonbi Yashiki to Tōmei Ningen (ナミ大ピンチ！ ゾンビ屋敷と透明人間)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Nami in Big Trouble! The Zombie Mansion and the Invisible Man
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After the meeting with Hogback, Nami is assaulted by an invisible creature in the shower, but Usopp and Chopper manage to drive it off. The rest of the Straw Hats set foot on the island and encounter more zombies. Elsewhere, Hogback meets with Absalom, the invisible man who attacked Nami, and a ghost referred to as Perona, to discuss what to do with the Straw Hats. Back in the manor, Nami, Usopp, and Chopper find themselves surrounded and trapped by the Surprise Zombies: zombies that strike from paintings, taxidermied heads, and even floor rugs.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Zonbi no Nazo! Akumu no Hogubakku Kenkyūjo (ゾンビの謎！悪夢のホグバック研究所)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Mystery of the Zombies! Hogback's Nightmarish Research Laboratory
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Escaping from the Surprise Zombies of the mansion, Nami, Chopper and Usopp discover the truth about Cindry's true identity and Doctor Hogback's experiments before being approached by a mysterious samurai zombie with Brook's voice.  Meanwhile, Luffy's group are ambushed by ghosts who make them become depressed and destroy a platoon of outside zombies with a group team attack.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Sono Na wa Moria! Kage o Nigiru Daikaizoku no Wana (その名はモリア！影を握る大海賊の罠)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: His Name is Moria! Trap of the Great Shadow-Stealing Pirate
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After beating the zombies, the Straw Hats learn that one of the Shichibukai, Gecko Moria, has been stealing people's shadows and using them to revive zombies. After they leave, Absalom rallies the zombies together for the Night Attack, while the ghosts from before return to their master, a Gothic-style Ghost Princess Perona. Gecko Moria himself, a massive, giant-like man, is awoken. The Straw Hats come to the realization that Thriller Bark is not an island, but rather, a massive ship!

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Zonbi Songu no Kyōen! Yo Uchi no Kane wa Yami no Oto (ゾンビ歌の饗宴！夜討ちの鐘は闇の音)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Feast of the Zombie Song! The Bell of the Night Raid is a Sound of Darkness
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp, Nami and Chopper are effortlessly incapacitated by the General Zombie Ryuma, a samurai with an eerie resemblance to Brook, and are locked inside a coffin. Luffy and the others enter the mansion and defeat the Surprise Zombies with ease, but Sanji goes missing, so they force Buhichuck to act as their guide by taking him with them. While the zombies of Thriller Bark celebrate the start of the Night Attack, Absalom awakens the other General Zombies to handle the Straw Hats.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Dōbutsu Ippai? Perōna no Wandāgāden (動物いっぱい？ペローナの不思議の庭)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Filled with Animals!? Perona's Wonder Garden
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After awakening the General Zombies, Absalom is accosted by Lola, a zombie warhog obsessed with making him her husband. After learning that he's chosen Nami to be his bride, Lola sets her sights on the navigator. Nami, Usopp, and Chopper manage to escape their coffin and find themselves in a garden, surrounded by animal zombies, including one that talks and acts a lot like Sanji. The other Straw Hats, meanwhile, discover a hallway lined  with suits of armor, and realize that Zoro is now missing as well.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Kieru Mugiwara Ichimi! Arawareta Nazo no Kenshi! (消える麦わら一味！現れた謎の剣士！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Disappearing Straw Hat Crew! The Mysterious Swordsman Appears!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The three remaining Straw Hats are lured by Buhichuck into a room where they are forced to face an army of armored General Zombies, but are able to handle them until the zombies are joined by a strange swordsman named Jigoroh (who appears to act and fight like Zoro) and Luffy is captured by the zombie forces. Franky and Robin are left to face against a massive monkey-spider. Meanwhile, Absalom forces Lola's anger on Nami while Perona invades the Straw Hats' ship for treasure.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Nokoru Kishidō! Nami o Mamoru Uragiri Zonbi (残る騎士道！ナミを守る裏切りゾンビ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Leftover Chivalry! The Traitorous Zombie who Protects Nami
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The Sanji zombie, a bizarre cross between a penguin and a bulldog, turns against his allies when they try to attack Nami, claiming that he'd rather die than attack her, but is blasted into a wall for his insolence by Absalom. Nami barely manages to escape another kidnapping attempt by Absalom, but is chased out of the garden by Lola. Franky and Robin, meanwhile, buy some time against the spider-monkey Tararan and the General Zombies by destroying the bridge they are standing on, when suddenly Brook himself falls from the sky.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Sora kara Sanjō! Kenkyō Hanauta wa Ano Otoko! (空から参上！剣狭ハナウタはあの男！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Coming from the Sky! That Man is the "Humming" Swordsman!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Nami finally gets Lola off of her tail by claiming to be an okama. She, Usopp, and Chopper hide from Absalom inside Kumashi, and overhear Absalom, Hildon, and Perona talking about being summoned by Moria. From within his chambers, Gecko Moria himself reveals to Luffy that he will use his strength to become Pirate King. Outside, Franky gets the upper hand against Tararan, but he and Robin are immobilized by his underlings, the Spider Mice. Brook, however, slices the spider-monkey through before he realizes it.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Kinkyūjitai! Saikyō no Kage no Ikisaki! (ルフィ緊急事態！最強の影の行き先！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy in an Emergency! The Living Place of the Strongest Shadow!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After defeating Talaran and releasing his shadow soul from within, Brook explains to Robin and Franky the truth regarding the zombies of Thriller Bark. Meanwhile, Moria meets with the rest of the Mysterious Four (as well as the hidden Straw Hats in Kumashi) where he uses his powers to steal Luffy's shadow, which he plans to use for his ultimate Special Zombie.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Majin to Yobareta Senshi!! Ōzu Fukkatsu no Toki (魔人と呼ばれた戦士！！オーズ復活の時)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Warrior Called a Demon!! The Time of Oars' Resurrection
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: With Luffy's shadow, Moria and his followers head into the freezer holding his ultimate special zombie that he believes will help him gain power in the New World: the massive ancient warrior known as Oars. At the same time Brook parts ways from Franky and Robin after giving further crucial advice regarding the zombies so he can go forth to accomplish his own goal: defeating the zombie Ryuma and reclaiming his shadow from the samurai fencer.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Gohyakunen buri no Mezame!! Ōzu Kaigan!! (500年ぶりの目覚め！！オーズ開眼！！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Awakening After 500 Years!! Oars Revives!!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Moria implants Luffy's shadow inside the corpse of Oars, making the massive zombie come to life. The zombie immediately shows his similarity to Luffy, yelling out for food at the moment of awakening! Oars calls out for Sanji to make him some food, but then is confused by his own sentence, not remembering who Sanji was, the shadow's personality and memories already starting to be worn away. Usopp, Chopper and Nami are discovered by Moria's band, upon which Nami is abducted by Absalom for marriage and the others are left to fend for themselves against another platoon of zombies until they are saved by Franky and Robin.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Shinnen no Inochi-goi!! Afuro o Mamoru Burukku (信念の命乞い！！アフロを守るブルック)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Conviction Strong Enough to Beg for One's Life!! Brook Protects his Afro
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Brook confronts Ryuma, recalling his time on Thriller Bark five years prior - and his first battle with Ryuma and how he lost to a zombie with his own shadow. Ryuma mocks Brook for being so careful about his afro, and the two engage in another battle. Oars meanwhile continues to exhibit traits of Luffy as he devours most of Thriller Bark's food and declares his desire to be pirate king!

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Otoko no Chikai wa Shinazu!! Tōi Sora de Matsu Tomo e (男の誓いは死なず！！遠い空で待つ友へ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: A Man's Oath Never Dies!! To the Friend who Waits Under a Far-Away Sky
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp, Chopper, Robin and Franky return to the Sunny, discovering their ship had been ransacked but Luffy, Zoro and Sanji returned to them without their shadows. After updating the other three of their current status and Nami's abduction, Franky reveals what Brook told him why he was still alive and drifting after fifty years, which was in order to return to Reverse Mountain where one of his most valuable crewmates waits for him: the whale Laboon.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Kanarazu Ai ni Iku!! Burukku to Yakusoku no Misaki (必ず会いに行く！！ブルックと約束の岬)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: We will Definitely Meet Again!! Brook and the Cape of the Promise
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Usopp, Sanji, and Zoro tell the rest of the crew how they got to meet Laboon as they started their new journey, while Brook reflects on his promise to return to Laboon amidst his duel with Ryuma. Luffy declares his intention to make Brook a part of their crew, and the Straw Hats prepare to counterattack the forces of Thriller Bark in order to reclaim what was stolen from them.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Meshi to Nami to Kage!! Rufi Ikari no Daihangeki (メシとナミと影！！ルフィ怒りの大反撃)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Food, Nami and Shadows!! Luffy's Angry Counterattack
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Having decided to help Brook and recruit him into their crew, the Straw Hats split up to help him recover his shadow, rescue Nami and defeat Gecko Moria. Hogback, frustrated with Absalom holding a wedding with the General Zombies as guests, becomes the second commander of the zombie forces. An enraged Luffy and Sanji decimate most of the zombies, but are stopped by Perona's Negative Hollow attack. When Oars jumps from the mast onto the stairs, Luffy, Chopper and Robin are cut off from Usopp and Sanji, who fall down below to where Zoro and Franky are.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Usoppu Saikyō? Negatibu wa Makasetoke (ウソップ最強？ネガティブは任せとけ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Usopp the Strongest? Leave the Negatives to Me
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy continues on to take on Moria while Chopper and Robin remain behind to take on Hogback and his loyal zombie servants. After Oars runs off with a new pirate hat from his destruction, the remainder of the crew end up in Perona's room where she uses her negative powers on them. However, Usopp reveals that he's immune to her attacks because he's already got a negative personality, staying behind to take on the ghost princess while the others continue towards Absalom and Ryuma.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Jeneraru Zonbi Shunsatsu Ōzu wa Bōken Kibun!! (将軍ゾンビ瞬殺！！オーズは冒険気分！！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Sudden Death of the General Zombies!! Oars in an Adventurous Mood!!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp continues to stand up to Perona's Negative Hollows while wiping out Wild Zombies, while Brook is held at the mercy of Ryuma, who finally proves his superiority over the original by defeating the skeleton in battle before the arrival of Zoro. Meanwhile, Oars continues to cause chaos on Thriller Bark, forcing Absalom to send his entire General Zombie audience to stop him. But Oars annihilates all of them with a "non-Gomu-Gomu" Gatling, leaving their boss at the mercy of the newly arriving Sanji.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Honō no Naito Sanji!! Keri Tsubuse Itsuwari no Kyoshiki (炎の騎士サンジ！！蹴り潰せの偽り挙式)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Sanji, the Knight of Flames!! Kick Down the False Ceremony
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy attempts to attack Gecko Moria, but instead is forced to face his shadow clone: Doppelman, while Usopp continues to maneuver around the Wild Zombies to get to Perona only to now face Kumashi's wrath. Sanji saves Nami from Absalom, who does not see him as a threat due to the power of his zombie, but Sanji unleashes his own rage against the lion-faced man, both for harming the women of the crew as well as an unknown connection between the two of them.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Suke Suke no Innen? Ubawareta Sanji no Yume (スケスケの因縁？奪われたサンジの夢)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Perverted Connection? Sanji's Stolen Dream
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Beating Absalom when he refused to reveal he has been using firearms, Sanji reveals that he knows Absalom's invisibility is due to the Suke Suke no Mi which he wanted for his own reasons. As Sanji defeats Absalom, Luffy managed to get through Doppelman to land a hit on Moria. At the same time, losing sight of Perona, Usopp finally manages to give Kumashi the slip before finding a more confident Perona floating in midair out the window.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Tasukete Hīrō! Teki wa Fujimi no Purinsesu (助けて英雄！敵は不死身のプリンセス)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Saving Hero! The Enemy is the Invincible Princess
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Usopp is forced to go through a gauntlet of Perona's Horo-Horo powers, including an untouchable body, size manipulation, passing right through him and creating mini-Hollows that slowly rip away at his stamina and body.  Temporarily turning into Sogeking to finally remove Kumashi's shadow, Usopp is forced up against a desperate wall until he finally discovers Perona's weakness: her own room, where her real body lies helplessly while using her abilities!

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Perona Kyōfu!! Uso no U wa Usoppu no U (ペローナ恐怖！！嘘のウはウソップのウ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Perona's Terror!! The U in Uso is the U in Usopp
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The battle between Usopp and Perona continues; Usopp fires something at Perona's real body which seems to miss it, giving Perona the confidence to fight back again. This time she produces a huge hollow, at least four times the size of Usopp, which grabs Usopp in its mouth and will not let go, leaving Perona time to go and return to her body. She detonates it, but the explosion gets sucked into the impact Dial, which Usopp cleverly brought out. He uses this on a Zombie-Hippo which was sneaking up, breaking his arm, but he then reveals that he stuck Perona's arm to the wall; he makes her faint and therefore wins the battle by first firing hundreds of little moving fake cockroaches onto her, and then smacking her over the head with an inflatable ten-ton hammer.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Yane ni Mau Zangeki! Kecchaku Zoro tai Ryūma (屋根に舞う斬撃！決着ゾロVSリューマ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Slashes Dancing on the Roof! Finale - Zoro vs. Ryuma
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro duels Ryuma in Hogback's lab, while Franky guards over the injured Brook. Neither Zoro, nor Ryuma, can gain any advantage over the other, as they keep matching the other's attack. Their attacks quickly destroy the lab, forcing them to escape the room and continue their fierce duel on the roof. As Brook watches on, he comes the conclusion that Ryuma was never taking their fights seriously. After an intense sword fight, during which the entire roof collapses to the ground below, Zoro finally defeats Ryuma using a technique which sets him ablaze. Zoro lands hard on the lip of the roof below. Ryuma manages to land on a higher ledge. Ryuma staggers slightly, then acknowledges his defeat at Zoro's hands. Sheathing Shusui, Ryuma throws it to Zoro. Ryuma collapses in a gout of flames and Brook's shadow is finally returned to him, to his great joy. Zoro acknowledges Ryuma's skill as a swordsman and says he wishes he could have met Ryuma before he died. He also agrees to forget the outcome of their fight.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Choppā Gekido!! Hogubakku Ma no Ijutsu (チョッパー激怒！！ホグバック魔の医術)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Chopper's Rage!! Hogback's Demonic Medical Practice
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper and Robin are outmatched by Zoro and Sanji's zombies, both of whom have almost completely lost the personalities they acquired from their shadows. Chopper tells Hogback that he had once respected him, but did not anymore after realizing the true nature of his experiments. Hogback, however, argues that the zombies are truly alive, and recalls that he had fallen in love with Cindry while she was alive, only to have her reject him in favor of her fiancé. After her death, Hogback agreed to serve Moria in exchange for his reviving her. Chopper becomes furious and attempts to attack and purify Cindry, but Cindry's strength, and Zoro and Sanji's zombies prevent them from doing so. Zoro's zombie and Sanji's zombie begin fighting each other, still unable to get along, and Robin tricks Hogback into telling them to jump out of the tower. Hogback orders Cindry to attack, but Cindry, having temporarily regained her original self, is unable to move. Elsewhere, Luffy is still unable to hit Moria, and Oars arrives at their location.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Ōzu Hoeru!! Dete Koi Mugiwara no Ichimi (オーズ吼える！！出て来い麦わらの一味)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Oars Roars!! Come Out Straw Hat Crew
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Chopper and Robin watch as Cindry's body refuses to move, much to the dismay of Hogback. However, Cindry quickly recovers and Hogback tells Cindry to buy as much time as possible so he can escape.  Robin quickly restrains Cindry though, and Chopper captures Hogback easily. Robin starts to lift Chopper and Hogback up, Chopper preparing to throw Hogback down to the ground from a dangerous height. Elsewhere, Luffy is confronted by Oars who is given the order to capture and destroy every Straw Hat Pirate. Moria takes advantage of Luffy's bewilderment at Oars and quickly escapes, though Luffy immediately starts chasing after him while Oars begins hunting down the other Straw Hats. Oars' moving around the island causes many disturbances and he interrupts just as Chopper is about to throw Hogback to the ground. Hogback is trampled by Oars while Cindry again is unable to move. As Oars continues to move he also disrupts the battle between Sanji and Absalom. While Sanji is distracted by Oars, Absalom steals Nami back and plans to properly wed her this time without any disturbances. Zoro, Franky and Brook see Oars' huge figure coming towards them and they quickly realize that it is Luffy's zombie. Sanji also arrives to help fight Oars along with Usopp, Chopper and Robin who realize that the gigantic Oars has received orders to destroy them. At the end, Oars cries for the Straw Hats to come out and do battle with him.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Teki wa Rufi!! Saikyō Zonbi tai Mugiwara no Ichimi (敵はルフィ！！最強ゾンビ対麦わらの一味)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Enemy is Luffy!! The Strongest Zombie vs. the Straw Hat Crew
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy continues to chase after Moria, only to be stalled by Moria's shadow attacks. The rest of the Straw Hats continue battling Oars. Oars quickly dispatches all of them, stating that he does not know them and that his master is Moria.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Taorero Abusaromu!! Nami Yūjō no Raigeki!! (倒れろアブサロム！！ナミ友情の雷撃！！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Defeat Absalom!! Nami's Lightning Attack of Friendship!!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After defeating the Straw Hats Oars goes in search of Nami, Luffy and Sogeking(he does not know its Usopp). Meanwhile Perona is woken up and brought up to date of the current events of Thriller Bark. After learning that Oars defeated Hogback and the General Zombies, she decides to take all the food and treasure of Thriller Bark and escape on the Thousand Sunny. Nami is also woken up and is about to be kissed by Absalom to seal their marriage. Lola comes in to help save Nami but Absalom quickly dispatches her. Nami is furious and puts all her energy into a Swing Arm Attack, knocking him out. The Straw Hats then prepare to attack Oars again but this time without Brook who is still wounded from his battle with Ryuma.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Ubae Daun!! Hissatsu Mugiwara Dokkingu? (奪えダウン！！必殺麦わらドッキング？)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: One Down!! Sure Kill Straw Hat Docking?
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: With Absalom down, Nami goes in search of Thriller Bark's treasure. She finds that the vault is empty but forces two chipmunk zombies to tell her where the treasure is. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats fighting Oars decide to use Tactics 15: Big Emperor. Franky 'docks' onto Sanji and Zoro, with Usopp docking as left arm and Chopper as the head. Robin refuses to complete the docking as the right hand, stating that it is too embarrassing, much to the dismay of Oars who was getting pumped to fight the Big Emperor. Usopp fires Oil Stars to make one of Oars' feet slip. Zoro then takes Franky's Heavy Nunchunks and is launched to Oars' arm by Sanji. He then smashes the nunchunks into Oars' arm, and Robin attacks Oars' other arm with Cien Fleur: Big Tree. Franky and Chopper climb up to Oars' face and attack with their combined powers, causing Oars to fall off balance. Sanji kicks Oars' remaining foot that is supporting him, causing Oars to fall down face first. Meanwhile Brook goes to the kitchen in search of milk and salt.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Ashioto Naki Shūrai!! Nazo no Hōmonsha: Bōkun Kuma (足音なき襲来！！謎の訪問者•暴君くま)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Soundless Invasion!! The Mysterious Visitor: Kuma the Tyrant
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Nami chases after Perona who has taken all the treasure, planning to escape Thriller Bark with it! Upon reaching there, Nami finds Perona being assaulted by Kuma who 'sends' her away. Kuma then asks Nami if Luffy has a brother and immediately disappears after. Meanwhile the Straw Hats combating Oars use Luffy's weaknesses such as meat, to defeat him. Zoro decides to test his new sword which he acquired from Ryuma.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Ōzu Purasu Moria - Chikara to Zunō no Saikyō Gattai (オーズ+モリア 力と頭脳の最強合体)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Oars Plus Moria - The Greatest Combination of Brains and Brawn
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy finds that he has been chasing Moria's shadow the whole time, while the real Moria has escaped! Some strange people are also seemingly searching for Luffy. Moria meets with Kuma as they discuss Crocodile's replacement, Blackbeard. The Straw Hats are still fighting Oars, planning to defeat him so Luffy can get his shadow back. Suddenly, the Straw Hats discover Moria in Oars' stomach, sitting in a cockpit! Usopp rushes to the kitchen to get more salt, only to be targeted by Oars. Brook appears and saves Usopp at the last moment, holding a big bag of salt.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Gyakuten e no Hisaku - Naitomea Rufi Kenzan (逆転への秘策 ナイトメア•ルフィ見参)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: A Secret Strategy to Turn the Tables - Nightmare Luffy Appears
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: With Moria's guidance, Oars is better able to counter the Straw Hats' strategies and turn their attacks against them. Franky is knocked unconscious after a failed attempt to fire himself at Oars with a giant slingshot known as Kuwagata and shoot him at point-blank range with Weapons Left. Nami arrives and joins the battle, but Oars demonstrates that he can somehow stretch his limbs, which the crew realizes is Moria's doing. Elsewhere, Luffy meets up with the Rolling Pirates, whose shadows have been stolen by Moria. They plant shadows into him in order to multiply his fighting strength and grant him new skills so that he can defeat Moria.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaimetsu, Mugiwara Ichimi - Kage Kage no Chikara Zenkai (壊滅、麦わら一味 カゲカゲの能力全開)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Straw Hat Crew Annihilated - Full-Throttle Kage Kage Abilities
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Moria explains that he enabled Oars to stretch by stretching his shadow, thereby forcing his body to stretch along with it in order to ensure that the body and shadow are the same shape. Usopp fires Brook out of Kuwagata, with Robin making him spin and Nami electrifying him, but he only does minor damage to Oars and is knocked out when Oars retaliates. Robin attempts to use her powers on Moria, but he attacks her with his shadow and then switches places with it, rendering her attack useless. He then takes her shadow, rendering her unconscious. Chopper discovered that Oars died of frostbite, and that while he does not feel any pain, he can still take damage from their attacks. Sanji and Chopper launch a combo attack on Oars, who then knocks out both of them with Gomu Gomu no Gatling, leaving only Nami, Zoro and Usopp standing.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Chōzetsu Batoru Sutāto! Rufi tai Rufi (超絶バトルスタート！ ルフィVSルフィ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Battle for Superiority Starts! - Luffy vs. Luffy
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro tries attacking Oars' arm again, but Oars knocks him out by kneeing him into a wall. Usopp shoots Brook's salt into Oars' mouth with Kuwagata, but Moria's shadow catches it and throws it out, breaking the bag and preventing them from using it again. Oars tries to stomp Usopp and Nami, but Nightmare Luffy arrives and gets them to safety in an instant. While the Rolling Pirates take the unconscious Straw Hats to safety, Luffy begins attacking Oars, and with his shadows, is far stronger than his opponent. Moria attempts to escape, but Luffy punches him out with Gomu Gomu no Pistol and sends Oars flying with Gomu Gomu no Storm. The shadows leave Luffy's body, but he appears to have won.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Kecchaku Semaru! Tatakikome, Todome no Ichigeki (決着迫る！ たたき込め、とどめの一撃)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Conclusion Arrives! - Deliver the Finishing Blow
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Oars recovers from Nightmare Luffy's attack. However, the Straw Hats all get back on their feet, from Luffy to Brook, and launch a final devastating attack on Oars, which ends with Luffy smashing a Gigant Bazooka into Oars' face from above, breaking his spine and finally defeating the demon. Moria, however, gets out of Oars' stomach moments later, and prepares himself for his ultimate technique, Shadows Asgard. By sucking up all of the shadows of all of the zombies on Thriller Bark, totaling one thousand shadows, Moria becomes a grotesque monster, as big as Oars in size with short spindly legs, gigantic arms, and a huge bloated neck pulsating with veins.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Karada ga Kieru! Akumu no Shima ni Sasu Asahi! (肉体が消える！ 悪夢の島に射す朝日！)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Bodies Vanish! - The Morning Sun Pierces Through the Nightmare Island!
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy begins fighting Moria, entering Gear Second in the process, but the blows that he deals Moria are not enough to force him to release the shadows. Moria attacks Luffy with a devastating blow, but he manages to continue fighting, and activates Gear Third while Gear Second is still active. With a new technique, Gomu Gomu no Gigant Jet Shell, he knocks Moria under the collapsing mast of Thriller Bark and forces him to release all his shadows just as dawn arrives. However, the ones who had their shadows stolen start to vanish.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Owaranai Kiki! Mugiwara Ichimi Massatsu Shirei (終わらない危機！麦わら一味抹殺指令)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Endless Crisis! Orders to Obliterate the Straw Hat Crew
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: All of Moria's victims recover their shadow and celebrate regaining their ability to enter daylight. Luffy, Zoro, Sanji and Robin recover their shadows in time to avoid being disintegrated. Luffy lies unconscious from his wounds and using Gear Second against Moria, and Usopp worries about him endangering himself by having to use the technique on the stronger enemies ahead. Kuma receives orders from the World Government to kill everyone on Thriller Bark in order to cover up Moria's defeat. He attacks the survivors with a strange move that sends several people flying backwards, before turning his attention to Zoro.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Subete o Hajiku Kuma no Nikyu Nikyu no Chikara (すべてを弾く くまのニキュニキュの能力)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Kuma's Nikyu Nikyu Power That Deflect Everything
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro attempts to fight Kuma, yet all of his attacks are effortlessly repelled. Kuma reveals that he has eaten the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi, which enables him to repel attacks and air at the speed of light. He then proves his power by easily shrugging off Sanji's Concasse attack and taking out Franky and Usopp with barely any effort. Finally, he compresses air to form a pressure bomb before delivering an ultimatum: he will spare everyone if they hand over Luffy, only to be met with defiance. Kuma mentions that it's a shame before detonating Thriller Bark with his Ursus Shock attack.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama no Itami wa Waga Itami - Zoro Kesshi no Tatakai (仲間の痛みは我が痛み ゾロ決死の戦い)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: My Crewmate's Pain is My Pain, Zoro Fights Prepared to Die
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: In the aftermath of Kuma's attack, only Zoro is left standing, and attacks Kuma in a last ditch attempt at saving Luffy, only to discover that the Shichibukai has metal parts underneath his clothing. Kuma reveals that he is a prototype Pacifista, a cyborg created by Dr. Vegapunk. Accepting his defeat, Zoro offers his life in exchange for Luffy's. Sanji awakes and tries to take his place instead, but Zoro knocks him out. Kuma honors his promise by expelling Luffy's pain from his body, telling Zoro that he must take it in and that doing so will kill him. He departs Thriller Bark, musing that Dragon's son has found a very loyal crew. When the rest of the Straw Hats awake, Sanji finds Zoro away from the others, who, despite being covered in a massive amount of blood, insists that nothing happened.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Tōi Hi no Yakusoku - Kaizoku no Uta to Chīsana Kujira (遠い日の約束 海賊の唄と小さなクジラ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Promise on a Day Long Ago - The Pirate's Song and a Tiny Whale
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Everyone is happy that their shadows are back, and Nami is really happy with the pile of treasure they find. The crew carries lots of food with them down to the courtyard. While everyone starts enjoying it two men say they saw what happened to Zoro after everyone else, including Sanji that second time from Zoro, was knocked out. Sanji drags them out and asks what happened. After being told about Zoro risking his life and taking in all of Luffy’s pain from their voyage so far, he makes them swear not to tell anyone, especially Luffy since he would get sad at the thought that all the pain he took for his crewmate was in one of them. Everyone starts partying and Luffy tries to feed Zoro, still knocked out from taking all of his pain, some rum but Chopper won’t let him. Brook plays the piano and everyone starts partying. Luffy asks once again if Brook wants to join the crew seeing he got his shadow back. Brook declines again, saying that he made a promise to Laboon the whale. Luffy then tells Brook he doesn’t need to worry and that Laboon’s fine. Brook starts crying with happiness and has a flashback to when he first met Laboon.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Burukku no Kako - Yōki na Nakama Kanashiki Wakare (ブルックの過去 陽気な仲間悲しき別れ)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Brook's Past - Sad Farewell to the Cheerful Friend
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Brook recalls his past, when the whale Laboon started following his pirate ship and befriended the crew. When the crew headed toward the Grand Line, they had no choice but to leave Laboon behind because the danger the sea would present to a young whale like him, but Laboon followed them over Reverse Mountain, anyway. Brook and his captain convince Laboon to stay behind, promising that after they traveled through the entire Grand Line and he grew strong enough to follow them, they would come back and bring him on their adventures. They were unable to fulfill the promise, though.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Binkusu no Sake - Kako to Ima o Tsunagu Uta (ビンクスの酒 過去と現在をつなぐ唄)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Bink's Sake - The Song that Connects the Past and Present
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Brook recalls the Rumbar Pirates' journey through the Grand Line, where they faced many dangers but still managed to enjoy themselves. The captain contracted an illness and attempted to leave the Grand Line through the Calm Belt with the other infected crew, leaving Brook in charge of the remaining pirates. The journey continued until some powerful enemies defeated the Rumba Pirates in the Florian Triangle, fatally poisoning them. As they were dying, they sang Binks's Booze one last time, recording it in a Tone Dial in the hopes that Brook would revive with his Devil Fruit power and deliver the shell to Laboon. Back in the present, Brook silently hopes Laboon will wait just a little longer for his return.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Aratana Nakama! Ongakuka - Hanauta no Burukku (新たな仲間！音楽家・鼻唄のブルック)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: A New Crewmate! - The Musician "Humming Brook
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: Brook tells Luffy that he is glad to be alive and asks if he can join the crew, which Luffy approves of. All the Straw Hats are shocked by this, except for Zoro, who is sleeping, and Robin, who knew Luffy would accept him no matter what, but they nevertheless welcome him to the crew. Two days later, Usopp and Franky make a grave for the dead Rumbar Pirates, and Zoro lays the broken Yubashiri at the grave. Nami gets a Biblicard from Lola, which points the way to Lola's mother, a pirate in the New World. Luffy takes out the piece of paper he received from Ace, which is also a Biblicard, and learns that as it is burning and shrinking, Ace's life is in danger. Believing that Ace can get out of trouble on his own, Luffy decides to head onward rather than go to rescue him, and the Straw Hats sail away from Thriller Bark. As the Luffy and his crew sail away, three enormous and mysterious figure appears in the fog, looking over Thriller Bark.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Noro Noro no Kyōi - Gingitsune no Fokushī Futatabi (ノロノロの脅威 銀狐のフォクシー再び)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Noro Noro Menace - Return of Foxy the Silver Fox
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats take a vacation at Spa Island, but while there, encounter Foxy and his crew, who are pursuing two small girls: Lina and her older sister Sayo. The Straw Hats manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates, and learn that they had been pursuing Lina and Sayo for the girls' notebook, which shows their father's research on how to create a special gem, the solution for which can be found on the island. Lina considers her father a liar, but Sayo believes him. Suddenly, Sayo is abducted, and the owner of the island, Doran, says that if they want her back, they must complete the research and find the gem.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Otakara Daisōdatsusen! Hōkai! Supa Airando-gō (お宝大争奪戦！ 崩壊！スパアイランド号)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: The Great Treasure Contest! Collapse! Spa Island
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After Lina reveals that she has searched all over the ship, Luffy decides to destroy the ship in order to find Sayo. The Straw Hats manage to fight off Doran's men, but Doran unveils a large cannon and aims it at Sayo. Sayo tells Lina that their father truly cared for them and believed that his research would bear fruit, and left in order to protect them from his pursuers. The Straw Hats manage to rescue Sayo and destroy Spa Island, and notice that the X on Lina's father's map pointed to an X-shaped underwater volcano opening beneath the island. Several days later, Sayo and Lina complete the gem and send it to the Straw Hats, but as candy rain falls on the Sunny, Luffy accidentally loses it.

Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_jp: Burukku Daifuntō - Shin no Nakama he no Michi Kewashi? (ブルック大奮闘 真の仲間への道険し？)
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_name_en: Brook's Hard Struggle - The Difficult Path to Becoming a True Crewmate?
Thriller Bark Saga.episode_sumary: After reading an account of the various adventures that the Straw Hats have had, Brook resolves to be as much use as he can to prove his worth, but his well-intentioned efforts only manage to annoy or get in the way of the others. Brook then reveals his insecurities to Robin, saying that he will leave the crew if he proves to be only a burden. Robin tells him that she used to feel similarly, until the Straw Hats came to save her at Enies Lobby, and she had finally found her place. Encouraged, Brook later reflects on how he has found his place after decades of being alone, and resolves to do his best so that he can have stories to tell of his own.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Gurand Rain Hanshū Tōtatsu! Reddo Rain (偉大なる航路半周到達！赤い土の大陸)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Arriving at Halfway Through the Grand Line! The Red Line
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After traversing the treacherous Serpent Currents, the Straw Hats finally arrive at the Red Line, signifying that they've sailed halfway around the world and that their voyage is half over. While the crew reflects and takes a well-deserved rest, a sea monster attacks. Luffy easily dispatches it, forcing it to spit up a talking starfish and a genuine Mermaid onto the Sunny's deck.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mugiwara Ichimi Nikushi - Tetsu Kamen no Dyubaru Tōjō (麦わら一味憎し　鉄仮面のデュバル登場)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Hatred of the Straw Hat Crew - Enter Iron Mask Duval
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The Mermaid and starfish, named Camie and Pappug, respectively, thank the Straw Hats for helping them, and Camie offers to give them some Takoyaki (fried octopus), after she meets up with her friend Hacchin as thanks. However, a call from him reveals that he has been kidnapped by the Fishman Macro Gang as bait for her. Luffy decides to rescue him for the Takoyaki, and the crew sets sail for their hideout. En route, they are briefly attacked by the Flying Fish Riders, a gang of ruffians aiding the Macro Gang, who are commanded by a masked man named Duval.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Innen no Saikai! Toraware no Gyojin o Sukuidase (因縁の再会！囚われの魚人を救い出せ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Fated Reunion! Save the Imprisoned Fishman
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Duval bears a grudge against one of the Straw Hats, but it is not known which one. When the Straw Hats reach the hideout, they discover that Hacchin is none other than the octopus Fishman Hatchan, formerly of Arlong's crew. Although reluctant to save him with this new knowledge, Camie convinces the crew to go through with it. However, everything was a trap set by Duval, and the Straw Hats are ambushed by the Flying Fish Riders.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Higeki! Kamen ni Kakusareru Dyubaru no Shinjitsu (悲劇！仮面に隠されたデュバルの真実)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Tragedy! The Truth of the Unmasked Duval
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While the battle between the Straw Hats and the Flying Fish Riders rages on, Zoro frees Hatchan from his cage, and the Fishman in turn saves him from an attack, revealing that he feels bad about their battle at Arlong Park. Meanwhile, Luffy crashes into Duval's hut and catches a glimpse of his unmasked face before being chased back outside. Once outside, Duval reveals that Sanji is the Straw Hat he wants to kill. After Luffy knocks his helmet off, the reason for his hatred is laid bare: Marines and bounty hunters have been relentlessly pursuing him because he looks exactly like the poorly-drawn visage on Sanji's wanted poster!

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Sakuretsu! Sanī-gō no Chōhimitsu Heiki Gaon Hō (炸裂！サニー号の超秘密兵器ガオン砲)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Explosion! The Sunny's Super Secret Weapon: Gaon Cannon
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After the surprising reveal, Duval tells his story of living a peaceful life as a mafioso until Marines and bounty hunters came after him for Sanji's bounty, mistaking him for the Straw Hat, casing him to flee and wear a helmet to hide his face. The Flying Fish Riders attempt to drown Sanji by dragging him underwater, but the cook is saved by the intervention of Camie. Duval then tries to sink the Thousand Sunny by having his men drop a giant anchor on it, but Franky reveals the Chicken Voyage reverse function to dodge it, and then the Gaon Cannon to wipe out most of the Riders. Enraged, Duval orders his pet bison Motobaro to gore Luffy, but Luffy stops the beast by unknowingly using haki, the beast goes wild and then faints, much to everyone's surprise. Sick of everything, Sanji takes things into his own hands, and sends Duval flying into his hut with a faceful of kicks.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Gyojintō o Mezashite Jōriku - Shabondi Shotō (魚人島を目指して上陸　シャボンディ諸島)
