Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Landing to Get to Fishman Island - The Sabaody Archipelago
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: With the Flying Fish Riders taken care of, the Straw Hats rest as Hatchan treats them to the promised Takoyaki. Duval shows up again, not for revenge, but to thank Sanji since his kicks altered Duval's face to become handsome and suave, or so he thinks. To make up for the trouble he's caused, he leaves his Den Den Mushi number with the Straw Hats in case they may need his assistance before departing with the newly christened Rosy Life Riders. The Sunny sets sail for the Sabaody Archipelago, the stepping stone to Fishman Island. Hatchan explains that one needs to have their ship coated with a bubble resin in order to travel underwater, and once they reach Sabaody, he promises to find them a ship coater that he trusts. He also warns them that the world nobility will be on the island, and no matter what happens, not to touch them, even if they witness a murder.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Bōgyaku! Shabondi no Shihaisha Tenryūbito (暴虐！シャボンディの支配者天竜人)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Tyranny! The Rulers of Sabaody, the Celestial Dragons
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The crew splits up in order to explore the archipelago. Hatchan, Camie, and Pappug lead Luffy, Chopper, and Brook to find the mechanic Hatchan spoke of. In town, they witness a disturbance caused by a man claiming to be an escaped slave yelling for help in getting an iron collar off. To the Straw Hats' horror, the collar explodes, severely injuring the man. Two people wearing gaudy clothing and bubble helmets, Saint Roswald and his daughter Saint Shalulia arrive and callously shoots his body twice before leaving him for the Marines to pick up. Pappag later explains that they were part of the Celestial Dragons, descendants of the founders of the World Government and that they have the power to summon one of the three Admirals if they so please.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Aratana Raibaru Shūketsu! Jūichinin no Chōshinsei (新たなライバル集結！11人の超新星)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: New Rivals Gather! The 11 Supernovas
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After fighting their way through bounty hunters, Luffy's group arrives at a bar owned by a woman named Shakuyaku, an old friend of Hatchan's. The mechanic, Rayleigh, is not there, so Shakky suggests that they go searching for him at the Sabaody Amusement Park, but not before warning them to be careful, as right now there are nine other pirates on the Archipelago with bounties over 100,000,000. In addition to Luffy and Zoro, they are: Capone Gang Bege, Jewelry Bonney, Basil Hawkins, Eustass Kid, Scratchmen Apoo, Dies Drake, Urouge, Killer, and Trafalgar Law. Together, the group is known as the Eleven Supernovas.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hyōteki wa Keimī!! Semaru Hito Sarai-ya no Mashu (標的はケイミー！！迫る人攫い屋の魔手)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Target is Camie!! The Kidnappers' Evil Draws Near
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While walking through the groves, Zoro encounters another Celestial Dragon, Saint Charloss, harassing a group of townspeople. A fight almost breaks out, but Jewelry Bonney intervenes and tricks Charloss into thinking he killed him, after which she angrily berates him for picking a fight and almost getting an Admiral sent to the archipelago. Meanwhile, Luffy's group get caught up at the Sabaody Amusement Park, and Camie ends up getting kidnapped by a group of slavers. When the Straw Hats still on board the Sunny learn of this, Sanji decides to call the Flying Fish Riders.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Keimī o Sukue - Shotō ni Nokoru Ankoku no Rekishi (ケイミーを救え 諸島に残る暗黒の歴史)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Rescue Camie - The Dark History of the Archipelago
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Duval and his crew arrive on the archipelago and start gathering the Straw Hats up to bring them to the Human Auction House, where the kidnappers have brought Camie. Robin tells Nami why the Fishmen and Merpeople are not welcome on the island as in the past they had been discriminated against and classified as just fish. At the auction house itself await Saint Roswald and Saint Shalulia, as well as Trafalgar Law, Eustass Kid, and their crews. Backstage are Camie and the other human merchandise, including the coating mechanic, Silvers Rayleigh, former first mate of Gold Roger himself.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Taimu Rimitto - Ningen Ōkushon Kaimaku (タイムリミット 人間オークション開幕)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Time Limit - The Human Auction Begins
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The human auction finally begins, and it is only then that the Straw Hats discovered that their mermaid friend is being sold off at Grove 1. After rendezvousing there (save for Zoro, Luffy, Brook, and Robin), their initial plan to extract Camie is thwarted upon learning that the World Government and the Celestial Dragons are involved in the slave trade, so Nami decides that they'll buy Camie back in the auction itself. Meanwhile, the rest of the archipelago receives news that the World Government is going to execute the captured Portgas D. Ace, a move that could provoke a war with Whitebeard.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Tekken Sakuretsu! Ōkushon o Buttsubuse (鉄拳炸裂！オークションをぶっつぶせ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Fist Explodes! Destroy the Auction
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The auction continues, but Saint Charloss arrives and ruins the Straw Hats' plan to buy Camie back by placing an exorbiant bid on her. The proceedings are then interupted when Luffy and his Flying Fish crash into the auction house, but he is restrained from rushing the stage by Hatchan, who accidentally reveals his Fishman nature in the process. While the nobility recoils in disgust, Charloss shoots him, gloating about obtaining a Fishman slave. Luffy snaps and punches the man in the face.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Dai Panikku! Ōkushon Kaijō no Shitō (大パニック！オークション会場の死闘)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Huge Panic! Struggle in the Auction Hall
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: In the aftermath of Luffy's punch, a fight breaks out in the auction hall between the staff, the Celestial Dragon's bodyguards, and the Straw Hats, aided by the arrivals of Usopp, Brook, and Robin. A freed Rayleigh then emerges from backstage, and ends the conflict by using a mysterious power to render the Straw Hats' enemies unconscious.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Taishō Kizaru Ugoku! Sōzen Shabondi Shotō (大将黄猿動く！騒然シャボンディ諸島)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Admiral Kizaru Moves! The Sabaody Archipelago in Chaos
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Rayleigh manages to free Camie from her chains; the power he used to knock out the enemy fighters revealed to be derived from the force of his spirit. The way out of the auction house is blocked by the Marines, so Luffy, Kid, and Law decide to clear them out, Kid revealing a magnetism-based Devil Fruit, and Law one involving spatial manipulation. Sengoku hears the news of the incident at Mariejois, and Admiral Kizaru offers to deal with it, saying that it will not take him any time at all to quell the violence.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hōim Ami o Toppaseyo! Kaigun VS Sannin no Senchō (包囲網を突破せよ！海軍VS三人の船長)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Break Through the Encirclement! Marines vs. Three Captains
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Kid, and Law make quick work of the Marines before parting ways, each of them assuring the other that they'll be sure to meet again in the New World. The Straw Hats manage to escape with Rayleigh, Camie, and Hatchan thanks to the help of Duval and his men. The crews of Kid and Law escape from the auction house, but the two groups find their path blocked by Bartholomew Kuma.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rojā to Reirī - Kaizoku Ō to sono Migiude (ロジャーとレイリー　海賊王とその右腕)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Roger and Rayleigh - The Pirate King and His Right Hand
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats make their way back to Shakky's bar. There, Rayleigh tells them the story of Gold Roger. Roger was suffering from a fatal illness, and so he decided to turn himself in to the World Government, and started the Great Pirate Era on his death scaffold of Loguetown. Luffy turns down an offer of information on One Piece, since he feels that it would ruin the excitement of their adventure to find it. Rayleigh then tells them that the ship coating process will take three days to complete, so the crew decides to split up and lay low until the Celestial Dragon incident blows over, each getting a Vivre Card from Rayleigh. Meanwhile, Admiral Kizaru finally makes his appearance on the archipelago.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaihi Fukanō!? Taishō Kizaru no Kōsoku no Keri!! (回避不可能！？大将黄猿の光速の蹴り！！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Impossible to Avoid!? Admiral Kizaru's Speed of Light Kick!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After failing to make contact with his subordinate Sentomaru, Kizaru uses light-based Devil Fruit powers to attack a fleeing horde of pirates before encountering Hawkins and Urouge who is apparently engaged another Kuma in combat , the former of which reveals voodoo doll powers while the latter mysteriously bulks up in size. Elsewhere, Bonney reveals an age-manipulating Devil Fruit while Capone reveals his nature as a human fortress. The crews of Kid and Law struggle against their Kuma, while the Straw Hats encounter yet another Kuma, though Zoro notes that there's something odd about him.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Attōteki! Kaigun no Sentō Heiki Pashifisuta (圧倒的！海軍の戦闘兵器パシフィスタ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Overwhelming! The Marine Combat Weapon Pacifista
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats continue their fight, realizing that they are not fighting Kuma, but a robotic duplicate. At the scene of Urouge's battle with the other Kuma, X. Drake reveals that the Kuma copies are cyborg clones of Kuma called Pacifista. Kizaru easily takes out Urouge, Drake, and Hawkins, despite Drake possessing a Zoan that allows him to transform into a dinosaur, and Hawkins using his straw Devil Fruit to turn himself into a scarecrow-like monster. Apoo, who had until then been watching the battle, uses a sound-based Devil Fruit to blow Kizaru up, but the Admiral reforms and takes him out too, as he has the power of the Logia, Pika Pika no Mi.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Saranaru Kyōteki Arawaru! Masakari Katsuida Sentōmaru (さらなる強敵現る！鉞かついだ戦桃丸)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Another Strong Enemy Appears! Broadaxe-Wielding Sentomaru
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After taking a massive amount of punishment, the Straw Hats' Pacifista finally goes down after Luffy grinds it into the ground with Gigant Rifle. But the crew gets no rest, as they are immediately attacked by Sentomaru, an axe-toting man who is both Kizaru's subordinate and the bodyguard of Dr. Vegapunk. With him is another Pacifista, and he himself is strong enough to harm Luffy despite his rubber body. The crew tries to flee, but their luck only gets worse as they run into Kizaru, who decides to finish off the weakened Zoro first.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Taishō Kizaru no Mōkō - Mugiwara Ichimi Zettaizetsumei! (大将黄猿の猛攻 麦わら一味絶体絶命！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Admiral Kizaru's Fierce Attack - The Straw Hat Crew's Desperate Situation!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Kizaru is prevented from killing Zoro thanks to the sudden appearance of Rayleigh, who is able to deflect his lasers. Facing a hopeless situation, the Straw Hats try yet again to flee, but are trapped by Sentomaru and his Pacifista, and Chopper resorts to using Monster Point. Elsewhere, Law and Kid finally manage to take down their Pacifista, but it reactivates and stands back up. Back with with Straw Hats, the real Kuma finally makes his appearance, and uses his powers to vanish Zoro before everyone's eyes.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kiesareta Nakama-tachi - Mugiwara Ichimi Saigo no Hi (消された仲間たち 麦わら一味最後の日)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Disappearing Crew - The Final Day of the Straw Hat Crew
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sentomaru lets out that Kuma's powers send people flying through the air for days, and that Luffy should give up on ever seeing Zoro again. Kuma's motivations become questionable when he vanishes the Pacifista, gives Rayleigh some secret information, and refuses to explain himself to Kizaru. He then goes after each of the Straw Hats, vanishing them one-by-one before Luffy's helpless eyes. Brook falls trying to protect Usopp and Sanji, Usopp falls as he tries to get away, Sanji falls when he attacks in retaliation, Franky falls when he tries to get past Kuma, Nami falls as she pleads to Luffy for help, Chopper falls as he continues his mindless rampage, and Robin falls as she tries to flee. Luffy breaks down sobbing at the realization that he's alone and he failed his crew, as Kuma tells him that they will never meet again before vanishing him too. The Straw Hat Pirates have been completely annihilated.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen - Rufi-Oyabun Futatabi Kenzan (時代劇特別編 ルフィ親分再び見参)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Special Historical Arc - Boss Luffy Appears Again
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: In Grand Jipang a race is about to be held where a team carries a portable shrine to the finish line. The prize is the chance to see a legendary treasure that is said to grant wishes. The deziens of the Kazeguruma restaurant sign up, entrusting the craftsman Franky with the construction of their shrine. Usopp also fishes a talking, amnesiac skeleton named Brook from a river. However, the ghostly Thriller Company is working to sabotage the other race teams, and Brook leaves his new friends when he recovers his memories as a former member of the Company. Also this filler introduces a filler only character Omao, who works with Onami at her restaurant.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen - Yabure! Surirā Shōkai no Wana (時代劇特別編 破れ！スリラー商会の罠)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Special Historical Arc - Destroy! Thriller Company's Trap
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Brook goes off to try to defeat the Thriller Company himself, but ends up their captive, but Luffy and Zoro rescue him. The next day is the day of the race, with the Kazagaruma restaurant competing against the Thriller Company. After an intense and destructive race, Kazagaruma emerges victorious, and get to see the legendary treasure: a golden pair of women's underwear.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jōriku! Danshi Kinsei no Shima Amazon Rirī (上陸！男子禁制の島アマゾン・リリー)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Landing! No-Boys-Allowed Island Amazon Lily
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After flying through the air for several days, Luffy finds himself in the middle of a jungle. He tries to use Rayleigh's Vivre Card to find his way back to Sabaody, but only tires himself out. He then kills a boar and eats it, and also eats a mushroom that turns out ot be parasitic and poisons him. His body is then discovered by a young woman named Marguerite and her friends, and mistaking him for a child from their village, they bring him back to treat him, and learn, much to their surprise, that he is a man. Luffy is in the middle of the Calm Belt, on the island of Amazon Lily, home to the all-female Kuja Amazon tribe.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Isoge! Nakama no Moto e - Nyōgashima no Bōken (急げ！仲間のもとへ 女ヶ島の冒険)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Hurry! Back to the Crew - Adventure on the Isle of Women
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy wakes up inside a cage, surrounded by the curious Amazons. Marguerite gives him a new pair of clothes to wear, but then the other Amazons decide to finish him off, as they detest men. They attack Luffy with cannon-strength archery, but he grabs Marguerite and manages to escape into the jungle, where he gets his Vivre card back from her. Although initially distrustful, Marguerite's curiosity gets the better of her and learns that he's a pirate. She reveals that Amazon Lily's empress, Boa Hancock, is in command of an all-female pirate crew, which, unbeknownst to the two, is on its way back to the island.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Minna Meromero! Kaizoku Jotei Hankokku (みんなメロメロ！海賊女帝ハンコック)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Everyone's Drunk on Love! Pirate Empress Hancock
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy attempts to make a raft to leave the island, but utterly fails and has to be saved from drowning by Marguerite. She determines that she's getting too attached to him, and resorts to attacking him with her super-powered archery, which she reveals is the result of Haki, the same power that Rayleigh used to knock out everyone at Sabaody. Luffy is then driven off by the arrival of the other Amazons. Offshore, the ship of Boa Hancock and her two younger sisters is met by a Marine battleship helmed by Vice-Admiral Momonga, who is there to take Hancock, the final Warlord of the Sea to Mariejois in preparation for the battle with Whitebeard. Hancock uses the Mero Mero no Mi to petrify the lovestruck Marines, and tells Momonga that she refuses the order.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Senaka ni Kakusareta Himitsu - Sōgū Rufi to Hebihime (背中に隠された秘密 遭遇ルフィと蛇姫)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Secret Hidden on Their Backs - Luffy Encounters the Snake Princess
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Hancock’s ship reaches Amazon Lily and she returns to her palace. Nyon, a former ruler of the island, urges Hancock to answer the summons in order to keep the treaty that protects her people, but Hancock refuses and throws her out a window. Hancock goes to take a bath, and some of the villagers discuss a legend that states that Hancock and her sisters defeated a Gorgon, but received eyes that turn anyone who looks at them to stone. Luffy, searching for someone from whom he can borrow a ship, falls into the bath. He sees something on Hancock’s back that surprises him, but does not turn him to stone.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hijō no Sabaki! Ishi ni Sareta Māgaretto!! (非情の裁き！石にされたマーガレット！！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Heartless Judgment! Marguerite Turned to Stone!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy looks at Hancock’s back and notes that he saw what was on it before. Hancock tries, but fails to turn him to stone with her powers when he mistakes her Love-Love abilities for Foxy’s Slow-Slow Beam. Luffy tries to escape but gets captured by the Kuja pirates and is brought to the execution arena. Marguerite confesses to bringing him to the island, and Hancock turns her and two of her companions to stone. Enraged at the Kuja’s lack of empathy for Marguerite, Luffy punches out Bakura, the panther sent to execute him. Hancock’s two younger sisters, Sandersonia and Marigold, jump into the arena and using their Devil Fruit powers, transform into snake-women to fight Luffy.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Daikusen! Hebi Shimai no Haki no Chikara!! (ルフィ第苦戦！ヘビ姉妹の覇気の力！！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Hard Trial! The Power of the Snake Sisters' Haki!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy gets the petrified Marguerite and her friends to safety and then fights against Sandersonia and Marigold, but struggles against their Devil Fruit powers and their ability to predict his moves with Haki. When Sandersonia plans on breaking the petrified Marguerite in order to cause Luffy pain, he screams for her to stop, forcing her to stop and causing many of the assembled warriors to faint by using a special and rare kind of Haki Hancock identifies as a “Haōshoku Haki”. With Marguerite safe, Luffy prepares to fight at full power.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nōryoku Zenkai Batoru!! Gomu Gomu vs. Hebi Hebi (能力全開バトル！！ゴムゴムVSヘビヘビ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Battle with Full-Powered Abilities!! Gomu Gomu vs. Hebi Hebi
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy activates Gear Second and gains the upper hand. Desperate to finish him off, Marigold and Sandersonia attempt to finish him off with their strongest moves, but Luffy fights them off and ties their tails together. Marigold’s fire attack accidentally burns the clothes off Sandersonia’s back, prompting Hancock to order everyone to evacuate or risk seeing the “Gorgon Eyes”. Luffy covers the symbol on her back with his body, saying that while she is his enemy, her secret has nothing to do with his fight. Boa Hancock is then moved to tears.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hankokku no Kokuhaku - Shimai no Imawashiki Kako (ハンコックの告白　姉妹の忌まわしき過去)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Hancock's Confession - The Sisters' Disgusting Past
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sandersonia and Marigold concede defeat to Luffy, and Hancock agrees to grant Luffy the choice of getting a ship or saving Marguerite, and he chooses the latter. Luffy is brought to the palace, where Hancock is shocked to learn of Luffy’s attack on the World Noble. Luffy learns that the three sisters were once slaves of the World Nobles, but were freed when Fisher Tiger attacked Mariejois, and that he eventually founded the Sunny Pirates from former slaves. Hancock then grants Luffy use of her ship.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ēsu o Sukue! Arata na Mokutekichi wa Daikangoku (エースを救え！新たな目的地は大監獄)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Rescue Ace! The New Destination is the Great Prison
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Following a party, Luffy learns from Nyon that Hancock is a Warlord of the Sea, and that they have been called together as the Marine is launching an all-out offensive on Whitebeard. When Luffy hears that they are planning on executing his brother Ace at Marineford to lure Whitebeard out, he decides to save him from the prison Impel Down before he’s transported away. The only hope of him getting there in time is for Hancock to answer to the call for the Seven Warlords of the Sea so Luffy can hitch a ride on her ship, but the empress has just caught a disease, and is lying in bed.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Koi wa Harikēn! Meromero Hankokku (恋はハリケーン！メロメロハンコック)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Love is a Hurricane! Hancock in Love
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Nyon discovers that Hancock’s disease is the same one that killed her two predecessors, and has Hancock meet with Luffy. Luffy requests that Hancock take him to Impel Down, and when Hancock agrees, much to everyone’s shock, Nyon realizes that Hancock is in love with Luffy. Hancock boards Momonga’s ship to answer the summons, smuggling Luffy aboard inside her clothes, and de-petrifies the crew before the ship sails to Impel Down. Elsewhere, Sengoku notes that Jinbe, one of the Warlords of the Sea, refuses to fight and is being held in Impel Down, and learns that the 23 ships observing Whitebeard’s flagship have been destroyed. Garp visits Ace in prison.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Tenkō no Kagaku to Karakurishima (仲間達の行方　天候の科学とからくり島)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - Weather Science and Karakuri Island
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy proceeds to Impel Down, but worries about his friends. Nami finds herself on Weatheria, a sky island dedicated to the study of weather, and learns about a special rope that can create winds. She uses the rope with her Clima Tact to stop a storm. Franky ends up on the futuristic Mechanical Island, and is frozen solid in the cold. He is rescued but because there is no cola on the island, is given tea instead and becomes a gentleman.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Kyōdori no Shima to Momoiro no Rakuen! (仲間達の行方　巨鳥の島と桃色の楽園)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - The Island of Giant Birds and the Pink Paradise!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: This episode shows the whereabouts of Chopper and Sanji. Chopper is awoken by humongous birds that want to use him as a toy and when he finally escapes them, the island's natives try to eat him. Meanwhile Sanji awakes in the lap of a beautiful but shy 'woman' on an island that makes everything girly, and when he chases after the woman he notices something strange about this islands people at her house.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Shima o Tsunagu Hashi to Shokunin Shokubutsu (仲間達の行方　島をつなぐ橋と食人植物)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - The Bridge that Connects Islands and Man-Eating Plants
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Robin finds herself on Tequila Wolf, a snow-covered island. She is taken in by Soran, a young girl who works on the island as a slave, and tells her much about the outside world, which she pretends to visit by drawing pictures. Some soldiers break in to find Robin, smashing Soran’s pictures in an attempt to determine her location, and Robin is captured. She learns that she is on an island full of prisoners and citizens of countries that refused to join the World Government, and that she and the others are being forced to build a bridge. Meanwhile, Usopp finds himself on Boin Island, an island full of man-eating plants, with a man named Heracles.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Negatibu Ōjo to Akumaō! (仲間達の行方！ネガティブ王女と悪魔王！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - The Negative Princess and the Devil King!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro finds himself on a gloomy island, the same one that Kuma sent Perona to, in fact. She tries to turn him into one of her cute servants, to his great annoyance. Brook, meanwhile, ends up on an island of cultists who mistake him for Satan himself.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kesshi no Sennyū! Kaitei Kangoku Inperu Daun (決死の潜入！海底監獄インペルダウン)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: A deadly Infiltration! The Underwater Prison Impel Down!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and Hancock arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. Hancock meets two of the prison's staff: the head guard Domino, and the overly ambitious Vice-Warden Hannyabal. Before Hancock can be taken to see the warden though, she must undergo a body-check, something which could expose Luffy.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jigoku de Saikai!? Bara Bara no Mi no Nōryokusha! (地獄で再会！？バラバラの実の能力者！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Reunion in Hell!? The User of the Bara Bara No Mi!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Hancock turns Domino (and the surveillance Den Den Mushi) to stone before she can undergo the body-check, allowing Luffy to escape into the prison. On Level 1, Luffy runs into Captain Buggy, who is trying to escape  the prison.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Yabure! Guren Jigoku - Bagī no Dohade Daisakusen (破れ！紅蓮地獄　バギーのド派手大作戦)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Break through Crimson Hell! Buggys great Uproar Plan
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Buggy is shocked to learn that Luffy is trying to rescue Ace, as he himself only wants to escape Impel Down. However, in exchange for Luffy's armband, in actually a key to the treasure of the pirate Captain John, he decides to stick around long enough to help Luffy reach the next level. Since Buggy's powers make him immune to blades, he and Luffy are easily able to bypass Level 1's razor-sharp grass and reach a pit leading to Level 2. Although fully intending to abandon his companion, Buggy is knocked in after Luffy.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kangoku Saikyō no Otoko! Doku Ningen Mazeran Tōjō (監獄最強の男！毒人間・マゼラン登場)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Prison's strongest Man! Introduction of the Poison-Man Magellan
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Hancock and the others finally reach the office of Magellan, a large man who has eaten the Doku Doku no Mi. Luffy and Buggy meanwhile find Level 2 to be filled with wild animals, but Luffy manages to handle them without too much trouble. Buggy manages to unlock several of the prisoner cells, and the two fugitives are joined by none other than Baroque Works officer agent Mr. 3.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Eiga Rendō Supesharu - Ugokidasu Kinjishi no Yabō (映画連動特別編　動き出す金獅子の野望)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Movie-connected Special: The 'Gold Lion's' Ambition Moves Forward
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Twenty years ago, the legendary pirate Gold Lion Shiki managed to escape Impel Down by cutting off his own legs. In the present, the Straw Hats encounter a giant beetle named Boss, who ends up carrying Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Sanji away to an island called Little East Blue, where immigrants from East Blue live. There, the four Straw Hats are treated like celebrities, and Usopp calls Nami over to join them. The only one who distrusts the Straw Hats is a girl named Yoko, whose father was a Marine. Meanwhile, the Amigo Pirates, under the command of Largo and Corto, receive orders from Shiki's forces to retrieve Boss.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Eiga Rendō Supesharu - Nerawareta Ritoru Īsuto Burū (映画連動特別編　狙われた小さな東の海)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Movie-connected Special: 'Little East Blue' is Targeted
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Yoko observes the five Straw Hats with distrust as they are shown places and sights similar to their old homes. The peace, however, is disrupted by Corto and his men invading the island, demanding that the islanders hand over Boss. Luffy knocks Corto out of the way with ease, but Largo shows up to avenge his brother and reveals his abilities by eating a metal mallet and converting it into a barbwire net and ensnares Luffy with it.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Eiga Rendō Supesharu - Amīgo Kaizokudan no Mōkō (映画連動特別編　アミーゴ海賊団の猛攻)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Movie-connected Special: The Amigo Pirate Crew's Vicious Assault
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Largo reveals that he has eaten the Ami Ami no Mi, which gives him the power to convert materials that he consumes into indestructible nets amd cages. After Zoro and Sanji fall prey to his power, Corto gives the islanders an ultimatum: either hand over Boss, or die. Despite Yoko's pleas, Boss decides to give himself up to save the villagers, but Luffy will not have any of it and his words inspire Boss to shed his skin early to become more powerful. Largo still manages to capture him, but the fight is on, as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji are freed.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Eiga Rendō Supesharu - Kessen! Rufi VS Rarugo (映画連動特別編　決戦！ルフィVSラルゴ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Movie-connected Special: The Decisive Battle! Luffy vs. Largo
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy activates Gear Second in order to fight Largo, but has trouble since Largo's nets simply absorb his blows. However, his Gear Third technique is able to overwhelm the nets, and Luffy finishes the fight by smashing Largo into his own ship. Meanwhile, Nami rallies the villagers to battle, and with Zoro and Sanji's help the Amigo Pirates are defeated. In the aftermath, Nami relates the story of how Luffy saved her from Arlong to Yoko, convincing her that he's not a bad person. The Straw Hats are soon forced to leave Little East Blue before the Log Pose resets, but not before getting one last goodbye from Yoko and Boss. Elsewhere, Gold Lion Shiki receives news of the Amigo Pirates failure to recapture Boss, but decides that the loss of one animal is insignificant, and declares his intention to wage war upon the world.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Toraware no Ōka Shichibukai! Kaikyō no Jinbē (囚われの王下七武海！海侠のジンベエ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Imprisoned Royal Shichibukai! Jinbe, Knight of the Sea
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: With Mr. 3 joining the group, Luffy and his gang confront the beasts of Impel Down's Level 2. Eventually they run into a giant, but simpleminded, Sphinx. Luffy starts messing around with it, and then he, Buggy, Mr. 3, and the Sphinx end up crashing through the floor towards Level 3. Deeper in the prison, Ace's cellmate is revealed to be the Fish-Man Warlord Jinbe, who was imprisoned because he had refused to participate in the war against Whitebeard, and fears what the fate of Fishman Island would be without his protection. His story is only met with scorn by another prisoner, Luffy's former enemy Sir Crocodile, who reminds him that there are many who would wish to take Whitebeard's head.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rōbansha Sarudesu no Wana - Reberu Surī Kiga Jigoku (牢番長サルデスの罠　LV3・飢餓地獄)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Buggy, and Mr. 3 find themselves on Level 3, a barren floor of extreme heat. There, they are caught in a net by Saldeath, the imp-like commander of the Blugori. However, thanks to the interference of the Sphinx, they manage to escape. Buggy and Mr. 3 manage to get away from Luffy, and they encounter the imprisoned Baroque Works agent Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, whose stay in the dungeon has not dampened his spirits one bit.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Tokihanatareta hakuchō! Saikai! Bon Kurē (解き放たれた白鳥！再会！ボン・クレー)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The prison staff and Hancock finally arrive on the floor where Ace is being held. When the prisoners become loud and rowdy, Magellan silences them by attacking with a hydra made from his Devil Fruit's poison, and while everyone is distracted, Hancock manages to tell Ace that Luffy is on his way to save him, surprising him greatly. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to fight his way through Level 3, and encounters a freed Mr. 2. The two friends team up with the intention of heading in even deeper.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shochō Mazeran Ugoku - Kansei! Mugiwara Hōimō (署長マゼラン動く 完成！麦わら包囲網)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Magellan finally receives word of Luffy's break-in, and decides to move his forces to Level 4 and head off Luffy and his companions. Back on Level 3, Mr. 2 reveals that he wants to meet Iva, king of Kamabakka, who is imprisoned on Level 5 as he and Luffy arrive at a giant pit leading to Level 4. The two meet up with Buggy and Mr. 3 again as they are being chased by Minotaurus, a monstrous beast that gave Luffy and Mr. 2 a beating earlier. Though their foe is fat and powerful, by working together the four fugitives are able to take the beast down.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Zensenryoku shūketsu! Reberu Fō - Shōnetsu Jigoku no Kessen (全戦力集結！ LV4·焦熱地獄の決戦)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The escape team end up crashing down to Level 4, a level of blazing heat and molten liquid. There, the group spits up, with Luffy and Mr. 2 going one way while Buggy and Mr. 3 go another. Luffy and Mr. 2 fight their way through the jailers, but end up encountering Magellan himself.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mazeran Tsuyoshi! Bon Kurē Tekizen Tōbō (マゼラン強し！ボン・クレー敵前逃亡)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy begins his fight with Magellan, but is immediately put at a disadvantage thanks to the fact that he cannot even hit the warden thanks to his poison, and Mr. 2 flees the battle. Elsewhere, Mr. 3 and Buggy attempt to break out of Level 4 by challenging Hannyabal and his men. Meanwhile, Luffy activates Gear Second, and, saying that he does not care what happens to him as long as he can reach Ace, hits Magellan anyway, coating his hands in the poison and causing him severe pain.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shiyū Kesu! Sutemi no Rufi Saigo no Ichigeki (雌雄決す！捨て身のルフィ最後の一撃)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Fight Finished! Luffy's Final Life Risking Attack
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Touching Magellan causes Luffy crippling pain, but he continues to fight on despite getting poisoned even more in the process. Meanwhile, Buggy and Mr. 3 are captured by Hannyabal, but Mr. 2 leaps onto the scene to engage the Vice-Warden. Luffy's fight ends with Magellan completely dousing him in poison, saying that nothing is going to save him from death now.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Dachi dakara - Bon Kurē Kesshi no Kyūshutsukō (友達だから　ボン・クレー決死の救出行)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Because He's My Friend - Bon Kurei's Do-or-Die Rescue
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After his defeat, Magellan has the defeated and dying Luffy taken to Level 5. Mr. 2, meanwhile, disguised as Hannyabal, decides to rescue him and take him to meet Iva, in the hopes that he can heal Luffy. He, Buggy, and Mr. 3 then go to Level 5, a place of bitter cold. Buggy and Mr. 3 flee when confronted with fierce wolves prowling the area, but Mr. 2 presses onward and finds Luffy's cell.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jigoku ni Rakuen Inperu Daun Reberu Go ten Go (地獄に楽園 インペルダウンLV5.5)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Paradise in Hell - Impel Down Level 5.5
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After freeing Luffy from his cell, Mr. 2 trudges through Level 5 until he's attacked by the wolves yet again. After the fight, the two are found by a mysterious man and Mr. 2 later wakes up to find himself in a secret prisoner party hall dubbed Level 5.5: New Kama Land, headed by Emporio Ivankov, the very man that Mr. 2 had been searching for.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Chiryō Kaishi Iwa-san Kiseki no Chikara!! (ルフィ治療開始 イワさん奇跡の能力！！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Treatment Begins - Iva's Miraculous Power!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After regaining his bearings, Mr. 2 learns from Ivankov that he and Luffy had been brought to New Kama Land ten hours ago. Impressed by Luffy's will, Ivankov used the powers of his Devil Fruit, the Horu Horu no Mi, to inject him with chemicals that will rid his body of Magellan's poison. However, it is an extremely agonizing process, and the chances of Luffy actually surviving it is incredibly low.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kiseki o Shinjite! Bon Kurē Tamashī no Seien (奇跡を信じて！ボン・クレー魂の声援)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Believe in Miracles! Bon Kurei Cheers From His Heart
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Mr. 2 learns from Ivankov that there is an additional level beneath Level 5, Level 6 where some of the most vile criminals in history are kept. That is where Ace is being held. Mr. 2 then cheers Luffy on during his procedure, and after several hours, Luffy's treatment finishes much sooner than expected.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Fukkatsu! Iwa-san Datsugoku Keikaku Shidō!! (ルフィ復活！イワさん脱獄計画始動！！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy Revives! Iva-san's Jailbreak Plan Begins!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After Luffy revives, Ivankov is shocked to discover that he is the son of the revolutionary Dragon. Being a revolutionary himself, Ivankov offers to help Luffy rescue Ace, and after using his powers to give Luffy an energy boost, he, Luffy, and an underling named Inazuma break for Level 6 to reach Ace before he can be transferred out.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ēsu Gosō Kaishi - Saikasō Reberu Shikkusu no Kōbō! (エース護送開始 最下層LV6の攻防！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Ace's Convoy Starts - The Offense and Defense of the Lowest Level, Level 6!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy, Ivankov, and Inazuma reach Level 6, but they are too late as Ace has already been handed over to the Marines. Inazuma uses his Devil Fruit power, the Choki Choki no Mi in order to prevent them from being gassed, and Luffy resolves to head to Marineford to rescue Ace there. They end up trapped on Level 6, however, but another prisoner offers to help them out, and that prisoner is none other than Luffy's nemesis Sir Crocodile.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Saikyō Chīmu Kessei - Shinkan! Inperudaun (最強チーム結成 震撼！インペルダウン)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Strongest Team is Formed - Shake Impel Down to it's Core!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy reluctantly has Crocodile freed after Ivankov promises to make sure he does not do anything to betray them. Jinbe joins the escape team as well, and the New Kamas and everyone start their grand jailbreak while Luffy, Crocodile, and Jinbe go ahead of the others and engage the enemy on Level 4. Crocodile also seeks out and frees his old henchman, Mr. 1.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Saranaru Konran! Kurohige Tīchi Shūrai! (さらなる混乱！黒ひげ・ティーチ襲来)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Even More Chaos! Blackbeard Teach Invades
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While Luffy and his allies fight on Level 4, Buggy and Mr. 3 start another uprising on Level 2, but are soon put down by Magellan. The mayhem is only increased when the Blackbeard Pirates unexpectedly invade Impel Down as well. Faced with this unprecedented crisis, Magellan has Shiryu of the Rain released from his cell in order to deal with them.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kiken na Deai! Kurohige to Ame no Shiryū (危険な出会い！黒ひげと雨のシリュウ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: A Dangerous Meeting! Blackbeard and Shiryu of the Rain
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: There is a riot at level 4, and the Jailer Beasts fight the Newkama army. But then, the six strongest fighters of the Newkama set up their plan to take out the thrash called Jailer Beasts. As they shoot down the Jailer Beasts, they fail in ways of power, and the enemies break free. Then the escapees; Luffy, Crocodile and Jinbe go head on at the Jailer Beasts; Minokoala, Minorhinoceros and Minozebra. Emporio Ivankov goes face to face with Sadi-chan and the Blugori of Saldeath. Mr. 1 and Inazuma team up, taking out guards on their way following Luffy and co. Back at level 2, Buggy and Mr. 3 have no return as they are blocked by Magellan's poison. Impel Down gets even more disgraced as the Blackbeard Pirates cause a scene at level 1, which Shiryu must overpower. Though both the forces appear to be not wounded, they have gone away from each other. Meanwhile at level 4, Hannyabal gets serious, going straight ahead on Luffy.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Iji demo Taorenu! Honki no Hannyabaru (意地でも倒れぬ！本気のハンニャバル)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: His Spirit Won't Break! Hannyabal Goes All Out
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy makes short work of Hannyabal who tries to stop the attempted escapees. But then Blackbeard shows up and there's a confrontation between them.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ikari no Jetto Pisutoru - Rufi tai Kurohige (怒りのJETピストル　ルフィVS黒ひげ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Jet Pistol of Rage - Luffy vs. Blackbeard
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Although Luffy wants a proper battle with Blackbeard, Jinbe reminds him there's no time for that as Ace's execution will occur in only a few short hours. Regretfully Luffy moves on, but Magellan is hot on their heels, and ignores Blackbeard's crew, who he disposes of quickly.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mazeran o Tomero! Iwa-san Ōgi Sakuretsu (マゼランを止めろ！イワさん奥義炸裂)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Stop Magellan! Iva-san Unleashes His Secret Attack
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy and the other prisoners are getting closer to the surface, having made it through levels 3 and 2. However, in order to stall Magellan, who is quickly catching up, both Ivankov and Inazuma stay behind. Inazuma cuts down the stairs from Levels 3 to 2, and Ivankov stays to fight Magellan with his "Newkama Kenpo". Despite his best efforts, he is ultimately defeated by Magellan, and later, Magellan manages to get to Level 2, and poisons Inazuma as well. Meanwhile, Luffy meets up with Buggy, Galdino and the other rioters and easily defeats the Jailer Beasts (who had used the elevator to reach Level 1) once again, only to be confronted by the furious Magellan, who has finally caught up to put an end to the potential breakout.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mazeran no Kisaku! Habamareta Datsugoku Keikaku (マゼランの奇策！はばまれた脱獄計画)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Magellan's Clever Scheme! The Jailbreak Plan is Obstructed
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Magellan reaches level 2 and Luffy heads back to avenge the fallen Inazuma and Ivankov. He is stopped by Mr. 2, who reminds him what happened last time he tried to battle the Chief Warden. Magellan blasts a Hydra at the escapees. Just before Luffy is poisoned a second time, Mr. 3 shows up and uses a Candle Wall to block the poison. Crocodile comments Mr. 3 is not so useless after all. Jinbe overhears the conversation between Magellan and some guards. Mr. 2 and Mr. 1 team up and take down the guards with ease. Meanwhile, Luffy and Mr. 3 team up with some escapees who shoot Magellan. Although the bullets just barrage through him (though not being a Logia, but a Paramecia), Magellan gets hurt. Mr. 3 armors Luffy's fists and feet so the latter can finally attack Magellan. The two get in a fight between venom and wax

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Datsugoku Chīmu Zettaizetsumei - Kinjite 'Benomu Dēmon' (脱獄チーム絶体絶命 禁じ手"毒の巨兵")
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Jailbreak Team Driven Into a Corner - Forbidden Move 'Venom Demon'
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Jinbe, Crocodile and Mr. 1 finally secure a Marine vessel to escape with, meanwhile Luffy continues his fight against Magellan with the assistance of Mr. 3's Doru Doru no Mi powers. Although at first the pair are confident they can beat the Warden with their combined abilities, Magellan - seeing the situation is becoming desperate - unleashes his ultimate technique, Venom Demon: Jigoku no Shinpan which is so toxic it can even poison Mr. 3's wax. With Luffy's wax armor rendered useless, the remaining escapees flee to the entrance with Magellan directly behind them. It is then that Ivankov, who managed to partially heal himself with the Horu Horu no Mi, comes bursting through the ground with Inazuma using Hell Wink. By clinging onto Ivankov's enlarged head while he uses another Hell Wink, Luffy and the others are finally able to breakout of Impel Down and be carried to the captured Marine ship by a school of Whale Sharks summoned by Jinbe, all seconds before being caught by Magellan who stares on in disbelief.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Okose Saigo no Kiseki - Seigi no Mon o Toppaseyo (起こせ最後の奇跡 正義の門を突破せよ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Cause the Last Miracle - Breaking Through the Gate of Justice
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Mr. 2 puts himself on the line to save Luffy and the others by disguising himself as Warden Magellan, but in doing so sacrifices any chance of his own escape as the real Magellan corners him in the control room for the Gate of Justice.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mezase Kaigun Honbu - Ēsu Kyūshutsu e no Funade (目指せ海軍本部 エース救出への船出！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Destination is Marine Headquarters - The Ship Sets Out to Rescue Ace!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Shiryu saves Blackbeard and his crew by giving them antidotes to Magellan's poison before taking the opportunity to join with them. The prisoners celebrate their escape, but some, such as Buggy, are upset to learn from a Marine officer calling on a Den Den Mushi that they are on their way to Marine Headquarters, and that the Gates of Justice to Marine Headquarters will not open for pirates. During the conversation, the officer reveals Buggy's past in the Roger Pirates and connections to Shanks, causing the prisoners to rally behind him. While some of the escapees are concerned that Buggy will start a mutiny, Buggy manages to convince the prisoners to go with them to Marine Headquarters in the hopes of defeating Whitebeard and standing on top of the pirate world. Meanwhile, the ship carrying Ace reaches Marine Headquarters.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Wezaria Repōto to Saibōgu Animaru (仲間達の行方 空島リポートと改造動物)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - Weatheria Report and Cyborg Animals
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: As Luffy's ship heads to Marine Headquarters, the scene shifts to a point some time in the past. Nami is still on Weatheria, which slowly heads toward Sabaody Archipelago at a pace determined by the winds. She sees the old man demonstrate his ability to summon large rains and store thunderstorms in soap bubbles. Meanwhile, Franky is still acting like a gentleman under the effects of the tea, and the boy with him wonders when cola will arrive to return him to normal. Franky is attacked by several cyborgs in the forest, causing the tea in him to bubble over and restoring his usual personality, which enables him to defeat the cyborgs with ease. Franky learns that Dr. Vegapunk, who modified Kuma, made the cyborgs, and reaches a house with Vegapunk's name on it, triggering an alarm as he goes in.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Kyochō no Hina to Momoiro no Taiketsu (仲間達の行方 巨鳥のヒナと桃色の対決)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - Giant Bird Chicks and a Pink Showdown
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sanji desperately tries to escape the crossdressers of Kamabakka Kingdom, until he eventually encounters Caroline, the "queen" stand-in for Ivankov. He challenges Caroline to a duel to get off the island, but is unable to land a hit due to wanting to protect his modesty, and is eventually induced to start crossdressing. Meanwhile, Chopper cares for an injured bird chick, hoping that she can take him to the Sabaody Archipelago when she can fly. Humans corner Chopper and the chick on a cliff, hoping to eat them, until the bird's mother rescues Chopper by pushing him off a cliff and saves her child. Chopper is grateful, but then realizes he has no idea when the bird will be able to fly.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Kakumei-gun to Bōshoku no Mori no Wana! (仲間達の行方 革命軍と暴食の森の罠！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - The Revolutionary Army and the Forest of Gluttony's Trap!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Robin is imprisoned in a tower on Tequila Wolf and interrogated for information on the whereabouts of the Straw Hats, but her captors keep her true identity a secret. Soran meets with the woman who betrayed Robin, who regrets what she did to survive, and sets out to thank Robin. Some revolutionaries start to rise up and release Robin from her cell, allowing her to defeat some guards and join them to save the prisoners. Meanwhile, on Bowin Island, Usopp is constantly being attacked by animals and plants, as he is the weakest life form on the island, and Hercules tells him to eat in order to get stronger. Not hearing his advice to also work out, he eats as much as he can, and barely avoids being eaten by the island itself when the ground tilts and drops many fat animals into a strange mouth-like hole.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama-tachi no Yukue - Kyodai na Bohyō  to Pantsu no On (仲間達の行方 巨大な墓標とパンツの恩)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Crewmates' Whereabouts - The Giant Gravestone and Panties of Gratitude
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While heading to the sea to return to the Sabaody Archipelago, Zoro and Perona stumble upon a surprising discovery. Brook, however, decides he has to wait to find Luffy and the others until he can fulfill his debt to the people of Harahettania.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Marinfōdo Chokuzen Kaisou Supesharu - Kyōdai no Chikai! (海軍本部直前回想特別編 兄弟の誓い！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Special Retrospective Before Marineford - The Siblings' Vow!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy recalls his childhood with Ace, meeting him again in Alabasta and receiving his Vivre Card, meeting Blackbeard in Jaya without knowing who he was, hearing the news about Ace's execution, and confronting Blackbeard in Impel Down. Ace, awaiting his execution in Marineford, recalls his encounter with Blackbeard.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Marinfōdo Chokuzen Kaisou Supesharu - Shūketsu! San Taishō (海軍本部直前回想特別編 集結! 三大将)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Special Retrospective Before Marineford - Assemble! The Three Admirals
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While Luffy's on his way to rescue Ace, everyone at Marine Headquarters get's ready for the execution. The present Warlords of the Sea and the three admirals are summoned to get ready for Whitebeard's attack. At every instance a Warlord or admiral is introduced, there is a series of recap clips related to that character, with the exception of Akainu who is still a mysterious entity.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kessen no Koku Semaru! Kaigun Saikyō no Fujin Kansei! (決戦の刻迫る！ 海軍最強の布陣完成！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Time of the Decisive Battle Draws Near! The Marine's Strongest Battle Formation is Ready!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace reaches the scaffold in Marineford, where the Marines assemble for Whitebeard's assault. Meanwhile, Luffy's ship approaches the Gates of Justice, blocking his path through Marineford. After Ace finally reaches the execution platform, Sengoku asks who his father is, but Ace insists that Whitebeard is his father. However, Sengoku reveals to the world via Den Den Mushi that Ace's mother is Portgas D. Rouge, who had him inside her womb for 20 months and he took his mother's surname to become a pirate himself. He also reveals that Ace is the son of the Pirate King, Gold Roger, much to the horror of Ace, the Marines and the reporters.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kyodai Kantai Arawaru - Shūrai! Shirohige Kaizoku-dan (巨大艦隊あらわる　襲来！ 白ひげ海賊団)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: An Enormous Fleet Appears - Invasion! The Whitebeard Pirates
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While the Marines are waiting for Whitebeard's assault and Ace's execution, Garp has a flashback: months before Gold Roger was executed, he revealed to Garp that he is having a child and told Garp to look over the child. The Marines searched for any people who are connected to Roger. Portgas D. Rouge, Ace's mother, kept the child inside her womb months after his execution. However, after Rouge gave birth to the child, a boy whom she named Gol D. Ace, she died of exhaustion. Ace was raised by Garp and Dadan soon after. Garp also introduced Luffy to Ace and they befriended each other. During Sengoku's execution speech, he receives word that the Gates of Justice has been opened without an order, allowing Luffy's ship to pass through. After Whitebeard's fleet appears for the assault, the Moby Dick appears from underwater in front of the execution platform.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kessen no Makuake! Ēsu to Shirohige no Kako (決戦の幕開け！ エースと白ひげの過去)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Beginning of the Battle! Ace and Whitebeard's Past
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Whitebeard reveals his Devil Fruit powers in front of the Marines. Whitebeard and Ace's past are shown: Ace was the captain of the Spade Pirates. Ace confronts Jinbe to meet Whitebeard since Ace turned down an offer to become a Warlord. Soon after Whitebeard offered Ace to join his crew when his battle has ended, Ace attempted to kill Whitebeard to no avail. Whitebeard allowed Ace to become division commander. However, when Blackbeard turned against the crew and killed Thatch, Ace left Whitebeard on a mission to capture Blackbeard. When Ace tells Whitebeard on the execution platform that he ignored his advice, Whitebeard says that he was the one who sent Ace on the mission when in fact he told him not to go, doing this to cover for Ace's mistake and make his rescue seem justified.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Sekai o Horobosu Chikara! Gura Gura no Mi no Nōryoku (世界を滅ぼす力！ グラグラの実の能力)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Power to Destroy the World! The Gura Gura no Mi's Ability
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Whitebeard and his allies declare to the Marines and the Warlords of the Sea their determination to rescue Ace, while Luffy and his group continue to reach Marineford. A tsunami approaches Marineford on both sides as a result of Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi abilities. However, Aokiji stops the two waves with his Hie Hie abilities by freezing them and the central bay. The Whitebeard division commanders leap into action, as do the Vice-Admirals. Mihawk then steps up and launches a large slash attack towards Whitebeard.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Subete o Yakitsukusu! Taishō Akainu no Chikara (すべてを焼き尽くす！ 大将赤犬の能力)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Burn Everything to Ash! Admiral Akainu's Power
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Jozu manages to withstand Mihawk's slash with his Devil Fruit power, which turns his body into diamond. Kizaru attempts to attack Whitebeard, but Marco blocks the attack by turning into a phoenix with his Devil Fruit power, and knocks Kizaru back. Jozu digs out a large chunk of the ice and tosses it toward the Marines, but Akainu melts it with his magma-based Devil Fruit power. Akainu counterattacks with his power, sinking one of Whitebeard's ships, but Whitebeard effortlessly extinguishes the magma. While the Marines and the Whitebeard pirates fight on the ice, Koby and Helmeppo start becoming scared, as many Marines more powerful than they have been taken down easily. Little Oars Jr., a descendant of the original Oars steps forward to force his way through the Marine defenses and save Ace, whom he views as a close friend.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Majin no Shison! Ritoru Ōzu Junia Bakushin! (魔人の子孫！ リトルオーズJr.驀進！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Devil's Descendant! Little Oars Jr. Dashes Off!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Oars Jr. forces his way into the plaza, overturning one of the Marine ships and defeating the Giant Unit, enabling the Whitebeard Pirates to advance. He continues despite Ace's protests that he is too large of a target and recalls the time Ace made him a hat that protected him from the weather. Kuma blasts Oars with Ursus Shock, Doflamingo cuts off his leg, and Moria impales him with Tsuno Tokage, causing him to collapse while trying to reach out to Ace.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shōsha dake ga Seigi - Hatsudō! Sengoku no Sakusen! (勝者だけが正義 発動！センゴクの作戦！)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Only the Winner is Justice - Put Into Motion! Sengoku's Plan!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Oars Jr. tries to reach towards Ace, but is unable to and falls down. Vice Admiral Ronse launched a sneak attack at Whitebeard, but was easily defeated by a quake punch. Whitebeard ordered his solders to storm the plaza. Koby and Helmeppo run inside Marinefold to escape the battle, but witness Akainu kill a marine for doing so. Sengoku tells the strategy of forgetting about the time and executing Ace to all the marines, and Koby and Helmeppo also hear it. They witness something falling from the sky, which happens to be Luffy and the escaped prisoners from Impel Down.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mugiwara Chīmu Tōchaku - Fūun Kyū o Tsugeru Senjō (麦わらチーム到着 風雲急を告げる戦場)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Straw Hat Team Arrives — The Battlefield Grows More Intense
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: In a flashback, the tsunami Whitebeard created rushes toward Luffy's Marine ship. They attempt to ride the wave, but get stuck on the top when Aokiji freezes it. After hearing a report that Ace's execution will happen early, they attempt to break free, but fall into the hole Jozu created. Luffy checks to see that Ace is still alive, then stops Crocodile from attacking Whitebeard. Whitebeard notices that Luffy has Shanks' hat, and Luffy, undaunted by Whitebeard's power or reputation, tells him that he will rescue Ace and become Pirate King.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shindemo Tasukeru - Rufi tai Kaigun Batoru Sutōto (死んでも助ける ルフィVS海軍戦闘開始)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: I'll Save You Even If I Die - Luffy vs. The Marines, The Battle Starts
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy charges forward to save Ace, fighting off the marines in the way. Admiral Kizaru attacks him with a beam of light, but Ivankov saves him, only to get attacked by Kuma, whom he claims to know. Luffy encounters Jango and Fullbody; Jango accidentally hypnotizes himself and Fullbody, and Luffy barely escapes from Hina using Gear Second. Elsewhere, the Whitebeard Pirates are having difficulty getting past the Vice-Admirals, and Squard attempts to sneak past, only to encounter someone. Moria attacks with a group of zombies, halting Luffy's progress, while Marine reinforcements come in. Ace yells that Luffy must not try to save him, saying that he cannot bear to be saved by a weakling, while actually not wanting Luffy to die. However, Luffy tells him he does not care, and will save Ace even if he dies. As Jinbe arrives, defeating Moria's zombies with a blast of salt water, and Luffy defeats a giant officer with Gear Third, Sengoku reveals to the Marines that Luffy is the son of Revolutionary Dragon.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Gekisen no Renzoku! Nōryokusha Gundan VS Nōryokusha Gundan (激戦の連続! 能力者軍団VS能力者軍団)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Consecutive Battles! Devil Fruit User Army vs. Devil Fruit User Army
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace is still upset that the Whitebeard Pirates and Luffy are still trying to save him, but decides to accept whether he lives or dies. Whitebeard tricks Buggy into helping him, noting that despite being weak, he has powerful followers who could pose a threat. Whitebeard, sensing that the Marines have a plan when the forces in front of them fall back, orders the ships under his command to attack the Marine ships flanking him. Jinbe fights with Moria and defeats him even when he steals several shadows to increase his power. Smoker attacks Luffy and manages to pin him down, but Hancock, angered by him attacking Luffy, attacks him and manages to kick him despite his Logia powers with her Haki. Ivankov encounters Kuma, saying they knew each other. However, Doflamingo reveals to Ivankov that the Kuma he knew is dead.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kuma ni Okita Ihen - Iwa-san Ikari no Ichigeki (クマに起きた異変 イワさん怒りの一撃)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Kuma Causes Disaster — Iva-san’s Angry Attack
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Doflamingo tells Ivankov that Kuma had slowly been modified into a Pacifista over time, and a few days ago, had his brain replaced, completely losing his personality and free will in the process. Luffy receives the key to Ace's handcuffs from Hancock, who then fantasizes about a wedding ceremony held on Amazon Lily between herself and Luffy with the entire Kuja tribe witnessing. Ivankov fights against Kuma while Luffy continues to advance up the battlefield. Crocodile defeats multitudes of Whitebeard's lower-ranking men to get to him, but is assaulted by Jozu, who is then halted by Doflamingo. Mihawk then steps up to block Luffy's path to the execution platform.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kengō Mihōku - Rufi ni Semaru Kokutō no Zangeki (剣豪ミホーク ルフィに迫る黒刀の斬撃)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Master Swordsman Mihawk - The Black Sword's Slash Draws Near Luffy
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Mihawk begins attacking Luffy while Hancock and Ivankov are occupied, easily defeating two of the New Kamas who arrive to assist him and knocking Jinbe aside. Luffy manages to get away by using Buggy as a human shield, and fifth division leader Vista arrives to fight Hawk-Eyes. Buggy and his followers manage to get a Den Den Mushi as part of his plan to become famous. Sengoku orders that the links to the Den Den Mushi to be cut so that the world will only know that the Marines won. An army of Pacifistas, led by Sentomaru, attacks the Whitebeard Pirates from behind.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Senmetsu Sakusen Shidō - Pashifisuta Gundan no Iryoku (殲滅作戦始動 パシフィスタ軍団の威力)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Extermination Operation Begins - The Might of the Pacifista Army
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The Pacifistas approach from behind, defeating the Whitebeard Pirates in their path, but the plan is not fully effective because of Whitebeard's attacking the ships at the sides. The Marines withdraw to the plaza, intending to raise the fortification wall and execute Ace before finishing off the Whitebeard Pirates, and Luffy and the division leaders rush to reach Ace before then. Sengoku orders all the Den Den Mushi to stop broadcasting, but the one Buggy stole continues to broadcast images of the war as he tries to make himself famous. Squard, one of Whitebeard's pirate allies who had been missing for some time, stabs Whitebeard through the chest with his sword.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Akainu no Bōryaku! Otoshiirareta Shirohige (赤犬の謀略! おとしいれられた白ひげ)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Akainu's Plot! Whitebeard Entrapped
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Squard’s stabbing of Whitebeard shocks the Whitebeard pirates, as does his statement that Whitebeard agreed to sacrifice his allies to save Ace. As the Whitebeard Pirates question Whitebeard and become demoralized, the Marines gain the upper hand and Aokiji freezes Buggy, cutting the Den Den Mushi footage. Whitebeard chastises Squard for falling for the Marines’ lies, but forgives him. He opens a path for his men to escape, telling them to follow him if they are prepared to give their lives. As their faith in him is restored, Whitebeard then jumps into the fray, determined to save Ace even if he dies doing so.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hōiheki Sadō! Shirohige Kaizoku-dan Zettaizetsumei!! (包囲壁作動! 白ひげ海賊団絶体絶命!!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Encirclement Walls Activated! The Whitebeard Pirates Driven Into a Corner!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: In a desperate to stop Whitebeard from advancing to the execution platform, the Marines activate walls to block Whitebeard's path, but gets stopped by the ice. Squard realizes his error in Whitebeard's stabbing and bursts into tears, but Marco comforts him. Meanwhile, Luffy and his allies charge to the execution platform and the Marines attack them to no avail. Whitebeard confronts John Giant, and defeats him with a punch to the chest. Luffy uses his arms to reach Ace, but the Marines activate the walls and stops Luffy. However, it could not move Oars, Jr.'s body. Akainu uses his Ryusei Kazan attack to melt the ice in an attempt to prevent Whitebeard's pirates from reaching Ace, much to Luffy's horror.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shokei Shikkō Meirei Kudaru - Hōiheki o Toppaseyo! (処刑執行命令下る 包囲壁を突破せよ!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Order to Perform the Execution is Given - Break Through the Encircling Wall!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Akainu's Ryusei Kazan melts the nearly all the ice and destroys the Whitebeard Pirates' ships, dropping them into boiling water, enabling the cannons on the wall to bombard them while the Pacifistas block the way out. The hole left open by Little Oars Jr.'s body is vulnerable, and Luffy and some of the Whitebeard Pirates try to break through, but are forced back. Sengoku prepares to have Ace executed now that the Whitebeard Pirates cannot save him or escape, but Oars regains consciousness. Jinbe launches Luffy over the wall, and he begins to fight the three admirals as Whitebeard decides to play his "trump card".

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Saishū Kyokumen Totsunyū! Shirohige Kishikaisei no Itte (最終局面突入! 白ひげ起死回生の一手)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Rush Into the Final Phase! Whitebeard's Maneuver to Turn the Tides
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy attempts to slip past the admirals, but Kizaru easily catches up to him and knock him to the ground. The executioners prepare to execute Ace, but Crocodile intervenes, saying he can kill Whitebeard later and he does not want the Marines to win. Aokiji attacks Luffy, but Marco knocks him away before he can finish him off. Mr. 3 hides in the passageways below Marineford, having managed to escape Aokiji's freezing. The Whitebeard pirates rush toward the opening in the wall, prompting the Marine forces to fire their cannons at them, but Whitebeard commands a submerged paddle ship to surface, and Oars propels it into the plaza with the pirates on board. As Whitebeard's forces reach the plaza, Sengoku and Garp prepare to fight them.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Chikaratsuku! Orisu Hiroba no Sōryokusen!! (ルフィ力尽く! オリス広場の総力戦!!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy's Strength is Exhausted! All-Out War in the Oris Plaza!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Whitebeard attacks the Marines in the plaza, and Aokiji comes to fight him until third division Leader Jozu arrives to handle him. Luffy comes under attack from two vice admirals and Kizaru, then collapses from his injuries and exhaustion. Whitebeard tells Luffy to stay out of the rest of the battle, but admires his persistence. The battle continues as Akainu engages Whitebeard, the allied pirates arrive to help Whitebeard's pirates, and the Pacifistas arrive to fight them. Marco flies up to rescue Ace, but Garp knocks him back and declares that anyone trying to rescue Ace will need to kill him first.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Inochi o Kazuru Chikara - Tenshon Horumon Futatabi (命を削る力 テンション・ホルモン再び)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Power that Reduces One's Life - Tension Hormones Return
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace thinks back to his childhood, when he fought with anyone who spoke ill of Roger, and wondering if he should ever have been born. In the present, he’s touched by everyone fighting for him and realizes that he wants to live. Buggy comes to after recovering from being frozen, and notices that Mr. 3 is gone. Whitebeard doubles over in pain while fighting Akainu, enabling Akainu to severely injure him and distracting Marco and Jozu long enough for them to be injured by Kizaru and Aokiji. Luffy asks for Ivankov to give him Tension Hormones to enable him to fight again and save Ace. Ivankov refuses, saying that it will likely kill him, but Luffy responds by saying that he would rather die than fail to save Ace, causing Ivankov to comply, restoring Luffy’s energy. Koby, despite being afraid earlier and Helmeppo's advice to stay out now that the Marines are almost certain to win, goes out to fight.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Yakusoku no Tame ni Gekitotsu!!!! Rufi to Kobī!! (約束のために激突!!! ルフィとコビー!!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: For a Promise!! Luffy and Koby Clash!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ivankov warns Luffy that the hormones are only fooling his body, and he will not be able to get up if he falls again, before the two advance, fighting the Marines in their way. Koby tries to stop Luffy, but Luffy defeats him almost instantly. Luffy encounters more Pacifistas, but Hancock stands in their way to allow him to advance. Jozu and Marco are defeated by Kizaru and Aokiji. Whitebeard receives even more injuries from the Marines, but keeps fighting for the sake of his men. The executioners try to execute Ace again, but Luffy incapacitates them with his Haoshoku Haki.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shokeidai Mokuzen!Hirakareta Ēsu e no Michi!! (処刑台目前! 開かれたエースへの道!!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: In Front of the Execution Platform! The Path to Ace is Opened!!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After Luffy unleashes his Haki, the Marines move to eliminate him, seeing the potential threat he poses, and Whitebeard orders his men to back him up, wanting to see what he will bring about in the future. Crocodile and Hancock attack Luffy’s enemies as he advances toward the scaffold. Buggy tries to thaw out the Den Den Mushi in order to continue broadcasting to the world. Ivankov lets Inazuma out of his hair to make a bridge for Luffy to use to reach Ace, but Garp moves out to fight Luffy, saying that he is a Marine and Luffy is a pirate.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Sorezore no Eranda Michi - Rufi vs Gāpu! (それぞれの選んだ道　ルフィVSガープ!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Path they Each Chose - Luffy vs. Garp!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Garp faces off with Luffy and thinks back to when he trained him so that he could become a Marine and stay on the right path. Luffy and Garp throw punches at each other, but Garp hesitates and Luffy knocks him off the bridge, defeating him. Luffy reaches Ace, but Kizaru destroys his key with a beam of light and Sengoku transforms into a giant golden Buddha. Mr. 3, disguised as an executioner, comes to, and uses his powers to create a copy of the key and unlock Ace's shackles as the platform collapses and the Marines open fire on Luffy and Ace. Ace, now released, uses his flame powers to protect Luffy and Mr. 3 from the barrage.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ēsu Kyūshutsu! Shirohige Saigo no Senchō Meirei! (エース救出! 白ひげ最後の船長命令!!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Ace Freed! Whitebeard's Final Captain's Order!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace and Luffy fight off the Marines as the Whitebeard pirates move to escape. Some of the Marines are demoralized, but Akainu and Aokiji are determined to prevent the Whitebeard Pirates from leaving. Squard attempts to hold off the Marines to allow their escape and atone for stabbing Whitebeard. Whitebeard, however, decides to remain behind, not wanting any of his crew to die for him. He says that he is a remnant of the old era and that the time has come for a new one to arrive.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hi o mo Yakitsukusu Chikara - Akainu Hijō no Tsuigeki (火をも焼き尽くす能力 赤犬非情の追撃)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Power that Burns Even Fire - Akainu's Ruthless Pursuit
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Whitebeard's final order leaves his pirates distraught as they leave Marineford for the New World. Meanwhile, Buggy uses a Den Den Mushi and does a public broadcast on the Sabaody Archipelago, angering witnesses. When Akainu mocks Whitebeard, saying that he will not surpass Gold Roger, Ace is provoked. Despite his crew's objections, Ace confronts him, but gets burned and his Vivre Card is exposed as Akainu reveals that his magma powers can extinguish fire. Despite Jinbe's objections, Luffy tries to get Ace's vivre Card. Akainu launches a powerful attack at Luffy, but Ace jumps in at the last second to shield Luffy from his attack. Luffy watches in horror as Ace's Vivre Card is burned up.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kotae o Sagashite - Hiken no Ēsu Senjō ni Shisu (答えを探して 火拳のエース戦場に死す)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Searching for an Answer - Fire Fist Ace Dies on the Battlefield
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Akainu's attack against Ace gives him only seconds to live. Akainu tries to attack Ace again, but Jinbe blocks it, and Marco, freed from his handcuffs by Mr. 3, arrives with Vista to assist him. Garp is angered by Akainu's actions, but Sengoku holds him down. Ace apologizes to Luffy for not letting him to be rescued properly and for not being able to see him achieve his dream. He tells Luffy that he wanted to know whether someone like him deserved to be born. Before Ace dies, he thanks Luffy, Whitebeard and his crewmates for loving him in spite of who he is. Ace's death shatters Luffy's spirit, and he screams in torment.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kaigun Honbu Hōkai! Shirohige Kotobanaki Ikari! (海軍本部崩壊! 白ひげ言葉なき怒り!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Marine Headquarters Collapses! Whitebeard's Silent Rage!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy is incapacitated as Ace's death replays over and over in his mind. Akainu attempts to finish him off, but the Whitebeard Pirates step up to fight him to protect Luffy, and Jinbe flees with Luffy. Whitebeard, enraged, attacks Akainu and creates a massive earthquake that severely damages Marine Headquarters and leaves him isolated from his men. The Blackbeard Pirates, having acquired several notorious criminals from the lowest level of Impel Down, then make their appearance, with Blackbeard having come to see Whitebeard die.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Kejime o Tsukeru - Shirohige VS Kurohige Kaizoku-dan (ケジメをつける 白ひげVS黒ひげ海賊団)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Settling the Score - Whitebeard vs. The Blackbeard Pirates
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Blackbeard reveals that the entire reason he wanted to become one of the Warlords of the Sea was to gain access to Impel Down, and that he gained entrance by having Laffitte hypnotize the Marines in control of the Gates of Justice to admit all Marine ships, which also enabled Luffy's ship to gain entry. Whitebeard attacks Blackbeard to avenge Thatch, whom Blackbeard had killed to get the Yami Yami no Mi. Blackbeard uses his Yami Yami powers to cancel out Whitebeard's Devil Fruit powers, but Whitebeard gains the upper hand, only to be attacked and mortally wounded by the rest of Blackbeard's crew. Whitebeard tells Blackbeard that he will not be the one to find One Piece, and reveals that Ace may have died, but others with the Will of D have inherited Roger's will, and that One Piece is real. Whitebeard dies standing up, with hundreds of wounds on his body, but not a single one on his back.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shō no Kaimaku - Akasareta Kurohige no Takurami (ショーの開幕 明かされた黒ひげの企み)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Start of the Show - Blackbeard's Plot Revealed
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: News of Whitebeards's death spreads across the world, and many people are excited to hear of the demise of one of the world's most powerful pirates. The Whitebeard Pirates attempt to flee, but Akainu, having survived Whitebeard's assault, emerges in front of Jinbe. Jinbe, having grown to like Luffy, refuses to hand him over, and Iva, Inazuma and a few of the Whitebeard Pirates arrive to assist him as Hancock holds off the Pacifistas. Meanwhile, Blackbeard throws a cloth over himself and Whitebeard's body, and emerges with the ability to use his and Whitebeard's Devil Fruit powers. As those assembled watch in horror, he declares that his era has begun.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Akainu no Shūnen! Rufi o Osou Maguma no Kobushi (赤犬の執念! ルフィを襲うマグマの拳)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Akainu's Tenacity! The Fist of Magma Attacks Luffy
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Blackbeard expresses his desire to sink Marineford into the ocean after destroying the fortress, but Sengoku attacks him, saying that the island is a symbol of justice in the world. The Marines continue to pursue and kill the retreating Whitebeard Pirates, and Koby begins hearing the combatants' voices in his head. Akainu defeats Inazuma and Iva, then chases down Jinbe and punches through his chest, severely injuring both him and Luffy. The two fall to the ice below, but Crocodile attacks Akainu and launches Luffy into the air, where Buggy catches him. Crocodile and Whitebeard's division commanders fight Akainu to cover Luffy's escape. Just as Buggy desperately tries to escape, Trafalgar Law arrives in his submarine. Law says that Luffy will become his enemy one day, but as that is a worthwhile relationship, he will give him medical treatment.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hisshi no Sakebi - Unmei o Kaeru Yūki aru Sūbyō (必死の叫び 運命を変える勇気ある数秒)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: A Desperate Cry - Seconds of Valor that Change Destiny
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The fighting between the pirates and the Marines continues as Sengoku and Garp fight Blackbeard, and the Marines are determined to eliminate the fleeing Whitebeard pirates. Kizaru attacks in an attempt to prevent Law from escaping with Luffy and Jinbe. Koby, having developed the ability to sense the voices of those fighting, becomes overwhelmed by all the violence, and screams that fighting is unnecessary and only risks the lives of many soldiers who have families. Akainu tries to kill him, but Red-Haired Shanks arrives, blocks his attack and reveals that he has come to end the war.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Shankusu Kenzan! Chōjō Sensō Tsuini Shūketsu (シャンクス見参! 頂上戦争ついに終結)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Enter Shanks! The Ultimate War Ends at Last
