Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Shanks tricks Buggy into returning Luffy's straw hat to him, noting that while he would like to see Luffy again, it is too soon for their reunion. Law's submarine barely escapes from Aokiji and Kizaru's attacks, and Kizaru declares that they will have to give up if that did not kill Luffy. Boa Hancock requisitions a Marine ship to go after Luffy out of concern for him. Shanks convinces the Marines, the Whitebeard Pirates and the Blackbeard Pirates to stand down by saying that fighting will only lead to more casualties, and declaring that he will fight those who still wish to do so. All those involved comply, and the war ends.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Gun'yūkakkyosu! "Atarashī Jidai" no Hajimari! (群雄割拠す! "新しい時代"の始まり!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Powerful Independent Rivals! The Beginning of the "New Era"!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The public celebrates the end of the war around the world. Meanwhile, in Marineford, Whitebeard's crew discovers that Blackbeard released the Impel Down inmates to join his crew earlier. Sengoku is enraged by Blackbeard. In the sea, Law's submarine submerges near a Marine ship with Hancock onboard. Law tells her that even though Luffy has been stabilized, he also suffered severe injuries from the battle. Ivankov and the Newkamas reveal that Luffy could not stand up in Impel Down because of his condition at that time. Ivankov also says that Luffy pushed himself to save Ace, much to Hancock's sadness. Jinbe, now partially recovered, appears despite being told to rest. Jinbe tells everyone that he cannot stop worrying once Luffy wakes up. Hancock orders Law's crew to call the Kuja's ship and return to Amazon Lily.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nyōgashima Jōriku - Rufi o Semeru Kakoku na Genjitsu (女ヶ島上陸 ルフィを責める過酷な現実)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Arrival at the Island of Women - Cruel Reality Tortures Luffy
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Brownbeard is seen taking over Foodvalten saying it is not a Whitebeard territory anymore, Iva says goodbye to Jinbe and the others. Hancock, the Heart Pirates, and Jinbe make it to Amazon Lily. Luffy wakes up and goes on a rampage on the eastern shore looking for Ace. He later understands that Ace is no longer alive while talking to Jinbe.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Saikyō Taggu! Funtō, Rufi to Toriko! (最強タッグ! 奮闘、ルフィとトリコ!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Strongest Tag-Team! Luffy and Toriko's Hard Struggle!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After eating the Hungrila Bird that they captured, Luffy and Toriko team up again to save Nami and Komatsu who have been kidnapped by the Cocoalas.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi to Ēsu - Kyōdai no Deai no Monogatari! (ルフィとエース 兄弟の出会いの物語!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy and Ace - The Story of the Brothers' Meeting!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Garp drops Luffy to live with the Dadan Family where he meets Ace. Luffy follows Ace to become friends with him while Ace attempts to kill Luffy more than once for 3 months every day. Luffy reaches the end of the forest and reaches a new unknown place.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Sabo Tōjō! Gurei Tāminaru no Shōnen (サボ登場! 不確かな物の終着駅の少年)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Enter Sabo! The Boy From Grey Terminal
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy discovers the junkyard is named Gray Terminal. Luffy runs after Ace when he steals the treasure and run into Sabo, a boy who lives there. Sabo discovers the stolen treasure and they are tied up. Luffy screams and Porchemy, a member of the Bluejam Pirates, finds them. Luffy, Ace and Sabo escape, but Luffy is captured by Porchemy. Luffy is tortured into asking where the treasure is at, but he refuses to cooperate. Realizing that Luffy would not tell Porchemy about the treasure's whereabouts, Sabo and Ace break into Porchemy's hideout.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ore wa Nigenai - Ēsu Kesshi no Kyūshutsu Sakusen (おれは逃げない　エース決死の救出作戦)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: I Won't Run - Ace's Desperate Rescue Operation
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo and Ace confront Porchemy. When Porchemy asks about Ace's treasure, he refuses to answer and they defeat Porchemy. Later, Bluejam guns down Porchemy for failing to capture the pirates. Sabo reveals that the forest is near Dadan's house and together they go there. Dadan allows Sabo, Luffy and Ace to stay in the forest. Dadan asks where Sabo and Ace are, but they return to the house.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Itsuka Umi e! Sannin no Akudō Chikai no Sakazuki! (いつか海へ! 三人の悪童ちかいの盃!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Someday to the Sea! The Three Brat's Sake Cups of Oath!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo is seen by his father but Sabo pretends he does not know him. Later Sabo explains to Ace and Luffy that he is in fact a Noble. Ace, Sabo, and Luffy become brothers by sharing a drink together.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Dadan Ikka to no Wakare!? Kansei! Himitsu Kichi (ダダン一家との別れ!? 完成! 秘密基地)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Leaving the Dadan Family!? The Secret Base is Complete!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Makino, Woop Slap, and Garp come to visit the boys. The boys later decide to leave the Dadan Family and build a secret hideout.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Deshi-iri!? Kaizoku-Ō to Tatakatta Otoko! (ルフィ弟子入り!?　海賊王と戦った男!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Apprentice Luffy!? The Man who Fought the Pirate King!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace, Sabo, and Luffy chase down a Danpa and succeeds to catch it, but a tiger steals it. To get revenge, the three brothers put fish on their back to lure the tiger, but a bear that can match the tiger appears. Ace attacks the bear, but it gets angry and chases the three brothers. It is then stopped by a former pirate captain named Naguri using Haki.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Biggu Taigā no Tatakai! Dareka Kyaputen ni naru no!? (ビッグタイガーとの戦い! 誰がキャプテンになるの!?)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Battle Against the Big Tiger! Who Will Be the Captain?!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace, Sabo and Luffy help Naguri make a pirate ship. The three brothers meet the tiger they fought the previous episode. The three brother defeats the tiger and say good-bye to Naguri.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ubawareta Jiyū! Sankyōdai ni Semaru Kizoku no Wana (奪われた自由! 三兄弟に迫る貴族の罠)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Stolen Freedom! The Nobles' Trap Draws Near the Three Brothers
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo, Luffy and Ace are caught by the Bluejam Pirates. Sabo returns to High Town and finds out about the nobles' plan to burn "all the shame" in Gray Terminal from the new brother his parents adopted when he ran away. Sabo runs away to warn Luffy and Ace.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Hanatareta Honō - Gurei Tāminaru no Kiki (放たれた炎 グレイ・ターミナルの危機)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Flames Are Lit - The Gray Terminal's Crisis
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo failed to warn his brothers. A huge fire engulfs Gray Terminal. Ace and Luffy try to escape but find themselves struggling against the Bluejam Pirates.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jiyū wa Doko ni Aru? Shōnen no Kanashiki Funade (自由はどこにある? 少年の悲しき船出)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Where Is Freedom? The Boy's Sad Departure
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: While Dadan and Ace stay behind to fight Bluejam, the rest of the Dadan Family and Luffy make a quick escape. In the mean time Sabo fully accepts that he will never have freedom so long as he stays in Goa and leaves the island the day the Celestial Dragon are set to arrive.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Yoroshiku Tanomu! Kyōdai kara Todoita Tegami! (よろしく頼む! 兄弟から届いた手紙!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: I'm Counting On You! A Letter From a Brother!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Sabo is killed by Celestial Dragon. Ace and Dadan returns to their bandits house making Luffy and other bandits happy. Dogra returns from town and informs about Sabo's death. Later Ace receives a letter from Sabo, that is written before he sets out to sea. The letter contains a message to take care of Luffy.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Yakusoku o Hatasu Tame - Sorezore no Tabidachi! (約束を果たすため それぞれの旅立ち!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: To Fulfill the Promise - Separate Departures!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Ace starts to care for Luffy more as a brother after he was nearly mauled to death by a bear. Ace then sets off on his own seven years later, bidding the mountain bandits and Luffy farewell. Dogra comes by a few months later and shows Luffy a newspaper that talks about Ace and his new crew. Three years later, Luffy sets out from the Goa Kingdom. He then beats up the Lord of the Coast for eating Shanks' arm and to show the results of his forest training.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Aitsura ni Aitē! Rufi Namida no Sakebi (あいつらに会いてェ! ルフィ涙の叫び)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: I Want to See Them! Luffy's Tearful Scream
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy still distraught at the death of Ace, blames it on his weakness. Jinbe helps Luffy in reasoning back to what he still has. Luffy resolves to meet up with his crew.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Mugiwara no Ichimi Gekishin! Motarasareta Kyōhō (麦わらの一味激震! もたらされた凶報)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Straw Hat Crew Shocked! The Bad News is Received
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The episode starts off with Zoro on Kuraigana Island, with Perona accompanying him. He is seen fighting against humandrills. He manages to keep equal grounds with them, but is then thrown against the giant cross. The humandrills are about to attack, but then are mysteriously frightened. A mysterious figure approaches them and the baboons run off in fright. The figure is actually Hawk-Eye Mihawk. Zoro looks shocked to see him.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Meiō Reirī to no Saikai - Rufi Ketsudan no Toki (冥王レイリーとの再会 ルフィ決断の時)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Reunion with Dark King Rayleigh - It's Time For Luffy's Decision
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: A man comes out of the sea. They are surprised to see Dark King Rayleigh. Rayleigh remarks that they have met at Sabaody Archipelago. He says that his ship sank in a storm and he had no choice but to swim. Luffy says to Rayleigh that he needs to head to Sabaody Archipelago to meet his friends, but Rayleigh tells him to remember what happened there. He says to Luffy that he would give a suggestion before he reunites with his crew. Meanwhile, an overweight Usopp desperately tries to escape the Boin Islands despite Heracles' objections.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Senchō no Moto e - Sorajima no Datsugoku to Fuyujima no Jiken (船長のもとへ 空島の脱獄と冬島の事件)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Back to the Captain - Jailbreak from Sky Island and the Incident on the Winter Island
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: After hearing the suggestion from Rayleigh, Luffy cannot decide whether to follow it or not because of his promise to his friends to meet at Sabaody. Rayleigh says that he has a second suggestion for Luffy. On Weatheria, Nami attempts to flee from the island by stealing a local balloon. Meanwhile, Franky tries to leave Karakuri Island by breaking into Vegapunk's laboratory to steal an ice breaker ship and causes an incident.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Sesshoku! Daikengō Mihōku - Zoro Iji no Shitō (接触! 大剣豪ミホーク ゾロ意地の死闘)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Contact! The Great Swordsman Mihawk - Zoro's Struggle of Willpower
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Zoro tries to go back to the sea using the small boat given to him by Mihawk, but he cannot get past the humandrills. Meanwhile, Brook is caught by the Longarms upon trying to make peace between them and the locals of the Nakamura Island. Back at Amazon Lily, Luffy  agrees to Rayleigh's "suggestion" and decides to go back to Marineford.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Sanji no Junan - Ōkoku e to Kikanshita Joō! (サンジの受難 王国へと帰還した女王!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Sanji's Suffering - The Queen Returns to His Kingdom!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy goes to Marineford along with Rayleigh and Jinbe. Chopper finishes his preparations to return to Sabaody and gets a bird ride, but during the flight he is shocked by what he sees in the newspaper. Robin is escorted by the revolutionaries away from Tequila Wolf and receives a copy of the latest newspaper. Ivankov returns to Kamabakka Kingdom and gets into a fight with Sanji due to Sanji being unwilling to accept his wanted poster picture. Afterwards Ivankov gives Sanji a newspaper and Sanji is shocked by what he reads.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Masaka no Saijōriku! Rufi Marinfōdo e! (まさかの再上陸! ルフィ海軍本部へ!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: An Unexpected Return! Luffy, to Marineford!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The episode starts with a view of Marineford being rebuilt. It shows a room full of vice-admirals as Lieutenant Commander Brandnew talks about how Luffy survived the war and caused trouble again. A flashback follows, showing what happened two days ago. Two reporters are seen talking about how the Marines will go after the pirates involved in the war. Suddenly, some Marines see the warship which Luffy, Jinbe and Rayleigh are on.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Nakama ni Todoke - Kakemeguru Dai-nyūsu! (仲間に届け かけめぐる大ニュース!)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Delivered to the Crew - The Big News Comes Through!
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: Luffy is worried, wondering if his crew would get the message. Rayleigh told him not to worry and that they would understand the message; although there was one amongst them who seemed dull, he (Rayleigh) was sure the guy would eventually understand the message.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Ugokidasu Kaizoku-tachi! Kyōtendōchi no Shinsekai (動き出す海賊たち! 驚天動地の新世界)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: The Pirates Move Out! The Earth Shattering New World
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The episode begins with Trafalgar Law near Sabaody Archipelago. Meanwhile X Drake is on a winter island somewhere in the New World. When he and his crew are attacked by some icicles and they start to run back. Suddenly, a massive iron dome opens up, revealing a hidden city and a huge cyborg shoots at them and states that he is a guardian, along with many others. Drake asks the robot whether attacking him would get Kaido's attention; the robot informs him that it would.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Jigoku o Ikinuke - Sanji Otoko o Kaketa Shōbu (地獄を生き抜け サンジ男をかけた勝負)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Live Through Hell - Sanji's Fight with Men at Stake
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The episode opens with Nami, as she is reading the newspaper containing Luffy's recent actions. Meanwhile Franky, on Karakuri Island, finds a hidden lab of Dr. Vegapunk, where he finds hidden blueprints of the scientist's weapons and Devil Fruit research. He tells Kitton, his grandfather, and Taroimo that he will be staying in the lab to study the blueprints and asks them to bring him some cola every now and then. Elsewhere, Ivankov makes Sanji a deal--if he beats the 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo, Sanji will have the right to learn the recipe of the Attack Cuisine.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Madamada Tsuyoku Naru! Zoro Senchou Heno Chikai (まだまだ強くなる!ゾロ船長への誓い)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: I'll Get Stronger and Stronger! Zoro's Vow to his Captain
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: A group of people are gathered to see some kind of freak show which turns out to be just Brook. Robin and the revolutionaries are asking her why she suddenly changed her mind and decided to come with them to Baltigo. The location switches to Usopp in the Boin Islands. Usopp is running with Heracles saying that he needs to lose weight then get much stronger. The location switches again to Kuraigana Island where Zoro is begging Mihawk to train him to become a great swordsman. Mihawk is disgusted by what Zoro is doing and says if he cannot even beat the humandrills outside then he has no reason to train him to which Zoro replied by saying that he defeated all of them.

Summit War Saga.episode_name_jp: Rufi Shugyou Kaishi 2 Nengo ni Yakusoku no Basho de (ルフィ修行開始　2年後に約束の場所で)
Summit War Saga.episode_name_en: Luffy’s Training Begins. See You 2 Years later, At The Promised Place
Summit War Saga.episode_sumary: The scene goes to a deserted island north west of the Amazon Lily called Rusukaina, which will be Luffy's training spot for the next two years. Rayleigh mentions it is a great spot for training because the island has forty-eight seasons in a year and the season changes weekly. Hancock tells Luffy that she will bring him food everyday from Amazon Lily. Rayleigh interrupts her and says that while Luffy is training, women are not allowed on the island. Hancock gets mad about this, but Rayleigh tells her that it is good for Luffy, so Hancock and the Kuja Pirates leave. The episode ends with a scene of all of the crew and Luffy's pledge to become stronger.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 出航！新世界への冒険の夜明け (Shukkō! Shin Sekai e no Bōken no Yoake)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Set Sail! The Dawn of Adventure to the New World
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: All but three of the Straw Hat Pirates reunite at their ship, while the Fake Straw Hat Crew hold a rally in the archipelago. However, attacking Pacifistas unmask both the fake and real Straw Hats, as the Marines' focus moves to the real crew.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 驚愕の真実 大恩人くま (Kyōgaku no Shinjitsu - Dai Onjin Kuma)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: A Shocking Revelation - A Great Benefactor, Kuma
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Finally reunited, the Straw Hat Pirates head for Fish-Man Island, as their respective allies from the last two years hold off the approaching Marines. On their descent, the Straw Hats learn of Bartholomew Kuma's role in protecting the Thousand Sunny, before they are suddenly attacked by the Caribou Pirates.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 深海の冒険！迫りくる海底の脅威 (Shinkai no Bōken! Semarikuru Kaitei no Kyōi)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: A Deep Sea Adventure! A Looming Undersea Threat
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: When the Caribou Pirates' attack doesn't go to plan, Caribou is left on the Thousand Sunny and quickly incapacitated by the Straw Hat Pirates. They watch as the Kraken destroys the Caribou Pirates' ship, and Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji leave to tame the creature, easily defeating it but getting sucked into the current in the process.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 海底火山噴火！麦わらの一味大混乱 (Kaitei-Kazan Funka! Mugiwara no Ichimi dai Konran)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Undersea Volcanic Eruption! The Straw Hats in Turmoil
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Exploring the depths of the sea without three of their members, the rest of the Straw Hats are nearly eaten by a a giant anglerfish and crushed by a sea monster at the orders of a man claiming to be the legendary pirate Vander Decken. They are saved by the return of the three missing members with the newly-tamed Kraken, and finally make it to Fish-Man Island, where they are challenged by a group of fish-men outside.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 人魚達の楽園！ついに魚人島上陸 (Ningyo-tachi no Rakuen! Tsuini Gyojin-tō Jōriku)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Mermaids' Paradise! Landing at Fish-Man Island
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The Straw Hats enter Fish-Man Island, but are separated while bursting through the island's bubble. Inside, Luffy's group are found by Camie, and visit Mermaid Cove; however, they are soon interrupted by the kingdom's princes and the fish-men pirates from earlier, being forced to flee to the town when Sanji collapses from a nosebleed in the chaos.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 海底の恐怖！ホーディの野望 (Kaitei no Kyōfu! Hōdi no Yabō)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: A Terror in the Deep Sea! Hody's Ambition
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Having found blood donors for Sanji, Luffy's group briefly visits the Mermaid Café and Pappag's Criminal shop, where they are reunited with Brook and Nami and invited to Ryugu Palace by King Neptune. Elsewhere, the Gyro Pirates try to escape the New Fish-Man Pirates, but are single-handedly defeated by Hody Jones.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 弱虫で泣き虫！人魚姫しらほし (Yowamushi de Nakimushi! Ningyo Hime Shirahoshi)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: A Coward Crybaby! Shirahoshi, the Mermaid Princess
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Luffy's group reaches Ryugu Palace while Caribou kidnaps a group of mermaids after being accidentally freed. Learning of the kidnapping and Shyarly's prophecy, Neptune's forces attempt to arrest the Straw Hats while Luffy wanders off, finding and befriending the Mermaid Princess Shirahoshi. Elsewhere, Vander Decken IX meets Hody Jones, solidifying their alliance to take down the Ryugu Kingdom.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 誘拐事件発生!? ルフィとしらほし (Yūkai Jiken Hassei!? Rufi to Shirahoshi)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Kidnapping?! Luffy and Shirahoshi
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Luffy brings Shirahoshi out of her tower, planning on going to the Sea Forest. Meanwhile, Hody Jones and Vander Decken IX injure Hatchan and launch their first attack on Ryugu Palace, to the occupying Straw Hats' confusion.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 襲撃開始！ホーディとデッケン (Shūgeki Kaishi! Hōdi to Dekken)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: A Raid Begins! Hody and Decken
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Hody Jones begins his attack on Ryugu Palace, where he is challenged by Roronoa Zoro. Meanwhile, Luffy and Shirahoshi continue on their journey, but Megalo is unable to keeping hiding the Princess, and she is discovered the residents of the kingdom.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: ジンベエの告白 魚人族の衝撃の歴史 (Jinbē no Kokuhaku - Gyojin-zoku no Shōgeki no Rekishi)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Jinbe's Confession - A Shocking History of the Fish-Men
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Luffy and Shirahoshi, now joined by a few other Straw Hats, continue their journey to the Sea Forest, defeating Vander Decken IX on the way. In the palace, Hody completes his takeover of the Ryugu Kingdom, but Nami and Camie escape in the process and head to the Forest themselves. There, the arriving Straw Hats meet up with Jinbe, who apologizes for his role in Arlong's actions and begins explaining the history of fish-men-human relations.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 魚人島の過去！オトヒメとタイガー (Gyojin-tō no Kako! Otohime to Taigā)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Fish-Man Island's Past! Otohime and Tiger
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Jinbe tells the assembled Straw Hats of Fisher Tiger's legacy and Otohime's quest for peace, beginning with his own time in the Royal Army and ending with the Sun Pirates taking Koala aboard.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: タイガーの無念 オトヒメが描く未来！ (Taigā no Munen - Otohime ga Egaku Mirai!)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Tiger's Regret - The Future That Otohime Envisions!
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The Sun Pirates return Koala to , but the  were waiting for them, and Fisher Tiger dies in the fallout. In the Ryugu Kingdom, Otohime's efforts seem to result in failure, until a World Noble crashes on the island. Visiting Mary Geoise with him, Otohime convinces him to join their side, signifying the first big victory of her pro-peace movement.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: オトヒメの悲劇 ホーディの宣戦布告 (Otohime no Higeki - Hōdi no Sensen Fukoku)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: The Tragedy of Otohime - Hody Declares War
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Jinbe completes his story, culminating in Otohime's assassination. In the present, Hody broadcasts himself across the island, declaring a new kingdom based on fish-man superiority and threatening the Straw Hats. When Luffy plans to go rescue Hody's hostages, Jinbe tries to stop him, and the two pirates prepare to face off.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: ホーディの異変！立ち向かう王子達 (Hōdi no Ihen! Tachimukau Ōji-tachi)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Hody's Accident! The Princes Strike Back
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The New Fish-Man Pirates defeat swarms of the Royal Army and assemble at Gyoncorde Plaza, where they plan to execute King Neptune. There, they are attacked by the princes, and each of the crew's officers take Energy Steroids in anticipation of fighting them. Elsewhere, Jinbe and Shirahoshi ride Megalo to the plaza, seemingly having convinced Luffy to stand down.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: しらほし悲痛の叫び ルフィ出陣！ (Shirahoshi Hitsū no Sakebi - Rufi Shutsujin!)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Shirahoshi's Desperate Cry - Luffy Begins His Attack!
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: As Shirahoshi and Jinbe approach the plaza, they are caught in one of Hody's traps, and brought forward in chains. Hody reveals that he was actually Otohime's killer and, learning of Shyarly's prophecy, the residents of Fish-Man Island begin begging for Luffy to destroy the island before Hody can rule over it. In response, Hody prepares to execute Neptune, but he is stopped by the Straw Hats appearing out of Megalo.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 大乱戦！麦わらの一味VS10万の敵 (Dai Ransen! Mugiwara no Ichimi tai Jū-Man no Teki)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Battle Royal! The Straw Hats vs. 100,000 Opponents
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The battle between the Straw Hats and Hody's forces begins. Luffy instantly defeats 50,000 of his soldiers, and as the Straw Hats begin to make quick work of the remaining 50,000, Luffy charges forward at Hody himself. Elsewhere, Vander Decken IX throws the Noah at Shirahoshi.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 魚人島壊滅の危機！古の方舟ノア (Gyojin-tō Kaimetsu no Kiki! Inishie no Hakobune Noa)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Fish-Man Island Faces Destruction! Noah, the Ancient Ark
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The Noah reaches Fish-Man Island, pressing dangerously deep into the island's bubble and prompting Shirahoshi to swim into the surrounding ocean to lure it away. She is followed by her brothers, Luffy, and Hody, and Hody takes out Decken, causing the Noah to begin falling back onto the island with no way to stop it.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: ルフィVSホーディ！渾身の (Rufi tai Hōdi! Konshin no Reddo Hōku)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Luffy vs. Hody! All-Out Red Hawk
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The battle for Fish-Man Island rages on as the citizens learn that the Noah is falling once again. In the waters above the island, an air bubble is placed around the ship, and Luffy is given free reign to solve the island's problems through any means necessary.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: 未来の約束 タイヨウへと続く道 (Mirai no Yakusoku - Taiyō e to Tsuzuku Michi)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: The Promise of the Future - The Road Toward the Sun
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: Luffy defeats Hody and begins destroying the falling Noah as his crewmates subdue the remaining New Fish-Man Pirates. In her panic, Shirahoshi calls for the surrounding Sea Kings, who move the Noah before it can land on Fish-Man Island, and she returns Luffy to Gyoncorde Plaza. However, he requires a blood transfusion, and only Jinbe offers to give him blood, a symbolic move against prejudice in the history of human-fish-man relations.

Fisher-Man Island Rmk.再出発！集う麦わらの一味！ (Sai Shuppatsu! Tsudou Mug: さらば魚人島！最強の海〝新世界〟へ (Saraba Gyojin-tō! Saikyō no Umi "Shin Sekai" e)
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The New Beginning! The Straw Hats Reunit: Goodbye, Fish-Man Island! To the New World, the Mightiest Sea in the World
Fisher-Man Island Rmk.The Straw Hat Pirates have all landed on: The Straw Hats and residents of the Ryugu Kingdom celebrate their victory by throwing a banquet. As the arrival of pirates to the New World resumes with Hody's defeat, the Straw Hats set off for the next half of their adventure.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shin Shou Kaimaku Sai Shuuketsu! Mugiwara no Ichimi (新章開幕　再集結！麦わらの一味)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The New Chapter Begins. Regroup, Straw Hat Pirates!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Two years have passed and the episode opens with Luffy reclaiming his straw hat to renew his voyage. The beasts on the island have been tamed by Luffy. Luffy informs Boa Hancock that he is thankful for the food, but he does not want to marry her. On Sabaody Archipelago, Rayleigh and Shakuyaku discuss how time has passed and the pending arrival of the Straw Hat Pirates.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Isshoku Sokuhatsu! Luffy tai Nise-Rufi (一触即発! ルフィVSニセルフィ)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: A Hair-Trigger! Luffy vs. Fake Luffy
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The episode starts with Fake Luffy threatening Luffy and ordering him to apologize for not only not seeing him but also colliding with him in the street. Luffy remembers the moment when he landed on the Sabaody Archipelago along with the Kuja Pirates. Hancock tells him that they have to bid goodbye here because she cannot let anyone know about their relationship yet and gives him a mustache (disguise) to put on so that no one recognizes him at all.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kaigun Shutsudou Nerawareta Mugiwara no Ichimi (海軍出動　狙われた麦わらの一味)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Marines Move Out, Target the Straw Hat Crew!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Robin arrives at Grove 17 to find a fully coated Sunny as well as Franky who shows off his body modifications and informs her about the whereabouts of the other Straw Hat Pirates. Robin questions Franky about the flyer of Brook's concert to which he replies that Brook became a star and might have given up on piracy. Brook is briefly shown still performing Bone To Be Wild at Sabao Dome.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Oomono Shuuketsu Nise Mugiwara Ichimi no Kyoui (大物集結　ニセ麦わら一味の脅威)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Massive Gathering, Threat of the Fake Straw Hats!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Brook finishes his concert when the Marines arrive to capture him, but he escapes. Usopp, Chopper, Robin and Nami all reunite at the Ship and finds Franky.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Sentou Kaishi! Misero Shugyou no Seika! (戦闘開始！見せろ修行の成果！)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Battle Begins! The Results of Training!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy is taken to the Fake Luffy. While the pirates are gathered in grove #46 the marines arrive and a fight between them and the marines begins. Luffy's identity is revealed to the shock of everyone. Luffy comes across Sanji and Zoro after a short fight with a pacifista and together they head to grove #42, where the rest of the crew is.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Zen-In Shuugou - Rufi Shin-Sekai he no Funade (全員集合　ルフィ新世界への船出)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Everyone's Reunited! Luffy Sets Sail for the New World!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy along with Zoro and Sanji are heading to Grove #42. As the three of them reach Thousand Sunny and reunite with the rest of the crew, the Marines appear, but only to be intercepted shortly afterwards by the Kuja Pirates who help the Straw Hat Pirates set sail for Fish-Man Island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kyōgaku no Shinjitsu - Sanī-gō o Mamotta Otoko (驚愕の真実 サニー号を守った男)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: A Shocking Revelation - The Man Who Protected the Sunny!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Caribou is seen punishing the fake straw hats for making him join them instead of the Straw Hats. Rayleigh is seen retracing the first time he met Gol D. Roger. Meanwhile Franky reveals to the rest of the crew that Kuma had been protecting Thousand Sunny for the past two years. The episode ends with the attack of the Caribou pirates on Thousand Sunny.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kaichū no Shitō Arawareta Oounabara no Akuma (海中の死闘　現れた大海原の悪魔)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Undersea Struggle, The Demon of the Deep Appears!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The Caribou Pirates attack the Straw Hats. While Caribou manages to get on the Thousand Sunny, the rest of his crew gets pulled away by Momoo, who gets scared when he recognizes the Straw Hats. Caribou is left alone and, as a result, is captured by the Straw Hats. The Straw Hats come across the Kraken, which destroys the ship of the Caribou Pirates, who returned to save their captain, and then attacks Thousand Sunny. The Straw Hats manage to avoid its attacks and Luffy, along with Zoro and Sanji, are getting ready to fight it.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shinkai de Sōnan Soreta Mugiwara no Ichimi (深海で遭難　逸れた麦わらの一味)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Disaster in the Deep Sea, The Straw Hat Crew Gets Lost!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The episode opens with the Monster Trio (Luffy, Zoro and Sanji) facing the Kraken. The trio each reveal some result of their intensive training these past two years. Sanji showing his Blue Walk and a new kick, Diable Jambe: Bien Cuit. Zoro cuts the kraken with his new three-sword style technique, Santoryu Ogi: Rokudo no Tsuji, before Luffy finishes him off with a haki-embued Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kaitei-Kazan Funka! Nagasarete Gyojin-tō (海底火山噴火！　流されて魚人島)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Undersea Volcanic Eruption! Sailing To Fish-Man Island
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The Flying Dutchman shows up and Vander Decken tells Wadatsumi to crush the Thousand Sunny, but then the Kraken beats Wadatsumi. The volcano erupts, and the pirates run from it. Surume jumps off a cliff and some big stones are about to crush them but Usopp stops them for a while with his new move Sargasso. But when they are celebrating their survival, a rock hit Surume's head, made it faints as they descending to the depth of the cliff.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Gyojin-tō Jōriku Uruwashiki Ningyotachi (魚人島上陸 うるわしき人魚たち)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Landing at Fish-Man Island, The Lovely Mermaids!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The Straw Hats encounter the mysterious fish-men riding one of the sea-beasts. One of the fish-men, Hammond, insults Surume for carrying the crew or "those sinful humans." Surume gets scared and leaves the Thousand Sunny and its crew behind. After Surume left, Hammond addresses the crew and their achievements (namely beating Arlong, defending Hachi, and punching a World Noble). He then offers the crew a choice: either join the New Fish-Man Pirates or die.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kōfun Bakuhatsu! Sanji Seimei no Kiki! (興奮爆発！　サンジ生命の危機！)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Eruption of Excitement! Sanji's Crisis of Life!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The episode begins with an infatuated Sanji playing in a pool with the mermaids in Mermaid Cove. The chef states his wish to live there, with a mermaid remarking how much fun he is. Luffy, soaking his feet on the side of the pool, comments on how nice it must be to swim. Camie suggests that Luffy could wear a bubble in order to do so, much to his surprise.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Gyojin-tō Metsubō!? Shārī no Yogen (魚人島滅亡！？シャーリーの予言)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Fish-Man Island Collapses?! Shirley's Prediction!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: As blood donors are finally found, the recovering Sanji stays at the Mermaid Cafe while Luffy, Usopp and Camie meet Pappug and Brook. The five of them head for Pappug's home. In the meantime, Ishilly and her friends vanish after opening the barrel that was washed up together with the Straw Hats and the episode ends with Madam Shyarly predicting that Luffy would destroy Fish-Man Island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Gyojin-tō no Ō, Kaishin Nepuchūn! (魚人島の王、海神ネプチューン！)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The King of Fish-Man Island, Sea God Neptune!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: In the open sea, Gyro remembers the time when he was attacked by the New Fish-Man Pirates and vowing never to return to the Fish-Man Island. On the Noah, Hody Jones turns down the offer from his subordinate Ikaros Much to defeat them and says that he will do it himself. Meanwhile, on Fish-Man Island, Nami reunites with Luffy and the others. Neptune, the island’s king, appears with his whale and Megalo before them.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Ryūgū Jō! Tasuketa Same ni Tsurerarete (竜宮城! 助けた鮫に連れられて)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Ryugu Palace! Led By The Shark That Was Saved!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: On Fish-Man Island, Caribou breaks out of the barrel and traps Ishilly and the mermaids with his Numa Numa no Mi powers. Fukaboshi learns that Sharley did have a vision of Luffy destroying the island, and tells the fortune teller that he must deal with the Straw Hats at once. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats finally reach Ryugu Palace for their banquet. While there, Nami reveals that Robin is looking for clues on an important history and Franky is searching for Tom’s relative. Neptune reveals that Fish-Man Island is powered by the roots of the Sunlight Tree Eve and also supply air to the ocean. The Ministers of the Left and Right, the king’s advisors, scold him for leaving the palace unharmed and tells the Straw Hats that they received a message from Fukaboshi. Meanwhile, Luffy goes into the castle’s hard-shell tower, discovering food there. However, while running towards it, he unknowingly stumbles upon a gigantic mermaid princess. The princess confronts Luffy, saying that she is not afraid as she is the daughter of King Neptune, before bursting into tears.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Naki Mushi de Yowamushi! Kōkaku Tō no Ningyo Hime (泣き虫で弱虫！　硬殻塔の人魚姫)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Coward Crybaby! Hard-Shell Tower’s Mermaid Princess
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: On the sea floor, Vander Decken IX reveals that he plans to marry the princess, using his Mato Mato no Mi curse to throw a giant axe at her. Meanwhile, at Ryugu Palace, the Minister of the Left accuses the Straw Hats for the conspiracy of destroying the Island and kidnapping the mermaids. Luffy saves the princess by stopping the axe. When the palace guards rush in, the princess hides Luffy and is told that the Straw Hat Pirates will be detained in the castle’s dungeons, as Zoro has been captured. The princess apologizes for her rudeness and allows Luffy to eat her food, revealing that her name is Shirahoshi. She then reveals that she was in the tower for 10 years. After being accidentally insulted by Luffy, Shirahoshi reveals that she wants to see a lot of places and Luffy immediately orders her to leave with him. Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp and Brook confront the palace guards just as Zoro, who has escaped from the guards, arrives. On the Noah, Decken meets Hody, and the two fish-men form an alliance to plot the complete destruction of Fish-Man Island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kinkyūjitai Hassei Senkyo Sareta Ryūgū Jō (緊急事態発生　占拠された竜宮城)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Emergency Situation! Ryugu Palace Held Captive
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The episode starts off with the guards around Zoro and the others and preparing to pop their air bubble, however, Nami found some bubbly coral and made the whole room fill with air and Zoro prepares to fight Neptune. Shirahoshi is still not sure if she should leave her tower, and Luffy says again he does not like her, causing her to cry some more. Camie and Papagu are shocked that the crew tied up the guards and took Neptune hostage despite Usopp and Brook's comments stating they were just gonna look tough and run away.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Ryūgū Jō Gekishin! Shirahoshi Yūkaijiken (竜宮城激震！　しらほし誘拐事件)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Ryuugu Palace Shaking! Shirahoshi and the Kidnapping
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy leads Shirahoshi out of her tower inside Megalo while Brook and the Minister of the Right tells them to stop. When Brook and the Minister see that Shirahoshi is not in her tower, they are attacked by human pirates and tell them to take them to the switch to open the palaces gates or they'll die. The story shifts back a few hours to the Fish-Man District with Decken explaining his Mato Mato Curse to the humans and just as he calls out for a demonstration, a voice shouts out for Hody Jones. That person is none other than Hatchan who states they should all stop this insanity claiming the Energy Steroids will only destroy their bodies and should not destroy Fish-Man Island or underestimate Neptune.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Hōdi Shūrai Fukushū Keikaku no Hajimari (ホーディ襲来　復讐計画の始まり)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Hody's Attack! The Beginning of his Vengeful Plan!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy is still on his way to the Sea Forest with Shirahoshi, when he notices something going to the Ryugu Palace, which is revealed to be Hody and Decken. Meanwhile, Robin waits for the Sea Bus, when many Ammo Knights appear and tell she need to go with them. But then she attacks all of them once and leaves in the Sea Bus.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Ryūgū Jō no Kessen! Zoro VS Hōdi (竜宮城の決戦！ ゾロ VS ホーディ)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Decisive Battle at Ryugu Palace! Zoro vs. Hody
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy and Shirahoshi are still on their way to the Sea Forest. At the palace, Neptune begs someone to protect her daughter. Hody just comments on how weak he is and states he only joined his army for military strength and knowledge. He states he will revive the dream and ambition Arlong. Nami is shocked by seeing this and during all this she escapes with Camie. Hody declares he will destroy the army and the Straw Hats and begins to flood the palace.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shirahoshi o  Mamore! Dekken no Tsuigeki (しらほしを守れ！ デッケンの追撃)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Protect Shirahoshi! Decken's Pursuit
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Episode starts with everyone exclaiming that the Mermaid Princess has been kidnapped. Luffy asks Shirahoshi why she got out of Megalo's mouth, she apologizes and asks him not to get mad at her as she starts to cry. As someone calls Luffy filthy and heartless, Chopper urges Sanji not to turn around. Sanji realizes that Chopper's warning can only mean that the Mermaid Princess is right behind him. Chopper tells him he is correct, but seeing the princess would without a doubt kill him if a normal mermaid made him lose so much blood before.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Ichimi Haiboku!? Hōdi Ryūgū Jō Seiatsu (一味はいぼく!? ホーディ竜宮城制圧)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Crew is Defeated!? Hody Controls Ryugu Palace
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The episode starts from where it left off, as Zoro cuts Hody Jones and asks Neptune's help to escape from Ryugu Palace. Unfortunately, Hody who was unconscious comes to sense after taking an Energy Steroid and successfully stops Neptune and the Straw Hat Pirates from escaping.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Yomigaeru Innen! Nami to Gyojin Kaizokudan! (蘇る因縁! ナミと魚人化遺族団!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Revived Fate! Nami and the Fish-Man Pirates
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Robin is seen walking through the Sea Forest and eventually finds what she was looking for. Meanwhile, Neptune's army escapes the palace and the Ministers lament how this have turned out. The Minister of the Right tell the soldiers to look for the princes and then they'll come back to reclaim the palace. While this is going on, the New Fish-Man Pirates are forcing the citizens of Fish-Man Island to step on Otohime's face as loyalty. As Dosun is forcing the citizens, Fukaboshi arrives and punches him in the face in anger for forcing the citizens to step on his late mother's face. At the graveyard, Jinbe reassures Shirahoshi that her father will be saved.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Dorei Kaihō no Eiyū - Bōkenka Taigā (奴隷解放の英雄　冒険家タイガー)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: A Hero Who Freed the Slaves! An Adventurer Tiger!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: A flashback of Tiger and Jinbe’s life is shown. Sixteen years before the Straw Hats enter Fish-Man Island, Queen Otohime confronts a thief. However, her hand is seriously injured. Despite this, Otohime berates the thief for raising children on the money that he has stolen and makes him promise to become a better man. Otohime announces that the Ryugu Kingdom must surface and unsuccessfully tries to sign a petition for equality between humans and fish-men. Meanwhile, Arlong and Jinbe have a disagreement over Otohime’s intentions just as Tiger arrives. Later, Tiger becomes an adventurer, Arlong goes up to the surface, Macro becomes a slave trader and Jinbe joins the army. As Tiger arrives back from Marie Geoise, the four form the Sun Pirates, who soon become known to fight Marines and considers freeing enslaved people as crimes.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kizaru Tōjō! Taigā o Nerau Wana (黄猿登場! タイガーを狙う罠)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Kizaru Appears! A Trap Aimed at Tiger
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The story now goes 15 years into the past, as Neptune, holding a baby Shirahoshi, comments on how Tiger's actions will make Fish-Man Island unable to attend the World Summit for a while. Otohime comments that they could never have stopped him after hearing the voice in his heart. Tiger's attack on Mary Geoise, is spread to the whole island and everyone celebrates his attack and freeing the slaves, calling him the hero of Fish-Man Island. Otohime tries to get others to sign her petition for migrating to the human world, only to be turned down by the people due to them celebrating Fisher Tiger and his attack and they all leave.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Chiimu Kessei! Choppā o Sukue (チーム結成! チョッパーを救え)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Team Formation! Save Chopper
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Toriko and Komatsu are seen fishing when Komatsu catches a Harusame. After defeating it, Luffy suddenly comes out of the Harusame's mouth and surprises Toriko and Komatsu. Soon, the Sunny arrives and Chopper is revealed to be sick. In order to make him feel better, they have to find the "Seafood Fruit" and make Chopper eat it. Thus, Luffy, Toriko and the rest head off to To-Chuka Island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Eiyū no Saigo - Taigā Shōgeki no Shinjitsu (英雄の最期 タイガー衝撃の真実)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Hero's Last Moments! The Impact of Tiger's Truth
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Sun Pirates get the Eternal Pose to Koala's hometown. Koala has been given a new look and has lost some of her trauma, as Aladdin notes that trauma is not something you get over so easily. Koala sails with Fish-Men and learn that they are not like Celestial Dragons. Arlong does not get along with Koala, while Jinbe changes his views about human beings, recalling what Otohime said about them and realizing she may be right.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kaizokudan Bunretsu - Jinbē tai Āron (海賊団分裂 - ジンベエ VS アーロン)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Pirates Split - Jinbe vs. Arlong
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Arlong is enraged over Tiger's death and, rather than choosing to obey Tiger's last wish, he completely goes against what he wanted and returns to Koala's home island to get revenge on the humans that sold him out. However, Vice-admiral Borsalino is there and easily defeats Arlong. Arlong states he's here to kill all the humans that sold Tiger out and how Tiger is now dead while Borsalino just states now he's going to take him with him. At the G-2 Base, Arlong is being interrogated and yells how if not for human's blood being the cause of Tiger's death, he would still be alive and states that humans killed Fisher Tiger.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Yureru Gyojin-tō! Hyōchaku Shita Tenryūbito (揺れる魚人島! 漂着した天竜人)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Fish-Man Island is Shaking! The Landing of a Celestial Dragon
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: With Jinbe having been accepted as a Shichibukai, the Sun Pirates return to Fish-Man Island. A few days later a World Noble on a wrecked ship arrives at the island and Otohime says to let them in. The past slaves arrive at the scene where the World Noble is lying on the ground, asking for help while he's shooting at everything around him. They all gather around the World Noble, who asks them to kindly return back to his home and be his slaves again.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Totsuzen no Higeki! Mirai o Tozasu Kyōdan (突然の悲劇! 未来を閉ざす凶弾)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Unexpected Disaster! An Assassin's Bullet Shuts the Future
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Vander Decken IX discovers about the Tamatebako and wishes to use it to age Shirahoshi after she grows up a little. Otohime returns with a letter from the World Nobles and all the citizens finally start giving their signatures after so many years of work. At the palace, Otohime explains to her sons about Shirahoshi's ability to summon Sea Kings and how if she loses control, she could destroy the island. The princes swear they'll protect their sister.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Futatabi genzai e! Ugokidasu Hōdi (再び現在へ! 動き出すホーディ)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Back to the Present! Hody Begins to Move
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: After Otohime passed away, Hody Jones had found and killed the suspected human assassin and showed him to the people. Back to the present, Nami forgives Jinbe for letting Arlong run free and Sanji kicks Luffy in the face for sleeping through the whole story. Suddenly, a large mobile visual Den Den Mushi appears with Hody making an announcement about the New Fish-Man Pirates' takeover to the entire island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Ōkoku Gekishin! Nepuchūn Shokei Shirei (王国激震! ネプチューン処刑指令)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Kingdom is Shaking! Instruction for Neptune's Execution
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Hody Jones makes his announcement to take over the Ryugu Kingdom with the execution of King Neptune as the start of his new rule. Hody also announces that he will kill the Straw Hat Pirates so that they will serve as examples to all humans in the surface. Shirahoshi tries to go to save her father, but was stopped by Jinbe and Hatchan. Luffy also tries to leave to face Hody and save his crew, but Jinbe will not allow him, causing them to face each other in a duel.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shōjita Kiretsu! Rufi tai Jinbē (生じた亀裂!　ルフィVSジンベエ)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: A Crack Arises! Luffy vs. Jinbe
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy and Jinbe start their duel to see who gets to fight Hody but their fight was cut short by Sanji and Robin's interference. Meanwhile, Hody has ordered all his men to move out of the Ryugu Palace to the Gyoncorde Plaza along with the residents of the Fish-Man District, allowing the captured Straw Hats to plot an escape plan. While recovering, Jinbe explains that if Luffy fights Hody now, the people of Fish-Man Island will see humans as a violent race, but Luffy says he has a reason to fight Hody to save his crew. However, Jinbe still will not allow him to go, thus resuming their duel.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Hōdi no Ihen - Kyō Yaku no Shin no Chikara! (ホーディの異変　凶薬の真の力!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Hody's Accident - The Evil Drug's True Power!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The New Fish-Man Pirates head to the Gyoncorde Plaza to execute King Neptune but before getting at the plaza, they demonstrate a little taste of their power by terrorizing and destroying everything in their path. By abusing of the energy steroids due to the pain caused by Zoro's cut, Hody transforms. King Neptune briefly explains the side effect of the drug. In the meantime, Luffy and Jinbe are still arguing about whom should stop Hody.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Kessen Hajimaru - Gyonkorudo Hiroba (決戦始まる ギョンコルド広場)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Decisive Battle Begins at Gyoncorde Plaza!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Neptune's army launches an offensive strike against Hody, but they are completely wiped out and Hody goes to Gyoncorde Plaza. Meanwhile, at the Fish-Man District, Vander Decken is despondent at Shirahoshi's rejection and decides to kill her. Hody is confronted by the army, but Ikaros uses a Sea Bear to attack. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi, Jinbe and Megalo leave the Sea Forest to confront Hody. Fukaboshi, Manboshi, Ryuboshi arrive at the plaza to save their father. Upon their arrival, Fukaboshi lectures Hody for trying to ignore the island's history of discrimination. Hody, however, has his beasts attack the princes and gives Energy Steroids to his crew. The princes are easily defeated and Hody laughs as Neptune watches in horror.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Sōgeki no Kokuhaku - Otohime Ansatsu no Shinjitsu (衝撃の告白 - オトヒメ暗殺の真実)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Shocking Confession - The Truth about Otohime's Assassination
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Jinbe and Shirahoshi are captured by the New Fish-Man Pirates when they fall into a trap due to a balloon version of King Neptune which easily tricks Shirahoshi and Megalo. At the plaza, the princes are tied up in the same manner as their father, with the New Fish-Man pirates chanting for their deaths. However, Hody Jones refuses to admit victory until he receives news that Shirahoshi is dead. Hody's underlings bring Shirahoshi, Jinbe, and Megalo to the plaza all chained up which greatly pleases Hody.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shirahoshi no Namida! Rufi Tsuini Tōjō (しらほしの涙! ルフィ遂に登場)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Shirahoshi's Tears! Finally, Luffy's Appearance!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Shirahoshi reveals that Megalo witnessed Hody shooting Queen Otohime and told her in secret. Shirahoshi recounts her promise to her mother about not to bear any grudge towards her killer and has kept the secret with her ever since. Jinbe is shocked at her keeping the secret for so long. Hody, however, laughs at her calling her actions stupid and taunts her saying that her secret would have stopped his plans for taking over the island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Dai Gekitotsu! Mugiwara Ichimi VS 10 Man no Teki (大激突!　麦わら一味VS１０万の敵)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Big Clash! Straw Hat Pirates vs. 100,000 Opponents
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The citizens marvel and celebrate at the arrival of Luffy and his crew along with the enemy. The New Fish-Man Pirates wonder how some of the crew had survived and are alive and Jinbe comments on how his plan with the Straw Hat Pirates crew worked. After a flashback of this plan and it being put in action along with a flashback of how Brook, Zoro and Usopp had escaped from the palace, it seems that the rest of the New Fish-Man Pirates are not concerned with Hody Jones, their captain, being hit by Luffy. Luffy seems to be not as harmed as he should have been as Hody berates Luffy and his crew along with himself, claiming that he will become the King of the Pirates. This enrages Luffy as he takes down half of Hody's forces of 100,000 with Haki and says to Hody that he will become the King of the Pirates and not Hody himself.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Oowaza Sakuretsu! Zoro Sanji Shutsugeki! (大技炸裂!　ゾロ・サンジ出撃!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Explosive Move! Zoro and Sanji Sally Forth!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The Straw Hat Pirates begin their attack with Luffy, Zoro and Sanji taking the lead in the fight but mostly it is the latter two of the three who begin showing their new powers and abilities from their two year separation. Zoro starts showing his new sword attacks and Sanji showing a familiar style of kicking.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Hatsu Hirō! Sanī-gō no Himitsu Heiki! (初披露! サニー号の秘密兵器!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: First Showing! Sunny's Secret Weapons!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The fight against the New Fish-Man Pirates continues as Franky reveals the two new weapons added to Thousand Sunny, Meanwhile, Hody calls Kraken to join the battle, but as it turns out to be , Luffy's Pet, it defects to the Straw Hats. Making things worse for Hody and The New Fish-Man Pirates.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Tetsu no Kaizoku! Furankī Shōgun Tōjō (鉄の海賊! フランキー将軍登場)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Iron Pirate! Entry of Franky Shogun
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The New Fish-Man Pirates commanders begin fighting. Franky unveils his new robo by combining two of the Thousand Sunny's weapons and begins to start fighting.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Noa Sekkin! Gyojin-tō Kaimetsu no Kiki! (ノア接近! 魚人島壊滅の危機!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Noah Approaching! The Crisis of Fish-Man Island's Destruction!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy begins fighting Hody using his new attacks enhanced with Haki. Meanwhile, the "Ship of Dreams" Noah, being marked by Decken to kill Shirahoshi, starts approaching the Fish-Man Island with Decken on it. In order to prevent the Noah from destroying the whole Fish-Man Island along with her, Shirahoshi starts swimming away from the island. As Decken's plan consists of destroying the whole island, Hody feels betrayed and angry, and starts pursuing Decken. Luffy decides to follow and protect Shirahoshi and asks Sanji to stay behind and protect the plaza instead.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Isoge Rufi! Shirahoshi Zettai Zetsumei (急げルフィ!しらほし絶対絶命)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Hurry Up, Luffy! Shirahoshi's Desperate Situation
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: With the help of Sanji, Luffy is able to pierce through the bubble successfully. He quickly latches himself to one of Noah's chains, with Hody on the other. Some citizens of Fish-Man Island try stopping the Noah from following Shirahoshi by pulling the chains, but their efforts remain fruitless as Hody attacks them. Seeing this, Shirahoshi escapes to the sea through the gateway, to lure Noah and Hody away from the island. As the Noah follows her and enters the sea as well, Luffy is knocked away from the chains due to the water force, but is able to survive in water using the bubble producing coral given by Jinbe. Hody starts fighting Luffy underwater, and breaks Luffy's air bubble. Luffy begins to drown, but is rescued by Prince Fukaboshi. Shirahoshi starts swimming upwards, as suggested by other two princes. The episode ends with Hody finally confronting Decken, and stabbing him in the chest with his trident, so as to kill him and make Noah fall on the island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Sentō Kaishi! Rufi tai Hōdi! (戦闘開始! ルフィ VS ホーディ)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Beginning of the Battle! Luffy vs. Hody!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Hody, after stabbing Decken, catches up with Shirahoshi. But then again, Shirahoshi is rescued by Luffy and Prince Fukaboshi. Meanwhile, on the island, Wadatsumi defeats Kraken using the powers of the drug, and then attacks Jinbe, but his punch is countered by Jinbe's roundhouse kick. Due to Jinbe's powerful kick, Wadatsumi falls on the ground, with its impact knocking down Nami too. Sanji, furious with Wadatsumi, starts fighting him along with Jinbe. Zoro is challenged by Nuru, the soon-to-be no. 1 Fish-Man swordsman, but gets easily defeated. Hyouzou, rampaging after the consumption of drugs, is then stopped by Zoro. Zoro admits that Hyouzou seems strong, and will be a good warm-up duel for him before going to the New World. The episode ends with Luffy stating that he'll protect everyone, because that is what he trained for those past two year.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Dairansen! Ichimi tai Shin-Gyojin Kaizokudan! (大乱戦! 一味 VS 新魚人海賊団!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Battle Royal! The Group vs. the New Fish-Man Pirates!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Luffy along with the three princes try to protect Shirahoshi against Hody Jones, the captain of the New Fish-Man Pirates, focused on killing the Mermaid Princess but seems to have an ulterior motive as Vander Decken IX is slowly losing consciousness and his grip on his Devil Fruit powers that keeps the massive ship Noah from falling on top of Fish-Man Island and its occupants therefore killing them is weakening.Meanwhile the other Straw Hat Pirates face off against the New Fish-Man Pirates officers who are equally eager to finish their opponents off as everyone prepares for the fight once again as the fate of the people of Fish-Man Island rests on Luffy's hands and his crew. As Luffy and the siblings deal with Hody, Decken falls after trying to throw his axe and passes out and the Noah starts falling to Fish-Man Island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Rufi Haiboku!? Hōdi Fukushū no Toki (ルフィ敗北!?ホーディ復讐の時)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Luffy is Defeated!? The Hour of Hody's Revenge
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: As the Noah falls onto the Fish-Man Island, Shirahoshi desperately tries to tell Decken to wake up only for Hody to attack her, but Manboshi takes the blunt of the attack. Luffy and Hody clash with Luffy sending Hody to the ship after receiving a bite wound. Hody, knowing that Luffy will have the advantage destroys the bubble on the ship leaving Luffy at his mercy but was saved by Fukaboshi. Fukaboshi then fights Hody himself and despite being heavily wounded in the duel demands to know why Hody is doing all this and what humans did to him. Hody smirks and gave him an answer which shocks Fukaboshi leaving him open and stabbed by Hody.Shirahoshi following Fukaboshi's orders swims away with Luffy next to the Noah and Luffy receives a call from the Ammo Knights at the air tank saying that they have prepared a large air bubble to surround Noah, but stated that they've only got one shot available, and it will not slow the ship down. Hody attacks Luffy again but Luffy destroys his Kirisame and sends Hody flying with his Jet Pistol imbued with Haki. Hody then shovels down more Energy Steroids causing him to grow larger and more enraged. Meanwhile, Fukaboshi, barely alive contacts Luffy and states he has discovered who Hody really is.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shōgeki no Jijitsu! Hōdi no Shōtai! (衝撃の真実！ホーディの正体!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Shocking Truth! Hody's True Identity!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The story goes back before the Noah started falling back to the island. Jinbe and Sanji continue to fight Wadatsumi and Wadatsumi becomes angry and inflates himself, crushing some of his allies unknowingly. Sanji goads him into growing larger after saying he's smaller than Surume.At that time, Neptune is greeted by some of his soldiers and the Minister of the Left, who apologizes for not protecting him. The Minister of the Right arrives at the plaza with some of the army and is informed of the situation. They join the battle against the New Fish-Man Pirates officially, allying themselves with the Straw Hats and Jinbe claiming they've made a terrible mistake for blaming them. Hammond is using human pirates as slaves in his Slave Tank and Jinbe asks Robin to free them, and she agrees. She frees them and easily defeats Hammond with her Double Clutch, breaking his back. The freed slaves then revolt against the New Fish-Man Pirates and ally themselves with the Straw Hat Crew. The Minister of the Left gets in touch with the Air Tank and is informed of the situation. He orders an evacuation of the island and all citizens attempt to leave the island. The whole island can hear Luffy's talk with the soldiers, Shirahoshi and Fukaboshi stating he knows who Hody Jones really is. He states Hody is a monster born from their environment. He states the officers are all the same and how they are just monsters born of hatred born from their ancestors and they fear their hatred will fade one day and so will their hatred towards humans and want them to be evil to justify their actions not even wanting peace for Fish-Men. He recalls what he asked what Humans did to Hody and Hody answers "nothing" and that they've been chosen by the heavens to punish humans and granted power. He goes on to state that their hatred is not from beliefs or experience, but they are nothing but empty opponents. At the same time, Hody laughs maniacally and with blood-shot eyes he charges at Luffy and Shirahoshi.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Zero ni! Rufi e no Atsuki Negai! (ゼロに! ルフィへの熱き願い!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: To Zero! Passionate Desire to Luffy!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: As Fukaboshi begins to state who Hody really is, Hody's past is revealed as he recalls his hatred towards humans. The New Fish-Man Pirates officers were taught as kids that the humans are an inferior species and that they should be punished by heaven.Time moves to when Hody was a Neptune Army member and he and his crew commit crimes, celebrate the death of Otohime, and start producing Energy Steroids. As the flashback ends, Fukaboshi laments how his mother was killed by the hatred of the Fish-Man Island and begs Luffy to reset their history to zero. Luffy gladly accepts because of his recent vow not to let anyone harm the island followed with saying that they are friends. Luffy prepares to attack Hody. Franky continues fighting Ikaros Much. Chopper continues to fight Dosun, revealing his new Heavy point. Zoro continues to fight Hyouzou and is mocking him by saying that he cannot even kill his boredom.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Rufi Konshin no Ichigeki! Hi Kenjū Sakuretsu (ルフィ渾身の一撃! 火拳銃炸裂)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Luffy's Whole Body Blow! Red Hawk Explosion
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Brook continues to fight Zeo and reveals his new control over his Yomi Yomi no Mi abilities. Usopp continues to fight Daruma and has set traps for him. Luffy attacks Hody with a new move called Red Hawk and it deals Hody an incredible amount of damage and sends him flying to the Noah.The guards announce Hody's defeat and the lower members try to run away with their captain defeated and Zeo stops them wanting them to die for their grudge. The lower members note how insane the officers are and the children wonder if humans are really that bad and Shyarly states not all are and for them to judge humans with their own eyes. Brook stops Zeo from attacking his men and declares the island will be fine and knows Luffy will save everybody. Franky, Sanji, Jinbe and Zoro prepare to end things with their opponents. Usopp is shocked to see Chopper in his Monster Point only for Chopper to be completely fine. Hody is not yet defeated and shovels down more Energy Steroids despite his injures and as Luffy arrives on the ship Hody recovers briefly and gives an angry look with Luffy in disbelief as to Hody still fighting.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Tsuini Kecchaku! Hōdi Saishū Kessen (ついに決着! ホーディ最終決戦)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Final Conclusion! Hody's Final Battle
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: Hody recovers thanks to the Energy Steroids and manages to overwhelm Luffy and bite him again in the same spot. Luffy retorts with another Red Hawk, but Hody is still standing. Chopper reveals he now only needs one Rumble Ball for his Monster Point. Usopp, Franky, Sanji and Jinbe prepare to end things with their opponents. Luffy attacks Hody with Elephant Gun and Hody is sent crashing into the Noah and is finally defeated. He wishes for the Noah to destroy the island and all the Fish-Man who've lost their pride.Brook finishes Zeo off. Usopp finishes Daruma off. Chopper finishes Dosun off with his claws. Franky blasts Ikaros Much with his laser beam. Jinbe sends Wadatsumi flying and Sanji finishes him off. Hyouzou attempts to attack Zoro from behind only for Zoro to counter and destroy his swords again and defeat him thinking he was a frog. Luffy uses Elephant Gatling on the ship and Hody is blasted out unconscious as Luffy attempts to destroy the ship.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Tomare Noa! Kesshi no Zō Jūranda! (止まれノア! 決死の象銃乱打!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Stop Noah! Elephant Gatling of Desperation!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: All of the New Fish-Man Pirates lie down defeated while the Straw Hat Pirates are relaxing and waiting for Luffy. All the citizens of Fish-Man Island are cheering for him to destroy Noah and thus saving them. While some citizens evacuate the island, some recall how Whitebeard also saved the island at a point in the past and how Luffy reminds them of him. Luffy keeps attacking Noah intent on destroying it while Neptune laments being unable to keep the promise with Joy Boy stating there is no choice but to destroy it. As Luffy continues to destroy the Noah, Shirahoshi jumps in front of him telling him to stop which he eventually does. He realizes that Noah has been brought to a halt by Sea Kings. However, he suddenly faints, falling back down to the Noah. The Sea Kings acknowledge the strength of Luffy's will. After everyone understands that Noah has been stopped, they start celebrating.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Mirai e! Taiyō e to Tsuzuku Michi! (未来へ! タイヨウへと続く道!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: To the Future! The Path Towards the Sun!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: With the Sea Kings having stopped and saved the great ship Noah, Shirahoshi learns a startling secret from the Sea Kings. Meanwhile, the missing and captured mermaids have been found but they have been replaced with some other valuable items from the Palace. The remaining humans and New Fish-Man Pirates are being rounded up and caught by the Strawhat Crew and Jinbe, while Shirahoshi rescues a collapsed and unconscious Luffy from Noah's remains. However, if Luffy is to survive from his injuries taken from his battle with Hody Jones and his unsuccessful destruction of Noah, the only thing that can save him is a blood transfusion, but the merfolk are reluctant to donate blood as it is forbidden in Fish-Man Island to give blood to a human. Jinbe volunteers, stating that he is a pirate. The episode ends with Luffy asking Jinbe to join his crew.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Akasareta Himitsu - Kodai Heiki no Shinjitsu (明かされた秘密 古代兵器の真実)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Revealed Secret - The Truth of Ancient Weapons
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: As the whole Fish-Man Island celebrates the capture and defeat of Hody Jones and the New Fish-Man Pirates by the Straw Hat Pirates, who make their own plans to leave Fish-Man Island soon while Jinbe reluctantly tells Luffy that he cannot join his crew at the moment but he will in the future when he is finished his own tasks and obligations. They are all soon called to celebrate their victory at the Ryugu Palace with the banquet that was originally planned.As the party begins to wind down, Robin asks and discusses a troubling and dangerous secret with King Neptune surrounding his daughter, Shirahoshi, the ship Noah, and the mysterious Joy Boy. Robin reveals the location of the ancient weapon from Skypiea she read two years ago being on Fish-Man Island and that Poseidon is on the island and deduces that the Mermaid Princess during the Void Century name was Poseidon and discovers that Shirahoshi is the now current ancient weapon, Poseidon.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Ichimi Kyōgaku! Aratanaru Kaigun Gensui! (一味驚愕! 新たなる海軍元帥!)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: The Crew Is Surprised! The New Marine Fleet Admiral!
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: King Neptune talks about the Ancient Weapons and Shirahoshi with Robin while Caribou listens and makes his way to Shirahoshi's room.Meanwhile, Luffy regroups with the rest of the crew away from the party after Jinbe insists that he wants to talk to him and explains that Akainu fought against Aokiji for the title of Fleet Admiral on a certain island. Akainu won the title and Aokiji left since he did not want to work under Akainu. He then explains the two changes that happened in the New World after two years: Akainu becoming fleet admiral and Marshall D. Teach taking all of Whitebeard's territories and claiming the title of Emperor alongside Shanks, Charlotte Linlin, and Kaido. Jinbe also tells of a rumor that Blackbeard is searching for the strongest Devil Fruits so he can extract their abilities and claim them for his own use. Luffy does not pay attention to Jinbe's announcements and instead asks Camie where Shirahoshi is, to which she replies that she is in her room. Luffy senses a "big animal" in the palace so he calls Zoro and Sanji to come with him and they find Caribou using his Logia powers to capture Shirahoshi. Luffy kicks him out and Minister of the Right thanks him once again. The Minister of the Right wonders why the tower has been cut into pieces and Pappug says that Zoro did it and Zoro gets mad.Meanwhile in Hody Jones's cell, Hody and his gang appear to be aged by the Energy Steroids and still want revenge against the royal family and humans. The Minister of the Left gets news that Baron Tamago and Pekoms, crew members of the Big Mom Pirates, are on Fish-Man Island. The Minister of the Left claims that Big Mom will destroy the island if they do not give her candy.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Okashi Daisuki! Yonkō Biggu Mamu (お菓子大好き! 四皇ビッグマム)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: I Love Sweets! The Emperor Big Mom
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The rest of the Straw Hats are waiting for Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji to return the treasure from Caribou. They find Caribou easily with all the treasure. Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji each take a huge bag of treasure. Meanwhile, Pekoms and Tamago came for the candy but the Minister of the Left claims that here is no more candy and the factory machines have been destroyed by Hody.Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji find Caribou and the treasure and start to carry the treasure back, searching for a ride back to Ryugu Palace. On their way back they see a crowd by the sweet factory. Luffy shouts out "Thank you for the sweets, they were delicious!" not knowing that the combats of the Big Mom Pirates, Pekoms and Tamago were there. Luffy gets interested by Pekoms and Tamago's looks and then realize they are part of Big Mom's crew. Luffy had been thinking Big Mom was "a good guy" because he has claimed the Fish-Man Island as her territory however realizes that she is only doing it in exchange for 10 tons of sweets.Big Mom in the New World on Whole Cake Island is waiting for the candy from Fish-Man Island. Bobbin comes right after Big Mom eats some of her crewmates. Bobbin tells her that he destroyed an island and it smelled sweet when he did. She then learns that Fish-Man Island will not be giving her candy. She calls Tamago and Pekoms and they dare not answer so Luffy does. Luffy tells her that he ate the rest of the candy and he is willing to give the treasure to her for repayment. Tamago sees the huge amount of treasure they have and thinks it would be a good idea to keep it however, Big Mom refuses and she says that she will go after Luffy in the new world. Luffy claims that he will beat her up in the New World and claim Fish-Man Island as his own territory.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Zentotanan - Shin-Sekai ni Machiukeru Wana (前途多難 - 新世界に待ち受ける罠)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Grim Prospects! A Trap that Waits in the New World
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The Minister of the Right is thanking the Straw Hats for saving Fish-Man Island. The Minister of the Right gets a report that the Tamate Box is gone and is in the hands of Tamago and Pekoms. The Minister of the Right was worried that the Tamate Box will be opened by them because had put bombs in it since the inside of the box was stolen by Hody 10 years ago. Caribou starts searching for his treasure that he stole from the royal family after realizing it was taken after waking up from getting beat by Luffy. Jinbe and Neptune talk about putting a new pirate flag in Fish-Man Island which is the Straw Hat Pirate flag. The Minister of the Right tells King Neptune that the Tamate Box is gone and it might explode in the hands of Big Mom. Jinbe decides to cut off the alliance with Big Mom before things get ugly.Caribou finds Tamago and Pekoms with his treasure that he stole and attacks Pekoms with his gatling gun. Pekoms is revealed to be a Devil Fruit user. Caribou then attempts to slice off Pekom's head but he gets punched in the stomach by Pekom's Haki imbued fist which penetrates Caribou's logia defenses. Pekoms and Tamago then leave Fish-Man island.Smoker and Tashigi are seen with the G-5 Marine Branch and arresting several pirates emerging from Fish-Man Island.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Tsui ni Shukkō! Sayonara Gyojin-tō (ついに出航! さよなら魚人島)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: Finally Setting Sail! Goodbye Fish-Man Island
Fisher-Man Island.episode_sumary: The mermaids and Camie from the Mermaid Cafe ask Madam Shirley if they can say good bye to the Straw Hats. Madam Shirley says that her prediction that Luffy will destroy Fish-Man Island might not happen after all since they defeated Hody and the New Fish-Man Pirates.Meanwhile, Shirahoshi is crying and asking the Straw Hats to not go. Usopp and Chopper complains that they are going to die in the New World. The Minister of the Left gives Nami a new New World Log Pose with three needles so they can get to the islands in the New World. The Minister of the Left explains about the new Log Pose's features when Luffy suddenly grabs onto Nami, wanting to see the new Log Pose. She complains and says that she will tell the crew where to go but Luffy complains saying that he is the captain so he should decide where they should go. Franky gets a new haircut and they start to leave but Shirahoshi comes and ask them to pinky promise to come back and the crew does it.The Straw Hats finally leave and some of the children of the Fish-Man Island ask their parents if they can get a Straw Hat similar to Luffy's and Jinbe says he will get some. Luffy then remember the times when Shanks, Rayleigh, Jinbe, and Ace told him something important. The Straw Hats then comment about what they will do once they are in the New World.

Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_jp: Shin-Sekai e! Saikyō no Umi o Mezashite (新世界へ! 最強の海をめざして)
Fisher-Man Island.episode_name_en: To the New World! Aim for the Strongest Sea
